anya-e0301n0:9_0: Sañjātaṃ so hadaye mayhaṃ, tamokhandhaṃ panūdataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:14_0: Na tāhi tuṭṭhiṃ vindanti, ye sāratthā bhimānino;
anya-e0301n0:15_0: Te maṃ saṅgamma yācanti, paramatthassa dīpanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:29_1: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ kattukāmo anuruddhatthero saṅgahārabbhe tāva sappayojane pañcapiṇḍatthe dassento ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n0:29_8: Sā sammāsambuddhamatulaṃ sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ abhivādiyāti etehi padehi dassitā.
anya-e0301n0:29_9: Sakalena ganthena abhihitā padhānatthabhūtā cattāro abhidhammatthā ganthābhidheyyo.
anya-e0301n0:31_0: Saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyoyevāti katvā abhidheyyo abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadena dassitotivuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:32_0: Na hi so appadhānatthabhūto saṅgahitabhāvo imasmiṃ piṇḍatthadassane abhidheyyo nāma bhavituṃ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:32_1: Ito paṭṭhāyaca ṭīkāyanti vutte imassa saṅgahassa dvīsu sīhaḷaṭīkāsu pathamāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:35_3: Saṅgahaganthe kate sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena anāyāsato laddhabbaṃ dhammānaṃ sarūpāvabodhādikaṃ
anya-e0301n0:35_4: anupādāparinibbānantaṃ ganthassa phalānuphalaṃ ganthappayojanaṃ taṃpi abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadeneva sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:38_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddena vinā anāyāsato saṃsiddhimattadīpakena saṅgahasaddamattena tādiso anupādāparinibbānanto payo janaviseso sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0301n0:39_0: 2. Tattha ratanattayavandanā tāva asaṅkheyyaappameyyappayojanā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:40_0: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akuto bhaye;
anya-e0301n0:41_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, yamettha mapi kenacīti.
anya-e0301n0:42_0: Ya metthamapītiettha yenakenaci api manussenavā devenavā brahmunāvā saṅkhātuṃ na sakkāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:42_1: Ṭīkākārāpi taṃ payojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti.
anya-e0301n0:47_2: ratanattayavandanā hi nāma vandanākiriyābhinipphādako sattakkhattuṃ sattakkhattuṃ anekakoṭisatasahassavāre
anya-e0301n0:47_4: So ca anuttaresu buddhādīsu puññakkhettesu saṃvaḍḍhitattā therassa ca uḷāracchandasaddhābuddhiguṇehi
anya-e0301n0:47_5: paribhāvitattā mahājutiko mahapphalo mahānisaṃso ca puññātisayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:47_6: So sayaṃ payogasampattibhāve ṭhatvā bahiddhā vipattipaccaye apanetvā sampattipaccaye upanetvā atipaṇītautucittāhāra
anya-e0301n0:47_7: samuṭṭhitānaṃ sarīraṭṭhakadhātūnaṃ upabrūhanaṃ katvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya laddho kāsassa janakakammassa
anya-e0301n0:47_10: Atha laddhānubalena laddho kāsena ca tadubhayena puññena nibbattā rūpārūpasantatiyo therasantāne yamakamahānadiyo
anya-e0301n0:47_12: Tadā tasmiṃ iṭṭhaphalaghanaparipūrite therasantāne aniṭṭhaphalabhūtānaṃ rogādi antarāyānaṃ uppattiyā
anya-e0301n0:47_13: okāso nāma natthīti iṭṭhaphalasantānavibādhakāni aniṭṭhaphalasantānajanakāni ca apuññakammāni dūrato
anya-e0301n0:47_15: Na hi kammānināma puññāni apuññāni ca attano vipākuppattiyā okāse asati vipaccantīti.
anya-e0301n0:47_16: Tato tasmiṃ santāne āyuvaṇṇā dayo iṭṭhaphaladhammā yāva ganthaniṭṭhānā yāva āyukappapariyo sānāpi vā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhatvā pavattanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:49_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyuvaṇṇo sukhaṃ balanti.
anya-e0301n0:50_1: Tasmā saṅgahārabbhe ratanattayavandanākaraṇaṃ therassa attanā ārabbha mānasaṅgahassa anantarāyena parisamāpanutthaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:50_3: sotūnañca saṅgahaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ ādimhiyeva ratanattaya vandanā siddhito anantarāyena gahaṇa kiccasampajjanatthanti.
anya-e0301n0:52_0: Sattasu javanesu pathamajavana vaseneva vandanā payojanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:53_2: Yathā hi āhārarūpassa dvīsu kiccesu ojaṭṭhamakarūpajananakiccaṃ parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:53_4: Tathāhi paṭṭhānepi tadupatthambhanakiccameva gahetvā kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayoti vibhaṅgavāro vibhatto.
anya-e0301n0:53_5: Evamevaṃ idhapi pathamajavanassa avunāva vipākajananakiccaṃ parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:53_9: Yasmā pana ganthābhidheyye ganthappakāre ganthappayojane ca ādito vivitesati sotu janānaṃ ganthassavane ussāho jāyati.
anya-e0301n0:53_10: Tasmā tesaṃ ganthā bhidheyyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ ganthe ussāhajananatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_2: Sammāca bujjhi sāmañca bujjhīti sammā sambuddho.
anya-e0301n0:54_4: So bujjhitabbesu ñeyyadhammesu bujjhanakriyāya asesabyāvibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0301n0:54_5: Tathāhi padesañāṇe ṭhitā paccekabuddhādayo attano visaye eva aviparītaṃ bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:54_6: Avisaye pana andhakāre paviṭṭhāviya hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_7: Visayo ca tesaṃ appamattakova sabbaññuvisayaṃ upādāya yathā hattha puṭe ākāso appamattakova ajaṭākāsaṃ upādāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:54_8: Te hi phassādīsu dhammesu ekadhammampi sabbākārato bujjhituṃ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:54_11: Te hi anamatagge saṃsāre anantāsu ca lokadhātūsu tiyaddhagate addhamuttake ca dhamme hatthamaṇike viya samasame katvā bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:54_12: Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāta māgacchantīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_14: Tattha hi te dhammā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaṃ abhidhammaṃ sammasanato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:54_15: Sabbaññubuddhā pana yattake dhamme vicāretuṃ icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:54_16: Tattake dhamme āvajjanāya visuṃ katvā āvajjitvā vicārentīti.
anya-e0301n0:54_17: Nanu dhammā mahantā bhavaṅgaṃ parittakanti na codetabbametaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_19: Saṃsaddo pana sāmanti etassa atthe upasaggo.
anya-e0301n0:54_21: Na me ācariyo atthīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_22: Nanu bhagavato tatīyacatutthāruppa samāpattiyo āḷārudakamūlikāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:54_23: Tā pana analaṅkaritvā laddhamattāva hutvā chaḍḍitattā pacchā bujjhanakriyāya pādakamattāpi nahonti.
anya-e0301n0:54_25: Tasmā tā bhagavato buddhabhāve sācariyakataṃ na sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n0:55_1: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi.
anya-e0301n0:57_1: Idāni thero attano vandanaṃ suṭṭhubalavaṃ karonto atulanti āha.
anya-e0301n0:57_2: Anekaguṇapadavisayā hi vandanā suṭṭhutaraṃ balavatī hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:57_3: Nanu ekaguṇapadavisayāpi vandanā antarā yanīvāraṇesamatthā siyāti kiṃ dutīyenāti.
anya-e0301n0:57_5: Viññujātikā pana satthuguṇatthomane mattakārino nāma na honti.
anya-e0301n0:57_9: Na kevalaṃ antarā yanīvāraṇameva vandanāya icchitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:57_11: Sopi hi anāyāsena gantha niṭṭhānassa ganthapārisuddhiyā ca paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:57_13: Citta samādhāne ca sati paññātikkhāsūrā hutvā pahati.
anya-e0301n0:57_14: Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:57_15: Tasmā tadatthāyapi attano vandanā suṭṭhu balavatī kātabbāyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:59_0: “Yathāvuttavacanattha yogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā atulanti iminā vise setī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:60_2: Tasmā taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ jānantānaṃsantike bhāvatthasuññaṃ satthusamaññāmattaṃ bhavituṃ nārahati.
anya-e0301n0:60_3: Aññesaṃ pana padasahassaṃ vuccamānaṃpi satthu samaññāmattameva sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:60_6: natthitulo sadiso etassāti vā atulo. Bhagavā.
anya-e0301n0:60_7: Na hi atthi bhagavato attanā sadiso koci lokasminti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:61_0: Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0301n0:63_3: Tadā hi mahāpuriso sampatijātova samāno puratthimadisābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0301n0:63_4: Tasmiṃ disā bhāge anantāni cakkavāḷāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:63_5: Tesu ṭhitā devabrahmāno mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadiso natthi.
anya-e0301n0:63_8: Tadā mahāpuriso attano sabbalokaggabhāvaṃ ñatvā aggohamasmi lokassa,
anya-e0301n0:63_11: natthi dāni punabbhavoti evaṃ achambhivācaṃ nicchāresīti.
anya-e0301n0:63_14: Yadā pana so sumedhabhūto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa santike niyatabyākaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e0301n0:63_15: Tadāpi thapetvā dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhaṃ pāramitāguṇehi tena sadiso koci nattheva.
anya-e0301n0:63_16: Natthibhāvocassa tadā pavatte hi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi asādhāraṇapāṭihāriyehi dīpetabbo.
anya-e0301n0:63_17: Tāni hi paccekabodhisattānaṃ satasahassaṃpi pavattetuṃ na sakkhissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:63_19: Teneva hi tadā pavattipāramipavicayaññāṇaṃ attano visaye sabbaññuthaññāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:63_20: Sāvakabodhisattāpi hi yato paṭṭhāya attano bodhiyā anurūpe sambhāradhamme sayameva jānituṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:63_21: Tato paṭṭhāya anivattidhammā hutvā vattānusārimahāputhujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā bodhisattabhūmiṃ okkantā honti.
anya-e0301n0:63_22: Ekena pariyāyena niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ca nāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:63_23: Tadā eva buddhānaṃ sammukhibhāve sati niyatabyākaraṇaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:65_0: Samitatthe yyakārassa akārassa vā vasena etaṃ siddhanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:66_0: Na hi tulasaddo dhātusiddho kammasādhano ca bhavituṃ na yutto.
anya-e0301n0:66_4: Evañca sati kammasādhaneneva tadatthasiddhito kiṃ tato samitatthe yyakārassaakārassa vā cintāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:66_5: Vatticchānugato saddappayogoti katvā etaṃ vuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n0:66_6: Yathā sutaṃ yuttaṃ vajjetvā assutassa parikappanāya payo janābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n0:67_1: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi satthu tisso sampadā vibhā vitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:67_3: Tattha satthu mahākaruṇā samaṅgitā bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca hetusampadānāma.
anya-e0301n0:67_4: Bodhimaṇḍe pavattitā catuvīsati koṭisabhasahassasaṅkhā mahāvajiraññāṇasaṅkhātā sabbaññumahā vipassanāpi ettheva saṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n0:67_6: Pahāna sampadāyameva vā sā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:67_7: Phalasampadā catubbidhā pahānasampadā ñāṇasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
anya-e0301n0:67_8: Tattha saha vāsanāya kilesappahānaṃ pahānasampadā nāma.
anya-e0301n0:69_0: Etāsu dvīsu sampadāsu ñāṇasampadā pathamaṃ vuttā,
anya-e0301n0:71_0: “Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ aggamaggaññāṇa”nti ñāṇasampadāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:72_1: Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:72_2: Yañca koci vadeyya maggaññāṇaṃ ñāṇañca hoti pahānañca.
anya-e0301n0:74_0: Ñāṇasampadāyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbapathamaṃ vattabbaṃpi na vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:75_0: Nanu “tammūlakāni ca dasabalādi ññāṇānī”ti ettha ādisaddena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃpi gahitanti ce.
anya-e0301n0:76_0: Na hi appadhānaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā padhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ ādisaddena gahitanti ñāyāgataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:76_1: Acinteyyānubhāvehi sīlā diguṇehi iddhi dhammehi ca sampadā ānubhāvasampadā.
anya-e0301n0:76_5: Ajjhāsayassa uḷāratā kāyavacīpayogassa ca parisuddhatāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:76_6: Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā āsaya sampadā.
anya-e0301n0:76_7: Loke abhiññātānaṃ rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ seṭṭhi gahapatīnaṃ devarājūnampi dhammaṃ desentassa lābhasakkārādi
anya-e0301n0:76_10: Dvīhi ānu bhāvarūpakāyasampadāhi saha dve sattupakārasampadā atulapadena.
anya-e0301n0:76_11: Hetusampadā pana dvīhipi padehi sāmatthiyato vibhāvitā.
anya-e0301n0:76_12: Na hi tādisiyā hetusampadāya vinā itarāsaṃ pavatti atthīti. [Sampadā]
anya-e0301n0:77_1: Punapi thero attano vandanaṃ balavataraṃ karonto sasaddhammagaṇuttamanti āha.
anya-e0301n0:77_4: sasaṅghaṃ lokanāyakanti hi vutte saṅghassapi namanakriyāpatti sahasaddena viññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:79_0: “Guṇībhūtānaṃpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṃ abhivādetabba bhāvo sahayogena viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:79_3: Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṃpi therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:79_4: Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā.
anya-e0301n0:79_6: Attano nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
anya-e0301n0:80_0: Apica thero imaṃ ganthaṃ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi,
anya-e0301n0:80_1: atha taṃ attano vandanaṃ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṃ gāthaṃ racayītipi na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:80_5: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo.
anya-e0301n0:80_7: Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:80_8: Na ca attanoeva saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṃ arahantīti,
anya-e0301n0:80_9: tasmā idaṃpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:81_3: Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:81_7: yesaṃ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti,
anya-e0301n0:81_9: Imasmiṃ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca nippariyāyato dhammonāma.
anya-e0301n0:81_10: Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā samucchindanti.
anya-e0301n0:81_19: Yo hi dhārentaṃ ekantena dukkhato moceti.
anya-e0301n0:81_24: Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena keci diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti.
anya-e0301n0:81_25: Te ca evaṃ dhārīyamānā dhārentaṃ yathārahaṃ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti,
anya-e0301n0:81_27: Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca attānaṃ apata mānaṃ vahanti etenāti dhammo.
anya-e0301n0:81_28: Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā janā laddhappatiṭṭhā hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:81_30: Nanu paṭipattidhammena saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:81_31: Sopana paṭipattidhammo maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n0:81_32: Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:82_2: Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:82_4: Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:82_5: So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n0:82_6: Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:82_7: Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti,
anya-e0301n0:82_9: Na hi taṃsaraṇaṃ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṃ sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:82_12: yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto,
anya-e0301n0:82_13: so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṃ satthuṭhāne thapetvā bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto,
anya-e0301n0:82_19: Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito.
anya-e0301n0:83_1: Samitakilesānaṃ tatoyeva pasatthānaṃ pūjitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:83_3: sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti santo dhammotipi saddhammo.
anya-e0301n0:83_4: Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā.
anya-e0301n0:83_6: So hi ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
anya-e0301n0:83_9: Gaṇuttamapade loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ samūho gaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:83_10: Idha pana uttamehi sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
anya-e0301n0:83_11: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
anya-e0301n0:85_0: “Gaṇānaṃ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:86_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:86_1: Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:86_5: Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṃ upasampadākammaṃ sammutināma.
anya-e0301n0:86_6: Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho sammutisaṅghonāma.
anya-e0301n0:86_10: Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:86_11: bhagavatā tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā so visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:86_12: Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṃ samānopi anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nahoti. Kasmā.
anya-e0301n0:86_13: Sālikkhette tiṇānaṃ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṃ sabbhāvāti.
anya-e0301n0:86_14: Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade vuttanayena veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:87_2: Ettha ca ayaṃ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti evaṃ seṭṭha cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:88_0: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
anya-e0301n0:89_0: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0301n0:89_2: Yaṃ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:89_10: Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
anya-e0301n0:90_2: Kāmañca thero imaṃ saṅgahaṃ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṃ katvāva racayissati.
anya-e0301n0:90_3: Ganthakammaṃ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:91_1: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā.
anya-e0301n0:91_3: Saṅgayhantitica therena saṃkhipitvā gayhanti kathīyantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:91_4: Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
anya-e0301n0:91_5: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṃpāḷi dvayaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:91_6: Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññattoti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:91_7: Tañca pāḷidvayaṃ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ vinayana kiccaṃ vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:91_8: Evaṃ dīpentesuca tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca.
anya-e0301n0:91_11: Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:91_16: Atirekavisesatā cettha kusalādi vasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena tathā tathā desetabbappakārānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:91_18: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ devesueva desenti.
anya-e0301n0:91_19: Na hi manussā evarūpaṃ tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattanayogyaṃ kathāmaggaṃ ekena iriyāpathena ādito paṭṭhāya pariyosānaṃ pāpetvā paṭiggahetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0301n0:91_20: naca eva rūpo ekamātikānubandho kathāmaggo nānākhaṇesu nānājanānaṃ desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:91_23: Tattha hi dhammanāmikānaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ majjheeva ayaṃ atirekavisesatā vicāritā.
anya-e0301n0:91_24: Naca yujjati vinayena saha tathā vicāretuṃ asamānakiccavisayattā.
anya-e0301n0:91_28: Kecipana vadanti evaṃ santepi vinayo eva sabbajeṭṭhako siyā.
anya-e0301n0:91_34: Tattha vinayaṃ vivaṇṇento satthu āṇācakke pahāraṃ deti.
anya-e0301n0:91_37: tassa dhammasaṅghesu tīsu sikkhāsuca agāravo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:91_38: Tasmā vinaya vivaṇṇane āpatti mahantī hoti.
anya-e0301n0:91_42: Tasmā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃpi vinayavivaṇṇane mahatī āpatti paññattāti.
anya-e0301n0:96_1: Evaṃ ādigāthāyataṃtaṃ payojana sahite pañca atthe dassetvā idāni te abhidhammatthe uddesato dassento dutīyagāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:96_2: Tattha tatthāti bhāsissaṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahanti vutte tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā vuttā
anya-e0301n0:96_3: abhidhammatthā sabbathāparamatthato catudhā hontīti yojanā. Etthaca -
anya-e0301n0:98_0: Tattha tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapakaraṇetivā abhidhammattha padetivā abhidhammetivā tasaddattho niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:99_0: Na hi abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇe mayā vuttā abhidhammatthāti yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:99_4: Na ca saṃvaṇṇanāpakaraṇesu ādimhiyeva tāva tasaddo appadhānapadāni paccāmasatīti atthi.
anya-e0301n0:99_5: Tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ādimhi tattha kena ṭṭhena abhidhammoti vākyeviya idha tasaddattho veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:102_2: Tatta sabbathāti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vuttena kusalādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva honti,
anya-e0301n0:102_3: vibhaṅge vibhatte na khandhādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:103_4: tattha satta puggala atta jīvādikā paññattiatthā sabhāvato avijjamānāyeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:103_5: Dhammavavatthānaññāṇarahitānaṃpana mahājanānaṃ citte mahantamahantāpi hutvā vijjamānāviya paññāyanti,
anya-e0301n0:103_6: teca mahājanā samaggā hutvā tesaṃ ekantena atthibhāvaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā voharanti ceva sampaṭicchantica.
anya-e0301n0:103_7: Tasmā te mahājanehi samaggehi sammatattātatoyevaca vacīsaccaviratisaccānaṃ vatthubhūtattāsammuti saccanti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:103_8: Tasmiṃ sammutisacce ṭhatvā sammā paṭipajjantā sabba lokiyasampattiyoca sabbabodhisambhāra dhammeca ārādhenti.
anya-e0301n0:103_11: Paramatthasaccaṃ pana patvā taṃ saccameva nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:103_12: Tañhi sayaṃ avijjamānaṃyeva samānaṃ mahājane vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:103_13: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhi tividhamicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ vatthu hutvā bālajanānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyātuṃ nadeti.
anya-e0301n0:103_17: Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiādīsu sattasu pakaraṇesu vibhattā kusalādayo dhammā sabhāvasaccaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:103_18: Te hi sayaṃ sabhāvato vijjamānattā kusalānāma dhammā atthi sukhānāma vedanā atthīti gaṇhantena visaṃvādentīti.
anya-e0301n0:103_19: Taṃ pana ariyasaccaṃ patvā kiñci asaccaṃpi hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:103_20: Tathāhi anubhavanabhedamattaṃ upādāyeva vedanā sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:103_22: Sabbehi pana aniccatā saṅkhatatādīhi anekasatehi ākārehi sabbāpi vedanā dukkhāeva.
anya-e0301n0:103_23: Tathā anavajjasukhavipākaṭṭhena kusalabhāvopi akusalaṃ upādāyeva vutto.
anya-e0301n0:103_24: Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā kusalasammatā dhammā sāsavatā saṃkilesikatā oghaniya yoganiya upādāniyatā saṅkhātehi vajjehi sāvajjāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:103_25: Dukkhasaccabhūtānañca vipākānaṃ jananaṭṭhena ekantena dukkhavipākāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:103_27: Sabbepi hi catubbhū makadhammā ekantena attāpināma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:103_31: Ayaṃ nayo sesattika dukadhammesupi yathārahaṃ netabbo.
anya-e0301n0:103_32: Ariya saccaṃnāma sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ekanta dukkhabhāvo taṇhāya ekanta dukkhasamudaya bhāvo nibbānasseva
anya-e0301n0:103_34: Idhameva hi parisuddhabuddhīnaṃ ariyānaṃ ñāṇe acalamānaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ nippariyāyasaccaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:103_35: Tesu idha sammutisaccaṃ nivattento paramatthatoti ida māha.
anya-e0301n0:103_38: Tattha yo vinā aññāpadesena kevalaṃ visuṃ visuṃ attano lakkhaṇena vijjamāno hutvā siddho.
anya-e0301n0:103_41: Vijjamānassapana atthassa nānā pavattiākāre upādāya cittena parikappetvā saviggahaṃ katvā gahito cittamayo
anya-e0301n0:103_45: So hi santi bhavanti buddhisaddā etthāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:103_46: Ekantavijjamānaṭṭhena itarato paramo ukkaṃsagato atthoti paramattho. Api ca,
anya-e0301n0:103_47: ye ayaṃ atthi ayaṃ upalabbhatīti gahetvā tassa abhiññeyyassa abhiññatthāya,
anya-e0301n0:103_52: Tesaṃ tadatthasādhane avisaṃvādakaṭṭhena paramo uttamo atthoti paramattho.
anya-e0301n0:103_53: Itaropana avijjamānattā tassa abhiññādiatthāya paṭipajjantānaṃ tadatthasādhane visaṃvādakoyeva bhavissati.
anya-e0301n0:103_54: Napana tadatthaṃ sādhessa tīti paramatthoti vattuṃ nārahatīti.
anya-e0301n0:105_0: “Paramassavā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho”tipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:106_3: So eva attho aviparītassa ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti saccikaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:106_4: Taṃpi aviparītena ñāṇena araṇīyato upagantabba to atthoti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:107_2: Etthaca cintanakriyā nāma niccaṃ ārammaṇāpekkhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:107_3: Na hi sā ārammaṇena vinā labbhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:107_4: Tasmā ārammaṇaggahaṇa ārammaṇupaladdhiyeva idha cintanāti daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:107_5: Evañhi sati bhavaṅgasamaya visaññisamayesu cittaṃ ārammaṇena vināpi pavattatīti evaṃ vādīnaṃ vādo paṭikkhitto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:107_6: Santesupica nissaya samanantarādīsu tassa paccayesu tehi nāmaṃ alabhitvā ārammaṇapaccayavasenevassa nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:107_8: Tañhi ārammaṇaggahaṇakicce pubbaṅgamabhūtanti taṃ sampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantā tassa vaseneva gaṇhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:107_10: Sabbepi hi dhammā taṃtaṃ kriyāmattāva honti.
anya-e0301n0:107_11: Na tesu dabbaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā viggahovā upalabbhati.
anya-e0301n0:107_13: Na te attano thāmenavā balenavā vasenavā sattiyāvā uppajjituṃpi sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:107_16: na kadāci kassaci vase vattituṃ sakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:107_19: aya kriyāti evaṃ vibhāgo nalabbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:107_20: Evañca katvā sabbesu paramatthapadesu ekaṃ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:107_22: Ettha ca dabbādivasena abhedassa cintanassa atthavisesañāpanatthaṃ vibhāga kappanāvasena bhedakaraṇaṃ pariyāyakathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:107_24: tathā karaṇañca taṃ taṃ kriyāsaṅkhāta dhammavimuttassa paraparikappitassa kārakabhūtassa atta jīva satta puggalassa sabbaso abhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:107_25: Sati hi attādimhi kiṃ abhedassa bhedakappanāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:109_0: Sasavisāṇaṃ viya abhūtassa bhūta kappanā vuttā viya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:109_2: dhammesu kattāvā kāre tāvā koci natthi.
anya-e0301n0:109_3: Lokepana attappadhāno kriyā nipphādako kattānāma siddho.
anya-e0301n0:109_4: Tasmā cintanakicce attappadhānatā dīpanatthaṃ taṃ kattubhāvaṃ citte āropetvā cintetīti cittanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:110_0: Cittassaca balena taṃsampayuttānaṃpi tasmiṃ kicce tadanukūlappavattidīpanatthaṃ punakaraṇabhāvaṃ citte
anya-e0301n0:110_1: kattubhāvañca tesu āropetvā cintenti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti cittanti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:111_2: Tampi kho bhikkhave caraṇaṃ cittaṃ citteneva cintitanti.
anya-e0301n0:111_3: Tenāpi kho bhikkhave caraṇena cittena cittaññeva cittataranti,
anya-e0301n0:111_4: nā haṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekanikāyaṃpi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:111_6: Tepi kho bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittikatā.
anya-e0301n0:111_7: Tehipi kho bhikkhave tiracchāna gatehi pāṇehi cittaññeva cittataranti.
anya-e0301n0:112_0: Tattha caraṇaṃnāma cittanti yatthavicitrāni dibbavimānādīni cittakammāni katvā idañcidañca puññaṃ karontā idhacidhaca nibbattāti dassento vicaranti.
anya-e0301n0:112_9: Yonivicittatāya tesaṃ tiracchā nagatānaṃ vicittatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:113_0: Taṃ taṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ, kiccasampattiyo raso;
anya-e0301n0:115_0: Āsannakāraṇaṃ yaṃ taṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0301n0:118_1: Cetasikanti ettha cetasi bhavaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti cetasikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:118_3: Etthaca tadāyattavuttitā nāma ekuppādatādīhi lakkhaṇehi cittena saha ekī bhūtassa viya pavatti.
anya-e0301n0:118_10: tadeva phassādīnanti evaṃ ekapuppha mañjariyaṃ ekavaṇṭupanibbandhāni pupphāni viya cittena saha ekajātiyādi
anya-e0301n0:118_11: upanibbandhā phassādayo dhammā idha cetasikaṃnāmāti siddhā honti.
anya-e0301n0:118_12: Evañca sati cittaṃpi tehi phassādīhi saha tatheva āyattaṃ pavattatīti taṃpi phassikaṃ vedanikantiādinā vattabbanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n0:118_16: Etthaca manomayāti manasāeva pakatā nimmitā cittakriyā bhūtāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:118_17: Etena te phassādayo dhammā cittena vinā nupalabbhantīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:118_19: Pañcaviññāṇa cittañhitehi kehici vitakkādīhi vinā uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:118_20: Tasmā tesaññeva tadāyatta vuttitā vattabbā na cittassāti.
anya-e0301n0:120_0: Ekālambaṇatā mattena tesaṃ tadāyattavuttitaṃ cetasi kattañca vibhāveti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:121_1: Ettha ca loke nānāvaṇṇadhātuyo udake ghaṃsitvā vatthumhi nānā cittakammāni karonti,
anya-e0301n0:121_2: tattha vatthumhi pharaṇaṃ bandhanañca udakasseva kiccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:122_2: Sītuṇhādīhi virodhi paccayehi visama pavatti vasena vikāraṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0301n0:122_3: tehi vā vikāraṃ āpādīyatīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:123_0: Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:123_6: Ḍaṃsa makasa vātātapa sariṃ sapa sapphassehipi ruppatīti.
anya-e0301n0:124_5: Tesañhi appaṭighasabhāvānaṃ sukhuma rūpānaṃpi bahiddhā sītādīhi samāgamonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:124_10: Samāgamoca nāma idha thapetvā āpātagamanaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇañca aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ ṭhitipattānaṃ oḷārikarūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:124_13: Ruppanañcanāma parasenāyuddhena raṭṭhakhobhoviya kalāpantaragatadhātūnaṃ kuppanaṃ bhijjanaṃca vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:124_19: Omattādhimattarūpasantatīnaṃ uppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ pattā hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:124_22: Tadubhayaṃpi kappavuṭṭhāne kappasaṇṭhāne nānāāyukappa saṃvacchara utu māsa ratti divādīnaṃ parivattaneca pākaṭaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:124_23: Kasmā pana rūpanti nāmaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena ruppanadhammānameva siddhanti.
anya-e0301n0:124_25: Rūpadhammā hi samūhasaṇṭhānādi bhāvapattiyā saviggahā honti.
anya-e0301n0:124_26: Tasmā tesameva ruppanaṃ paccakkhatopi lokassa pākaṭanti tesveva rūpanti nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:124_27: Arūpadhammā pana aviggahāti na tesaṃ vikāro paccakkhato lokassa pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:124_28: Taṃ taṃ rūpavikāraṃ disvāvā sutvā vā pucchitvāyeva vā so lokena jānitabbo aññatra paracittavidūhi.
anya-e0301n0:126_1: Yasmā pana vohāronāma lokopacārena vinā nasijjhati.
anya-e0301n0:126_3: Tasmā idha sītādiggahaṇena vināpi tappasaṅganivatti lokatova siddhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:127_0: Yasmā ca brahmaloke brahmānaṃ kāyavikāra vacīvikārā ca iddhivikuppanāvasappavattā nānārūpavikārāca dissantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:127_1: Teca ekena pariyāyena ruppanākārāeva nāma honti,
anya-e0301n0:127_2: tasmā tesaṃ vasena tattha rūpānaṃ rūpatāsiddhi hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:127_3: Rūpayati vā attano sabhāvena pakāsatīti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:127_4: Arūpadhammā hi na attano sabhāvena pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0301n0:127_6: Idaṃ pana attano sabhāveneva pākaṭaṃ pañcaviññāṇehipi gahetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:127_7: Imasmiṃ atthe sati brahmaloke rūpānaṃpi uju katova rūpatāsiddhi hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:129_0: Anuggāhakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena taṃ sabhāvā nātivattana vasenaca tattha rūpatāsiddhi vibhāvitā.
anya-e0301n0:129_1: Yasmāpana sīte nāpi uṇhenāpītiādivacanaṃ nidassanamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:129_3: tathāhi saññā viññāṇānipi rūpārammaṇarasārammaṇehi eva pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0301n0:129_5: Na ca viññāṇaṃ rasa meva vijānāti.
anya-e0301n0:129_7: Tasmā sītādiggahaṇaṃ amuñcitvāva tattha rūpatāsiddhivibhāvanena payojana natthīti. [Rūpaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:130_1: Nibbānanti ettha nibbāyanti sabbe vaṭṭadukkhasantāpā etasminti nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:130_2: Nibbāyantīti ye kilesāvā khandhāvā abhāvitamaggassa āyatiṃ uppajjanārahapakkhe ṭhitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:130_4: Na hi khaṇattayaṃ patvā niruddhā atītadhammā nibbāyanti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:130_5: Paccuppannesu āyatiṃ avassaṃ uppajjamānesuca dhammesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:130_7: Na hi tividha vaṭṭadukkhasantāparahitānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ anuppādanirodho nibbānaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:130_11: Tesaṃ tabbinimuttaṃ aññaṃ nibbutiṭṭhānaṃnāma kiñci natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:130_13: Nibbanti dhīrā yathayaṃ padīpoti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:130_14: Nibbāyantīti taṃ taṃ kilesānaṃvā khandhānaṃvā puna appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:130_17: Ṭīkāsupana bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbana to vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā.
anya-e0301n0:132_0: “Nibbābhivā etena rāgaggiādikoti nibbāna”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:133_0: Na hi maggeviya nibbāne katthaci karaṇasādhanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:133_1: naca nibbānaṃ nibbūti kriyāsādhane rāgādikassa kattuno saha kāripaccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:136_1: Idāni uddesakkamena cittaṃ tāva niddisanto tattha cittantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:136_4: Cattāro vidhā pakārā yassa taṃ catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:137_2: Kāmentivā ettha sattā avikkhambhitakāmarāgattā kāmaratiyāeva ramanti.
anya-e0301n0:137_11: Maraṇakāle hi upaṭṭhitā nirayaggijālā suvaṇṇavaṇṇāviya khāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:137_12: Eko kira micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo maraṇamañce nippanno hoti.
anya-e0301n0:137_13: Tassa ācariyabrāhmaṇā samīpe ṭhatvā brahmalokaṃ bho gacchāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:137_15: Tadā so bho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā paññāyantīti āha.
anya-e0301n0:137_24: Etthaca avacaratīti padassa uppajjatīti attho na gahetabbo.
anya-e0301n0:137_27: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:137_28: Yadi cettha so attho adhippeto siyā.
anya-e0301n0:137_29: Evaṃ sabhi etthāvacarā etthuppannāti vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:137_31: Naca pariyāpannasaddo uppannasaddena saha samānatthoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:137_32: Na hi lokuttaracittāni tīsu bhavesu uppannā nipi tatra pariyāpannāniyeva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:138_1: Evañca sati tasmiṃ kāme ye mahaggata lokuttaradhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:138_2: Tesaṃpi kāmā vacaratāpattidoso rūpāvacaratādi muttidosoca āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:138_4: Tesañca rūpārūpā vacaratā pattidoso kāmāvacaratā muttidosoca āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:138_7: Tasmā idhapi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attano attano bhummīsu uppannabahulattā kāmāvacarādi nāmalābhe sati na koci dosoti.Na.
anya-e0301n0:138_8: Evañhi sati lokuttara dhammānaṃ kāmāvacaratādi muccanatthaṃ yebhuyyena uppannabhūmi visuṃ vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0301n0:138_11: Tehi uppajjantā tīsu bhavesu eva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:138_12: Tasmā tesaṃ kāma rūpārūpāvacaratāpattidoso dunnivāro siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:138_14: Tasmāssa tathā atthaṃ aggahetvā etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannāti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitena pāḷinayenevassa attho gahetabboti.
anya-e0301n0:138_16: Kāme avacarati pariyāpannabhāvena tasmiṃ ajjhogāhetvā carati pavattatīti kāmāvacaranti.
anya-e0301n0:138_17: Pariyāpannabhāvocanāma attano ādhārabhūtena tena kāmena saha samānajātigottanāmatā saṅkhātehi paritobhāgehi
anya-e0301n0:138_20: Soca tathā pariyāpannabhāvo pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:138_21: Ettāvatā yedhammā rūpārūpasattasantānabhūtāpi mayhaṃ eteti kāma taṇhāya pariggahitā kāme pariyāpannāva honti.
anya-e0301n0:138_24: Tesupana rūpataṇhā arūpataṇhāca pariggāhinī taṇhā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:139_0: Yepana dhammā tiṇṇaṃ taṇhānaṃ pariggahavimuttā honti.
anya-e0301n0:139_1: Te tīsu bhavesu uppannāpi tatra apariyāpannāeva hontīti lokuttarā nāma jātāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:139_2: Etthaca paṭṭhāne āruppe kāmacchandaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca uddhaccanīvaraṇantiādinā arūpasattasantānepi kāmacchandasaṅkhātāya kāmataṇhāya uppatti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:139_3: Tasmā rūpārūpa bhūmīsu uppannānaṃ kāmadhammānaṃ pariggāhinītaṇhā rūpārūpasattasantāna gatāpi daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:139_5: Na hi jhānabhūmīsu ekantanīvaraṇakiccāni nīvaraṇāni sakkā laddhunti.
anya-e0301n0:139_9: Tattha thapetvā rūpārūparāge añño sabbopi lobho imasmiṃ catubbhūmiparicchede kile sakāmonāma.
anya-e0301n0:139_10: Thapetvāca rūpārūpāvacaradhamme aññe sabbepi tīsu bhūmīsu uppannā kāmāvacaradhammā vatthukāmonāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:139_11: Yaṃpana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā vatthukāmoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:139_12: Taṃ mahāniddese niddiṭṭhena suttantikapariyāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:139_13: Na hi rūpārūpāvacaradhammā abhidhamme kāmanāmena vuttā atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:140_1: Rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaranti ettha rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:140_7: Tatthaca heṭṭhā ekādasavidhā bhummi oḷārikena kāmena visesetvā kāma bhūmīti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:140_8: Upari soḷasavidhā bhummi rūpabhūmiicceva vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:140_10: Tattha nissayassanāmaṃ nissite āropanavasena nissayopacāro veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:140_12: Tattha nissitassa nāmaṃ nissaye āropanavasena nissito pacāroti.
anya-e0301n0:140_15: Ayamettha tebhūmaka paricchede pāḷianugatā paramatthadīpanā. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:141_1: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattīdeve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
anya-e0301n0:141_2: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:141_5: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā
anya-e0301n0:141_6: ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0301n0:141_9: Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanupage deve pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito nevasaññā nāsaññā yatanupage deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare. La.
anya-e0301n0:143_0: Yathāvuttaṃ suvisadaṃ pāḷinayaṃ aggahetvā aññathā vacanatthāca vinicchayāca ettha vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:144_0: Nanu aṭṭhasāliniyameva teca aññeca atthā vuttāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:144_1: Bhūtaṃpana suvisadaṃ pāḷianugataṃ atthaṃ ñatvā kiṃvikkhepenāti.
anya-e0301n0:145_1: Lokuttaranti ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko vuccati yathāvutto tebhūmakadhammo.
anya-e0301n0:145_2: Yathāha lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā lokoti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:145_3: Evaṃ sante lokuttaradhammānaṃpi nibbānavajjānaṃ lokatāpatti siyā. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:145_5: Yattha hi nicco dhuvo sassatoti mahājanassa micchāgāho nivisati.
anya-e0301n0:145_6: Tattheva tassa nivāraṇatthaṃ ayaṃ lokasamaññā niyamīyati.
anya-e0301n0:145_7: Tasmā sabbaso micchāgāhavimuttānaṃ tesaṃ lokatāpatti natthīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:145_15: Uttaraṇañcettha taṇhāttayaggāha vimuttiyā tīsu lokesu apariyāpannabhāvoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:145_16: Soca apariyāpannabhāvo kesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhāna bhūtoviya gayhatīti visuṃ ekā catutthī avatthābhūmināmāti.
anya-e0301n0:147_1: Evaṃ cittaṃ bhūmibhedena hīnapaṇītā nukkamato catudhā niddisitvā idāni tadeva catubbidhaṃ cittaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhakkamena
anya-e0301n0:147_4: Tatthaca sabbahīnaṃ akusalacittaṃ tāva dassetuṃ somanassasaha gatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:147_5: Etthaca kāmāvacaracittassapi akusalāhetuka sahetukānukkamo hīna paṇītānukkamavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:149_0: Upari vuccamānānaṃ bahūnaṃ cittānaṃ sobhaṇasaññākaraṇasukhatthaṃ appake pāpāhetukeyeva pathamaṃ dassentoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:152_0: Tesu tesuca bhavesu gahitappaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena lobhasahagata cittuppādāna meva sambhavato teyeva pathamanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:153_0: Ādito vīthicittavasena manodvārā vajjanasseva sabbapathamaṃ uppajjanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:153_1: Akusalesu pana lobhamūla cittaṃ bahukañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:153_2: Dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi yuttattā padhānaṃ pākaṭañca hotīti tadeva pathamaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:154_3: Na hi anavajjaṭṭhena sundaratā idha yuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:154_8: Etthaca sumanassa bhāvoti tasmiṃ citte puggalevā sumanābhidhānassavā ayaṃ so sumanoti sumanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:154_13: Yathā hi tattha attano dantanimittaṃ dantayutte nāge hananappavatti hoti,
anya-e0301n0:154_14: evamidhapi taṃ vedanānimittaṃ vedanāyutte manasmiṃ puggalevā abhidhānabuddhiyo pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:154_17: Somanassena saha ekato gataṃ pavattanti somanassasahagataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:154_26: Diṭṭhigatena samaṃ pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigata sampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:154_27: Diṭṭhigatena ekuppādatādīhi pakārehi samaṃ ekībhūta miva yuttaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:154_31: Tattha āṇattiyāvā ajjhesanāyavā tajjetvā vā idaṃ karohīti parehi kato kāyavacīpayogo payogonāma.
anya-e0301n0:154_32: Āṇattādināpana vināva kammassa karaṇatthaṃ taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ pare ācikkhanti.
anya-e0301n0:154_36: sayameva vā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ anussarati,
anya-e0301n0:154_40: Saṅkharoti attano pakatiyā kātuṃ anicchamānaṃ citta santānaṃ akātuṃ adatvā karaṇatthāya saṃvidahati tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme payojetīti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:154_41: Yopana paccayagaṇo tena saṅkhārena virahito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:155_0: Saha saṅkhārenāti sasaṅkhāro. Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti atthoti.
anya-e0301n0:156_0: Etthaca paccayagaṇoti ārammaṇādiko sādhāraṇo paccaya gaṇo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0301n0:156_1: Asādhāraṇopana kusalakammesu sappurisupanissayādiko akusalakammesu asappurisupanissayādiko paccayagaṇo visesetvā yojetuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n0:156_2: Sopana yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena vinā sayameva cittaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ katvā uṭṭhāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0301n0:156_4: Yadāpana tena vinā sayameva cittaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ nasakkoti,
anya-e0301n0:156_7: Iti asaṅkhāro sasaṅkhārotica idaṃ paccaya gaṇasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:156_9: Cittaṃpana asaṅkhārena suddhena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:156_12: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārenāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:156_13: Etthaca sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ hotīti yojetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:158_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā cittameva asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti ca gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:160_1: Saṅkharīyativā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena sajjīyatīti saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:161_0: Evañhi sati sasaṅkhārikapi cittaṃ tikkhaṃnāma siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:163_0: “So pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāneceva parasantāneca pavattatīti taṃ nibbattito cittassa
anya-e0301n0:163_1: tikkhabhāva saṅkhāto visesova idha saṅkhāroti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:163_2: Taṃpi asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikapadānaṃ vacanatthesu virajjhitvā tadanu rūpassa saṅkhārassa parikappanāvasena vuttattā nayuttameva.
anya-e0301n0:169_1: sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārikanti ce taṃ kevalaṃsaṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:169_3: Bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idhamatthitāya taṃ vasena nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:169_6: Taṃpi pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsiddhaṃ ujuṃ visadaṃ atthaṃ muñcitvā attano parikappanā vasena vuttattā na gahetabbameva.
anya-e0301n0:170_0: Etthaca attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ āṇattiyāvā ajjhe sanāyavā yācanāyavā pavattitaṃ cittaṃ payogasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:170_1: Tathā attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ bhayenavā lajjāyavā gāravenavā kathikāyavā daṇḍabhayenavā pavattitaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:170_2: Sayamevavā attano līnaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā tena tena upāyena attānaṃ ovaditvāvā taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ anussaritvāvā pavattitaṃ cittaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:170_5: Udāsinabhāvena pekkhati anubhavanākārena ārammaṇaṃ passatīti upekkhā.
anya-e0301n0:170_7: Yathāhi somanassa domanassāni ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato passanti.
anya-e0301n0:170_8: Yato somanassito puggalo tena ārammaṇena viyoge vikārapatto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:170_9: Domanassitoca tena ārammaṇena saṃyoge vikārapatto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:170_11: ayaṃ pana yuttitova passati na ārammaṇasaṃyoga viyogahetu puggalaṃ vikāraṃ pāpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:170_12: Kecipana upapattito yuttito ikkhatīti idaṃ idha nasambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:170_13: Na hi akusalaṃ yuttarūpaṃ nāma hotīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:171_1: Etthaca kiñcāpi phassādayo vitakkādayo mohādayoca dhammā iminā sakalena aṭṭhavidhena cittena saha gatā sampayuttāca honti,
anya-e0301n0:171_2: na pana te vedanāviya sayaṃpi bhedavantā honti.
anya-e0301n0:171_3: Naca diṭṭhisaṅkhārānaṃ viyatesaṃ imasmiṃ citte katthaci honti katthacinahontīti ayaṃ vikappo atthi.
anya-e0301n0:171_4: Tasmāte imassacittassa bhedakarā nahontīti idha nagahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:171_5: Lobhopana aññehi imassa aṭṭhavidhassa bhedakaro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:171_6: Vedanādiṭṭhi saṅkhārāca imassa aññamaññassa bhedakarā hontīti teeva idha gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:171_7: Nanu pīti māna thinamiddhānipi bhedakarāni hontīti tānipi idha sapītikaṃ apītikanti mānasampayuttaṃ mānavippayuttanti
anya-e0301n0:171_8: thinamiddhasampayuttaṃ thinamiddhavippayuttanti ca gahetabbā nīti. Na.
anya-e0301n0:171_9: Tesu hi somanasse gahite pīti gahitāva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:173_0: Phassādivitakkādimohādidhammā ito aññehipi citte hi yuttā hontīti nate aññehi imassa visesaṃ karonti.
anya-e0301n0:173_1: Tasmā te idha na gahitāti iminā adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “kasmā panettha aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu
anya-e0301n0:173_4: Phassādayohi keci sabbacitta sādhāraṇā keci kusalādi sādhāraṇā.
anya-e0301n0:173_5: Mohādayoca sabbā kusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetu”nti.
anya-e0301n0:174_0: Evañhi sati somanassupekkhā saṅkhārāpi aññesu dissantīti tepi aññehi imassa visesaṃ nakaronti.
anya-e0301n0:175_5: Somanassappaṭisandhikohi sadā bhavaṅgasomanassena paribhāvita santāno hotīti tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:175_8: Tasmā tassapi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:175_9: Iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti attanā icchitena hīnenavā paṇītenavā ārammaṇena samāyogo.
anya-e0301n0:175_16: Tādiso hi puggalo mahantaṃpi appakaṃ maññati,
anya-e0301n0:175_23: Tattha diṭṭhajjhāsayatāti kāṇāriṭṭhassaviya sunakkhattassaviyaca purimabhave diṭṭhi gatikabhāvena āgatattā imasmiṃ bhavepi sassatucchedāsaya bhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:175_24: Saddhammavimukhatāti ciraṃpi kālaṃ saddhammena vinā āgatatā.
anya-e0301n0:175_25: Micchāvitakkabahulatāti attano avisayesu sabbaññuvisayesu ṭhānesu attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā cintāpasutavasena micchāvitakkabahulabhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:175_26: Ayoniso ummujjananti attanādiṭṭhakāraṇameva sārato saccato ummujjanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:175_38: Imesaṃpana cittānaṃ uppatti vidhānaṃ visuddhimagge gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:175_39: Aṭṭhapīti pisaddena nesaṃ labbhamānakammapathabhedato kāla santānā rammaṇādi bhedatoca anekavidhattaṃ sampiṇḍetīti.
anya-e0301n0:177_7: Sā hi attanā sahagate cittevā taṃ samaṅgīpuggalevā dummanā bhidhānassavā ayaṃ so dummanoti dummanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:178_2: Saṅkhāro tāva imassa cittassa bheda karoti tassa idha gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:178_3: Vedanā paṭighāpana bhedakarā na hontīti te idha na gahetabbāti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:178_4: domanassaggahaṇaṃ tāva imassa cittassa kadāci aññavedanāyogatā pasaṅganivattanatthanti.
anya-e0301n0:178_6: Yadāca janā attano verīnaṃ maraṇe tuṭṭhiṃ pavedenti.
anya-e0301n0:178_9: Tadā idaṃ nukho somanassena yuttanti attheva pasaṅgo.
anya-e0301n0:178_13: Tathāhi ye natthikāhetukā kiriyamicchā diṭṭhikā pāṇavadhe apuññaṃnāma natthīti gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:178_16: Yeca pāṇavadhaṃ katvā yaññaṃ yajantānaṃ mahantaṃ puññaṃ hoti,
anya-e0301n0:178_18: Te sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vissaṭṭhā pāṇavadhaṃ sayaṃvā karonti.
anya-e0301n0:178_20: Tadā idaṃ diṭṭhiyāpi sampayuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:178_22: te kadāci tesaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā pāṇaṃ vadhantā ādito vematikajātāva honti.
anya-e0301n0:178_23: Tadātesaṃ idaṃ vicikicchāyapi yuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:178_25: Itarathā purima cittassa lobhasahagatabhāvoviya imassa paṭighasampayuttabhāvo cūḷanigameneva siddhoti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:178_26: Etthaca issāmacchariyakukkuccānaṃ thinamiddhassaca aggahaṇaṃ purimacitte mānathinamiddhanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:181_0: [29] Satipi imassa somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva domanassena imassa upalakkhaṇatthanti atthassa āpajjanato.
anya-e0301n0:181_1: Yathātaṃ satipi purimassa imassaca cittassa mohasahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva lobhena paṭighenaca
anya-e0301n0:182_0: Evañhi sati pākaṭena domanassena apākaṭānaṃ aññavedanā naṃpi idha laddhabhāvaṃ upalakkhetīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:184_0: “Paṭighasampayuttabhāvopana ubhinnaṃ ekanta sahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:186_6: Tattha dosa bahula bhāvato āgatavasena dosajjhāsayatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:186_8: Appassutassaca aniṭṭha loka dhammehiphuṭṭhassa taṃkutetthalabbhāti paccavekkhanā natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:188_2: Yasmāpana idaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahena laddhokāsena suṭṭhubalavantena mohenaceva saṃsappamānavikkhipamānehi vicikicchuddhaccehi ca yuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:188_3: Tasmā idha vedanāpi ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti upekkhāvedanāva yuttā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:188_4: Evaṃ santepi idaṃ cittaṃ somanassa domanassa sahagatānaṃpi anantare uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:188_5: Tasmā tadubhayavedanāhipi idaṃ yuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hotīti tappasaṅganivattanatthaṃ idha upekkhāgahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:188_7: Uddhaccaṃ pana sabbākusalesu yuttaṃpi idha laddhokāsaṃ hutvā suṭṭhu balavaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ idheva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:188_8: Tenevahi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ dhammuddesavāre uddhaccaṃ aññesu pāpacittesu sarūpato anuddharitvā yevāpanakabhāveneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:188_10: Yasmāca idaṃcittadvayaṃ sattānaṃ pakatisabhāvabhūtanti payogena vā upāyena vā kenaci uppādetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:188_11: Sabbakālampi bhavaṅgacittaṃviya anosakkamānaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ akicchena akasirena pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:188_12: Tasmā ekantena asaṅkhārikameva hotīti katvā idha saṅkhārabhedo na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:188_13: Tenevaca pāḷiyaṃpi purimacittesuviya idha sasaṅkhārenāti dutīyacittavāro navuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:190_0: Imāni dve cittāni atisammuḷhatāya aticañcalatāya ca sabbatthapi rajjanadussanarahitāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:191_0: Rajjana sahitānaṃpi lobhamūla cittānaṃ upekkhā yogassa diṭṭhattāti.
anya-e0301n0:193_0: “Tatoyevaca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāyaca abhāvato saṅkhārabhedopi nesaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:193_1: Tattha sabhāvatikkhatāya abhāvatoti iminā imassa asaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0301n0:193_3: Tadubhaye pana idaṃ cittadvayaṃ sabbaso saṅkhāravimuttaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:194_2: Evaṃ sati idha mohopi saṅkhāramutto siyā.
anya-e0301n0:194_3: Soca avijjāyevāti tividhabhāvova avijjāya tattha vattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:195_0: [33] Yasmāca idha tikkhabhāvonāma vinā saṅkhārena kevalaṃ pakati paccaya gaṇa vaseneva pavattanasamatthatā vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:195_2: Tasmā idaṃ sabhāvatikkhaṃ na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:196_0: Laddhokāsena mohena suṭṭhu muyhantīti mohamūhānīti vattabbe niruttanayena momūhānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:197_4: Pacchimovā evaṃ saddo purimassa itisaddassa atthavacano.
anya-e0301n0:197_6: Sabbathāpi iminā somanassasahagatantiādinā vuttappakāre nāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:197_11: Tesu tesu suttantesu vuttena pakārenāpi dvādaseva.
anya-e0301n0:199_0: Heṭṭhā vutto sampayogādi ākārova vibhāvito. Sopana iccevanti imināva siddhoti.
anya-e0301n0:200_0: Akusalacittānīti kusalapaṭiviruddhasabhāvattā evaṃ laddhanā māni cittāni.
anya-e0301n0:200_4: na hi ārammaṇa vijānanaṃvā ekantena muyhanādiviya sāvajjaṃvā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:200_8: Saddhādīnaṃpana mohādīnañca paṭiviruddhabhāvo yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:200_10: Suvaṇṇappaṭirūpakāviya pheggubhūtā abhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānāpi cañcalantiyeva vikkirantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:200_11: Niyāmaṃ okkamantāpi ekasmiṃbhave eva apāyabhāgitāya okkamanti.
anya-e0301n0:200_12: Napana kusalamūlāni sabbaso pacchinditvā satte vaṭṭasotaniyate kātuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:200_14: Jātisuvaṇṇāviya sārabhūtā bhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānā thiratarapattā lokiyesu yāva iddhividhānā
anya-e0301n0:200_16: Niyāmaṃ okkamantā apāyasotaṃvā vaṭṭaso taṃvā sabbaso samucchinditvā anupādisesanibbānabhāgitāya okkamanti.
anya-e0301n0:200_19: Apica kusaladhammānāma antamaso ālopabhikkhā dānamattāpi lokebhesajjavidhānāniviyaakusalappahānāya eva paṇḍitehipaññapīyanti karīyanti ca,
anya-e0301n0:200_21: Akusaladhammāpana loke nānārogajātiyoviya sakalalokassa pakatisabhāvabhūtāeva hontīti te pahātabbāevāti.
anya-e0301n0:200_26: Dvādasā kusalā siyunti ettha siyunti nipātapadaṃ idha daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:204_1: Evaṃ sabbanihīnaṃ akusalaṃ saṅgahetvā idāni ahetukaṃ saṅgaṇhanto tatthaca sabbanihīnaṃ akusalavipākaṃ tāva dassetuṃ upekkhāsahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:206_0: Taṃ akusala vipākattāyeva akusalānantaraṃ pathamaṃ dassitanti adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “tesaṃ akusalavipākā
anya-e0301n0:207_0: Evañhi sati kusalavipākānipi kusalā nantareeva vattabbāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:208_3: vijānāti vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmāviññāṇanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:208_8: Cakkhussavā indriyabhāvena sāmi bhūtassa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:209_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kaṭṭhañca paṭicca aggi jalati.
anya-e0301n0:209_12: Evamevakho bhikkhave cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:209_14: Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:210_2: Sampayuttadhamme taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā bādhati hiṃsatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:210_11: Tenevahi bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti ettha sampaṭicchiṃ sūti vaṇṇayiṃsu.
anya-e0301n0:211_17: Etthaca āloka ākāsādīnaṃ sannissayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tehi vinā rūpādīnaṃ pasādesu āpātāgamanasseva abhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:211_18: na hi āloke sati rūpāni sannihitānipi cakkhumhi āpātamāgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:212_0: Cakkhusmiṃpana asambhinnepi bahiddhārūpārammaṇe āpātaṃ anā gacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:212_1: Tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:213_1: Napana āpākāgamanaṃnāma āloke asatipi sambhavatīti dassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:213_2: Itarathā rattandhakārepi rūpāni cakkhumhi āpātaṃ āgacchantīti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:214_4: Yathā loke ambaphalādīnaṃ taruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma pariṇatabhāvappattivipaccananti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:214_11: Tattha pubbe taṃ taṃ kammāyūhanakāleyā kusalākusalacetanāya khaṇattayasamaṅgitā.
anya-e0301n0:214_13: Sāpana cetanā nirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā nanirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:214_14: Āyatiṃpana vipākapātubhāvāya attano sabbākāraparipūraṃ kriyāvisesaṃ tasmiṃ cittasantāne nidahitvāva nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:215_0: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
anya-e0301n0:216_0: Dahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmā channova pāvakoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:217_0: Sopana visuṃ eko paramatthadhammotipi saṅkhyaṃ nagacchati,
anya-e0301n0:217_3: Sopana yadā attano anurūpe paccaye labhati.
anya-e0301n0:217_9: Soca satto taṃ amuñcamāno yadi gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:217_12: Taṃ amuñcitvā cutassapana cutianantarameva so kammasaṅkhāto kriyā viseso visuṃ eko sasampayutto paramatthadhammarāsi
anya-e0301n0:217_14: ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamānotica yāva tāyukaṃ bhavaṅgakiccaṃ chasu dvāresu taṃ taṃ dvārikavipākakiccāni pariyosāne cutikiccañca sādhayamānoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:217_15: Tattha purimā tisso samaṅgītā taruṇā vatthānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:217_17: Iti vipaccantīti vipākāni mudutaruṇāvatthaṃ atikkamitvā pariṇakāvatthasaṅkhātaṃ vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjantīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:217_18: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānaṃpi kaṭattārūpānaṃ vipākapade aggahaṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:217_19: Tānihi kammasantānato visuṃ siddhattā visuṃ kammato jātāniyeva nāma honti,
anya-e0301n0:218_0: Yepana arūpabhāvena sārammaṇabhāvenaca kammena sadisa tāmattaṃ gahetvā arūpadhammānameva vipākattaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n0:218_1: Tesaṃ vipākasaddo arūpadhammesu ruḷhīvasena pavattoti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:218_2: Yañca tattha sālibījanibbattesu nāḷapattapupphaphalesu bījasadisānaṃ phalānameva sāliphalasālipakkanāmaṃ siddhaṃ viyāti upamaṃ dassenti,
anya-e0301n0:218_4: Na hi phalānipi taruṇakāle pākanāmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:219_4: Kusalassa vipākāni sampayutta hetuvirahato ahetukānicāti kusalavipākā hetuka cittāni.
anya-e0301n0:221_0: Pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunāpi idha vipākassa sahetukatāpasaṅgokato. So na sundaro.
anya-e0301n0:222_0: Na hi abhidhamme katthaci pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunā vipākassa sahetukāhetukatā sambhavonāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:222_1: Asatica sambhave byabhicārassapi abhāvato so pasaṅgo niratthakovāti.
anya-e0301n0:222_3: Etthaca akusalavipākānaṃ sayaṃ abyākatadhammattā lobhādīhi akusalahetūhica sayaṃ akusalavipākattā alobhādīhi
anya-e0301n0:222_5: Asati ca taṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo abyabhicāroyeva hotīti tattha ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:222_6: Kusalavipākānaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalavipākattāyeva alobhādīhi kusalā byākatayogīhi anavajjahetūhi sahetukatā sambhavo atthiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:222_7: Satica tasmiṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo byabhicārasahito hotīti tattheva ahetukaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:223_2: tañhi pañcadvāre ghaṭṭitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:223_4: Tañhi tasmiṃ āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjantaṃ pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:225_0: Tāva “manodvāranti ettha āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:225_1: Tadeva dvāraṃ āvajjanajavanādi thicitta pavattiyā mukhattā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:228_0: Yadihi yassa bhavaṅgassa anantaraṃ vīthicittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:228_1: Tadeva ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā manodvāraṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:228_3: Evañcasati yesu cakkhādīsu rūpā dīnaṃ ghaṭṭitattā āvajjanādīni vīthicittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:228_4: Tāneva ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā dvārānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:228_15: Khīṇāsavānaṃ anoḷārikesu ārammaṇesu yena cittena sitaṃ pātukaronti,
anya-e0301n0:228_17: Na hi khīṇāsavā lokiya mahā janāviya rajjanīyādi bhāvena oḷārikesu hasaniya vatthūsu hasantīti.
anya-e0301n0:228_18: Ṭīkāsu pana cittaṃ apekkhitvā hasituppādanti niddiṭṭhaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:228_19: Vuttanayena ahetukānica tāni vipaccana vipākuppādana kiccarahitattā taṃ taṃ kriyāmattabhūtāni cittānicāti ahetukakriyacittāni.
anya-e0301n0:228_20: Etthaca vīthimuttacittāni kiccadubbalattā pañcaviññāṇāni vatthudubbalattā sampaṭicchanādīnica kiccaṭṭhānadubbalattā
anya-e0301n0:228_21: attano ussāhena vinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena pavattantīti tāni sabbāni vipākānieva honti.
anya-e0301n0:228_25: Yāni pana cittāni vipaccanamattaṃ atikkamma attano ussāheneva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:228_26: Tesu āvajjanadvayaṃ vipākasantānato laddhapaccayattā thokaṃ dubbalabhāvato itarānica nirānusayasantāne
anya-e0301n0:228_27: pavattattā sabbaso vipākuppādanatthaṃ ussāharahitānieva hontīti tāni sabbāni kriyānināma jātānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:229_2: Tathāhi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva vatthūnica ārammaṇānica upādārūpāneva honti,
anya-e0301n0:229_3: upādārūpānañca vicupiṇḍakānaṃviya aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ dubbalamevāti tāni iṭṭhe aniṭṭheca ārammaṇe upekkhā sahagatāneva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:229_4: Kāyaviññāṇassapana ārammaṇāni mahābhūtāni hontīti yathā adhikaraṇimatthake thapitaṃ picupiṇḍakaṃ ayokūṭena
anya-e0301n0:229_5: paharantānaṃ ayokūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamma akhikaraṇighaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:229_6: Tathā tesaṃ ārammabhūtānaṃ kāyavatthuṃ atikkamma kāyanissaya bhūtesu saṅghaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:229_7: Tasmā kāyaviññāṇaṃ iṭṭhe sukhasahagataṃ aniṭṭhe dukhasahagataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:229_8: Sampaṭicchanacittaṃpana sabbadubbalānaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ anantaraṃ uppajjatīti niccaṃ dubbalaṃ hutvā sabbattha upekkhāsahagatamevāti.
anya-e0301n0:229_9: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana asamānanissaye hi tehi laddhapaccayatāvasena ayamattho vibhāvito,
anya-e0301n0:229_11: Tādisenaca balavavatthunissayena purimacittena laddhapaccayaṃ hotīti thokaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:229_12: Tasmā taṃ kusalavipākaṃ iṭṭhe upekkhāsahagataṃ abhiiṭṭhe somanassasahagataṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:229_15: Yadihi taṃ atianiṭṭhārammaṇavasena vedanā bhedayuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:229_17: Tattha dukkhena tāva na yujjati, kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:229_20: paṭighena paṭihaññattāeva domanassabhāvaṃ pattā domanassavedanā paṭighena vinā nappavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:229_21: Ekantākusalabhūtena paṭighena niccayogino domanassassa abyākatesu asambhavatoti.
anya-e0301n0:229_26: Evaṃ santepi taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kammānubhāvatoca muccitvā vipākasantānatoca paccayaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhitattā
anya-e0301n0:231_0: Pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahite ārammaṇe ekavā rameva pavattattā manodvārāvajjanañca visadisacittasantānaparāvattanavasena
anya-e0301n0:231_1: byāpārantarasāpekkhattā ārammaṇarasaṃ adhimattato anubhavituṃ nasakkotīti sabbatthapi majjhatta vedanāyuttamevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:232_0: Na hi cittānaṃ balavadubbalatāvisesoattanopacchā pavattassa cittassa vasena sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:232_3: Taṃpi hi visadisacittasantānaṃ attanāparaṃ vatteti yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:233_1: Imāni cittāni attano pakati paccayagaṇasamāyoge sati nuppajjantīti natthi.
anya-e0301n0:234_0: Ahetukavipākānaṃ aparibyattakiccattā sasaṅkhārika kamma viruddho asaṅkhārikabhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0301n0:234_2: Tasmā tesaṃ ubhayakammenapi uppatti therena anuññātāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:235_0: Etena tiṇṇaṃ kriyacittānaṃpi tadubhayabhāvābhāvo vutto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:235_2: Rūpadassa na saddassavanādīni sattā kadāci attano icchāya karonti.
anya-e0301n0:235_3: Kadāci parehi ussāhitā karontīti paccakkhatova siddhametaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:235_5: Tadā pañcadvārāvajjanādīni sabbāni vīthicittāni asaṅkhārikānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:235_8: Dvāra vimuttesupana dvīsu upekkhāsantīraṇesu aṭṭhamahāvipākesuviya vattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:235_9: Iti sabbāni ahetukacittāni tena pariyāyena saṅkhārabhedena paccekaṃ bhinnānieva honti.
anya-e0301n0:235_10: Evaṃ santepi apari byattakiccattāyeva tesaṃ saṅkhārabhedo pāḷiyaṃ navuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:236_2: Tasmā te dubbalakammanibbattesu dubbalavatthukiccaṭṭhānesuca imesu cittesu nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:236_3: Tattha sabbaṃ pāpakammaṃ vikkhepayuttaṃ sayaṃpi cañcalati dubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:236_4: Tasmā taṃ kappaṭṭhitikaṃpi samānaṃ kālantare hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:236_5: Tihetukakammaṃpi samānaṃ dubbalesu cakkhādivatthūsuca dassanādīsu kiccaṭṭhānesuca hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:236_7: Tasmā imāni sabbāni sampayuttaheturahitāni jātānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:237_0: 39. Sabbathāpīti padassa attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:239_0: Sabbathāpīti akusalavipāka kusalavipāka kriyabhede nāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:240_3: kriyacittāni kiccadvārabhedena tīṇīti ahetukacittāni aṭṭhārasa hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:242_1: Idāni heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ cittānaṃ asobhaṇanāmaṃ upari vuccamānānañca sobhaṇanāmaṃ thapento gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:242_2: Upari vuccamānānañhi sobhaṇatte vutte heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ asobhaṇatā avuttāpi siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:242_3: Tattha pāpāhetukamuttānīti pāpehi ahetukehica muttāni ekūnasaṭṭhicittāni. Athavā.
anya-e0301n0:242_6: Akusalānihi attasamaṅgino satte anicchanteyeva apāyaṃ pāpenti.
anya-e0301n0:242_8: Etena puññānaṃpi sugatipāpanaṭṭhena pāpatā pasaṅgo nivattito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:242_9: Na hi icchantānaṃ pāpane pāpanabyāpāro pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:242_11: Sobhaṇehi saddhādiguṇadhammehi yuttiyā tatoyeva ca sayaṃpi sobhaggapattiyā sobhaṇānīti.
anya-e0301n0:243_1: Idāni tāni sobhaṇāni hīna paṇītā nukkamena dassento somanassasahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:243_8: Sohi yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:243_10: Soyeva yadā attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:243_14: Sasaṅkhārena uppannaṃ sasaṅkhārikanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0301n0:243_16: Apica saddhāsampatti dassanasampatti deyyadhamma paṭiggāhaka sampattīti evamādi somanassakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:243_31: Yānica vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassaca kāraṇāni aṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:244_2: Tena imesaṃ idha vuttappakārato aññehi pakārehi anekavidhataṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0301n0:244_4: Imāni aṭṭhacittāni dasahi puññakriyāvatthūhi guṇitāni asīti honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_5: Puna tāni chahi ārammaṇehi guṇitāni cattārisatāniceva asīti ca honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_6: Puna tāni tīhi kammehi guṇitāni sahassaṃ cattāri satāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_7: Puna tāni tīhi hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi guṇitāni cattāri sahassāni tīṇi satāni vīsatica honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_8: Tāni imāni suddhikānīti katvā dvīsu ṭhānesu thapetabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:244_9: Tato ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā dvidhā karontassa ñāṇasampayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhica honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_11: Puna tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni catūhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni aṭṭhasahassāni chasatāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_12: Ñāṇavippayuttānipana vīmaṃsāvajjitehi tīhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni chasahassāni cattārisatāni asītica honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_13: Puna tadubhayāni sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ pañcasahassāni sataṃ vīsatica honti.
anya-e0301n0:244_14: Puna tāni pubbe visuṃ thapitehi suddhikehi sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ navasahassāni cattāri satāni cattālīsañca hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:244_15: Yaṃpana ṭīkāyaṃ idha vuttanayena suddhikānica ñāṇavippayuttāni ca visuṃ akatvā sabbāni puññakriyādīhi
anya-e0301n0:244_16: samaṃ guṇitāni sattarasa sahassāni dve satāni asītica hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:246_0: Suddhikāni visuṃ akatvā ñāṇavippayuttānieva visuṃ katvā tathā guṇitāni vīsa satādhika pannarasa sahassāni hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:247_0: Evañhi sati imāni kāmāvacarakusalāni niccaṃ sādhipatikāni hutvā niyatādhipatikānināma bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:247_1: Naca imāni upari mahaggata kusalāni viya lokuttarāni viya ca niyatā dhipatikāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:247_3: Yathāvā kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalātiettha ñāṇavippayuttānipi kosallena nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ pavattena
anya-e0301n0:247_4: upanissayañāṇena sambhūtattā kusalāni eva nāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:247_5: Evamidhapi tāni teneva vīmaṃsādhipatibhūtena sambhūtattā vīmaṃsādhipateyyānipi nāma hontīti na nasakkā
anya-e0301n0:247_6: vattunti iminā adhippāyena tāni visuṃ akatāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:247_7: Evaṃsantepi kāmakusalānināma adhipativimuttāni eva bahutarāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:247_8: Tasmā nasakkā sabbāni kāmakusalāni vīmaṃsādhipatimūlikāni bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n0:248_13: Imānipana tehi vuṭṭhitattā kusalānināma arogāni nāmāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:248_14: Tappaṭipakkhattāca sundarāni chekāni anavajjāni sukhavipākāni ca nāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:248_15: Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti cālenti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalāni.
anya-e0301n0:248_16: Kucchitenavā ākārena sattasantāne senti anusentīti kusā. Rāgādayo.
anya-e0301n0:248_18: Kusaṃvā vuccati ñāṇaṃ kucchitānaṃ sānaṭṭhena tanukaraṇaṭṭhena antakaraṇaṭṭhenavā.
anya-e0301n0:248_20: Kusāviya hatthappadesaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunantītivā kusalāni. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:249_3: Tānihi atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe yathākkamaṃ somanassena upekkhāya ca yuttānīti.
anya-e0301n0:249_7: Kadācipana tadārammaṇavasena pavattikāle yebhuyyena tihetukajavanānubandhāni ñāṇasampayuttāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:249_13: Tānihi paṭisandhiyaṃ purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ñātakādīhi tena tena payogena upaṭṭhāpitāni kammādīni
anya-e0301n0:249_15: Tādisena payogena vinā sayameva kammabalena upaṭṭhitāni gahetvā pavattāni asaṅkhārikānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:249_19: Tena ārammaṇachakka hīnattikavaseneva kāladesa santānādivasenaca tesaṃ anekabhedattaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0301n0:249_20: Yasmā panetāni dānādivasena kāyakammādivasena chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā ca na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:249_21: Tasmā tāni puññakriyāvatthūnaṃ kammādhipatīnañca vasena vaḍḍhanaṃ nalabhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:251_0: Imāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato kammadvāra vasena na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:252_3: Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yohi kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvāra kammapatha puññakriyāvatthubhedo vutto.
anya-e0301n0:252_5: Aviññattijanakato avipāka dhammato tathā appavattiyācāti vuttanti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:252_6: Tattha pana aviññattijanakato kammadvāra bhedo idha natthīti etena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti evaṃ bhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n0:252_7: Avipākadhammato kammapathabhedo idha natthīti etena dasavidhassa kammapathabhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n0:252_8: Idhapana kusalesupi kammapathabhedaṃ aggahetvā tividhakammadvāra bhedabhinnaṃ kammattikameva gahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:252_9: Tañca viññatti samuṭṭhāpanā bhāvato tividhakammadvāravasena napavattantīti imināva siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:252_10: Yadica heṭṭhā kusalesupi dasavidhakammapathabhedavasena visuṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:252_11: Evaṃsati idhapi avipākasabhāvato kammapathavasena napavattantīti idaṃ vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0301n0:253_1: Mahākriyacittesupi mahāvipākesuviya ārammaṇa vaseneva vedenābhedo upari sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0301n0:255_0: Tathā avicāretvā kriyacittānaṃpi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassa sahagatāditā veditabbāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:256_0: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpīti padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:256_1: Sahetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka kriya cittānīti ettha sahetu kaggahaṇaṃ kusala sadda sambandhe bhūtakathana visesanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:258_0: Sakkharakathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti suttapade viya idha yathālābha yojanāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:259_1: Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedenāti vedanābhedena,
anya-e0301n0:259_6: Saṅkhārabhedenāti saṅkhārena vinā sahaca pavattapaccayagaṇabhedasiddhena cittabhedenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:259_8: yadidaṃ suviññātānaṃ nānāppakārānaṃ padatthānaṃ appakena byañjanena dīpanasamatthatāti.
anya-e0301n0:261_0: Sayaṃ abhinnānaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhedavacane cittassa bhedakara bhāve ca codanāya anokāsatā sādhitā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:262_1: Sahetu kāmāvacara puññapākakriyā vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena yathākkamaṃ chaca dvādasaca catuvīsati ca matāti. Etthaca –
anya-e0301n0:266_2: Tattha kāme kāmabhūmiyaṃ pākāni sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni vipākacittāni tevīsa.
anya-e0301n0:266_4: Kriyāca sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni kriyacittāni pana ekādasa honti.
anya-e0301n0:266_8: Vibhaṅge vibhattena sabbappakārenapi catuppaññāsa evātiādinā tassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:268_0: Idha vuttānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ antogadhabhedavasena tassa atthavibhāvanā paṭisiddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:271_0: Bhavasaddo hi kusalākusalakammesu kammanibbattesuca vipāka kaṭattārūpesu vattamāno abhidhamme diṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:271_3: Bhūmītica sahokāso indriyā nindriyabaddhadhammasamūho vuccatīti kāme kāmabhūmiyanti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:271_4: Bhavotivā bhūmieva vuccati suttantapariyāyena bhavanti ettha sattā saṅkhārācāti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:275_1: Evaṃ kāmacittasaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpacittasaṅgahaṃ dassento vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:275_2: Vitakkoca vicāroca pītica sukhañca ekaggatācāti dvando.
anya-e0301n0:275_8: Kasiṇādikassa ārammaṇassa aniccādilakkhaṇassaca upanijjhāyanato paccanīkadhammānañca jhāpanato dayhanato jhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:275_9: Imesu dvīsu atthesu ekaggatāeva sāti sayayuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:275_10: Sāhi ekattārammaṇasaṅkhāto eko aggokoṭikoṭṭhāsovā assāti atthena ekaggasaṅkhātassa cittassa tathāpavattane ādhipaccaguṇayogena ekaggatāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:275_11: Sāyeva cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu vikkhipituṃ adatvā ekasmiṃ yevārammaṇe paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena sammāca ādhiyati thapeti.
anya-e0301n0:275_12: Indriyānañca samabhāvaṃ katvā tattheva līnuddhaccābhāvāpādanena samañca ādhiyati thapetīti atthena samādhītica vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:275_13: Sāyevaca pāḷiyaṃ avikkhepo avisāhāro saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti niddiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:275_14: Vitakkādayopi pana tassā sātisayaṃ upakārakattā jhānanteva vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:275_15: Tathā hi vitakko tāva cittaṃ thinamiddhavasena osakkituṃ adatvā daḷhaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n0:275_18: Vicāroca naṃ vicikicchāvasena saṃsappituṃ adatvā daḷhaṃ ārammaṇānubandhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n0:275_21: Pītica cittaṃ byāpādavasena ukkaṇṭhituṃ adatvā ārammaṇe parituṭṭhameva karoti.
anya-e0301n0:275_24: Tathā sukhañca naṃ uddhacca kukkuccavasena avūpasamituṃ adatvā ārammaṇe laddhasātaṃ upabrūhitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:276_1: Evaṃ karontāca te dhammā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tassa cittassa suṭṭhu ekaggabhāvatthāyaca honti.
anya-e0301n0:276_3: Sāca ekaggatā tehi dhammehi tathā anuggahitā suṭṭhu balavatī hutvā sayaṃ kāmacchandavasena nānārammaṇesu
anya-e0301n0:276_4: cittavidhāvanaṃ nīvāretvā kasiṇanimittādike tasmiṃ ārammaṇe niccalaṃ ṭhatvā taṃārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhāyati oloketi.
anya-e0301n0:276_5: Tasmā te sabbepi dhammā upanijjhāyanaṭṭhenapi jhānanti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:276_6: Tesuca tathā pavattamānesu tappaccanīkā nīvaraṇadhammā okāsaṃ alabhitvā manasmiṃpi pariyuṭṭhituṃ nasakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:276_9: Evaṃ santepi yasmā jhāna magga sambodhisaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu dhammasāmaggī padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:276_10: Aṅgānaṃ samaggabhāveeva appanāpattivasena upanijjhāya nādi kiccasaṃsiddhito.
anya-e0301n0:276_11: Yasmāca ete dhammā vuttanayena visuṃvisuṃ attano kiccaṃ karontāpi cittassa ārammaṇe niccalappavatti saṅkhātaṃ ekameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n0:276_12: Tasmā rathaṅgānaṃ samudāyeeva rathavohāroviya tesaṃ samudāyeeva jhāna vohāro siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:276_13: Aparepana pañcannaṃpi tesaṃ ārammaṇābhiniropanādīni yathāsakaṃ kiccāniyeva visuṃ visuṃ upanijjhānakiccānināma
anya-e0301n0:276_14: hontīti paṭṭhāne jhānapaccayaṃ patvā sabbepete visuṃ visuṃ jhānapaccayaṃ sādhentiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:276_15: Tasmā te visuṃ visuṃpi jhānāniyeva hontīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:276_16: Yathāca pañcaṅgikaṃ sīlaṃ dasaṅgikaṃ sīlanti ettha pañcasamuditādīni tesaṃ sīlānaṃ pañcaṅgikā dināmalābhasseva kāraṇāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:276_18: Na hi pāṇātipātā veramaṇādikaṃ ekaṃpi samānaṃ sīlaṃnāma na hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:276_19: Evamevaṃ idhapi pañcasamuditādīni pañcaṅgikādi bhāvasseva pathamajjhānādi bhāvassevaca kāraṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:276_21: Itarathā jhānapaccaye jhānaṅgāni paccaniyāniyeva siyuntipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:276_22: Ettāvatā satipi imassa cittassa phassādīhipi sahitabhāve tesaṃ tathāvidhakiccavisesābhāvā idha aggahaṇantipi siddhaṃ nahotīti.
anya-e0301n0:276_23: Vicārapītisukhekaggatā saṅkhātena dutīyajjhānena sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ dutīyajjhāna kusalacittaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:277_4: Yohi vitakkasahāyo hutvā pañcaṅgikaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tattha vasībhāvaṃ katvā punavitakke nibbindati.
anya-e0301n0:277_5: Tassa vitakkaṃ samatikkamitvā avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ adhigantuṃ ajjhāsayo saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:277_6: Tadā so tameva pathamajjhānaṃ pādakabhāvatthāya daḷhaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tena ajjhāsayena saheva
anya-e0301n0:277_7: punabhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0301n0:277_8: Tattha sā bhāvanāsayaṃ vitakkayuttāpi tena ajjhāsayena paribhāvitattā vitakkavirāga bhāvanānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:277_10: Balena taṃ jhānaṃ uppajja mānaṃ avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:277_12: Evaṃ puggalajjhāsayena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhedo katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:277_13: Etthaca uttaruttarajjhānā dhigamane pādakabhāvatthāya purimapurimajjhānassa samāpajjanaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:277_14: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:277_17: Tenāha bhagavā ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattāti.
anya-e0301n0:277_18: Ayañca attho upari lokuttaracittaṃ patvā āvi bhavissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:278_6: Tathāhi sabbesaṃpi lokiya lokuttarajjhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadabhāve siddhe asaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:278_7: Dukkhappaṭipadabhāveca siddhe tesaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:279_0: Yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n0:279_2: Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n0:280_1: Etthaca pubbavākye dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogenāti diṭṭhattā paravākyepi sukhe na asaṅkhārena appayogenāti diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:280_2: Tattha sasaṅkhārena sappayogenāti saṅkhārappayogasahitena kāmādīnavadassanādinā paccayagaṇenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:280_3: Etena sabbesaṃ dukkhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo vutto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:280_5: Etena sabbesaṃ sukhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ asaṅkhārikabhāvo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:280_8: Yadievaṃ paṭipadārahitānaṃ magga siddhaupapattisiddhajjhānānaṃ kathaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddhoti.
anya-e0301n0:280_9: Tesaṃpi vaḷañjanakāle samāpattippaṭibandhakānaṃ paccayānaṃ sannihitā sannihitavasena dukkhasukhappaṭipadabhāvasambhavo hotiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:280_10: Tattha maggasiddhajjhānaṃnāma suddhavipassanāyānikānaṃ maggappaṭilābhena saheva siddhajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:280_13: Tattha mahāsamayasutte āgatānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhānaṃ heṭṭhima maggasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:280_15: Yaṃpi anāgāmīnaṃ ajānantānaññeva satthena hanitvā sahasā marantānaṃ uppannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:280_17: Yopana aṭṭhasamāpattiyo bhāvetvā aññatarasmiṃ rūpi brahmaloke nibbatti.
anya-e0301n0:280_18: Tassa tā samāpatti yo tattha pākatikāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:280_20: Ekasmiṃ bhavepi hi laddhajjhānāni vaḷañjanakāle sannihitapaccayavasena nānāpaṭipadāyuttāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:280_21: Jhānuppattippaṭipadā rahitattāvā asaṅkhārikajjhānesu tesaṃ saṅgaho yutto siyāti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:280_22: nettipāḷiyaṃ sabbesaṃ lokiya lokuttarasamādhīnaṃ saṅkhārabhedo sarūpatova niddiṭṭho. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:280_23: dve samādhayo sasaṅkhāro samādhi asaṅkhāro samādhīti.
anya-e0301n0:280_24: Aṭṭhakathāyañca sukhappaṭipadā pubbakānaṃ dvinnaṃ dandhābhiññakhippābhiññasamādhīnaṃ asaṅkhārabhāvo dukkhappaṭipadā
anya-e0301n0:280_26: Ettāvatā sabbesaṃ mahaggatalokuttarajjhānacittānaṃ asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikavasena visuṃ visuṃ duvidhabhāvo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:280_30: Tasmā tesaṃ bhedaṃ saṅkhāravasena avatvā paṭipadāvaseneva dhammasaṅgaṇi pāḷiyaṃpi vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:282_0: “Sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato asaṅkhārikantipi.
anya-e0301n0:282_1: Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkāravaseneva anuppajjanato sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:282_3: Asaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti idaṃ tāva nayujjati.
anya-e0301n0:283_0: Na hi parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhāro imasmiṃ saṅkhārabhede saṅkhāro evanāma hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:283_2: tathāhi loke sāsaneca sabbaṃpi kusalākusala kammaṃ attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā uppannaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:283_4: Yañca cittaṃ yena attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhātapubbā bhisaṅkhārena vinā na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:283_5: So tassa cittassa pakatipaccayagaṇeevaanto gadho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:283_6: Jhānānica lokiya lokuttara bhūtāni sabbāni attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta pubbabhāgabhāvanā bhisaṅkhārena
anya-e0301n0:283_7: vinā uppannānināma natthīti so tesaṃ pakatipaccayagaṇesueva antogadho hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:283_8: Itarathā sabbaṃpi kusalākusala kammaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ nāmanatthīti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:285_0: Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ.La. Sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:286_0: Na hi lokiyajjhānānināma adhikārena vinā nuppajjantīti atthi.
anya-e0301n0:286_1: Kevalaṃpana pubbe samathakammesu katādhikārassa sukhappaṭipadajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:286_6: purimabhave siddhaṃ adhikāraṃ gahetvā idha saṅkhārabhedavicāraṇāpi nayuttāeva.
anya-e0301n0:286_7: Kusalakriyajjhānesu hi sanni hitapaccayavaseneva tabbicāraṇā yuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:288_0: Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappopi paṭikkhitto eva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:289_1: Ettha jhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa nimittuppādato pubbaṃ paṭipadāya khettaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:289_3: Tattha pubbe viruddhapaccayānaṃ sannihitena kilamantassa sato paṭipajjantassa bhāvanā paṭipadā dukkhānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:289_5: Pacchāca dandhaṃ appanaṃ pattassa bhāvanābhiññā dandhābhiññānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:289_7: Tattha pubbe dukkhā paṭipadā pacchā dandhaṃvā khippaṃvā uppannaṃ jhānaṃ dukkhappaṭipadaṃnāma karoti.
anya-e0301n0:289_9: Dutīyajjhānādīsupana purimajjhāne nikanti vikkhambhanassa dukkhasukhatāvasena paṭipadābhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:289_10: Yopana etarahi gahaṭṭhovā pabbajitovā pubbabhave akatādhikāropi antarāyikadhammamutto kalyāṇapaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:289_12: Tassa jhānabhāvanā nasampajjatīti natthīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:290_1: Vipākajjhāne kāmakusalaṃ appanaṃ apattaṃ mudubhūtaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:290_3: Tasmā taṃ attanā asadisaṃpi vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n0:290_6: Tasmā taṃ sadāpi attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n0:290_7: Teneva vitakkavicārapīti sukhekaggatā sahitantiādinā vipākaṃpi sabbaso kusala sadisameva dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:291_0: [50] Anantarabhaveyeva phaladānattā taṃ attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janetītica vadanti,
anya-e0301n0:292_0: Evañhi sati kāmakusalaṃpi sattamajavanaṃ attanā sadisavipāka meva janeyyāti.
anya-e0301n0:292_1: Yasmāca kusalameva niranusayasantāne pavattaṃ kriyajjhānaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:293_2: Tattha jhānabhedenāti pathamajjhānādīhi pañcahi jhānehi sampayogabhedena.
anya-e0301n0:295_0: Jhānabhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:298_0: “Pañcadhāti pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti pañcavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:299_0: Jhānameva hi pañcaṅgikādi hoti. Na cittanti.
anya-e0301n0:301_1: Idāni yathānuppattaṃ arūpacittaṃ niddisanto ākāsānañcā yatanakusalacittantiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:301_3: So hi sayaṃ sarūpato anupalabbhamānopi candasūriyobhāsādīnaṃ vasena ativijjotamānoviya khāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:301_4: Nakassati chedana bhedana vasena na vilekhīyatīti akāso.
anya-e0301n0:301_6: So pana ajaṭākāso paricchinnākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso rūpakalāpaparicchedākāsoti catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:301_8: So hi anantena ajaṭākāsena saha ekībhūtoviya hoti.
anya-e0301n0:301_11: Nāssa uppādantovā vayantovā paññāyatīti anantotipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:301_14: Yathā pana devānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthu devāyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:301_15: Tathā idhapi tasmiṃ appanāpattassa sasampayuttassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tadeva āyatanantipi vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:302_0: Ākāsānañcā yatananti ākāsānañcā yatanaṃ samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā citta ceta sikādhammāti hi vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:303_2: Taṃpana sayaṃ uppādādi antavantaṃpi anantasaññite ākāse pavattanato anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:303_4: Attano uppādādīsu koṭṭhāsesu ekadese aṭṭhatvā sakalassa pharaṇavasena tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāya pavattanato anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:303_5: Anantasaññitevā ākāse pavattanato anantanti evaṃ tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāya pavattattā anantanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:303_6: Anantasaññitevā ākāse attano pharaṇākāra vasenapi anantanti vattuṃ yujjatiyeva.
