anya-e0301n0:306_0: “Dutīyā ruppa viññāṇena añcitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañca”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:307_0: Anantaṃ viññāṇanti tadeva viññāṇaṃ ñāṇena phuṭṭhaṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0301n0:307_3: Etena ca taṃviññāṇaṃ ekantena anantavisesanayuttaṃ hotīti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:307_5: Ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha kiñci kiñcananti atthato ekaṃ appamattakassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:307_6: Natthi kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattaṃpi avasiṭṭhaṃ assa pathamā ruppaviññāṇassāti akiñcanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:307_9: So hi natthi kiñcīti manasikāra vasena taṃnāmaṃ labhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:307_11: Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatananti ettha oḷārika saññaṃ sandhāya nevatthi saññā assāti nevasaññaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:307_12: Sukhumasaññaṃ sandhāya naca natthi saññā assāti nāsaññaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:307_13: nevasaññañca taṃ nāsaññañcāti nevasaññā nāsaññaṃ majjhe dīghaṃ katvā,
anya-e0301n0:307_15: Tameva yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatananti nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:307_16: Tasmiṃ pavattaṃ kusala cittanti samāso. Athavā.
anya-e0301n0:307_18: Saṅkhārāvasesa sukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā asaññāca nahotīti katvā nevasaññānā saññānāma,
anya-e0301n0:307_21: Etthaca yasmā ādito paṭṭhāya oḷārike nīvaraṇadhamme vitakkādikeca pajahitvā sesadhammeca bhāvanā balena
anya-e0301n0:307_22: uparupari sukhumabhāvaṃ pāpetvā anukkamena paṭipajjantā sukhumaṭṭhena lokiyadhammesu muddhabhūtaṃ imaṃ
anya-e0301n0:307_28: Vipākesu viññāṇañcāyatananti ettha viññāṇanti pathamāruppakusala viññāṇameva.
anya-e0301n0:307_31: Kriyacittesu pana viññāṇaṃ nāma kusalabhūtaṃ kriyabhūtañca duvidhaṃ pathamāruppaviññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:307_32: Akiñcanabhāvoca tasseva duvidhassa viññāṇassa abhāvo yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:308_1: Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ ārammaṇappabhedenāti ālambi tabbānaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsādīnaṃ catunnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ pabhedena.
anya-e0301n0:308_7: Taṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhaṃ ākāsaṃ ālambitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:308_12: Catutthāruppe so natthi bhāvo atikkamitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:308_14: Tattha kiñcāpi imaṃ āruppamānasaṃ catunnaṃ atikkami tabbānaṃpi bhedena catubbidhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0301n0:308_15: tathāpi ākāsānañcāya tanantiādinā idha ālambitabbānaññeva sarūpato gahitattā tesaṃ bhedena imassa bhedo pākaṭoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:308_17: Tadeva puññapāka kriyabhedena dvādasadhā ṭhitanti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:310_1: Idāni yathānuppattaṃ lokuttara cittaṃ dassento sotāpattimaggacittantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:310_2: Tattha savati sandati anivattagamanavasena pavattatīti soto,
anya-e0301n0:310_4: Sohi pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāvamahāsamuddā antarā anivatta māno savati sandati pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:310_13: Tato paṭṭhāya ānubhāvapharaṇavasena yāvaanupādisesanibbānadhātuyā antarā anivattamānoyeva hutvā savati sandati pavattatīti. Yathāha -
anya-e0301n0:311_3: Sabbā tā samuddaninnā honti samuddapoṇā samuddapabbhārā.
anya-e0301n0:311_4: Evameva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulikaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbāna pabbhāroti.
anya-e0301n0:312_0: Etthaca tena tena maggena pahīnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anupagamana vasena saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ anukkamena
anya-e0301n0:313_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ghaṭo nikkujjo vamateva udakaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:313_2: Evamevakho bhikkhave ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulikaronto vamateva pāpake akusale dhamme.
anya-e0301n0:314_0: Yathāca puthujjanā pahīnepi kilese puna upagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:314_2: Yato te uparibhavagge nibbattāpi puna apāyesu sandissanti.
anya-e0301n0:314_7: Tepana tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna naupagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:314_10: Sabbañcetaṃ ariyamaggasseva ānubhāvena siddhanti sototināmaṃ mūlappabhavabhūte tasmiṃ maggeeva niruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:314_11: Tassa sotassa ādito pajjanaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ sotāpatti.
anya-e0301n0:314_13: dhammasota samāpanno ariyoti pavuccatīti vuttattā sabbe ariyasantānagatā lokiya lokuttarabhūtā bodhipakkhiyadhammā
anya-e0301n0:314_14: upari sambodhiparā yanatāvasena anupādisesanibbāna parāyanatāvasenaca anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā yathāvuttena
anya-e0301n0:314_16: Taṃ sotaṃ ādito pajjanti pāpuṇanti etāya paṭipadāyāti sotāpatti.
anya-e0301n0:314_18: pathamamaggasaṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā aṅganti sotāpatti yaṅgantihi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:316_0: Ariyamaggasotassa ādito pajjanaṃ etassāti sotāpatti. Puggaloti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:317_0: Na hi puggale pavatto sotāpattisaddo katthaci diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n0:318_0: [55] Etena tassa maggo sotāpattimaggoti idaṃpi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:321_0: Sotāpattiyā laddhaṃ maggacittaṃ sotāpatti maggacittanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:322_0: Na hi cittasaddasambandho sotāpattisaddo katthaci pāḷiyaṃ diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n0:323_1: Paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ imaṃlokaṃ āgacchati sīlenāti sakadāgāmī.
anya-e0301n0:323_3: So hi asamucchinnakāma rāgānusayattā kāmalokāgamana kilesasabbhāvena taṃ sabhāvānāti vattanato upari
anya-e0301n0:323_4: bhavagge ṭhitopi paṭisandhivasena puna imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ āgamanappakatikoeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:324_0: Idha sāriputta ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti,
anya-e0301n0:324_2: So aparihīno kālaṃ kurumāno nesaññānāsaññā yatanupagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0301n0:324_3: So tato cuto āgāmī hoti āgantvā itthattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:324_4: Idha pana sāriputta ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti,
anya-e0301n0:324_6: So tato cuto anāgāmī hoti anāgantvā itthattanti.
anya-e0301n0:325_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca itthattanti imaṃ kāmāvacara pañcakkhandha bhāvanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:325_3: Na hi brahmabhūtā sotāpanna sakadā gāmino paṭipaṭisandhivasena heṭṭhimaṃpi brahmalokaṃ āgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:326_0: Kāmadhātuyā cutassa rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassa kassaci sattaanusayā anusenti,
anya-e0301n0:326_2: kassaci tayo anusayā anusentīti vatvā rūpa dhātuyā arūpadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassa satteva anusayā anusentīti.
anya-e0301n0:327_4: pacchimavākyepana brahmabhūtānaṃ sotā pannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ paṭisandhivasena kāmalokaṃ gamanassa
anya-e0301n0:327_5: natthitāya kevalaṃ puthujjanasseva vasena sattevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:328_3: “Navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariya sāvakānaṃ tatrupa pattipi hoti uparūpapattipi.
anya-e0301n0:328_5: Puthujjanānaṃpana tatrupapattipi hoti uparūpapatti heṭṭhupapattipī”ti ca.
anya-e0301n0:329_3: Etthaca imaṃ lokanti padassa imaṃ manussalokanti vā imaṃ kāmāvacaralokantivā dvidhāpi attho aṭṭhakathāsu vutto.
anya-e0301n0:329_4: Tattha purimasmiṃ atthe sati āgacchatīti etassa devalokato āgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:329_7: Vuttañhetaṃ puggalapaññattiyaṃ anāgantvā itthattaṃ anāgāmī tena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:329_8: Āgantvā itthattaṃ sotāpannasakadā gāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:329_9: Etthaca anāgantvā itthattanti iminā imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmīti atthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:329_10: Āgantvā itthattanti imināpana dvepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino sakiṃ puna imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ āgacchantīti sakadāgāminoti atthaṃ dasseti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:329_11: nirantaravākyesu ṭhitānaṃ dvinnaṃitthatta saddānaṃ nānātthā sambhavato.
anya-e0301n0:331_1: Tattha sabyāpajjhoti etena puthujjanena saha sotāpannasakadāgāmibhūtā brahmāno gahitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:331_2: Tehi paṭighānusayassa appahīnattā cetasikadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ byāpajjhaṃpi apahīnamevāti sabyāpajjhānāma.
anya-e0301n0:331_3: Āgantā itthattanti imaṃ kāmalokaṃ paṭisandhivasena puna āgamanasīlo āgamanappakatikoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:331_5: Tesupana dvīsu sakadāgāmīsu purimassa anaññasā dhāraṇeneva sabbapathamaṃ ariya magga sotādhi gamana guṇena sotāpanno tveva nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:331_6: Puggalagativasena panettha brahmaloke ṭhitānaṃ sattakkhattuparamatādibhāvoviya sakadāgāmibhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0301n0:331_8: Tasmā sakadāgāmīti idaṃ kāmajātikā naṃeva dutīyaphalaṭṭhānaṃ siddhaṃ nāmanti katvā tesaṃ kāmaloke eva
anya-e0301n0:331_9: heṭṭhuparupapatti vasena sakiṃ āgamanaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:331_10: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃpi pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā sattakkhattuparamassa kolaṃkolassa ekabījissa sakadāgāmissa yoca diṭṭheva dhamme arahāti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:331_18: Tattha idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti idha manussabhave sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā idhamanussa bhaveyeva arahattamaggaṃ labhitvā parinibbāyanadhammo.
anya-e0301n0:331_19: Tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti tasmiṃdevaloke sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā tasmiṃ devalokeyeva arahattamaggaṃ labhitvā parinibbāyanadhammo.
anya-e0301n0:331_21: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ lokanti padassa imaṃ manussalokanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:333_1: so hi ito gantvā puna sakiṃ idha āgacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:334_0: Mahāparinibbāna suttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāvagga saṃyuttaṭṭhakathā yañca sopi chaṭṭho puggalo sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena āgatoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:334_2: Tāva pathamaphalaṭṭhabhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṃviya dutīyaphalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṃ āgamanappakatiyaṃ saṇṭhitāyeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:334_3: Tasmā idha koci dutīyaphalaṭṭho sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena nippariyāyena sakadā gāmīnāma na nahotīti sabbopi
anya-e0301n0:334_4: so chabbidho puggalo idha nippariyāyena sakadāgāmiyevanāma hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:334_6: So hi sayaṃ janakabhūto sakadāgāmīnaṃ janetabbaṃ janetīti idha janetabba janakasambandhena visesana visesitabbatā ñāyāgatā eva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:336_2: Payojanavasena aviruddhā hotīti iminā adhippāyenayaṃ vuttaṃ “kiñcāpi maggasamaṅgino tathāgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmīnāma.
anya-e0301n0:336_3: Tassapana kāraṇabhūto purimuppanno maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ phalaṭṭhena visesetvā vuccati sakadāgāmimaggoti.
anya-e0301n0:338_1: Orabbhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā paṭisandhivasena puna imaṃ kāmalokaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī.
anya-e0301n0:338_3: Idañca kevalaṃ imassa maggassa ānubhāvavaseneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:338_4: Uparimagga vipassanāya pana āgatāya so tasmiṃ ṭhāneyeva arahatta maggaparāyanopi hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:339_8: Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ tāva pathamamagge jhānanāmena vuttesu pañcasu vāresu pathame suddhikapaṭipadāvāredvinnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:339_10: Tathā suddhikasuññatāya suññatappaṭipadāya suddhikappaṇihite appaṇihitappaṭipadāyacāti pañcasu vāresu
anya-e0301n0:339_12: Tathā maggasatipaṭṭhānādīhi ekūnavīsatiyā nāmehi vuttesu paccekaṃ pañcasu vāresūti vīsatiyā nāmehi vutte
anya-e0301n0:339_13: vārasate dvinnaṃ nayasatānaṃ vasena navacittasatāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:339_14: Puna catūhi adhipatīhi yojetvā vuttesu catūsu vārasatesu aṭṭhannaṃ nayasatānaṃ vasena tīṇi sahassāni chasatānica hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:339_15: Evaṃ pathamamagge naya sahassavasena cattāricittasahassāni pañcacitta satānica honti.
anya-e0301n0:339_16: Tathā sesamaggesupīti evaṃ catūsu maggesu catunnaṃ naya sahassānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa magga citta sahassāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:339_17: Saccasatipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu pana vīsatinaya sahassānaṃ vasena navutimaggacittasahassāni.
anya-e0301n0:339_18: Maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsatiyā naya sahassānaṃ vasena satasahassaṃ chabbīsatisahassāni ca maggacittāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:341_0: Pisaddena saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ saṭṭhisahassabhedaṃ nayaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:342_0: Sohi saṭṭhisahassabhedo nayo vipākaṭṭhāneeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatoti.
anya-e0301n0:344_0: Paṭipadābhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ suññato appaṇihi toti dvidhā vibhattoti vuttaṃ. Taṃ nayujjati.
anya-e0301n0:345_1: Naca ādimhi suññato appaṇihitoti dvidhā vibhatto nirantaravāro atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:347_3: appaṇihitā cattāroti katvā dasanayā hontīti adhippāyena evaṃ jhāna nāmena dasadhā vibhattoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:348_0: Na hi suññatādayo idha nayānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:348_1: Tesu pana eke kasmiṃ dve dve catukkapañcakanayāeva idha nayānāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:348_2: Etena tathā maggasatipaṭṭhāniccādikaṃpi sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:349_5: tatthavā pariyāpannaṃ cittanti sotāpatti phala cittaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:350_1: Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ catumaggappabhedenāti catukkhattuṃ pattabbattā catubbidhānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggānaṃ pabhedena.
anya-e0301n0:350_3: Sotāpattimagge tāva saddhādīni indriyāni mudūni honti,
anya-e0301n0:350_7: Tasmā so kāmarāgabyāpāde tanubhūte kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:350_12: Catuttha maggepana tāni indriyāni paṭutamāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:350_13: Tasmā so tāca aññeca sabbepi pāpadhamme samucchindituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:350_14: Evaṃ catukkhattuṃ pavattamānāeva pariniṭṭhitakiccattā te maggā catukkhattuṃ pattabbā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:350_16: Pākaṃpi tassa catubbidhassa kusalassa phalattā tathā catudhāmataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:350_17: Iti anuttaraṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhadhā matanti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:350_18: Natthi attano uttaraṃ adhikaṃ etassāti anuttaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:351_5: Yadi hi taṃ lokiyakusalaṃviya nānākkhaṇesu pavatteyya.
anya-e0301n0:351_6: Tadā niranusayasantānepi pavattitvā kriyā nuttaraṃnāma siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:351_10: Ariyamaggohi nāma sakiṃ pavattamānoyeva attanā pahātabbe kilese puna anuppādadhammataṃ āpādetvā pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:351_12: Vipākañca kusalakriyajavanaṃviya javanakicca yuttaṃ yadā kadāci samāpajjanakkhamañca katvā attano anantarato paṭṭhāya janeti.
anya-e0301n0:351_14: Tasmā tassa kilesappahānatthāyapi puna uppādetabbakiccaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:351_16: Sacepi hi koci ahaṃ phalaṃ samāpajjituṃ na icchāmi.
anya-e0301n0:351_17: Pubbe laddhaṃ maggameva samāpajjissāmīti parikammaṃ kareyya.
anya-e0301n0:351_18: Tadā pubbe sakiṃ uppajjitvā niruddhamaggacetanānubhāvena phalacittameva pavatteyya.
anya-e0301n0:351_21: Ayañhi maggānubhāvonāma kenaci chandena vā vasenavā ajjhāsayenavā parikammenavā paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyoyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:352_1: Dvādasākusalānevantiādi sabbesaṃ catubbhūmaka cittānaṃ jātivasena saṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:352_2: Evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena akusa lāni dvādasevahonti.
anya-e0301n0:352_6: Kecipana kusalānaṃ vipākānañca uparivaḍḍhamānattāevasaddaṃ ādiantapadesveva yojesuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:352_8: Kāmepariyā pannāni cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye katheyya.
anya-e0301n0:352_11: Tathā anuttare pariyāpannāni cittāni aṭṭhadhā īrayeti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:353_0: Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti pathamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā.La.
anya-e0301n0:354_2: Catuttha maggaphala yugaḷaṃ catutthabhūmīti evaṃpi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:354_3: Atthatopana rāgattayapariggahavimuttiyā tebhūmakadhammesu apariyāpannatā saṅkhātena avatthā visesena yutto dhammaviseso.
anya-e0301n0:356_1: Nava vidhadhammasamūhoeva tesaṃ bhūmipariyāyoti katvā yaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:356_2: “Katthaci apariyāpannāni navavidhalokuttara dhammasamūhekadesabhūtāni rukkhe sākhā tyādīsu viya anuttare cittānīti vuttānī”ti.
anya-e0301n0:357_2: Tattha avatthā bhūmieva nippariyāyabhūmi. Na itarā.
anya-e0301n0:357_3: Sā hi okāsabhūmināma dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthāvisesavaseneva siddhāti.
anya-e0301n0:357_4: Taṃ taṃ avatthā visesotica heṭṭhā vuttanayena kāmāvacaratādi avatthā viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:357_5: Apica ekattiṃsabhūmiyopi kusalākusaladhammānaṃ hīnapaṇītaoḷārikasukhumatā saṅkhātehi avatthāvisesehieva sijjhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:358_1: Evaṃ catubbhūmaka cittāni saṅkhepato niddisitvā idāni puna vitthārato niddisanto itthantiādigāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:358_3: Athavāpana itthaṃ yathāvuttappakārena ekunanavutippabhedaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ katvā vicakkhaṇā paṇḍitā vibhajantīti.
anya-e0301n0:360_0: Gāthāya pubbaddhaṃ purimagāthānaṃ nigamanaṃ katvā aparaddhameva ārabbhantaraṃ katvā yojenti.
anya-e0301n0:360_1: Taṃ kathamekūna navutividhaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ hotīti iminā nasametīti.
anya-e0301n0:361_2: Tattha pathamajjhāna sotāpattimaggacittanti ettha pañcaṅgikena pathamajjhānena yutto sotāpattimaggo pathamajjhānasotāpattimaggo.
anya-e0301n0:363_0: “Pathamajjhānañca taṃ sotāpattimaggacittañcā”ti yojenti. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:364_0: Na hi jhānaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Naca cittaṃ jhānaṃ. Aññañhi jhānaṃ, aññaṃ cittanti.
anya-e0301n0:366_0: “Jhānaṅgavasena pathamajjhāna sadisattā pathamajjhānañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:367_0: Na hi pañcaṅgikaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ pathamajjhānasadisaṭṭhena pathamajjhānasaññaṃ labhatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:367_1: Tañhi sayameva attano pañcaṅgikabhāvena nippariyāyato pathamajjhānaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:367_10: Lokuttarevā dutīyādibhāvassa uppattikkamavasena asiddhattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:369_0: Sadisabhāveneva lokuttare tesaṃ pañcaṅgikādīnaṃ jhāna vohārasiddhatādīpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:369_1: “Pādakajjhāna sammasitajjhāna puggalajjhāsayesu hi aññataravasena taṃ taṃ jhānasadisattā vitakkādiaṅgapātubhāvena
anya-e0301n0:369_2: cattāropi maggā pathamajjhānādi vohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcadhā vibhajantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:370_0: Na hi maggā pathamajjhānādi vohāraṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:370_8: Lokuttarāniyevapana atigambhīraṃ abhiduddasaṃ nibbānaṃ upecca nijjhāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:370_9: Paccanīkadhammeca samūle sānusaye sabbaso samucchindanavasena jhāpentīti.
anya-e0301n0:370_10: Etthaca appanājhānānaṃ pañcaṅgikabhāvonāma pakatiyā eva siddho hotīti na pathamajjhānikesu maggaphalesu
anya-e0301n0:370_12: Caturaṅgikādi bhāvo pana tena paccayavisesena vinā na sijjhati.
anya-e0301n0:370_13: Asatihi tasmiṃ sabbaṃpi jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikameva bhavissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:370_14: Tattha yathā lokiyajjhānesu ādikammikakāle tassa tassa dutīyādikassa jhānassa upacārabhūtā bhāvanā sayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:370_15: vitakkādiyuttā samānāpi vitakkādīsu ādīnavadassanaññāṇenaceva idāni avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ uppādessāmi,
anya-e0301n0:370_16: idāni avicāraṃ jhānaṃ uppādessāmīti evamādinā pavattena ajjhāsaya visesenaca yuttattā kāci vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:370_22: Sā attano attano jhānaṃ avitakkaṃvā avicāraṃvā appītikaṃvā upekkhāsaha gataṃvā kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:370_23: Jhānesu vasībhūtakālepana ādīnavadassanaññāṇena vinā kevalaṃ ajjhāsayamattena yaṃyaṃ jhānaṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:370_25: Evamevaṃ idhapi tassa tassa maggassa upacārabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāsaṅkhātā bhāvanā sayaṃ vitakkādiyuttā samānāpi nānāsattiyuttā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:370_30: Tattha yā vitakkaṃ virājetuṃ atikkāmetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:371_1: Kassapana balena sā vipassanā nānāsatti yuttā hotīti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:371_5: Tattha yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ tassā vipassanāya pādakatthāya āsanne samāpajjīyati.
anya-e0301n0:371_13: Pādakajjhāne sati taṃsadisameva magge jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:371_15: Sammasi tajjhānaṃvā puggalajjhāsayovā magge jhānaṅgaṃ niyametuṃ nasakkotīti adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:371_16: Pādakajjhāne sati taṃvā aññaṃvā yaṃyaṃ jhānaṃ sammasīyati.
anya-e0301n0:371_23: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvena saha caritattā sammasitajjhānameva pādakajjhānato ajjhāsayatoca balavataranti adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:373_0: Vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñcijhānaṃ natthīti imasmiṃ vāde vuttaṃ. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:374_0: Pādakajjhāne sati taṃvā aññaṃvā magge yaṃyaṃjhānaṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:374_2: Vipassanāpi icchānurūpaṃ vitakkavirāgādibhāvaṃ pattā hotīti puggalajjhāsayavādo.
anya-e0301n0:374_3: Yathā lokiyajjhānesu āsanne vuṭṭhitajjhānaṃ uparijjhānupacāra bhāvanāya upatthambhakamattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:374_4: Na pana uparijjhāne jhānaṃ attasadisaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:374_6: Evamevaṃ idhapi pādakajjhānaṃ vipassanāya tikkha visadabhāvatthāya balavupanissa yo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:374_7: Ajjhāsayoeva vipassanaṃ vitakkavirāgādibhāvaṃ pāpetvā magge jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:374_8: Yo panettha vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāeva magge jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti mahāṭṭhakathā vādo.
anya-e0301n0:374_9: Tatthapi puggalajjhāsayavisesabalena vitakkavirāgādisatti visesayuttā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāevāti attho veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:374_10: Kāmañcettha aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ theravādānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avirodho vuttoviya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:374_11: Imepana vādā aññamaññaṃ saṃsanditvā pavattā nahonti.
anya-e0301n0:374_12: Paccekaṃ sabbaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pavattā.
anya-e0301n0:374_13: Tasmā nasakkā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ virodho pariharitunti.
anya-e0301n0:374_14: Etthaca jhānalābhīnaṃ vipassanākamme pādakajjhānasamā pajjanaṃnāma bhagavatāeva suṭṭhuvihitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:375_0: Idhānanda bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0301n0:375_7: Tena bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ santhape tabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:377_0: Pathamaṃ pāhaṃ bhikkhavejhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi.La.
anya-e0301n0:377_1: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pāhaṃ bhikkhave jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:378_3: Tañca uparijjhānassa upacārabhāvanāya tikkhavisada bhāvatthāyaeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:378_6: Evamevaṃ idhapi pādakajjhānabalena tikkhavisada bhāvapattā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāeva ajjhāsayavisesabalena
anya-e0301n0:378_8: Asati pana ajjhāsayavisese taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānānurūpaṃ ajjhāsayasāmaññaṃsaṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:378_9: Tasmā ajjhāsayavisese asati pādakajjhānameva pamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:378_11: Icchi ticchita lokiyajjhāna samāpajjana sadisañhi sabbajjhānesu ciṇṇavasībhūtānaṃ maggesu icchitajjhāna nibbattananti.
anya-e0301n0:378_13: So sabbopi vipassanā visesatthāya eva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:378_14: Vipassanā visesoeva magge jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti katvā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ visuddhi maggeca vipassanāva pamāṇaṃ katvāvuttā.
anya-e0301n0:378_15: So sabbopi viseso pādakajjhānena vinā nasijjhatīti katvā maggavibhaṅgamaggasaṃyuttaṭṭha kathāsu pādakajjhānaṃ eva pamāṇaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:379_0: Idha gahapati bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi. La.
anya-e0301n0:379_3: Idaṃpi kho pathamajjhānaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcehayitaṃ yaṃkhopana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:379_5: Taṃ nirodhadhammanti pajānāti so tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇāti. La.
anya-e0301n0:381_0: Idhānanda bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0301n0:381_1: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ,
anya-e0301n0:381_2: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato anattato samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:381_3: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0301n0:381_5: Teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā upapātiko hoti.
anya-e0301n0:382_0: Ādinā mālukyaputtasutta anupadasuttādīsuca anekesu suttantesu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ekekāya samāpattiyā
anya-e0301n0:382_3: Tasmā satipi yogīnaṃ icchāvasena pādakajjhānato aññajjhānasammasane pādakajjhānameva pamāṇanti sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0301n0:382_5: Yepana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinopi jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvāva maggaṃ uppādenti.
anya-e0301n0:382_6: Pathamajjhānamevavā pādakaṃ katvā ajjhāsayavisesaṃ akatvā maggaṃ uppādenti.
anya-e0301n0:382_7: Pathamajjhānamattalābhinovā hutvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā maggaṃ uppādenti.
anya-e0301n0:382_10: Apica ye pakatiyāva aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:382_12: Taṃtaṃ jhānaṃ tesaṃ maggesu nasamijjhatīti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:384_1: Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya uparuparijjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:385_0: Na hi ārammaṇamattabhūtaṃ sammasitajjhānaṃ uparimaṃpi samānaṃ āsanne vuṭṭhitajjhānato balavataraṃ bhavituṃ arahati.
anya-e0301n0:385_2: Tato yevahi so sammasitavādo sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu kecivādapakkhe eva thapitoti.
anya-e0301n0:385_4: sopana lokiyajjhānānaṃ uppattividhānena saha saṃsandikattā yuttataroeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:387_0: “Uparuparijjhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhima heṭṭhimajjhāna dhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā pāda kajjhānasadiso hoti.
anya-e0301n0:388_0: Na hi pādakajjhānaṃ uparima bhūtattāyeva balavataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:390_1: Aññathā vipassanā yāyakāyacivedanāya yuttā hutvā tehi niyamitāya ekekāya maggavedanāya saddhiṃ ghaṭi
anya-e0301n0:390_2: yeyyāti iminā adhippāyena “vedanāniyamopana sabbatthapi vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāniyamena hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:391_0: Pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vaseneva vipassanāya saha vedanāniyamassa siddhattā.
anya-e0301n0:391_1: Tathāhi taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa vipassanā ādito kadāci somanassasahagatāvā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:391_4: Vipassanā ekantena somassasaha gatāva hutvā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:392_0: Tatra bhikkhave yā cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā.
anya-e0301n0:392_1: Tā nissāya tā āgamma yāni cha nekkhammassitāni somanassāni.
anya-e0301n0:393_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu pathamādinica tīṇijhānāni suddhasaṅkhāreca pādake katvā vipassanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:393_1: āraddhānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāga vipassanā somanassasahagatā vā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:393_3: Catutthajjhānādīni pādakānikatvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā purima sadisāva.
anya-e0301n0:393_8: Balavavipassanākāle hi vipassanāratināma suṭṭhu paṇītatarā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:396_0: Tasmā tadā pādakajjhānavisesenavā ajjhāsayavisesena vā vinā vipassanā upekkhāsahagatā na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:396_2: Etthapana sabbajjhānesu vasībhūtassa yaṃkiñci ekaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā taṃ pā aññaṃvā maggeyaṃyaṃ jhānaṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:396_3: Maggavuṭṭhānakāle ajjhāsayabalena taṃtaṃjhānānurūpaṃ vipassanāyaca maggeca vedanā pariṇāmo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:397_1: Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ anuttaraṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedena ekekaṃ pañcadhā katvā cattālīsavidhanti ca vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:397_2: Idāni sabbāni mahaggatā nuttaracittāni pañcavidhe jhāna koṭṭhāse saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ yathāca rūpāvacarantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:397_4: Jhāna bhedasiddhe pathamajjhānikacittādike pañcavidhe cittabhede saṅgayhati,
anya-e0301n0:397_6: Āruppañcacittaṃ upakkhekaggatā saṅkhātena pañcamajjhānena yuttattā pañcame jhāne pañcamajjhānikacittabhede saṅgayhati.
anya-e0301n0:397_7: Tasmā ekekaṃ patamādikaṃ pathamajjhānikacittādikaṃ jhānaṃ jhānacittaṃ ekādasa vidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:397_8: Antetu antimabhūte pañcamajjhānikacittabhedepana jhānaṃ cittaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ bhaveti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:397_10: Na hi jhānaṃ ekādasavidhaṃvā tevīsatividhaṃvā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:399_0: “Rūpāvacaracittaṃ pathamajjhānantiādinā vuccatītica āruppañcāpi pañcamajjhānavohāraṃ labhatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:400_0: Na hi cittaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ hoti. Naca pañcamajjhānavohāraṃ labhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:401_0: [70] Yāca imissāgāthāyaṃ aparāpi yojanā vuttā. Sāpi na yuttāeva.
anya-e0301n0:402_0: Tathā saddassa pathamādijjhānabhedeti padassa purato paṭhitattāti.
anya-e0301n0:402_1: Evaṃ yathā vibhajitabbe ekadese vibhatte sabbaṃ ekūnanavutividhaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ katvā vibhattaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:402_2: Tathā vibhajitvā idāni taṃsaṅgahaṃ dassento antimagāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:402_5: Iti ekūnanavutividhāni cittāni ekavīsasataṃ katvā budhā paṇḍitā āhu kathesuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:407_1: Evaṃ cittaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni anupattaṃ cetasika saṅgahaṃ dassento catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi saha
anya-e0301n0:407_2: vacanatthañca sarūpatthañca tāva dassetuṃ ādi gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:407_8: Tattha dhammānaṃ anāgatabhāvasaṅkhātā pubbantato uddhaṃ pajjanaṃ gamanaṃ sarūpato pātubhavanaṃ uppādo.
anya-e0301n0:407_10: Sabbepihi saṅkhata dhammā anāgatabhāvapubbā eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:407_14: Sarūpavināso bhaṅgo aniccatā maraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:407_20: Tadeva phassādīnantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena eko uppādo etesanti ekuppādā.
anya-e0301n0:407_29: Ekattaṃpana upanetvā ekaṃ ālambaṇanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:409_0: “Ekato uppādoca nirodhoca yesaṃ, te ekuppādanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:410_0: Na hi ekakkhaṇe ekato uppādamattena ekuppādatā idha adhippetā.
anya-e0301n0:413_1: Ekuppādanirodhāca ekālambaṇavatthukā ca hutvā yedhammā cetoyuttā.
anya-e0301n0:413_5: Ekuppādanirodhabhāvena ekālambaṇa vatthuka bhāvenaca yedhammā cetoyuttā.
anya-e0301n0:413_8: Te cetasikāti vutte cittassa sahajātapaccayuppannarūpānipi tadāyattavuttitāya ekantena cittasambandhīni hutvā cetoyuttāni cetasikāni nāma siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:413_11: Tānihi cittena khaṇato sahuppannānipi bhinnasantānattā yā cittassa jāti,
anya-e0301n0:413_15: Phassādīnaṃpana uppādamattameva cittena saha ekaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:413_16: Athakho nirodhopi ālambaṇaṃpi vatthupi sabbaṃ ekamevāti ñāpanatthaṃ eka nirodhādiggahaṇaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:413_17: Na hi evaṃ avutte sakkā tathā jānitunti.
anya-e0301n0:413_18: Yasmāpana yathā bahujanasantako eko goṇo tissassa goṇo dattassa goṇoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃpi vattabboyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:413_19: Evamevaṃ uppādo nirodhoca ekasmiṃ rūpārūpakalāpe ekovasamānopi phassassa uppādo vedanāya uppādo pathavidhātuyā
anya-e0301n0:413_20: uppādo āpodhātuyā uppādoti evamādinā nayena visuṃ visuṃpi vattabboyeva.
anya-e0301n0:414_6: Tathā yo bhikkhave pathavidhātuyā uppādo ṭhitiabhinibbatti pātubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:414_7: Dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarā maraṇassa pātubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:415_1: Itarathā jīvitindriyādīnapi ekasmiṃ kalāpe bahubhāvo vattabbo siyā.
anya-e0301n0:415_2: Yo arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:415_5: Catunnaṃ cahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpantica catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādotica vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:415_6: Kāyalahutā cittalahutādayopana atthavisesadīpanatthaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:417_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi ekuppādamatteneva cetoyuttāti adhippetā.
anya-e0301n0:417_1: Tadā cittena saha uppajjamānānaṃ rūpadhammānampi cetoyuttatā āpajjeyyāti eka nirodhaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:417_2: Evampi cittānuparivattino viññattidvayassa pasaṅgo nasakkā nīvāretuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:417_3: Tathā ekato uppādo vā nirodhovā etesanti ekuppādanirodhāti parikappentassa puretaramuppajjitvā cittassa
anya-e0301n0:418_1: Kathañca dvipaññāsa hontīti pucchitvā pathamaṃ dvipaññāsa sarūpaṃ tīhi rāsīhi vibhajitvā dassento kathantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:418_5: Phusanañcettha ārammaṇassa iṭṭhāniṭṭharasaṃ āhacca upahacca gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:418_10: Naca arūpadhammā appaṭighasabhāvā kiñci phusantīti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:418_18: Ayañca attho ambilakhādādike disvā aparassa kheḷuppādādīsu pākaṭoti.
anya-e0301n0:421_3: Aviditaṃvā ārammaṇarasaṃ sampayuttānaṃ taṃsamaṅgipuggalānaṃ vā viditaṃpākaṭaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:421_4: Vindantiva etāya sattā sātaṃvā asātaṃvā labhantīti vedanā.
anya-e0301n0:422_0: Vedayati vedayatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā vedanāti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:423_0: Nanu sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā ārammaṇarasānubhavanappa katikāevāti tepi vedanānāma siyunti. Nasiyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:423_3: Attano attano kiccaṃ karontāva ekadesamattena anubhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:423_4: Vedanāyevapana anaññakiccatāya anubhavanakicce ādhipaccayogatāyaca issarabhāvena anubhavatīti sāeva vedanānāma bhavituṃ arahatīti.
anya-e0301n0:423_5: Evañcakatvā rājaggabhojana rasānubhavane tesaṃ sūdasadisatā vedanāyaevaca rājasadisatā vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:424_3: Ayañhi pubbe gahitasaññānena sañjānanakālepi puna jānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:424_4: Sāhi evaṃ punappunaṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānā thirasaññābhāvaṃ patvā yāvatāyukaṃpi bhavantaraṃ patvāpi sattānaṃ appamuṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:424_5: Micchā bhinivesasaññābhāvaṃ patvāca ime satte sabbaññu buddhehipi bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye karotīti.
anya-e0301n0:424_6: Tathāhi sā puna sañjānanatthaṃ nimittakaraṇe dārutacchakasadisātica.
anya-e0301n0:425_0: Sañjānāti sañjānātītikho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:426_2: Sampayuttadhamme tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇevā kiccevā abhisandahati punappunaṃ ghaṭeti,
anya-e0301n0:426_3: tattha pabandhavasena nirantaraṃ pavattamāne karotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:426_7: Ārammaṇe sampiṇḍeti ekato samo sarante karotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:426_9: Tāyahi tasmiṃ nirantaraṃ ussukkana byāpāravasena pavattamānāya taṃ sampayuttāpi attano attano kiccaṃ kurumānā tasmiṃ tatheva pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:426_10: Teneva sā sakicca parakicca sādhaka jeṭṭhasissa mahāvaḍḍhaki ādisadisāti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:428_0: Ceteti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇe byāpāramāpajjatīti vatvā tadatthasādhanatthaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ “vibhaṅge suttantabhājaniye
anya-e0301n0:428_1: saṅkhā rakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena saṅkhatamatisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārāti vatvā”ti.
anya-e0301n0:429_0: Na hi vibhaṅge suttantabhājaniye saṅkhatama bhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārāti vuttaṃ atthi.
anya-e0301n0:430_1: Ekattārammaṇasaṅkhāto aggo koṭṭhāso koṭi vā etassāti ekaggaṃ. Cittaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:430_4: Tasmā tassa ekassapi nānāsabhāvesu vikkhepaṃ apatvā ekasmiṃ sabhāve khaṇamattaṃpi pavattassa cittassa
anya-e0301n0:430_5: yoniccalākāro atthi ayaṃ tasmiṃ ekaggābhidhānassa ekaggabuddhiyāca pavattihetubhāvena gayhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:430_6: Te neva hi sā nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhitiviya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:432_1: Tatthapi aggasaddo koṭṭhāsevā koṭiyaṃvā pavattoti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:433_0: Na hi aggasaddo ārammaṇapariyāyo katthaci diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n0:434_6: Tañhi mayā vinā tumhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:434_7: Tasmā tumhākaṃ jīvanakicce maṃ issaraṃ karothāti vadantamiva sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:434_8: Tathā hi taṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyanti ca padumuppa lānupālakamudakaṃ viyātica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:434_9: Tattha yāva khandhaparinibbānā anuppabandhavasena pavattamānā cittasantati pavattasantatināma.
anya-e0301n0:434_12: Punappunaṃ niruddhaṃpi hi cittasantānaṃ tassa balena punappunaṃ jīvantaṃ hutvā yāva khandhaparinibbānā punappunaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:435_0: Na hi jīvitarahitesu anindriyabaddhadhammesu tādiso pavattasantati visesonāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:436_1: Manasmiṃ ārammaṇaṃ asuññaṃ manaṃvā ārammaṇe niccaninnaṃ karotīti manasikāro.
anya-e0301n0:436_4: Tañhi pañcadvārika cittasantatiṃ ārammaṇe paṭipādeti yojetīti.
anya-e0301n0:436_6: Taṃpi javana santatiṃ ārammaṇe paṭipādeti yojetīti.
anya-e0301n0:436_7: Idameva dvayaṃ tattha tattha yoniso manasikārotica ayoniso manasikāro tica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:436_8: Tañhi pakatiyā samudāciṇṇaninnaniyāmitādīhi paccaye hi upatthambhitaṃ hutvā cittasantānaṃ yoniso ayonisovā ārammaṇe ninnaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0301n0:436_9: Paṭisandhicittato pana paṭṭhāya pavattamānā cittasantati ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā nirujjhitvāpi puna uppajjamānā
anya-e0301n0:436_10: yassa dhammassa vasena tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe uppajjati asati kāraṇavisese.
anya-e0301n0:436_13: Ayañhi ārammaṇaṃ citte cittaṃvā ārammaṇe paṭipādeti yojetīti.
anya-e0301n0:436_14: Tathā hi ayaṃ sāraṇa lakkhaṇoti ca sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇena saṃpayojanarasotica ārammaṇapaṭipādakaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n0:436_16: Tattha sāraṇalakkhaṇoti sārathīviya assānaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ ujuṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ pavattayanalakkhaṇoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:437_2: Tathā tathā saṅkappetvā ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:437_3: Tasmiṃ pana taṃ kathā ārohante sampayuttadhammāpi taṃ ārohanti.
anya-e0301n0:437_4: Tadā soyeva te ārammaṇaṃ abhiniropentonāma hotīti katvā ārammaṇā bhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakkoti vutto.
anya-e0301n0:437_6: Avitakkaṃpi hi cittaṃ savitakkadhammasantāne vitakkena saha pavattaparicaya balena ārohanato vitakkena atinirovitamevanāma hotīti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:437_9: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kiṃvā etāya yuttiyāti vatvā imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:437_12: Tasmiñhi asati taṃ niyāmakarahi tā nāvāviya yaṃvātaṃvā ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavatteyyāti.
anya-e0301n0:437_13: Iti pañcaviññāṇaṃ manasikārasahāyaṃ hutvā attano ārammaṇavijānanasattivaseneva ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
anya-e0301n0:437_14: Akusalaṃ patvā pana cittaṃpi lobhādayopi ārammaṇāruhane thāmavatā eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:437_16: Dutīyajjhāna cittādīnica manasikāra vīriyassatīnaṃpi vasena ārohanti.
anya-e0301n0:437_17: Vitakko pana tathā tathā saṅkappetvā attasahite dhamme ārammaṇāruhane suṭṭhutaraṃ balavante karoti.
anya-e0301n0:437_18: Iti tasmiṃ kicce aññesaṃ sābhisayabyāpāratāyaeva ayaṃ vitakkoti vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:437_20: Nanu aññepi arūpadhammā sārammaṇasabhāvā ārammaṇaṃ ārohanti.
anya-e0301n0:437_21: Atha ca pana kasmā ayameva vitakkoti vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:437_23: Imassa pana ito aññaṃ kiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:438_3: te vā dhammā vicaranti etenāti vicāro.
anya-e0301n0:438_4: Vicaraṇañcettha vitakkā ruḷhe tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe sabhāvākārapātubhāvatthaṃ punappunaṃ anumajjanavasena pavattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:438_5: Etthaca vitakko oḷāriko pubbaṅgamo ārammaṇe cittassa pathamābhinipātabhūtoca hotīti ghaṇḍābhighāto viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:438_6: Vicāro sukhumo anucaro tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa anubandhanabhūto ca hotīti ghaṇḍānuravoviya daṭṭhabboti.
anya-e0301n0:439_2: Ārammaṇe evaṃ nukho no nukhoti evaṃ pavattaṃ saṃsappanaṃ adhibhavitvā vicchinditvā pakkhako muccanavasena cittassa pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:439_3: Evañca katvā so ārammaṇe sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇoti ca ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlasadisotica vutto.
anya-e0301n0:440_7: Kammasiddhiyā niccaṃ paggahita kāya cittova hoti.
anya-e0301n0:440_8: Tasmā taṃ tassa puggalassa tathāpavattiyā hetubhāvoceva tathāpavattassa ca tassa puggalassa kāya cittakriyābhūtaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:440_9: Vidhināvā nayena upāyena vīriyavato kiṃ nāmakammaṃ na sijjhatītiādikena pubbābhisaṅkhārena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:440_10: Visesenavā sakaparahitahetu īranti kampanti taṃ samaṅgino etenāti vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:440_11: Etthaca vīriyu patthambhitā sampayuttadhammā sadā anikkhittadhurā paggahitasīsāviya hutvā attano attano kiccasampattiyā niccaṃ ussāhajātāva honti,
anya-e0301n0:440_12: tesuca tathāhontesu taṃsamaṅgino puggalāpi attanovā paresaṃvā hitahetu niccaṃ byāvaṭakāyacittā honti.
anya-e0301n0:440_14: Tathā hi taṃ upatthambhanalakkhaṇanti ca paggahalakkhaṇanti ca ussāhalakkhaṇanti ca gehassa thūṇūpatthambhana
anya-e0301n0:440_15: sadisanti ca sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlanti ca vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:441_4: vinantivā etāya taṃ samaṅgino puṇṇacandoviya virocamāna kāyacittā hontīti pīti.
anya-e0301n0:442_11: Etthaca kattusaddo sabbesaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ atthe saṅgahetvā pavatto.
anya-e0301n0:442_12: Tasmā kattukamyatāti etena kathetukamyatā cintetukamyatā daṭṭhukamyatā sotukamyatāti evamādīni sabba kriyāpadāni saṅgahitāni hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:442_13: So pana ārammaṇaṃ icchantopi taṇhā viya assādana rajjana laggana vasena naicchati.
anya-e0301n0:442_15: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ārādhetu kāmatāvaseneva icchati.
anya-e0301n0:442_16: Yathā rañño issāsā dhanenavā yasenavā atthikā rājaverīnaṃ vijjhanavasena chaḍḍitabbayuttakepi sare bahū icchantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:442_17: Evamevaṃ ayaṃpi parassa vissajjitabbayutta kānipi dānavatthūni aladdhānipi laddhuṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:444_0: Dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattakālepi cesa vissajji tabbena tena atthikoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:445_0: Tattha yadaggena dānaṃ dassāmīti dānavatthupariyesanādivasena pavattā pubbabhāgacetanā dānavatthuvissajjana saṅkāte dāne saṅgahitā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:445_1: Tadaggena tassā pubbabhāgacetanāya pavattikālo idha dānavatthu vissajjanavasena pavatta kāloti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:445_4: Khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇeti tesaṃ akatānaṃ karaṇavasena aladdhānaṃ pariyesanavasena gahaṇe.
anya-e0301n0:445_5: Ettha pana keci issāso usūnikhipitvāpi labhamāno tehi usūhi atthikoyevāti eva matthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:445_10: Keci issāso usūhi anatthiko khipanto nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:445_11: Atthikoyeva samāno aññaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ icchanto khipatīti evaṃ atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:445_13: Evañhi sati usūhi atthikoyeva tāni khipanto issāsoviyātivuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:445_15: Yasmāca chandasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantaṃ chandavasena ati icchamānaṃ viya viluppamānaṃ viya gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:445_16: Tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃviyāti vutto.
anya-e0301n0:445_19: Atthavisesapākaṭatthaṃ pana abhūtaṃpi bhūtaṃ viya kappetvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:445_20: ayaṃ chandonāma thāmapatto taṇhāya balavataro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:445_22: Yadi hi so taṇhāya samānabalo siyā.
anya-e0301n0:445_23: Ime sattā taṇhāya hatthe ṭhitā taṇhā pariggahitāni dhanabhogarajjasukhānivā dibbabrahmasampattiyovā chaḍḍetvā
anya-e0301n0:446_7: tadā tehi sobhaṇato aññehi samānā sadisāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:448_5: caturaṅgatamassa viya cakkhussa sabbaso kalyāṇapakkhaṃ paṭicchādetvā cittassa andhabhāvakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:448_6: Pāpapakkhaṃ pana patvā so ñāṇagatiko hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:448_8: Aṭṭhakathāsuca micchāñāṇanti pāpakriyāsu upāyacintāvasenapavatto mohoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:448_12: tathā hi pāpapakkhaṃ patvā pañcadhammā ñāṇagatikā honti moho, lobho, diṭṭhi, vitakko, vicāroti.
anya-e0301n0:448_14: Tehi pakatiyā viññujātikesu sutapariyattisampannesuca uppannā pāpakriyāsu taṃ taṃ upāyadassanavasena
anya-e0301n0:449_4: Tañhi pāpa kriyāsu paccupaṭṭhitāsu hiriyā okāsaṃ adatvā tāsu ruciṃ uppādetvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:449_5: Tathā hi taṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇantica alajjālakkhaṇantica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:450_4: Taṃpi hi tāsu paccupaṭṭhitāsu ottappassa okāsaṃ adatvā cittaṃ tāsu asārajjamānaṃ katvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:450_5: Tathā hetaṃ kāyaduccari tādīhi asārajjalakkhaṇanti ca anuttāsalakkhaṇanti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:453_2: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭha geṇḍuko viya nānārammaṇesu vikkhittaṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:453_3: uddhaṭassa pana cittassa uddharaṇākārappavattiyā paccayabhūto dhammo uddhaccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:453_4: Taṃ pana vāteritaṃ jalaṃ viya dhajapaṭākā viyaca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:454_2: lubbhanti sampayuttā dhammā ete nāti lobho,
anya-e0301n0:454_5: Sopana ārammaṇe lagga naṭṭhena makkaṭālepoviya abhikaṅkhaṭṭhena tattakapāle khittamaṃsa pesi viya aparicāgaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n0:454_6: telañjana rāgoviya taṇhānadibhāvena vaḍḍhitvā sattānaṃ apāyāvahaṭṭhena sabbāni sukkhakaṭṭha sākhāpalāsa
anya-e0301n0:454_7: tiṇakasaṭāni mahāsamuddaṃ vahantī sīghatotā nadī viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:455_2: Dhammānaṃ yāthāvasabhāvesu ñāṇadassanaṃ viya tesameva ayāthāvasabhāvesu micchādassananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:455_3: Sāhi ekaccānaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ micchāvitakkabahulānaṃ uppannā thāmagatā ayāthāvapakkhe paṭivedhaññāṇagatikā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:456_3: Na kaṭṭhakaliṅgaroviya avamaññanārahoti evaṃ attānaṃ daḷhaṃ paggahetvā samanupassatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:456_4: Sopana jāti kuladhana bhoga yasa issariyādīhi ceva sīla suta lābhasakkārā dīhica guṇehi upatthambhito
anya-e0301n0:456_5: atirekataraṃ vaddhitvā attānaṃ janamajjhe ketuṃviya accuggataṃ maññati.
anya-e0301n0:457_2: Sopana caṇḍikkaṭṭhena pahatā sivisoviya visappanaṭṭhena asanipātoviya attano nissaya dahanaṭṭhena dāvaggiviya
anya-e0301n0:457_3: dussanaṭṭhena laddhokāso sapattoviya sabbaso ahitarāsi bhāvaṭṭhena visa saṃsaṭṭha pūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:458_3: Sāhi paresaṃ pakatiyā laddhasampattiṃ disvā vā sutvāvā nasahati.
anya-e0301n0:459_1: Mama eva idaṃ guṇajātaṃvā vatthuvā hotu.
anya-e0301n0:459_2: Mā aññassāti evaṃ attano sampattihetu avipphārikatāvasena carati pavattatīti maccharaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:459_5: Idaṃca issā viya duvidhaṃ attanā laddhasampatti labhitabbasampatti vasena.
anya-e0301n0:459_6: Tattha pakatiyā laddhasampattiyaṃ tāva taṃ parehi sā dhāraṇaṃvā yena kenacivā kāraṇena attasantakabhāvato
anya-e0301n0:459_7: muccitvā paresaṃ santakabhāvaṃ gamissamānaṃ disvā vā sutvāvā cintetvā dukkhī dummano hoti,
anya-e0301n0:459_8: labhitabbasampattiyaṃpi asukasmiṃ dese vākālevā idaṃnāma bhavissatīti sutvāvā cintetvāvā taṃ attanāva laddhuṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:459_10: Aññe labhissantīti sutvāvā cintetvāvā dukkhī dummano hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:459_11: Tathā hetaṃ laddhānaṃvā labhitabbānaṃvā attano sampattīnaṃ nigguhanalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:459_13: Solabhatītivā labhissatītivā sutvāvā cintetvāvā cittavighāto issānāma.
anya-e0301n0:459_15: Taṃ taṃ attanā alabbhamānakaṃ cintetvā cittavighāto macchariyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:459_16: Na hi ete dve ekato uppajjantīti.
anya-e0301n0:460_4: Paṇḍitehi ekantena ninditabbo cittappavattivisesoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:460_5: Atthato pana akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ kataṃ pāpanti evaṃ anusocanavasena pavatto kukkucca sampayuttacittuppādoyeva,
anya-e0301n0:460_6: so hi tathā pavattamānopi pubbe akataṃvā kalyāṇaṃ puna kataṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:460_7: Pubbe kataṃ vā pāpaṃ puna akataṃ kātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:460_10: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭha kathāyaṃ katākatassa sāvajjānavajjassa abhimukhagamanaṃ paṭisāronāma.
anya-e0301n0:460_11: Yasmā paneso kataṃvā pāpaṃ akataṃ nakaroti.
anya-e0301n0:460_13: Tasmā virūpo kucchito vā paṭisāroti vippaṭisāroti.
anya-e0301n0:460_15: Kukkucceca kucchite sati taṃ sampayuttacittuppādopi kucchitoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:460_17: Teneva kāraṇena so cittuppādopi kucchitonāma hotīti katvā so cittuppādova kukatapade gahetuṃ yuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:460_18: Sudinnakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayamattho ujukatova vutto. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:462_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “kucchitaṃ katanti kukataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:462_3: Etena yañca tattha vuttaṃ “akataṃpi hi kukatanti voharanti.
anya-e0301n0:462_6: Idha pana katā kataṃ ārabbha uppanno vippaṭisāracittuppādo kukata”ntica.
anya-e0301n0:463_0: Kukatassa yathāvuttacittuppādassa tathāpavatti hetubhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:463_1: dhātupāṭhesu kucasaddaṃ saṅkocana mano vilekhanatthesu paṭhantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:463_2: Tasmā kucchitena ākārena kocati saṅkocati na pāpajigucchanākārenāti kukkuco.
anya-e0301n0:463_3: Kucchitenavā ākārena kocati vilikhati nakilesasallīkhanā kārenāti kukkuco.
anya-e0301n0:463_5: Sohi kucchitena akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ kataṃ pāpanti evaṃ pavattena anutthunanākārena saṅkocati.
anya-e0301n0:463_8: Saddhādīnaṃ sāradhammānaṃ tanukaraṇena cittaṃ kusaladhammasamādāne pariyādinnathāmabalaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:463_10: Yena pana dhammena yuttattā so tathā pavatto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:463_12: Taṃ pana yasmā pubbe akatañca kalyāṇaṃ katañca pāpaṃ ārabbha pacchā anutāpanavasena anusocanavasenaca pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:463_13: Tasmātaṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ katākatānuyocana rasanti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:463_14: Etthaca pacchānutāpalakkhaṇanti pubbe kalyāṇañca akatvā pāpañca katvā āgatattā pacchime kāle anutāpalakkhaṇanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:463_15: Tena kukkuccassa ekantena atītārammaṇatā siddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:463_17: Katākatā nusocanarasanti ettha katañca pāpaṃ akatañca kalyāṇanti yo jetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:464_0: Dvīhākārehi kukkuccaṃ uppajjati katattā ca akatattā ca.
anya-e0301n0:465_0: Etena pana akatasucaritā rammaṇatāya kataduccaritā rammaṇatāyaca vasena kukkuccassa dvidhābhāvoyeva siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:465_2: Soca kho pubbe pāpaṃ katvā pacchā apāyabhayatajjitānañceva apāyesu patitvā pubbe attanā katakammaṃ anussarantānañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:465_6: Yathā pana māno duvidho hoti yāthāvamāno ayāthāvamānoti.
anya-e0301n0:465_10: Tattha ayāthāva kukkuccaṃpi uppajjamānaṃ dvīhākāreho uppajjati akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ kataṃ pāpanti.
anya-e0301n0:465_12: Yañca pubbe kalyāṇakammepi pāpasaññī pāpadiṭṭhi akatvā pāpakammepi kalyāṇasaññī kalyāṇadiṭṭhi katvā pacchā anusocanavasena uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:465_13: Yañca pubbe kalyāṇe kalyāṇasaññī katvā pacchā pāpasaññino pāpeca pāsaññī akatvā pacchā kalyāṇasaññino uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:465_18: Idañca sabbaṃ uppajjamānaṃ dvīhā kāreheva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:465_24: Yaṃ pana taṃ bhikkhu kukkuccāyantā napaṭiggaṇhiṃsūti vinaye āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:465_25: Yañca kathaṃ kukkuccappakatatāya āpajjati kappiye akappiyasaññitā akappiye kappiyasaññitāti āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:465_28: Soca kho attano avisaye kappati nukho nonukhoti saṃsappanākārena pavatto kusala kriya cittuppādo.
anya-e0301n0:465_35: Te sandhāya kukkuccappakatatāya āpattiṃ āpajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:467_1: Medhati cetasike dhamme akammaññabhūte katvā vihiṃ satīti middhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:467_2: Tathā hi ārammaṇe vipphāravasena taṃ taṃ iriyā pathaṃ sandhāretvā pavattamānesu sampayuttadhammesu muggarena
anya-e0301n0:467_3: pothetvā viya te ārammaṇato oliyāpetvā iriyāpathaṃpi sandhāretuṃ asamatthe katvā thinaṃ cittaṃ abhibhavati.
anya-e0301n0:468_4: Tikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vigatā cikicchā etāyāti vicikicchā.
anya-e0301n0:468_5: Sabhāvaṃ vicinantā kicchanti kilamanti etāyātivā vicikicchā.
anya-e0301n0:468_9: Tattha buddhādīsu aṭṭhasu vatthūsu vimativasena pavattamānā nīvaraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0301n0:468_10: Tato aññāpana asabbaññūnaṃ tesu tesu ārammaṇesu kathaṃ nukho evaṃ nukho idaṃnukhoti vematikabhāvena pavattā sabbā vicikicchā paṭirūpakānāma.
anya-e0301n0:470_2: Yathā acchaṃ pasannaṃ nisinnaṃ udakaṃ canda sūriyādīni rūpanimittāni suṭṭhu attani dahati.
anya-e0301n0:470_3: Evaṃ ayaṃ buddhaguṇā dīni suṭṭhu attani dahati dhāreti thapetivāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:470_6: Sāpi buddhā dīsu saddheyyavatthūsu akālussiyabhāvena pavattamānāeva idha adhippetā.
anya-e0301n0:470_7: Tato aññāpana titthiyesuvā titthiyadhammesu vā evarūpesu asaddheyyavatthūsu saddahanavasena pavattā okappanā saddhā paṭirūpakānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:470_9: Yathā pana manussā hatthe asati ratanāni disvā pi-
anya-e0301n0:470_11: Vitte asati tesaṃ sabbabhogā na sampajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:471_2: Attanā katāni kattabbāni ca kalyāṇakammāvā buddhaguṇādīnivā appamajjanavasena upagacchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:471_6: Katassa kattabbassaca pāpakammassa appamajjanavasena pavatto satipaṭirūpako akusalacittuppādoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:471_7: Yasmā panesā cittaṃ sabbehi akusaladhammehica rakkhituṃ kusaladhammehica yojetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:471_8: Tasmā sā rañño sabbakammika mahāamacco viya daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:471_9: Satiṃkhvāhaṃ bhikkhave sabbatthikaṃ vadāmīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:472_0: 99. Hiriyatīti hiri. Kāyaduccaritādīhi lajjati jigucchati ukkaṇṭhatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:476_0: Yasmā pana sappurisā hiriyā attani ottappenaca paresu ārakkhadevatādīsu gāravaṃ uppādetvā pāpato vajjetvā suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharanti.
anya-e0301n0:477_2: So hi yesu attano hitasaññitesu ārammaṇesu lobho lagganavasena pavattati,
anya-e0301n0:477_3: tesveva taṃ lobhaṃ vidhamitvā lobhavatthubhūtā bhavabhogasampattiyo gūtharāsiṃviya hīḷetvā jigucchitvā ekānekkhamma dhātunāma hutvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:478_2: Sopi hi yesu attano ahitasaññitesu ārammaṇesu doso dussanavasena pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:478_3: Tesveva taṃdosaṃ vidhamitvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu sattesu puṇṇacandasadisaṃ sommahadayaṃ uppādetvā ekā abyāpādadhātu nāma hutvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:478_7: Sopi hi yesu dhammesuvā atthesuvā catūsu ariyasaccesuvā moho andhakāraṃ katvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:478_8: Tesveva taṃ mohaṃ vidhamitvā candasūriyasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpentoviya vijjānāma hutvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:479_2: Līnuddhaccādīnaṃ ubhinnaṃ visamapakkhānaṃ majjhe pavatto attā etassāti majjhattā.
anya-e0301n0:479_5: Tesu tesu sampayuttadhammesu dissamānā majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā tesu tesuvā hitakammesu cittacetasikānaṃ majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā.
anya-e0301n0:479_6: Tathā hi sā samappavattānaṃ sampayutta dhammānaṃ ajjhupekkhanavasena samappavattānaṃ ājāneyyānaṃ ajjhupekkhanasārathīviya daṭṭhabbāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:480_1: Kāyappassaddhādīsu kāyoti vedanādikkhandhattaya saṅkhāto cetasikasamūho vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:480_13: Tesaṃ cittaṃ sītale udake pakkhitta maccho viya hoti.
anya-e0301n0:481_8: Sītale udake pakkhitta padumapupphaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0301n0:483_4: Tesaṃ cittaṃ puññakammesu yathicchitaṃ thapetuṃ nalabbhati,
anya-e0301n0:483_8: Tesaṃyeva taṃ tattha yathicchitaṃ thapetuṃ labbhati navikkirati.
anya-e0301n0:484_7: te saṃ taṃ tattha navikampati navihaññati.
anya-e0301n0:484_8: Gambhīre udake khitta kumbhilo viya hoti.
anya-e0301n0:486_1: Etthaca siddhesupi cittappassaddhādikesu vuttesu visuṃ kāyappassaddhādīnaṃ vacanaṃ tesaṃ vasena rūpakāyassapi passaddhādi dīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:486_2: Tattha taṃ taṃ suttantaṃ sutvā gelaññavuṭṭhā nādīsu rūpakāyassa passaddhabhāvo pākaṭo iddhimantānaṃ iddhiyā ākāsagamanādīsu lahu bhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:486_3: Kāyaṃ khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā katvā nimminanesu mudubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:486_4: Antopathaviyaṃvā antopabbate suvā asajjamānaṃ katvā gamanādīsu kammaññabhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:486_5: Nāgavaṇṇaṃvā garuḷavaṇṇaṃvā katvā nimminanādīsu paguṇabhāvo tesveva sabbesu yathānimmitavasena cirappavattibhāvesu ujukabhāvo pākaṭo hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:487_1: Sammāvācāti ettha tividhā sammāvācā kathā, cetanā,
anya-e0301n0:487_3: tattha atthadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā subhāsitā vācā kathā sammāvācānāma.
anya-e0301n0:487_5: Yā pana musāvādā veramaṇādīni sikkhāpadāni samādiyantassavā adhiṭṭhahantassavā sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantassavā
anya-e0301n0:487_10: Etāyāti cettha karaṇatthe hetuatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:487_11: Tattha vācāya sikkhāpadāni samādiyantassa samādānavacanāni sandhāya karaṇattho hetuattho ca yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:487_12: Tato yathāsamādinnānivā yathādhiṭṭhitānivā sikkhāpadāni suṭṭhurakkhāmāti yāni anavajjānieva vacanāni vadantā vicaranti.
anya-e0301n0:487_13: Tāni sandhāya karaṇatthānukūlo hetu atthoyeva yujjatīti. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:487_15: Ayaṃpana vadamānesu sati tesaṃ sammā vattuṃeva deti.
anya-e0301n0:487_16: Namicchā vattunti katvā sammā vācātveva vuccati. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:487_17: ayaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ pajahanavasena pavattamānā vacīdvārasuddhiyā eva hotīti sammāvācāti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:488_3: Tattha yaṃkiñci anavajjaṃ kammaṃ karontassa kāyikakriyā kriyākammantonāma.
anya-e0301n0:488_5: Yā pana pāṇātipātā veramaṇādīni sikkhāpadāni samādi yantassavā adhiṭṭhahantassavā sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantassavā
anya-e0301n0:489_3: Tattha pakatiyā anavajjāni kasikammādīnivā bhikkhācariyādīnivā katvā jīvitaṃ kappentānaṃ uṭṭhānabalasaṅkhāto vāyāmo vīriyasammāājīvonāma.
anya-e0301n0:489_4: Yā pana ājīvasuddhiṃ apekkhitvā attano ājīvasīlavipattikāraṇāni kāyavacīduccaritāni pajahantānaṃ pāpaviramaṇākārena cittassa pavatti.
anya-e0301n0:489_7: Sammā ājīvanti jīvitaṃ pavattenti etenāti sammāājīvo.
anya-e0301n0:490_4: Tattha yā sikkhāpadāni asamā diyitvāvā samādinnānipivā tāni anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ hiri ottappabaleneva
anya-e0301n0:490_9: Yā pana sikkhāpadāni samādi yantassavā adhiṭṭhahantassavā yathāsamādinnānivā yathādhiṭṭhitāni vā suṭṭhurakkhāmīti
anya-e0301n0:490_13: Tathā hi pañcasikkhāpadā paccuppannārammaṇāti idaṃ sampattavirativasena vuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:490_14: Maggakkhaṇe pana sabbaduccaritānaṃ paccayasamucchedavasena uppannā samucchedaviratināma.
anya-e0301n0:490_17: Tattha lokiyaviratiyo jīvitindriyādīni vītikkamitabbavatthūni ārammaṇaṃ katvā pāṇātipātādīni viramitabbavatthūni pajahanti.
anya-e0301n0:490_18: Lokuttaraviratiyo pana nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā tāniyeva viramitabbavatthūni pajahantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:491_1: Paradukkhe sati kāruṇikānaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti karuṇā.
anya-e0301n0:491_11: Iti kaliṃ dukkhaṃvā pāpaṃvā sabbasampattito parājayaṃvā sattehi avanti rakkhanti,
anya-e0301n0:491_12: sattevā tato vidhakalito avanti rakkhanti kāruṇikā janā etāyāti karuṇā.
anya-e0301n0:492_5: Na ito aññesūti evaṃ paricchedappamāṇassa abhāvā ekasmiṃ satte pavattāpi appamaññāevanāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:494_0: Appamāṇasattā rammaṇattā appamāṇā. Tāeva appamaññāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:497_2: Evaṃ dvipaññāsa sarūpaṃ dassetvā idāni cetoyuttappakāraṃ dassento tesantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:497_3: Ito cetasikānaṃ sarūpadassanato paraṃ tesaṃ cittāviyuttānaṃ cittena aviyuttānaṃ cetasikānaṃ cittuppādesu
anya-e0301n0:497_8: Dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ sabbadubbalattā tesu cha pakiṇṇakā nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:497_12: Sanniṭṭhānasabhāvattā adhimokkho asanniṭṭhānasabhāve vicikicchā citte nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:497_13: Vīriyaṃ balanāyakattā dubbalesu pañcadvārāvajjanā dīsu soḷasacittesu nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:497_15: Chando icchāsabhāvattā icchārahitesu ahetukesu momūhacittesuca nuppajjatīti āha pakiṇṇakesupana vitakko.La.
anya-e0301n0:497_17: Te pana cittuppādā pakiṇṇakavivajjitā sapakiṇṇakāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:500_0: Pacchimaṃ purimassa samatthanavacananti adhippetaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:501_1: Yasmā pana sabbāni akusalacittāni imehi catūhi vinā nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:501_2: Na hi tāni pāpesu ādīnavaṃ passitvā ṭhitānaṃ uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:501_6: Yasmāca diṭṭhimānā khandhesu assādaṃ amuñcitvāva tesu tathā tathā āmasitvā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:501_8: Tattha uppajjantesu pana tesu diṭṭhi khandhesu attaggāhaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā taṃ attaṃ niccatādīhi micchāsabhāvehieva parāmasantī pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:501_9: Māno pana khandhe ahanti daḷhaṃ gahetvā taṃ gahitākāraṃ seyya tādīhieva āmasanto pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:501_10: Tasmā te āmasanākārato asadisavuttinoeva hontīti āha.
anya-e0301n0:501_13: Ye pana diṭṭhigatikā diṭṭhiyā yathāgahitaṃ attānameva ahanti gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:501_14: Tesaṃpi diṭṭhimānā āmasanākāraṃ patvā asadisavuttikāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:501_15: Na hi mānassa viya diṭṭhiyā atta saṃpaggahaṇe byāpāro atthi.
anya-e0301n0:501_16: Na ca diṭṭhiyā viya mānassa dhammānaṃ ayāthāvapakkhaparikappaneti.
anya-e0301n0:501_17: Teneva hi ahaṃgāho māno anāgāmīnaṃpi pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:503_0: “Mānopi ahaṃmānavasena pavattanato diṭṭhisadisova pavattatīti diṭṭhiyā saha ekacittuppāde napavattatī”ti vatvā kesara sīho pamāya taṃ atthaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:504_0: Sadisappavatti hi nāma sahapavattiyā eva kāraṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:504_1: Macchariyaṃ pana attasampattīsu lagganalobhasamuṭṭhitaṃpi tāsaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena
anya-e0301n0:504_2: pavattattā ekantena paṭighasampa yuttameva hotīti vuttaṃ doso.La.
anya-e0301n0:504_4: Akammañña lakkhaṇaṃ thinamiddhaṃ kammaññasabhāvesu asaṅkhārikesu nasambhavatīti vuttaṃ thinamiddhaṃ pañcasu sasaṅkhārika cittesūti.
anya-e0301n0:505_2: Lokuttare aṭṭhaṅgikamagge tīsu khandhesu paññākkhandhe sammāsaṅkappo nāma sammādiṭṭhipacchimakova hoti.
anya-e0301n0:505_3: Tasmā pādakajjhānādivasena tasmiṃ asatipi paññākkhandho naparihāyati.
anya-e0301n0:505_4: Sīlasamādhikkhandhadhammesu pana eko ekassa kiccaṃ nasādheti.
anya-e0301n0:505_5: Tasmā lokuttara maggo sattaṅgikato heṭṭhā napavattatīti āha viratiyo pana tissopi.La.
anya-e0301n0:505_8: Tattha niyatāvāti na lokiyesuviya kadācieva labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_9: Athakho sabbadāpi niyatā hutvāva labbhanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:505_11: Na hi te lokiyā viya kadāci dānavasena kadāci sutapariyattivasena kadāci kasiṇabhāvanādivasena pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:505_12: Ekato vāti nalokiyesu viya visuṃ visuṃ labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_13: Athakho tissopi ekato hutvāva labbhanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:505_15: Na hi te lokiyā viya vītikkamitabbavatthusaṅkhātāni jīvitindriyādīni nānārammaṇāni ārabbha pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_17: Sabbathāpīti na lokiyesu viya ekade sappahānavasena labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_18: Athakho tissopi anavasesa duccarita durājīvappahānākārena labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_19: Lokiyesuhi sakiṃ uppannā sammāvācā catubbidhāni vacīduccaritāni sabbāni ekato pajahituṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:505_23: Tathā pisuṇavācā virati pisuṇavācameva pajahituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:505_25: Pisuṇavācaṃpi samūlaṃ sānusayaṃ pajahituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:505_27: Lokuttaresu pana sakiṃ uppannā sammāvācā sabbāni vacīduccaritāni samūlāni sānusayāni pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:505_28: Sakiṃ uppanno sammākammanto sabbāni kāyaduccaritāni samūlāni sānusayāni pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:505_29: Sakiṃ uppanno sammāājīvo sabbāni ājīvahetukāni kāyavacīduccaritāni samūlāni sānusayāni pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:505_32: Sakiṃ uppannā ekā sammāvācā musāvādappahānavasenāpi labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:505_35: Etthaca duccaritāni samūlāni sānusayānīti ettha kāyavacīcopana bhāgiyāni kāmarāgānusayādīni uparimaggavajjhāni
anya-e0301n0:505_38: Tasmā tesaṃ pajahanavasena uparimagga phalaviratīnaṃ duccaritappahānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:505_44: Na hi brahmānaṃ viramitabbavatthu saṅkhātāni kāyavacīduccaritānināma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:505_45: Naca lokiyaviratiyo viramitabba vatthurahitesu puggalesu pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:505_48: Yadi evaṃ manussalokepi tīsu heṭṭhimaphalaṭṭhesu tāsaṃ appavatti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:505_49: Na hi tesaṃpi pāṇātipātādīni viramitabbavatthūnināma atthīti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:505_53: Manussānañca yāni kānici tassa tassa samādinnassa sikkhāpadassa vatthūnipi viramitabbavatthūnieva.
anya-e0301n0:505_54: Yānipi kāmasekkhānaṃ kāyavācā vipphandanakarāni kilesajātāni samucchedaviratīnaṃ vatthubhūtāni santi.
anya-e0301n0:505_56: Kadāci sandissantīti samādānasampattaviratīnaṃ aññataravasena pavattakāleeva sandissanti.
anya-e0301n0:505_57: Evaṃ sandissa mānāpi bhinnārammaṇattā naekato hutvā sandissantīti vuttaṃ visuṃ visunti.
anya-e0301n0:506_1: Appanāpattānaṃ appamaññānaṃ somanassasahagatabhāvova vibhaṅge vuttoti vuttaṃ pañcamajjhānavajjitamahaggatacittesūti.
anya-e0301n0:506_3: tasmā atisantāya nibyāpārāya pañcamajjhānupekkhāya saha napavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:506_4: Appanāpubbabhāgabhūtānaṃ pana tāsaṃ upekkhāvedanāyapi sampayogo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātoyevāti vuttaṃ kāmāvacara.La.
anya-e0301n0:506_7: Nānāhutvā jāyantīti tesaṃ vipattidassanakāle anukampanavasena karuṇā eva jāyati, namuditā.
anya-e0301n0:506_9: nakaruṇāti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ hutvā jāyantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:506_10: Yasmā panetā dosasamuṭṭhitānaṃ vihiṃsā aratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtāti suttantesu vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:506_12: Tasmā tāsaṃ appanāpubbabhāgabhūtānaṃpi niccaṃ somanassayogameva keci icchantīti vuttaṃ upekkhāsahagatesu.La.
anya-e0301n0:506_14: So pana tesaṃ vādo aṭṭhakathāyapi saha viruddho.
anya-e0301n0:506_15: Tasmā taṃ bahū viññuno na sampaṭicchantīti katvā sovādo therena kecivādonāma kato.
anya-e0301n0:506_16: Yasmāca sabbesaṃpi lokiya lokuttarajjhānānaṃ pubbabhāga bhāvanā nāma appanāsannakāleeva somanassajjhānānaṃ pubbabhāgā somanassasahagatā honti.
anya-e0301n0:506_18: Anāsannakāle pana sabbesaṃpi tesaṃ pubbabhāgā kadāci somanassasahagatā,
anya-e0301n0:506_20: Tasmā so vādo kecivādova kātuṃ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:506_21: Etthaca sabbānipi samathavipassanābhāvanācittānināma ādimhi yebhuyyena upekkhāsahagatānieva bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0301n0:506_22: yadiyi tāni āditoyeva paṭṭhāya somanassasahajātāni siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:506_23: Tadā ime sattā so manassajātesu kammesu anabhiratānāma natthīti aññaṃ kammaṃ chaḍḍetvā bhāvanākammameva anuyuñjeyyunti.
anya-e0301n0:506_24: Pacchā pana attano bhāvanāya pubbāpariyavisesadassanakāleeva somanassa sahajātāni bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:506_25: Paṭikūlā rammaṇesu pana asubhabhāvanācittesu dukkhitasattārammaṇesuca karuṇābhāvanācittesu vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0301n0:506_27: Tāsu pana muditā tāva iṭṭhasampattivisayāti sāyebhuyyena somanassa sahajātāti yuttametaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:506_28: Karuṇā pana aniṭṭhavipattivisayāti sā yebhuyyena upekkhāsahajātā eva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:506_29: Naca etā parasattahetu adhimatta byāpārāti katvā upekkhāvedanāya saha viruddhāevāti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:506_30: Sā hi appanaṃ apattā vedanupekkhānāma ārammaṇarasānubhavaneeva nibyāpārāhoti.
anya-e0301n0:506_32: Tathā hi sattā upekkhāsahagata cittehi adinnaṃpi ādiyanti,
anya-e0301n0:506_35: Tasmā appanā pattānaññeva tāsaṃ vedanupekkhāya saha viruddhabhāvo vattuṃ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:508_0: “Karuṇāmuditā bhāvanākāle appanāvīthito pubbe paricayavasena upekkhāsahagatacittehipi parikammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:508_1: Yathātaṃ paguṇaganthaṃ sajjhāyantassa kadāci aññavihi tassāpi sajjhāyanaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:508_2: yathāca paguṇavipassanāya saṅkhāre sammasantassakadāci paricayabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi sammasananti
anya-e0301n0:508_3: upekkhā sahagatakāmāvacaresu karuṇā muditānaṃ asambhavavādo kecivādo kato”ti.
anya-e0301n0:509_1: Tathāpi yogakammabalena cittasamādhānabalena kilesa dūrībhāvenaca tadārammaṇesu jhānacittesu ñāṇaṃ ekantena pavatta tiyevāti āha sabbesupi pañca.La.
anya-e0301n0:510_3: Evaṃ so bhaṇacetasikā sobhaṇesveva cittesu catudhā catūhi pakārehi sampayuttāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:510_4: Idāni sabbesaṃpi ceto yuttānaṃ niyatā niyatayogivibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ issātiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:510_14: Etthaca appamaññāviratīnaṃ nānā kadāci yogo heṭṭhāca vutto.
anya-e0301n0:510_18: Tattha māno catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu labbhamānopi kadāci tesaṃ seyyo hamasmītiādinā pavattakāleeva labbhati, naaññadā.
anya-e0301n0:510_19: Thinamiddhaṃ pañcasu sasaṅkhārikesu labbhamānaṃpi kadāci tesaṃ niddātibhūtavasena akammaññatāya pavattikāleeva labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:512_1: Kadāci tehi tenaca nānā jāyatī”ti yojanā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:513_0: Na hi tehi tenaca tassa sahabhāvo nānābhāvoca kiccārammaṇavirodhāvirodhabhāvena siddhoti.
anya-e0301n0:516_0: Yathāvuttānusārenāti sattasabbatthayujjantītiādinā vuttappakāraṃ anusārena sesāti ekādasahi aniyata yogīhi avasesā ekacattālīsadhammā.
anya-e0301n0:516_1: Te yathāvuttānusārena attanā labbhamāna cittuppādesu aniyatayogino veditabbāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:517_1: Evaṃ cetasikānaṃ yogaṭṭhānaparicchindanavasena sampayoganayaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttadhammarāsiparicchindanavasena
anya-e0301n0:517_3: Idāni tesaṃ saṅgahañca yathārahaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:517_5: Sattapaññattārammaṇā appamaññā nibbānā rammaṇesu nalabbhantiti vuttaṃ appamaññāvajjitāti tathā aṭṭhasu
anya-e0301n0:517_6: dutīyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavajjā aññasamānā dvādasaceta sikā appamaññāvajjitā tevīsati sobhaṇacetasikāceti
anya-e0301n0:517_7: pañcattiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchantītiādinayaṃ tathāsaddena niddisati.
anya-e0301n0:517_8: Teevāti vitakka vicāra pītisukhavajjā upekkhāsahagatā te eva tettiṃsadhammā.
anya-e0301n0:517_9: Aṭṭhasūti ettha aṭṭhaca aṭṭhaca aṭṭhāti ekasesaniddeso,
anya-e0301n0:517_11: Pañcakajjhāna vasenāti pāḷiyaṃ pañcakanayena vuttassa jhānabhedassa vasena,
anya-e0301n0:517_12: catukkanayena vuttassa jhānabhedassa vasena pana catudhāva saṅgaho hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:517_13: Dvīsu rūpapathamajjhānalābhīsu dutīyajjhānaṃ uppādentesu mando vitakkamo atikkamituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:517_15: Tikkhapañño pana vitakka vicāre ekato atikkamituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:517_16: Tassa tiyaṅgikaṃ dutīyajjhānaṃ uppajjatīti ayaṃ tesaṃ nayānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0301n0:518_1: Kiccārammaṇaviruddhattā viratiyo mahaggatesu nuppajjantīti āha viratittayavajjitāti.
anya-e0301n0:518_4: Viratiyoca vītikkamitabba vatthuṃvā nibbānaṃvā ārabbha pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:519_1: Kiccārammaṇavi ruddhattāyeva viratiappamaññāyo ekasmiṃ citte dve nalabbhantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:519_4: Viratiyo ekantena dussilyappahāna kiccattā tappahāna kiccarahitesu lokiyābyākatesu nalabbhantīti vuttaṃ virativajjitāti.
anya-e0301n0:519_7: Appamaññānaṃ sattapaññattārammaṇattā mahāvipākānañca ekanta parittārammaṇattā tāsaṃ tesu sambhavo natthīti vuttaṃ appamaññā virativajjitāti.
anya-e0301n0:519_8: Nanu kāmakusalaṃ sattapaññattādi ārammaṇaṃpi hotīti tabbipākenapi tena sadisā rammaṇena bhavitabbanti. Na.
anya-e0301n0:519_10: Paññattiyo hi avijjamānattā mahaggatānuttaradhammāca saṇhasukhumadhammattā tathā tathā vikappetvāvā paṭivijjhitvāvā
anya-e0301n0:519_12: Kāmavipākāni pana sayaṃ atidubbalatāya ārammaṇaṃ vikappetvā vigahetuṃ nasakkonti,
anya-e0301n0:519_14: Tasmā tāni paññattiyovā mahaggatānuttaradhammevā ālambituṃ na sakkontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:519_15: Mahaggatavipākāni pana vikapparahitānipi appanāpattakammavise sanibbattattā bhāvanābalanimmitāni paññattivisesāni ālambituṃ sakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:521_0: Kāmataṇhādhinakammajanitattā kāmavipākāni kāmataṇhāya ārammaṇabhūte kāmadhammeeva ālambituṃ labhantīti
anya-e0301n0:521_1: adhippāyena “kāmataṇhādhinassa phalabhūtattā”ti vatvā dāsiputtopamāya tadatthaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0301n0:522_0: Evañhi sati mahaggatavipākānipi rūpārūpataṇhādhina kammajanitāni eva hontīti tānipi rūpārūpataṇhānaṃ ārammaṇabhūte mahaggata dhammeeva ālambeyyunti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:522_3: Naca itthipurisādi hattha pādādi paññattīsu assādavasena pavattā taṇhā kāmataṇhā nāma nahotīti atthi.
anya-e0301n0:522_6: Subhe kriye pāketi niddhāraṇīyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sahetu. La.
anya-e0301n0:522_14: Parittesu kāmasobhaṇesu appamaññāca virati ñāṇapīti yoca visesakā,
anya-e0301n0:523_1: Sattarasadhammā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati hutvā saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:523_2: Pītivajjitā aññasamānā dvādasa cetasikā akusalasādhāraṇā cattārocāti soḷasadhammā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa hutvā saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:523_3: Issāmacchariya kukkuccāni kiccato ārammaṇato ca bhinnāni hontīti vuttaṃ issā.La.
anya-e0301n0:523_5: Sabbesupi akusalacittuppādesu sampayuttadhammā dhammato asadisāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:523_6: Gaṇanato pana ekacce ekaccehi sadisā eva hontīti vuttaṃ dvādasa.La.
anya-e0301n0:523_14: Momūhadvaye pannarasāti evaṃ akusalesu satta saṅgahā bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:524_4: Mano dhātuttikā hetuka paṭisandhi yugaḷeti pañcadvārāvajjana sampaṭicchanadvayasaṅkhāte manodhātuttikeceva
anya-e0301n0:524_7: tato sesā pakiṇṇakā pana yathārahaṃ yujjanti,
anya-e0301n0:524_8: iti tettiṃsa vidhasaṅgaho mayā vuttoti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:525_1: Idāni ayaṃ cetasikaniddesoti katvā cittassa viya ekassapi cetasikassa bhūmijāti sampayogādi bhedena vibhāgo kathetabboti taṃ dassetuṃ antimagāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:525_2: Itthaṃ iminā yathāvuttappakārena cittāviyuttānaṃ cetasikānaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ sampayogañca tettiṃsavidhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:525_3: saṅgahañca ñatvā tesaṃ yathā yogaṃ cittena samaṃ bhedaṃ uddiseti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:525_4: Phasso tāva ekūnanavutiyā ekavīsasatesuvā cittesu yuttattā ekūnanavuti ekavīsasatavidhevāti evaṃ dvipaññāsacetasike
anya-e0301n0:525_5: visuṃ visuṃ uddharitvā yathāyogaṃ bhūmijātisampayogādibhedehi tesaṃ vibhāgaṃ katheyyāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:530_1: Evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ cittacetasikānaṃ niddesaṃ dassetvā idāni puna ubhinnaṃ niddesaṃ dassento sampayuttāyathāyogantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:530_2: Yathāyogaṃ sampayuttā sabhāvato tepaññāsa cittacetasikā ye dhammā mayā visuṃ visuṃ niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0301n0:530_3: Idāni yathā rahaṃ tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ saṅgahonāma niyyateti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:530_6: Cittaṃ tāva bhūmijātisampayogādibhedena ekūna navutividhaṃpi attano ārammaṇa vijānanasaṅkhātena āvenikalakkhaṇena ekameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:530_7: Phassopi bhūmijātisampayo gādibhedena ekūnanavutividhopi phusanalakkhaṇena ekova hoti tathā vedanāsaññādayoti evaṃ sabhāvato tepaññāsa eva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:530_13: Ettāvatā channaṃ pakiṇṇakasaṅgahānaṃ vacanattho idheva tāva therena dassito hoti vedanābhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho vedanāsaṅgaho,
anya-e0301n0:532_0: Cittuppādasaddena cetasikadhammepi gahetvā aññaṃ nivatte tabbaṃ apassanto “na katthaci taṃvirahenā”ti vadati.
anya-e0301n0:533_0: Na hi idha ettakā cetasikā sukhasahagatā,
anya-e0301n0:533_1: ettakā dukkha sahagatātiādinā ekopi saṅgaho cetasikehi nīto nāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:533_2: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇamekamevātiādinā pana cittenaeva nīhoti.
anya-e0301n0:533_3: Citte pana siddhe ceta sikāpi siddhāevāti katvā cittuppādavasenevāti idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:536_1: Tattha casaddena vedanāsaṅgahoca vedanāsahagata cittuppāda saṅgahocāti imasmiṃ atthe vedanāsaṅgahoti ekasesaniddeso hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:537_0: Idha hi vedanābhedo imassa saṅgahassa nissayadhammapariggahatthaṃeva vutto.
anya-e0301n0:537_3: Nanu saṃyuttake dvepi tissopi pañcapi chapi aṭṭhārasapi chattiṃsapi aṭṭhasataṃpi vedanā vuttāti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:537_5: Ye hi keci yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ anubhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:537_6: Te taṃ sātatovā anubhavanti asātatovā majjhattatovā.
anya-e0301n0:537_8: Aññe pana pabhedā tena tena pariyāyena vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:537_9: Tattha hi dve kāyikacetasikavasena vuttā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:537_10: katamāca bhikkhave dve vedanā kāyikāca cetasikācāti.
anya-e0301n0:537_11: Sukhadukkha vasenavā upekkhaṃ sukhe saṅgahetvā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:537_12: dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhāvedanā dukkhāvedanā.
anya-e0301n0:539_0: Anavajjapakkhikaṃ upekkhaṃ sukhe sāvajjapakkhikañca dukkhe saṅgahetvā dve vuttāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:540_3: Cha gehassitāni cha nekkhammassitānīti evaṃ paccekaṃ dvādasannaṃ somanassa domanassaupekkhānaṃ vasena chattiṃsa.
anya-e0301n0:540_5: Yañca katthaci sutte yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:540_7: Heṭṭhā pana cittaniddese cittāni indriyabhedavasena niddiṭṭhānīti katvā idhapi indriyabhedavaseneva cittāni saṅgahetuṃ puna sukhaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:540_9: Ettha ca yesu dhammesu ādhi paccavasena sukhadukkhāni indriyāni nāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:540_10: Tesaṃ kāyika mānasikavasena duvidhattā tānipi sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ domanassindriyanti dvidhā vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:540_11: Upekkhāya pana ādhipaccaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā mānasikāeva hontītisā upekkhindriyanti ekadhāva vuttāti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:542_0: “Kāyika mānasika sātabhedato sukhadukkhāni dvidhā vuttānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:543_0: Tattha sabhāvato iṭṭhāniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbā nubhavanalakkhaṇāni sukha dukkhāni.
anya-e0301n0:543_2: Sesānīti yathāvutta sukhadukkhato manassa domanassayuttehi sesāni bāttiṃsa kāmāvacaracittāni tevīsati
anya-e0301n0:544_0: 131. Hetūnaṃ bhedena taṃsampayuttānaṃ cittacetasikāna saṅgaho hetusaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:547_2: Tattha hetukiccaṃnāma ārammaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāva sādhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:547_3: Yathā hi rukkhassa mūlāni sayaṃ anto pathaviyaṃ vaddhitvā pathaviraseca āporaseca gahetvā rukkhaṃ yāva aggā abhiharanti.
anya-e0301n0:547_4: Vātevā mahoghevā āgate rukkhaṃ suṭṭhu ākaḍḍhitvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0301n0:547_5: evaṃ rukkho vuddho viruḷho vipulo ciraṭṭhitikoca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_6: Evamevaṃ imepi dhammā sayaṃ ārammaṇesu thirapattā hutvā sampayuttadhamme tattha vuddhe viruḷhe vipule ciraṭṭhitikeca sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n0:547_7: Ahetukacittānipana jalatale amūlakasevā lāni viya ārammaṇe suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitāni na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:547_8: Apare pana dhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhanaṃ hetukiccanti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:547_12: Tesañca kusalādibhāvo āpajjeyyāti vatvā taṃvādaṃ paṭipakkhipanti.
anya-e0301n0:547_13: Yathā pana loke andhakāronāma kenaci paccaya visesena sādhetabbo na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_15: Tattha so attano dhammatāya siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_16: Evamevaṃ dhammesu muyhanakriyābhūto mohandhakāropi attano dhammatāya eva akusalo bhavituṃ arahati.
anya-e0301n0:547_18: Sāmuyhanakriyāya yuttā lagganabhāvaṃ patvā lobho akusalo nāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_19: Saddhāya yuttā pana dhammacchandabhāvaṃ patvā kusalacchandonāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_21: Sāpi muyhana kriyāya yuttā paṭighabhāvaṃ patvā doso akusalonāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_22: Saddhāya yuttā pana uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetītiādinā nayena pāpadhamma pāpārammaṇa virodhabhāvaṃ patvā alobho kusalonāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_25: Ambilatthāya aññena saṃyogakiccarahito jātiambilaraso viya ekantaakusalajātikāeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:547_26: Yoca dhammo kusalo akusaloca na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:547_27: So abyākatoti ettakameva dhammānaṃ abyākatabhāvasiddhiyā kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:547_28: Tasmā ahetukacittānaṃ rūpanibbānānañca abyākatabhāvopi attano dhamma tāyaeva siddho.
anya-e0301n0:547_32: Tāni pana lobhādīni lobhasahagatādīnaṃ visesamūlāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:547_35: Yasmā pana hetuyonāma sampayuttesu padhānadhammā honti.
anya-e0301n0:547_36: Tasmā sahetukavipākakriyānaṃ abyākatabhāvo pana hetu mukhenapi vattuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n0:549_0: “Apare pana kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhanaṃ hetu bhāvo”ti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:549_1: Evaṃ sati hetūnaṃ attano kusalā dibhāvasādhano añño hetu maggitabbo siyā.
anya-e0301n0:549_3: evampi momūha cittasampayuttassa hetuno akusala bhāvo appaṭibaddho siyā.
anya-e0301n0:549_5: Evaṃsati sesahetūnampi sabhāvato kusalādibhāvoti tesaṃ viya sampayutta dhammānampi so hetupaṭibaddho nasiyā,
anya-e0301n0:549_7: Tadā ahetukānaṃ abyākatabhāvo nasiyāti alamatinippīḷanenāti taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:550_0: Yathāca laddhajjhānapaccayesu rūpārūpadhammesu jhānaṅgāni arūpadhammesueva upanijjhānaṭṭhaṃ pharanti,
anya-e0301n0:550_2: Te pana jhānadhamma samuṭṭhi tattāeva jhānapaccayuppannesu vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:550_3: Evameva hetuyopi arūpa dhammesueva kusalādibhāvaṃ pharanti.
anya-e0301n0:550_5: Te pana hetu samuṭṭhitattāeva hetupaccayuppannesu vuttāti na tesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvāpatti codetabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:552_0: “Kusalādibhāvo pana kusalākusalānaṃ yoniso ayoniso manasikārapaṭibaddho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:553_0: Tathā hi sūriyāloke āgate divā balānaṃ haṃsādīnaṃ okāso hoti.
anya-e0301n0:553_1: Rattandhakāle āgate rattibalānaṃ ulūkādīnaṃ okāso hoti.
anya-e0301n0:553_2: Naca te ālokandhakārā tesaṃ vaṇṇādivisesaṃ sāmenti.
anya-e0301n0:553_9: Abyākatānaṃ panāti sabbaṃ yo dhammo kusalo akusaloca na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:553_12: Sahetukānaṃ pariggahasukhatthaṃ idha vajjetabbānipi ahetukāni pathamaṃ uddhaṭāni.
anya-e0301n0:553_15: Tesaṃvā ahetukanāmaṃpi hetūnaṃ vaseneva visuṃ siddhanti tesaṃpi idha saṅgahaṇaṃ aviruddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:553_17: Sabhāva bhedena chabbidhāpi hetuyo kusalā kusalā byākatajātibhedena navadhā hontīti vuttaṃ lobho dosocātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:554_0: 132. Cuddasannaṃ kiccānaṃ bhedena taṃkiccavantānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho kiccasaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:556_0: “Paṭisandhādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ vibhāgavasena taṃkiccavantānañca paricchedavasena saṅgaho kiccasaṅgaho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:557_1: Tasmiṃ sarasenavā laddhavibādhanenavā parikkhīṇe so bhavo nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:557_3: Tasmā tato nibbatta bhavato cutassa antarā khaṇamattaṃpi aṭṭhatvā laddhokāsena ekena kammena puna bhavantarādi
anya-e0301n0:557_5: Tathā nibbattassa upapattibhavasantānassa yāva taṃ kammaṃ nakhiyyati.
anya-e0301n0:557_7: Tassa hi tathā pavattiyā sati āyupabandhāca usmā pabandhāca pavattantiyevāti ete tayo dhammā imaṃ kāyaṃ abhijjamānaṃ rakkhantīti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:558_0: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahanti maṃ;
anya-e0301n0:560_3: Bhavaṅga vīthito okkamitvā ārammaṇantarābhimukhaṃ pavattatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:560_6: Voṭṭhabbananti visuṃ avacchinditvā thapanaṃ idaṃ nīlantivā pītakantivā subhantivāasubhantivā asaṅkaratothapanaṃ niyamananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:560_8: Asaninipāto viya vegasahitassa ekekassa pittassa pavatti javanakiccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:562_0: “Ārammaṇe taṃtaṃkiccasādhanavasena anekakkhattuṃ ekakkhattuṃvā javamānassa viya pavatti javanakicca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:563_0: Na hi javamānassa cittassa ekavāramattena nivattināma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:563_1: Maggātiññājavanānipi hi ekāvajjanaparikammacittato paṭṭhāya ekavegena pavattajavamānacittasantānapatitāni eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:563_2: Na pana tāni visuṃ siddhena javena javantīti.
anya-e0301n0:565_0: Javamānassa viya pavattīti etena visuṃ visuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhā naṃ khaṇikadhammānaṃ sīghagamanasaṅkhāto javonāma visuṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:565_1: Bahukkhattuṃ pavattivasena pana sīghagacchantapurisa sadisattā eva javananti vuccatīti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:566_0: Asaninipāto viya vegasahitassa ekekassa cittassa pavattijavanakiccanti hi heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:566_1: Bhavaṅgacittañhi dīghaṃ addhānaṃ pūretvā pavattaṃpi nadisote vuyhamānaṃ sukkhapaṇṇaṃ viya vegarahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:566_2: Javanacittaṃ pana ekamekaṃpi samānaṃ indena vissaṭṭha vajiraṃ viya vegasahitameva pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:566_7: tasseva gahitattā tadārammaṇaṃ nāmāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:566_8: Tassavā javanassa ārammaṇaṃ assa ārammaṇanti tadārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:566_11: Idāni tāni kiccāni aniyamato na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:566_13: Tiṭṭhati pavattati taṃtaṃ kiccavantaṃ cittaṃ etthāti ṭhānaṃ. Okāso.
anya-e0301n0:566_15: Kālopi hi kālavantānaṃ pavattivisayattā ṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:568_0: “Paṭisandhiyā ṭhānaṃ paṭisandhiṭṭhānanti vatvā kāmaṃ paṭisandhivini muttaṃ ṭhānaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:568_1: Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pana silā puttakassa sarīrantiādīsu viya abhedepi bhedaparikappanāti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:569_0: Kālo hi nāma sabhāvato avijjamānopi cittassa visuṃ ārammaṇabhūto eko paññattidhammo.
anya-e0301n0:569_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākacittānaṃ vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:569_3: Paṭisandhiyaṃ bhavaṅge cutiyaṃ tadārammaṇeti vatvā taṃ vitthārentena paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhihutvā vipaccanti.
anya-e0301n0:569_4: Asaṅkhyeyyaṃpi āyu kālaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā maraṇa kāle cuti hutvāti kālova vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:569_5: Itarathā kiccāni viya ṭhānānipi cuddasavidhānieva vattabbāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:569_6: Ṭhānānaṃ vitthārabhedo pana upari dvīsu pavattisaṅgahesu cittapavattividhānānusārena veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:569_7: Yasmā omakaṃ dvihetukakusalaṃ sayaṃ so manassayuttaṃpi samānaṃ atidubbalattā somanassa paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:569_8: Tasmā somanassasantīraṇaṃ paṭisandhiṭṭhānaṃ nagacchatīti vuttaṃ dveupekkhāsahagatasantīraṇānicevāti.
anya-e0301n0:569_9: Tathā hi paṭṭhāne pītisahagatattike paṭiccavāre hetupaccanike taṃ paṭi sandhiṭṭhānena uddhaṭanti.
anya-e0301n0:569_10: Manodvārāvajjanaṃ parittārammaṇevā avibhūtā rammaṇevā dvattikkhattuṃ pavattamānaṃpi vipāka santānato
anya-e0301n0:569_11: laddhapaccayabhāvena dubbalattā javanavegarahitameva hotīti vuttaṃ āvajjana dvaya vajjitānīti.
anya-e0301n0:571_0: “Ārammaṇarasānubhavanā bhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ a kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:572_0: Na hi ārammaṇa rasānubhavanaṃ javanakicca siddhiyā javananāma lābhassaca kāraṇaṃ hoti.
