anya-e0301n0:572_2: Yasmā pana phalacittaṃ āsevanabhāvarahitaṃpi magga cetanāya mahānubhāvattā parikammabhāvanābalena ca
anya-e0301n0:572_3: pavattattā ārammaṇe vegasahitameva patatīti tassajavanesu gahaṇaṃkataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:574_0: Maggābhiññājavanānaṃ ekavārameva pavattattā javanakiccaṃ na sampajjatīti adhippāyena “ekacittakkhaṇikaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:574_1: lokuttara maggāditaṃ taṃsabhāvavantatāya javanakiccaṃ nāmā”ti vatvā sabbaññutaññāṇopamāya tamatthaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0301n0:575_0: Idāni samānakiccagaṇanāni cittāni saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ tesu panātiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:578_1: Ekakiccaṭṭhāna dvikiccaṭṭhāna tikiccaṭṭhāna catukiccaṭṭhāna pañcakiccaṭṭhānāni cittāni yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhica
anya-e0301n0:578_2: tathā dveca navaca aṭṭhaca dveca niddiseti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:579_0: 133. Cakkhādīnaṃ dvārānaṃ bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho dvārasaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:581_0: “Dvārānañca dvārapavattacittānañca paricchedavasena saṅgaho dvārasaṅgaho”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:582_0: Dve janā aranti gacchanti etenāti dvāraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:582_1: Nagarassa anto janā bahijanāca yena chiddamaggena nikkhamanti pavisantica,
anya-e0301n0:582_3: Dve janā aranti gacchanti etthāti dvārantipī vadanti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:582_13: Taṃpi hi ārammaṇikadhammānaṃ ārammaṇadhammānañca niggamana pavisana mukhapathabhāvato dvārasadisattā dvāranti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:582_14: Taṃ pana rūpamaṇḍa dvāraṃ arūpamaṇḍadvāranti duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:582_15: Rūpamaṇḍadvāraṃpi kammavisesamahābhūta visesasiddhena maṇḍabhāvavisesena pañcavidhanti dassetuṃ cakkhudvārantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:582_16: Tattha cakkhumevacakkhudvāranti yasmiṃ cakkhumhi canda maṇḍalādīni rūpa nimittāni paññāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:582_17: Āvajjanādīnica yamhi paññātāni tāni nimittāni gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:582_18: Tasmā tadeva cakkhu tesaṃ dvinnaṃ visayavisa yibhāvupagamanassa mukhapathabhūtattā cakkhudvāraṃnāmāti attho. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:582_19: yena cakkhumaṇḍena bahiddhā candamaṇḍalādīni rūpāni anto āvajjanādīnaṃ visayabhāvaṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:582_20: Yenaca anto āvajjanādīni bahiddhā tesaṃ rūpānaṃ visayibhāvaṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:582_21: Tameva yathāvutta kāraṇena cakkhudvāraṃ nāmāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:584_0: “Āvajjanādīnaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato dvārasadisattā dvārānī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:585_2: Etthaca visayānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ dvāresu āpātā gamana saṅkhātā pavattiyo visayapavattiyoti vuccantīti.
anya-e0301n0:585_3: Tattha cakkhumeva cakkhudvāranti etena cakkhussa dvāraṃ cakkhudvāranti atthaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0301n0:585_4: Tathā sotādayo sota dvārādīnīti etena sota meva sotadvāraṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:585_6: Na manānaṃ dvāraṃ manodvāranti imamatthaṃ atidissati.
anya-e0301n0:585_7: Tassa pana manassa bahuvidhattā idha adhippetaṃ manaṃ dassento manodvāraṃ pana bhavaṅganti pavuccatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:587_0: “Āvajjanādīnaṃ manānaṃ dvāranti manodvāra”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:588_1: Tattha sabbaṃ ekūnanavutividhaṃpi cittaṃ manodvāra mevanāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:588_2: Idha pana upapattidvārameva adhippetanti katvā bhavaṅganti pavuccatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:588_3: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukaṃ nadisotamiva pavattamānaṃ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ bhavaṅgacittameva idha manodvāranti vuccati,
anya-e0301n0:590_1: Evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ manānaṃ pavattimukhaṭṭhena dvāraṃnāma āvajjanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgameva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:590_2: Na tato purimāni bhavaṅgānīti adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “bhavaṅganti āvajjānānantaraṃ bhavaṅga”nti.
anya-e0301n0:591_0: Evañhi sati yesu cakkhupasādādīsu rūpādīni āpātaṃ nāgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:591_1: Tānipi āvajjanādīnaṃ vīthicittānaṃ pavattimukhāni eva na hontīti katvā dvārānināma nasiyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:595_1: Yattha pana cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Sotañca. La.
anya-e0301n0:595_2: Manañca paṭicca dhammeca uppajjati manoviññāṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:595_4: Tattha hi cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā catūsu paccayesu cakkhurūpāni eva sarūpato vuttānīti itare āvajjanañca
anya-e0301n0:595_5: sampayuttakkhandhā cāti dve paccayā casaddena gahitā,
anya-e0301n0:595_7: Manoviññāṇe pana manañcāti ettha bhavaṅgacittena saha āvajjanaṃ gahetvā casaddena sampayuttakkhandhā gahitā.
anya-e0301n0:595_9: Vuttañhetaṃ dhātuvibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭiccāti nāma āgataṭṭhāne āvajjanaṃ visuṃ nakātabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:595_13: Etthaca paṭiccātināma āgataṭṭhāneti etena aññattha pana āvajjanaṃ dvārapakkhikaṃ nakātabbanti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:595_14: Paṭiccāti āgatattāyevaca bhavaṅgaṃpi āvajjanā nantaraṃ bhavaṅgadvayameva imissaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:595_16: Idha pana dvārabhāvā rahassa sabbassa upapattidhammassa pariggahitattā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:595_17: Na hi kiñci bhavaṅgaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:595_18: Yaṃ manodvārabhāvārahaṃ na siyāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:595_20: tesu chasu dvāresu cakkhu dvāreti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:595_22: Sabbathāpīti visuṃ visuṃ chacattālīsa bhedasaṅkhātena sabbapakārenapi agahita gahaṇa vasena,
anya-e0301n0:595_24: Sabbathāpītivā āvajjanādi tadārammaṇa pariyo sānavasena anekakiccabhedayuttena sabbapakārenapi,
anya-e0301n0:595_26: Yāni āvajjanādīni kiccāni dvāravikāraṃ paṭicca pavattanti,
anya-e0301n0:595_27: taṃ kiccavantānieva dvāre niyuttānīti atthena dvārikānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:595_28: Paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti kiccānipana dvāravikārena vinā kevalaṃ kammavaseneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:595_29: Tasmā taṃkiccavantāni dvārikānināma nahontīti vuttaṃ ekūna.La.
anya-e0301n0:595_30: Dvāravimuttānīti ettha ca dvāravikāronāma attani ārammaṇānaṃ āpātāgamanavasena bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:595_31: cakkhādīnañca attani viññāṇuppādana sattivisesa yogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:597_0: “Cakkhādidvāresu apavattanato manodvārasaṅkhāta bhavaṅgato ārammaṇantaragahaṇavasena apavattitoca dvāravimuttānī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:598_0: Paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasenāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:598_1: Etena hi kiccasīseneva cittānaṃ dvārika dvāravimuttabhāgo therena dassito.
anya-e0301n0:598_4: Nanu cakkhādidvāresu apavattanatoti iminā etadatthova vuttoti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n0:598_5: Adhippetatthavirahassa apasaṅga nivattakassaca saṃvaṇṇanā vākyassa payojanābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n0:598_6: Chadvārikāniceva santīraṇa tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ vasena dvāravimuttānica paṭisandhādikiccānaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:598_8: Kadāci chadvārikāniceva tāni kadāci dvāravimuttānicāti chadvārikavimuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:602_0: 134. Rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ bhedena cittacetasikānaṃ saṅgaho ārammaṇasaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:604_0: “Ārammaṇānaṃ sarūpato vibhāgato taṃvisayacittato ca saṅgaho ārammaṇasaṅgaho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:605_3: Dubbalapurisena daṇḍādiviya cittacetasikehi ālambīyati amuñcamānehi gaṇhīyatīti ālambaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:605_4: Ārammaṇasadde pana sati cittacetasikāni āgantvā ettha ramantīti ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:607_1: Tānivā āgantvā ettha ramantīti ālambaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:608_2: Pañcārammaṇavimuttaṃ yaṃkiñci dhammajātaṃ vijjamānaṃpiavijjamānaṃpi bhūtaṃpi abhūtaṃpi dhammārammaṇameva.
anya-e0301n0:608_3: Taṃ pana sabhāga koṭṭhāsato saṅgayhamānaṃ chabbidhaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ pana.La.
anya-e0301n0:608_6: Cakkhudvāre ghaṭṭayamāna rūpānusāreneva uppannāni cakkhudvārikacittāni aññāni ārammaṇāni ālambituṃ nalabhanti.
anya-e0301n0:608_7: Rūpānipi ghaṭṭanarahitāni atītānāgatāni ālambituṃ nalabhantīti vuttaṃ cakkhudvārikacittānaṃ sabbesaṃpi rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:608_10: Tattha taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ paccuppannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:608_18: Tasmā uppādarahitā asaṅkhatabhūtā nibbānapaññattiyo kālavimuttaṃnāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:610_0: “Vināsābhāvato atītādikālavasena navattabbattā nibbānaṃ paññattica kālavimuttaṃnāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:611_0: Sabbepi hi saṅkhatadhammā anāgatabhāva pubbakāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:611_1: Tasmā te yadā paccayasāmaggiṃ labhitvā uppajjissantīti vattabbapakkhe tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0301n0:611_11: Vināsābhāvatoti idaṃ pana atītakālavimuttiyāeva kāraṇanti na tena tāsaṃ itarakālavimuttiṃ sādhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:611_12: Yathārahavibhāgo pana idheva tesūtiādinā pacchā āgamissati.
anya-e0301n0:611_14: Yathā pana āvajjanādīnaṃ chadvārikacittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhavantarepi imasmiṃ bhavepi purimabhāge kenaci dvārena gahitaṃpi agahitaṃpi hoti.
anya-e0301n0:611_15: Na tathā imesanti dassetuṃ bhavantare chadvāragahitanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:611_16: Bhavavisesañhi patthetvā kammaṃ katvā tattha nibbattānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhavantarepi kenaci dvārena gahitaṃpi hoti yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:613_0: “Taṃ pana nesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na āvajjanassa viya kenaci agahitameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti dassetuṃ chadvāra gahitanti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:614_0: Pañcadvārā vajjanassapi hi ārammaṇaṃ pubbe kenaci dvārantarena gahitaṃpi agahitaṃpi hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:614_1: Tathā hi idaṃ nāma labhissāmi bhuñjissāmi passissāmīti pubbe gahitaṃ pacchā āvajjanassa ārammaṇaṃ na na hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:614_2: Naca ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ pubbe kenaci cittena agahitabhāvo idha pamāṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:614_3: Yathā ca pañcadvārikacittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekantapaccuppannameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:614_4: Yathā ca manodvārikacittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tekālikaṃvā kālavimuttasā maññaṃvā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:614_5: Na tathā imesanti dassetuṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññattibhūtaṃvāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:614_6: Yathā ca chadvārikacittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āgamasiddhavohārayuttaṃpi tabbohāravinimuttaṃpi hoti.
anya-e0301n0:614_7: Na tathā imesanti dassetuṃ kamma kamma nimitta gatinimitta sammatanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:616_0: “Nāpi nesaṃ ārammaṇaṃ maraṇāsannato purimabhāgajavanānaṃ viya kammakammanimittādivasena āgamasiddhavohāravinimuttanti dassetuṃ kamma.La.
anya-e0301n0:617_0: Maraṇā sannato purimabhāgepi hi sattā attanā katakammaṃvā cetiyādīni kamma,
anya-e0301n0:617_6: Ajātasatturājā viyaca supinadassanādivasena gatinimittānipi ārammaṇaṃ karontiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:617_7: Rājā hi dvīsu bhavesu pitaraṃ māreti.
anya-e0301n0:617_8: Māritakālatoca paṭṭhāya tassa niddāyantassa gatinimittāni upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:617_9: Tattha yathāsambhavanti taṃ taṃ paṭisandhādīnaṃ chadvāragahitādivasena sambhavantassa ārammaṇassa anurūpato.
anya-e0301n0:617_13: Chadvāra gahitanti chahi dvārehi maraṇāsannajavanehi gahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:617_14: Ettha ca yebhuyyenāti etena bhavantare chadvāragahitanti imassa vidhānassa anekaṃsabhāvaṃ viseseti. Kasmā.
anya-e0301n0:617_16: Yañhi asaññibhavato cutānaṃ kamma kammanimitta gatinimitta sammataṃ arūpabhavato cutānañca gatinimittasammataṃ
anya-e0301n0:617_18: Taṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena agahita meva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:617_19: Etthaca yasmā paṭṭhāne arūpabhave duvidhopi purejātapaccayo paṭisiddho.
anya-e0301n0:617_20: Aṭṭhakathāsuca tato cutānaṃ kāmapaṭisandhiyā paccuppannagatinimittārammaṇatāpi vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:617_22: Tasmā tesaṃ kāmapaṭisandhiyāpi gatinimittasammataṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena agahitameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:617_23: maraṇāsannakāle kammabalena kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃnāma yebhuyyena saṃmuḷhamaraṇena marantānameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:617_24: Itaresaṃ pana paresaṃ payogabalenapi attanā pakatiyā suṭṭhu āsevitānaṃ anussaraṇabalenapi dhammikaupāsakādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:617_25: viya devalokato āgantvā gaṇhantānaṃ devānaṃ ānubhāvenapi hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:617_28: Tañhi dve nirayapālā gahetvā pathamaṃ tāvatiṃsābhavanaṃ netvā pacchā nirayaṃ nayiṃsu.
anya-e0301n0:617_29: Te hi yakkha jātikattā vessavaṇaparisāviya tāvatiṃsā bhavanaṃpi gantuṃ sakkontiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:617_30: Yamassa dūtā dve yakkhāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:617_31: Vessavaṇadūtā idha yamassa dūtāti vuttātipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:617_32: Tasmā ye kasiṇāsubhādīni samathanimittāni suṭṭhu āsevitvā upacārajjhāne ṭhatvā tāneva nimittāni gahetvā maranti.
anya-e0301n0:617_33: Tesaṃpi kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ bhavantare kenaci dvārena agahitameva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:619_0: “Kevalaṃ kammabaleneva tesaṃ asaññibhavato cutānaṃ paṭisandhiyā kammanimittādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:620_0: Tattha kammanimittādikanti ettha ādisaddena kammaṃpi gahetabba meva.
anya-e0301n0:620_1: Na hi tassa agahaṇe kāraṇaṃ atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:620_2: Tāni pana sabbānipi kevalaṃ paṭisandhijanakassa kammassa ānubhāveneva paṭisandhiyaṃ upaṭṭhahantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:620_3: Anāgataṃ pana nimittaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ gatinimittameva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:620_5: Paccuppanna gatinimitte siddhe siddhameva hotīti vuttaṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññatti bhūtaṃvāti.
anya-e0301n0:622_1: Naca paccuppannagatinimittaṃ viya āpātamāgata”nti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:623_1: Gatinimittañhi nāma paccuppannaṃpi anubhūtaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:623_3: Evaṃsante anāgataṃpi kammabalena āpātamāgatameva siyāti ayaṃ pasaṅgo pākatikoeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:623_5: Rūpādīsu pañcasu ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti samāso.
anya-e0301n0:623_7: Sesānīti pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchana dvayato sesāni santīraṇa mahāvipākāni.
anya-e0301n0:623_8: Sabbathāpi kāmāvacarā lambaṇānevāti paṭisandhādīhi nānākiccehi rūpādīsu nānārammaṇesu pavattena sabba pakārenapi kāmāvacarālambaṇikāniyeva.
anya-e0301n0:623_9: Tāni hi sabbaññubuddhānaṃ uppannānipi vikappasattirahitattā avijjamāne paññattidhammeca sukhume mahaggatadhammeca
anya-e0301n0:623_11: Tattha santīraṇattayaṃ tāva santīraṇakiccavasena rūpādipañcālambaṇe pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:623_12: Tadārammaṇādivasena pana sabbānipi ekādasavipākāni chasu parittārammaṇesu pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:626_0: Yo panettha cittānaṃ ārammaṇesu pavattivibhāgo vattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:626_6: Tesuca dve dosamūlacittāni parihīnajjhānāni ārabbha uppannakāleti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:626_7: Ñāṇaṃpi anadhigatāni lokuttarāni ālambituṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ ñāṇasampayutta.La.
anya-e0301n0:626_9: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttakāmakusalāni puthujjanānaṃ ajjhānalābhīnaṃ uppannakāle paññattiyā saha kāmāvacarārammaṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:626_10: Tāneva sotāpattimaggato pure gotrabhukkhaṇe puthujjanānaṃ nibbānārammaṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:626_12: Heṭṭhimaphalaṭṭhānaṃ attanā adhigata maggaphalanibbānā rammaṇānipīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:626_13: Yathā cettha ariyā attanā adhigata maggaphalāniyeva ālambituṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:626_14: Tathā jhānalābhinopi attanā adhigatajjhānānieva ālambituṃ sakkontīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:626_22: Te hi jhānānināma evaṃ mahānubhāvāni evaṃ mahānisaṃsānīti sutvāvā sutapariyattibalena siddhe ākāra sallakkhaṇaññāṇe
anya-e0301n0:626_28: Maggaphala nibbānavacanānivikathenti saṃvaṇṇentīti tesaṃpi te ārammaṇabhūtā eva siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:626_29: Tesaṃ pana cittāni jhānādīnaṃ paññattiguṇe eva anubhontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:626_32: Māro deva puttopi rūpajjhānacittaṃ vaṭṭanissitameva passati.
anya-e0301n0:626_34: Arūpajjhānacittaṃ pana vaṭṭanissitaṃpi napassatīti aṅguttare navanipāte aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:626_36: Tesaṃ uppannāniññaṇasampayuttakāmakriyajavanāni kriyābhiññājavanañca puggalānurūpaṃ paññattiyā saha catubbhūmakadhammesu
anya-e0301n0:626_38: Tathā tesaṃ purecāri kamanodvārāvajjanañcāti vuttaṃ ṭhāṇasampayutta.La.
anya-e0301n0:626_40: Tattha sabbathāpīti sabbakāmāvacara sabbamahaggata sabbalokuttara sabbapaññatti sabbapaccuppannādi pakārenapītiattho.
anya-e0301n0:626_42: Itarāni pana pacceka buddhānaṃ uppannānipi padesasabbārammaṇānieva honti.
anya-e0301n0:626_43: Tāni hi ekaṃ pathavidhātuṃpi sabbehi anavasesapakārehi jānituṃ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:626_44: Āruppesu dutīyacatutthāni pathamatatīyāruppa viññāṇā rammaṇattā mahaggatā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:626_45: Sesānīti abhiññā dvaya dutīyacatutthāruppehi avasesāni sabbānipi ekavīsatividhāni mahaggatacittāni kasiṇādi paññattārammaṇānīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:626_46: Pañcavīsāti pañcadvārāvajjana tevīsati kāmavipāka hasanacittāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:626_48: Tañhi appānubhāvato paṭibandhakadhammehi parisamantato dīyati avakhaṇḍīyati nittejabhāvaṃ pāpīyatīti parittanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:627_0: 135. Cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ bhedena tabbatthukānaṃ cittacetasi kānaṃ saṅgaho vatthusaṅgaho.
anya-e0301n0:630_8: Parato vatthusaddo casaddoca pubbapadesu ānetabbotipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:630_11: Tāni kāmaloke sabbānipi labbhantīti kāmataṇhā dhina kammanibbattānaṃ attabhāvānaṃeva paripuṇṇindriyatā
anya-e0301n0:630_12: sambhavato sabbānipi tāni cha vatthūni kāmalokeeva labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:630_13: Tathā hi cakkhādīsu vatthūsu santesu evarūpādīnaṃ paribhogo sampajjati.
anya-e0301n0:630_14: Tasmā rūpādīsu kāmavatthūsu abhiratā kāmataṇhā sadā cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ vatthūnaṃpi sampattiṃ patthetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:630_15: Yathāca sabbakammiko amacco sadā rañño icchameva pūrayamāno sabbāni rājakammāni sampādeti.
anya-e0301n0:630_16: Evameva kāmāvacarakammaṃpi sadā kāmataṇhāya icchameva pūrayamānaṃ paripuṇṇindriyaṃ attabhāvaṃ nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:630_18: Yathā ca dassanasavanānuttariya dhammabhūtāni cakkhusotāni buddhadassana dhammassavanā divasena sattānaṃ visuddhiyāpi honti,
anya-e0301n0:630_21: Tasmā taṃ kāmavirāgabhāvanā kammanibbattesu brahmattabhāvesu naupalabbhatīti vuttaṃ rūpaloke pana ghānādittayaṃ natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:630_23: Sasambhāraghāna jivhā kāya saṇṭhānānipana suṭṭhuparipuṇṇānieva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:630_24: Arūpalokepana sabbānipi nasaṃvijjantīti rūpavirāga bhāvanā kammanibbatte tasmiṃ loke ajjhattabahiddhāsantānesupi
anya-e0301n0:630_26: Tattha nibbattā hi sattā suddhe ākāsataleeva cittapabandhamattā hutvā tiṭṭhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:630_27: Imasmiṃ saṅgahe pana cittāni sattaviññāṇa dhātuvasena gahetuṃ tattha pañcaviññāṇadhātuyotiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:630_32: Pañcadvāre āvajjanamatta sampaṭicchanamatta kiccāni hi visesajānana kiccāni nahontīti.
anya-e0301n0:630_33: Pañcaviññāṇāni pana paccakkhato dassanādivasena thokaṃ visesajānanakiccāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:630_34: Avasesā pana santīraṇādayo ārammaṇasabhāva vicāraṇā divasena atireka visiṭṭhajānanakiccayuttattā na manodhātuyo viya mananamattā honti.
anya-e0301n0:630_36: Athakho mananaṭṭhena manoca taṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇañcāti katvā manoviññāṇadhātuyonāma.
anya-e0301n0:632_2: Tattha manoyeva viññāṇanti idaṃ tāva na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:633_0: Na hi aññamaññaṃ visesetvā abhirekaṭṭhadīpake padaṭṭhānantiādike visesanasamāse avadhāraṇa viggaho katthaci dissati yujjaticāti.
anya-e0301n0:635_1: Tattha sampaṭicchanadvayaṃ santīraṇādikassa manoviññāṇapabandhassa paccayabhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:635_2: Pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ pana parato dvārantare pavattamānaṃ tasseva manoviññāṇapabandhassa paccayuppannabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:635_3: hotītikatvā ādimhi paccayabhūtassa ceva ante dvārantare paccayuppannabhūtassa ca manassa sambandhiviññāṇanti attho. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:635_5: Ārammaṇe pana abhinipāta mattāni pañcaviññāṇāni mananakiccāni nahontīti dassanādīni eva nāma.
anya-e0301n0:635_6: Pañcadvārāvajjanañca manato jātaṃpi manassa paccayo nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:635_8: Sampaṭicchanadvayañca manassa paccayo hontaṃpi manato jātaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:635_10: Santīraṇādīni pana attano pure pacchāpavattānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ manānaṃ eva majjhe jātānīti attano paccaya
anya-e0301n0:635_12: Evañca sati pañcaviññāṇaṃpi dvinnaṃ manodhātūnaṃ antare pavattattā manaso paccaya paccayuppannabhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:637_0: Manato jātaṃ viññāṇantipi vuttaṃ. Taṃpi vuttanayena nayujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:638_1: Pannarasarūpāvacaravasena tiṃsadhammā hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:638_2: Casaddo panettha avasesānaṃ chasattati dhammānaṃ manoviññāṇadhātubhāvaṃ sambhāveti.
anya-e0301n0:640_0: Sampiṇḍanatthaṃ gahetvā “na kevalaṃ manodhātuyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:641_0: Evañhi sati avasesāca manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātāti vuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:643_2: avasesā manoviññāṇa dhātusaṅkhātāca tiṃsa dhammāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:644_4: Santīraṇamahāvipākāni tāva tattha nuppajjanti pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ attano kiccānañca tattha abhāvato.
anya-e0301n0:644_8: Ettha pana yadi anīvaraṇāvattho paṭigho natthi.
anya-e0301n0:644_9: Pāḷiyaṃ dutīyajjhāneeva domassindriyassa aparisesanirodhavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathāsuca dutīyajjhānūpacāre tassa uppattisambhavavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:644_10: Tasmā attano sahāyapaccaya bhūtassa oḷārikassa kāmarāgassa jhānabhūmīsu abhāvato paṭighacittadvayaṃ tattha nuppajjatīti yuttantipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:644_11: Ṭīkākārāpana dutīyajjhānūpacāre tassa uppattisambhava vacanaṃ parikappavacanamattanti katvā purimakāraṇameva icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:644_12: Yadi panetaṃ parikappavacanamattaṃ siyā pāḷivacanaṃpi parikappavacanamattameva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:644_13: Tasmā pacchimakā raṇameva yuttarūpanti amhākaṃ khanti.
anya-e0301n0:644_17: Paratoghosābhāvena tatthuppannassa puthujjanassa dhammābhisamayābhāvato buddhapaccekabuddhānañca tattha anuppajjanato.
anya-e0301n0:644_18: Teneva hi tatthuppanno puthujjano aṭṭhasu akkhaṇayuttesu vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:644_19: Rūpāvacaracittānipi tattha nuppajjanti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya rūpanimittārammaṇānaṃ tesaṃ samatikkantattāti.
anya-e0301n0:645_0: Avasesā manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā kusalākusalakriyānuttaravasena dve cattālīsadhammā hadayaṃ nissāyavā anissāyavā pavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:645_3: Tattha kusalānīti pañcarūpa kusalato avasesāni dvādasalokiyakusalāni.
anya-e0301n0:645_5: Kriyānīti pañcadvārāvajjana hasana pañcarūpakrito avasesāni terasakriyacittāni.
anya-e0301n0:645_8: Rūpe tivatthuṃ nissitā catubbidhā dhātuyo matā.
anya-e0301n0:645_9: Āruppe kiñcivatthuṃ anissitā ekā dhātu matāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:645_10: Tecattālīsāti pañcaviññāṇa manodhātuttikehi saddhiṃ santīraṇādike tiṃsadhamme sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:650_3: ubhayappabheda saṅgahoti cittacetasikānaṃ kayopabheda saṅgahe dassetvā idāni vīthicittappavattisaṅgaho
anya-e0301n0:650_4: vīthimutta cittappavattisaṅgahoti te saññeva dve pavattisaṅgahe dassetuṃ cittuppādānamiccevantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:650_13: Uttare uttame tayo pabhedasaṅgahe katvāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:650_16: Pubbāparaniyāmitanti āvajjanādi cakkhuviññāṇādi pubba cittāparacittānukkamena niyāmitaṃ vavatthitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:650_22: Paṭisandhikāle pavattisaṅgahañca pavattikāle pavattisaṅgahañcāti dve saṅgahepavatti pavakkhāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:650_23: Ayañca attho uparisaṅgahe ārabbha gāthāya pākaṭo.
anya-e0301n0:650_27: Evañca sati upari vīthimuttasaṅgahe ārabbha gāthāyaṃ sandhiyaṃ pavattisaṅgahonāma idāni vuccatīti iminā na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:653_0: Evañhi sati pakiṇṇakasaṅgahova idha saṅgahasaddena gahito siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:653_1: Yasmāpana tiṇṇaṃ dvinnañca pabhedasaṅgahānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvā ayaṃ anusandhigāthā pavattā.
anya-e0301n0:653_2: Tasmā pubbe tayopi pabhedasaṅgahā idha saṅgahasaddena gahetuṃ yuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:653_3: Ayaṃ pana pavattisaṅgaho vatthudvārālambaṇehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vutto suvuttoti tāni tīṇi chakkānipi puna idha nikkhittāni.
anya-e0301n0:655_0: “Vatthudvārālambaṇa saṅgahā heṭṭhā kathitāpi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pavattisaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ puna nikkhittā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:656_0: Na hi sakalā vatthudvārālambaṇasaṅgahā idha nikkhittāti.
anya-e0301n0:656_8: Kammādīnaṃ visayānaṃ dvāresu pavatti paccupaṭṭhānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ visayappavatti.
anya-e0301n0:656_9: Vakkhati hi kammaṃvā kammanimittaṃvā gatinimittaṃvā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0301n0:658_0: “Visayesuca cittānaṃ pavatti visayappavattī”tipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:659_0: Evañhi sati atiparittārammaṇe visayappavattināma anupapannā āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:659_2: Dhātubhedaṃ patvādhātunānattaṃ pamāṇanti mananaṃ vijānanato visuṃ katvā manodhātu visuṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:659_3: Viññāṇabhedaṃ patvā pana yaṃkiñci mananaṃ vijānane anto gadhamevāti vuttaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:659_4: Chaviññāṇānīti chavīthiyo pana dvārappavattā cittapavattiyo yojetabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:661_0: “Cakkhuviññāṇasambandhinī vīthi tena saha ekārammaṇa eka dvārikatāya saha caraṇabhāvato cakkhuviññāṇa vīthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:662_1: Taṃ taṃ dvāravikāraṃ paṭicca uppannāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:662_6: Manodvāre pana vibhūtassa chaḷārammaṇassa pavatti avibhūtassa chaḷārammaṇassa pavatticāti dvidhāti chadhāvisayappavatti veditabbāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:662_7: Atimahantādibhāvo cettha ālokādi paccaya vasenavā vatthu atimahantādivasenavā veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:662_8: Tattha saṇhasukhumaṃpi dūraṃpi rūpādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthunāma ālokādi paccaya sampattiyā sati atimahantameva.
anya-e0301n0:662_9: Tathā hi buddhassa bhagavato pathamāti nīhārakālādīsu loka vivaraṇa pāṭihāriyapavatti kāle avīcinirayepi
anya-e0301n0:662_10: akaniṭṭhepi paracakkavāḷesupi saṇhasukhumānica dūrānica rūpāni idha ṭhitāva passanti.
anya-e0301n0:662_12: Tassa vasena sabbepi pathavisineru cakkavāḷa siluccayādayo jātiphalikakkhandhā viya sampajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:662_13: Mahanto uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikammadevānaṃ devānubhāvanti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:662_14: Upapattidevabrahmādīnaṃ pana pasādanissayabhūtānaṃ obhāsajātatāyapi pathavipabbatādayo cakkhurūpādīnaṃ antaraṃ kātuṃ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:662_15: Tathā dūrepi pabbatādirūpāni vatthu atimahantatāya candasūriya tārakādi rūpāni visaya vatthu mahantatāya
anya-e0301n0:662_16: obhāsa jātatāya ca ati mahantāni nāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:662_17: Ālokādipaccayānaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānavatthūnañca dubbala dubbalatara dubbalatamānukkamena mahantādibhāvo vattabboti.
anya-e0301n0:662_18: Yāni pana pañcālambaṇāni ekacittakkhaṇaṃ atikkamma āpātaṃ āgacchanti,
anya-e0301n0:662_22: Yāni catu pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava cittakkhaṇāni atikkamma,
anya-e0301n0:662_24: Yānipana dasekādasadvādasa terasa cuddasa pannarasa cittakkhaṇāni atikkamma āpātaṃ āgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:662_29: Evaṃ chachakkāni sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tāni sabbāni ekato yojetvā vīthicittappavattiṃ vitthārento
anya-e0301n0:662_30: kathanti pucchitvā rūpārūpānaṃ tāva addhānaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ uppādaṭṭhitītiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:662_31: Tattha kathanti kena pakārena vīthicittappavatti hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:664_0: “Kathanti kena pakārena atimahantādivasena visaya vavatthānaṃ hotīti pucchitvā cittakkhaṇavasena taṃ pakāsetuṃ uppādaṭṭhitītiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:665_0: Evañhi satiādito pañcannaṃ chakkānaṃ okāsonāma nasiyā.
anya-e0301n0:665_2: Rūpadhammānamāyūti idaṃ visaya vavatthānatthameva vuttanti sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0301n0:665_10: So pana khaṇo accharāsaṅghāṭakkhaṇassa akkhinimmilanakkhaṇassaca anekakoṭi satasahassabhāgo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:665_11: Accharāsaṅghāṭakkhaṇe anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā vedanā uppajjantīti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:665_12: Ācariyānandattheramatena panettha uppādabhaṅga vasenakhaṇadvayaṃ ekacittakkhaṇaṃnāmāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:665_13: Yathā hi loke vijjunāma vaddhanānantarameva bhijjati.
anya-e0301n0:665_14: Na panassā vaddhanassa bhijjanassaca antarā ṭhitināma visuṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:665_15: Yathā ca uddhaṃ ujuṃ khittaṃ leḍḍu uppatitvā patati.
anya-e0301n0:665_16: Na pana uppatanassa patanassa ca antarā ṭhitināma visuṃ dissati.
anya-e0301n0:665_18: Taṃpi hi udaya bhāgānantarameva vayabhāge patati.
anya-e0301n0:665_19: Na panassa rūpadhammānaṃ viya tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhāgānaṃ majjhe visuṃ eko gaṇanūpago ṭhitibhāgonāma upalabbhati.
anya-e0301n0:665_20: Evañca katvā yamakesu cittassa uppādabhaṅgāva tattha tattha vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:665_24: Uppādakkhaṇe uppannañceva uppajjamānañcātiādinā bhaṅguppādāva cittassa vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:665_25: Kathāvatthumhica ekaṃ cittaṃ divasaṃ tiṭṭhatīti āmantā.
anya-e0301n0:665_29: Ekaṃ cittaṃ dve divase tiṭṭhatīti āmantā.
anya-e0301n0:665_32: Ekaṃ cittaṃ cattāro divase tiṭṭhatīti āmantā.
anya-e0301n0:665_34: Dve divasā vayakkhaṇoti na hevaṃ vattabbe.La. Māsaṃ. Dve māse.
anya-e0301n0:665_40: Cattāro kappetiādinā dve uppādavayabhāgāva cittassa vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:665_46: Tatīyo vayakkhaṇoti evaṃ mahātherena vicārito siyā.
anya-e0301n0:665_47: Tayo divase tayo māse tīṇi saṃvaccharāni tayo kappeti imānipi avajje tabbānieva siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:665_49: nanu suttantesu tīṇi māni bhikkhave saṅkhatassa saṅkhata lakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:665_60: Tasmā cittassa tatīyo ṭhitibhāgo visuṃ upalabbhati yevāti.Na.
anya-e0301n0:665_63: uppādavaye pathamaṃ vatvā pacchā puna visuṃ ṭhitassa aññathatthaṃ paññāyatīti imassa vuttattāti.
anya-e0301n0:665_70: Tasmā sā pabandhaṭṭhiti tattha vuttāti nasakkā viññātunti ce.
anya-e0301n0:665_72: Abhidhammepi saṅkhatadhammaniddesesu samūha saṇṭhāna santati paññattīhipi niddesassa diṭṭhattā.
anya-e0301n0:665_73: Tathā hi rūpāyatananiddesādīsu dīghaṃ rassaṃ saṇhaṃ thulaṃ vaṭṭaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ caturassaṃ chaḷaṃsaṃ aṭṭhaṃsaṃ soḷasaṃsaṃ ninnaṃ thalantiādinā,
anya-e0301n0:665_74: vibhaṅge ca kesā lomā nakhā dantātiādinā paññattisisena saṅkhatadhammā niddiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:665_76: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu paññattivasena pavattāpi desanā saṅkhatadhammameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n0:665_77: Tasmā yathā uppādabhaṅgānaṃ paccekaṃ ekeko khaṇo cittassa labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:665_87: Ṭhitāya aññathatthaṃ paññāyatīti vadanto arūpadhammānaṃpi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni paññapeti.
anya-e0301n0:668_2: Imasmiṃ pana sutte ayaṃ viseso natthi.
anya-e0301n0:668_3: Tasmā ācariyagāthāya suttaṃ appaṭibāhetvā suttameva pamāṇaṃ kātabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:668_4: Tattha jarākhaṇonāma uppādakkhaṇabhaṅgakkhaṇānaṃ majjhe visuṃ jarāya khettabhūto ṭhītikkhaṇo vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:668_7: Paṭikkhittopi pana ayaṃ vādo kathāvatthu pāḷiyā saddhiṃ suṭṭhu sametiyeva. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:668_8: uddhaṃ uppatitassa leṭṭussa uppatananivatti viya yā cittassa udayasaṅkhātassa vaḍḍhanassa nivattināma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:668_9: Na hi udaye anivattante vayonāma sambhavatitī.
anya-e0301n0:668_10: Sā eva udaya pariyantamattabhūtā idha ṭhitipariyāyoti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:668_11: So pana visuṃ gaṇanūpago eko khaṇonāma nahotīti katvā abhidhamme dveeva khaṇā cittassa vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:668_12: Udayabhāgassa pana ādi koṭiṃ vayabhāgassaantakoṭiñca thapetvā majjhebhāgadvayanissitā paripaccana lakkhaṇā jarānāma arūpadhammānaṃpi labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:671_3: Dutīyo vayakkhaṇoti hi vicārentena uppādabhaṅgāvatthā hi bhinnā tatīyā avatthā tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ paṭikkhittāyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:673_0: “Pāḷiyaṃ pana veneyyajjhāsayā nuromato nayadassanavasena sā na vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:673_1: Atidhammadesanāpi hi kadāci veneyyajjhāsayānurodhena pavattati. Yathā,
anya-e0301n0:673_2: rūpassa uppādo upacayo santatīti dvidhā bhinditvā desito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:673_4: Vibhāgārahassa hi dhammassa vibhāgakaraṇaṃnāma veneyyavasenātipi dhammavasenātipi yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:673_5: Vijjamāne sati visuṃ katvā vattabbassa abhidhamme avacanaṃ pana veneyyavasenāti na yuttametanti.
anya-e0301n0:675_4: Ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatīti evaṃ saṅkhatadhammasseva lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ uppādādīnaṃ vuttattā nasakkā
anya-e0301n0:675_5: pabandhassa paññattisabhāvassa asaṅkhatassa ṭhiti tattha vuttāti viññātu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:676_0: Abhidhammepi heṭṭhā vuttanayena paññattisīsena saṅkhatadhammānaṃ niddesassa diṭṭhattāti.
anya-e0301n0:678_0: “Upasaggassaca dhātvattheyeva pavattanato paññāyatīti etassa viññāyatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:679_1: Tasmā tattha vineyyānaṃ suṭṭhu paññāyanameva adhippetanti.
anya-e0301n0:679_3: Rūpaṃ pana rūpidhammattāyeva dandhapariṇāmanti vuttaṃ tānipana.La.
anya-e0301n0:681_0: “Gāhakagahetabba bhāvassa taṃtaṃ khaṇavasena nippajjanato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:682_0: Na hi gāhakaṃ arūpaṃ gahetabbañca rūpaṃ gahaṇasampajjanatthaṃ lahuṃ pariṇamati garuṃ pariṇapatīti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:682_1: Tāni tādisāni sattarasannaṃ cittānaṃ khaṇāni sattarasavā tāni cittakkhaṇāni rūpa dhammānamāyūti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:682_2: Sattarasa cittakkhaṇasamapamāṇāni khaṇāni viññatti rūpalakkhaṇa rūpavajjānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ āyunāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:682_5: Tatthaca ādimhi dve khaṇāni rūpadhammānaṃ ekaṃ uppādakkhaṇameva.
anya-e0301n0:682_7: Majjhe aṭṭhavīsa khaṇāni tesaṃ ekaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:682_8: Na hi dandhapariṇatānaṃ rūpānaṃ uppādabhaṅgāpi cittassa viya lahukā bhavituṃ arahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:682_12: Mūlaṭīkānayena panettha tāni pana soḷasacittakkhaṇāni rūpadhammānamāyūti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:682_13: Ṭīkācariyo hi paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge āgataṃ mahāṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ patiṭṭhapento soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukabhāvaṃ sambhāveti,
anya-e0301n0:682_14: evaṃ santepi khandha vibhaṅgeyeva tāva rūpānaṃ uppādanirodhavidhānassa mahāaṭṭhakathā vādassa yamakapāḷivirodhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:682_15: dassetvā saṅgahakārena paṭisiddhattā na sakkā taṃ patiṭṭhapetunti.
anya-e0301n0:682_16: Tasmiṃ vāde hi paṭisiddhe tattha āgatā soḷasāyukatāvā atirekasoḷasāyukatāvā paṭisiddhāyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:684_0: Taṃ ṭīkānayaṃ tayidamasāranti paṭikkhipitvā tadatthaṃ sā dhentena “paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ rūpaṃ tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:684_1: Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatītiādinā aṭṭhakathāyameva
anya-e0301n0:685_1: Tadeva dassetvā ṭīkānayo paṭikkhittoti na yuttame tanti.
anya-e0301n0:685_3: Atthato abhinnaṃpi hi khaṇaṃ idaṃ cittassa idaṃ rūpānanti kappanāvasena bhinnaṃ viya katvā upacarīyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:687_0: “Etānivā taṃ atītānīti ekacittakkhaṇātī kānī”tipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:688_0: Na hi niruddhadhammavisayo atītasaddo kiñci atikkamitvā uddhaṃ āgatāni paccuppannarūpāni dīpetīti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:688_3: Rūpadhammānaṃ pana rūpadhammesveva āpātāgamane thokaṃ balavantatā icchitabbā.
anya-e0301n0:688_4: Teca ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva paripuṇṇapaccayupaladdhā hutvā balavantā hontīti vuttaṃ ṭhitipattānevāti.
anya-e0301n0:688_6: So hi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ pasāde ghaṭṭetīti icchatīti.
anya-e0301n0:688_7: Pañcālambaṇāni pañcadvāre āpātamāgacchantīti ettha rūpasaddārammaṇāni asampatta vasena itarānica sampattavasena gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:688_12: Na nimittamattavasena nimittaghaṭṭanañcanāma asampattānaññeva na sampattānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:688_15: Yathā hi tīre gacchantānaṃsarīranimittāni pokkharaṇi yāudake dissanti.
anya-e0301n0:688_16: Tasmiṃ udake orohantānaṃ pana tāni tattha na dissanti.
anya-e0301n0:688_18: visayavisayīnaṃ majjhe ālokassa ākāsassaca abhāvena nimittokāsassa abhāvato.
anya-e0301n0:688_19: Asampattāniyeva pana attano nimittupaṭṭhāpanavasena ghaṭṭenti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:688_25: Tāni sayaṃ dūre ṭhatvā nimitta appanāvasena ghaṭṭitattā ekekasmiṃ pasāde candamaṇḍala sūriya maṇḍalādivasena
anya-e0301n0:688_26: asanisaddamaṇḍala meṇḍasaddamaṇḍalādivasena ca mahantānipi bahūnipi āpātamāgacchantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:688_27: Itarāni pana tīṇi sampattāniyeva ghaṭṭentīti ekekasmiṃ pasāde ekekameva āpātamāgacchantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:688_29: Mano dvāre pana sabbānipi ārammaṇāni asampattāniyeva āpātamāgacchantīti.
anya-e0301n0:688_30: Etthaca pañcadvāreti idaṃ asādhāraṇa dvāradassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:688_33: Ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu apāta māgacchatīti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:688_34: Tasmā yadā candaṃvā sūriyaṃvā pabbataṃvā rukkhaṃvā yaṃkiñcivā passanti.
anya-e0301n0:688_35: Tadā ekekasmiṃ cakkhupasāde ekekāni manodvāre ekanti anekāni candamaṇḍalādīni ekakkhaṇe upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0301n0:688_37: Apātāgamanañcettha lañchakānaṃ tālapaṇṇe lañchanakhandhaṃ thapetvā muggarena paharaṇakāle lañchanakhandhassa
anya-e0301n0:691_0: Yattakāni hi pañcālambaṇāni cakkhādipathe ālokādi sahitāni hutvā ṭhitāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:691_1: Tattakāni sabbāni niddāyantassapi visaññi bhūtassapi aññavihitassapi yaṃkiñci jhānaṃvā phalaṃvā nirodhaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:691_2: samāpajjantassapi ābhogena vinā attano dvāresu āpātamāgacchantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:691_6: Āvajjanādīsu pana catubbhūmaka vīthicittesupi āpātaṃ āgacchantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:691_7: Ayaṃnāma mano manodvāraṃ nahotīti navattabboti hi dvārakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:691_8: Ayañca attho pathamajjhānassa saddo kaṇṭakoti iminā pāṭhena dīpetabbo.
anya-e0301n0:691_9: Pathamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa hi saddo sotamhi ghaṭṭetvā jhānacittasaṅkhāte manodvāre āpātamāgacchati.
anya-e0301n0:691_14: Dutīyajjhānādīni samāpajjanto pana appakena saddena navuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:691_19: Tesu pana tathā āpātamāgatesu tadārammaṇāni vīthicittāni pavattantiyevāti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:691_22: Pavattamānānipi ārammaṇā dhimattādivasena laddhapaccayavisese ekekasmiṃ ārammaṇeeva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:691_24: Etthaca atthavasā vibhatti pariṇāmoti katvā ekacittakkhaṇātītāni ṭhitipattāneva pañcā lambaṇāni ekacittakkhaṇātīte
anya-e0301n0:691_25: ṭhitippatte eva pañcadvāre bahu cittakkhaṇātītāni bahucittakkhaṇātīteti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:693_0: “Te pana pasādā bhavaṅgacalanassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena saddhiṃ uppannā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:694_0: Evaṃ pana sati bahucittakkhaṇātītānipi pañcālambaṇāni ekacittakkhaṇātīteeva pañcadvāre āpātamāgacchantīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:694_1: Eta rahi pana ekakkhaṇe sahuppannānaññeva vatthārammaṇānaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:696_0: “Āvajjanena saddhiṃ uppannāti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:697_1: Aññadeva pañcaviññāṇānaṃ nissayavatthūti evaṃ viruddhassa atthassa āpajjanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:697_2: Evaṃ pañcadvāre visayapavattiyā ādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbapāripūraṃ visayapavattivibhāgaṃ vīthicittapavattiñca dassento tasmātiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:697_4: Cakkhussa āpātāgamanena saheva bhavaṅgassapi āpātaṃ āgacchatiyevāti vuttaṃ dvikkhattuṃbhavaṅgecaliteti.
anya-e0301n0:697_5: Calanañcettha yathā gahitaṃ kammādi ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā idāni attani āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ abhinavārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:697_6: gahetuṃ ussāhajātassa viya bhavaṅgasantānassa vikārappatti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:697_7: Etthaca cakkhussa āpātāgamanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā eva kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:697_9: Bhavaṅgassa āpātāgamanameva pana āvajjanuppattiyāpi kāraṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:699_0: Manodvārepi āpātāgamanaṃ visuṃ apatvā rūpādīnaṃ cakkhādisu ghaṭṭanaṃnāma yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ eva.
anya-e0301n0:699_1: Tamevaca bhavaṅgu pacchedassapi kāraṇaṃ hotīti katvā “pañcasu hi pasādesu yogyadesāvaṭṭhāna vasena ārammaṇe
anya-e0301n0:700_0: Na hi yogyadesāvaṭṭhānameva ghaṭṭananti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:700_1: Yogyadesepana ṭhatvā nimittaghaṭṭanavasena vatthughaṭṭanavasenaca asani nipātoviya pasādesu yujjhanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:700_2: manthanaṃ khobhakaraṇaṃ ghaṭṭananti ca āpātāgamananti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:700_4: Etthaca ayaṃpi eko dhammaniyāmoyevāti katvā nānā ṭhāniyesu dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu saheva āpātāgamanaṃ paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:700_5: Rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ nissitasseva pañcaviññāṇassa calanaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:700_6: Kathaṃ pana hadayavatthunissitassa bhavaṅgassāti na codetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:702_0: Tameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā taṃ pariharanto “santati vasena ekābaddhattā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:703_2: Vuttañhi tattha ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpātamāgacchatīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_3: Rūpārammaṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇeyeva manodvāre āpātaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0301n0:703_5: Sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0301n0:703_6: Yathā hi sakuṇo ākāsenāgantvā rukkhagge nilīyamānova rukkhasākhañca ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0301n0:703_8: Sākhāghaṭṭana chāyāpharaṇāni apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:703_9: Evaṃ paccuppannarūpādīnaṃ cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanañca bhavaṅgacālana samatthatāyamanodvāreāpātāgamanañcaapubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_10: Evaṃ sakuṇopamāya sahataṅkhaṇeyevāti ca apubbaṃacarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe yevātica vatvā daḷhaṃ paṭibhiddhattā
anya-e0301n0:703_11: taṃ anukkamacalanaṃ acintetvā dhammaniyāmavasena ekappahāracalanameva paccetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:703_15: Sampaṭicchantanti muñcituṃ adatvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ paṭi gaṇhantaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:703_17: Vavatthapentanti suṭṭhu asaṅkarato thapentaṃ sallakkhentanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:703_20: Taṃ pana javanaṃ ārammaṇassa dubbalakālevā mucchā maraṇāsannakālesuvā chakkhattuṃ vā pañcakkhattumevavā javatīti vuttaṃ yebhuyyenāti.
anya-e0301n0:703_22: Tattha pathamajavanaṃ aladdhā sevanattā sabbadubbalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:703_29: Javanā nubandhāniti yathā paṭisotaṃ gacchantiṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ thokaṃ anubandhati anugacchati.
anya-e0301n0:703_31: Dve tadārammaṇapākānīti dvikkhattuṃ tadārammaṇakiccāni vipākacittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:703_33: Bhavaṅgapātoti imasmiṃ atihantārammaṇe āvajjanato pathamabhavaṅgacalanatoyevavā paṭṭhāya uṭṭhitaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:703_34: cittasantānaṃ yāvacatutthajavanā samuṭṭhahitvā pañcamajavanato paṭṭhāya patitameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:703_35: Evaṃ santepi samuṭṭhitavegassa sabbaso aparikkhīṇatāya patitanti navuccati.
anya-e0301n0:703_36: Dutīyatadārammaṇato paraṃ pana samuṭṭhitavegassa sabbaso parikkhīṇattā tadā eva taṃcittasantānaṃ patitaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:703_48: Taṃ cakkhuvatthuṃ nissāya tattha ghaṭṭitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:703_49: Itarāni pana āvajjanādīni mano viññāṇāni attano attano atītānantaracittena sahuppannaṃ hadayavatthuṃ nissāya tamevārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:703_50: Cakkhudvāra manodvārāni sabbesaṃpi vīthicittānaṃ dvārakiccaṃ sādhenti.
anya-e0301n0:703_53: Ekacittakkhaṇaṃ atikkamma ghaṭṭanasamatthe atibalavā rammaṇe uppannattā atimahantārammaṇa vīthītica vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_54: Etthaca yattakāni rūpārammaṇāni cakkhupathe uppajjitvā ṭhitippattāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:703_55: Tāni tattakāni ṭhitippattesu pubbāparabhūtesu ekūna paññāsaparimāṇesu cakkhupasādesu kismiṃci naghaṭṭentīti navattabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:703_56: Tesu pana yadeva ekaṃ cakkhu imissā vīthiyā yathārahaṃ vatthubhāvaṃ dvārabhāvañca sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:703_57: Yatthaca ghaṭṭitaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha ayaṃ vīthi pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:703_62: Tānipana yathāvutta kicca sādhanato purimāni pacchimānīti duvidhāni honti,
anya-e0301n0:703_63: tadubhayānipi cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhitibhāvena labbhamānāni aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni veditabbānīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_64: Avasesāni pana tato purimatarāni pacchimakarānica laddhaghaṭṭanānipi vatthudvārakiccasiddhibhāve anāsaṅkitabbattā idha nagahitānīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_65: Ettha siyā imāya vīthiyā uppattisamaye so puggalo ahaṃ idaṃ nāma passāmīti jānāti,
anya-e0301n0:703_76: Tattha vaṇṇasallakkhaṇāya pavattamānāya ahaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ passāmītiādinā vaṇṇaṃ sallakkheti.
anya-e0301n0:703_79: Iti taṃtaṃ sallakkhaṇavīthi yā pavattamānāyaeva taṃtaṃpassāmīti jānātīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_80: Etthaca alātacakkassa gāhikāviya purimāhi dvīhi vīthīhi punappunaṃ gahitānaṃ rūpānaṃ samudāyato gāhikā tatīyā manodvāravīthi samudāya gāhikānāma,
anya-e0301n0:703_81: na hi samudāyagahaṇena vinā paribyattavaṇṇagahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_82: Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakanti dvikkhattuṃ yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pavattituṃ appahontaṃ hutvā atītadvatticittakkhaṇikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:703_83: Yassa hi dvevā tīṇivā cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:703_84: Taṃ yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pavattituṃ nappahoti na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:703_87: Natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti ettha yassa tīṇi cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:703_88: Tassa cuddasa cittakkhaṇāyukāvase sassa ārammaṇassa sattamajavanena saheva niruddhattā tasmiṃ natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti yuttametaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:703_89: Na hi ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ cittāni dhammavasena viya kālavasenāpi nānārammaṇāni icchanti aṭṭhakathācariyāti.
anya-e0301n0:703_91: Tasmiṃ sattamajavanato paraṃ ekacittakkhaṇāyukāvasese ārammaṇe ekena tadārammaṇena uppajjitabbanti ce.Na.
anya-e0301n0:703_92: Na hi tādisaṃ nirodhā sannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekavāraṃpi tadārammaṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ sakkotīti.
anya-e0301n0:703_93: Tathā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vipākuddhāre cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ tadārammaṇāni dveti dveeva tadārammaṇa vārā āgatāti.
anya-e0301n0:705_1: Tattha pāḷiyanti aṭṭhakathātantiṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:705_2: Na hi sā nāma pāḷi atthi,
anya-e0301n0:706_1: Saṅgahakārena pana taṃ paṭisiddhanti idhapi taṃ therena paṭikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:706_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā paramatthavinicchaye sakiṃdvevā tadālambanti therena vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:706_6: Tathā tadārammaṇaṃpi ekaṃ napavattatīti nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:706_11: Yassa hi ārammaṇassa cattāri pañca cha satta aṭṭhanava vā cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:709_0: Na hi bāhiratthabhūto hetuattho kitakapaccayānaṃ visayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:709_3: Etena yā lakkhaṇe hetumhicamānantapaccayānaṃpi pavatti katthaci vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:709_5: Nahi bāhiratthabhūtā lakkhaṇahetuyo tesaṃ visayā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:709_6: Etthaca yassa ārammaṇassa navacittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:709_7: Tassa avasesa aṭṭhacittakkhaṇā yukassa dutīya voṭṭhabbanena saheva niruddhattā tasmiṃ javanaṃpi anuppajjitvāti yuttametaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:709_12: Avasesachacittakkhaṇāyukaṃpi hi ārammaṇaṃ javanuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:709_13: Javanañhi uppajjamānaṃ sattakkhattuṃ pavattituṃ pahonake ārammaṇe eva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:709_15: Ettha pana yathā visaññikāla mucchākāla maraṇakālesu vatthussa avisadatāya dubbalatā yaca javanaṃ chapañcavārepi pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:709_16: Tathā pakatikālepi ārammaṇassa dubbalabhāve sati chapañcavārepi pavattatiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:709_18: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ voṭṭhabbane ṭhatvā ekaṃvā dvevā cittāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:709_19: Tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:709_20: Ettha hi tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāti etena tatīyassa voṭṭhabbanassa pavattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:709_26: Tattha pathamena dvikkhattuṃ dutīyena tikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanassa uppatti vuttā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:709_27: Āsevanaṃ labhitvāti idaṃ pana upacāravacanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:709_28: Na hi voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanatā paṭṭhāne vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:709_29: Ācariyānandattherena panettha voṭṭhabbanato paraṃ catupañca cittakkhaṇāvasese ārammaṇe catupañcajavanuppattiyā eva parittārammaṇavāro icchito.
anya-e0301n0:709_31: Paṭṭhānehi bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo tvevavutto.
anya-e0301n0:709_32: Na pana vutto āvajjanā bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0301n0:709_33: Yathā ca mucchāmaraṇakālesu vatthudubbalatāya cha pañcajavanavārā icchitabbā.
anya-e0301n0:709_34: Tathā idhapi ārammaṇadubbalatāyāti na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:709_35: Ettha ca santīraṇato paraṃ ekacittakkhaṇā vasese ārammaṇe ekaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ dvicittakkhaṇāvasese dve taduttari tīṇīti yuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:709_36: Etarahi pana dvivoṭṭhabbanikā chaparittārammaṇavīthiyoti voṭṭhabbanikā pañcāti yojesuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:709_39: Yaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ dvattikkhattuṃvoṭṭhabbanuppattiyā appahonakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:709_40: Taṃ āvajjanappattiyāpi paccayo na hotīti vuttaṃ tattha bhavaṅgacalanameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:709_42: Tattha bhavaṅgacalanamevāti dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgassa calanamattameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:709_43: Iccevaṃ cakkhudvāreti iti evaṃ yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa apātamāgacchatītiādinā
anya-e0301n0:709_44: vuttanayena cakkhudvāre catunnaṃ vārānaṃ vasena catudhā visayappavatti veditabbā,
anya-e0301n0:709_49: Itarāni pana ubhayathāpi itaresaṃ vārānaṃ ārammaṇānināma hontīti vuttaṃ catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāti.
anya-e0301n0:711_0: Ārammaṇabhūtāti imassa atiparittārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paccayabhūtāti attho vutto.
anya-e0301n0:711_1: Tañhi moghavāra paññā panāya paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:713_1: Manodvāre pana ārammaṇadhammā parittakhaṇāpi atītānāgatāpi kālavimuttāpi āpātaṃ āgacchantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:713_2: Tasmā tattha ekacittakkhaṇātītānivā bahucittakkhaṇātītānivā ṭhitippattāneva āpātamāgacchantīti idaṃ vidhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:713_5: Cakkhādīsu hi ghaṭṭanena saheva yattha apātamāgacchati.
anya-e0301n0:713_8: Taṃpi pañcadvārānubandhakaṃ visuṃ siddhanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:713_9: Tattha yathā ghaṇḍe daṇḍakena ekavāraṃ pahaṭe ghaṇḍasarīrabhūtā rūpa kalāpā ciraṃpi kālaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā anuravasaddasantānaṃ pavattenti.
anya-e0301n0:713_10: Tathā pañcadvāre ārammaṇena ekavāraṃ ghaṭṭite pañca dvārikavīthiyā niruddhāyapi atītaṃ pañcālambaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:713_11: manodvāre yathā pātāgatameva hutvā anekasahassānipi manodvārikavīthicitta santānāni pavattetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:713_12: Tesaṃ pana dvārabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgasantānaṃ anubandhakaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:713_14: Yattha pana pañcadvāraghaṭṭanā nubandhabhāvena vinā kevalaṃ tathā tathā chaḷārammaṇadhammā āpātaṃ āgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:713_16: Kathaṃ pana tasmiṃ visuṃ siddhe manodvāre ārammaṇa dhammā āpātaṃ āgacchantīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0301n0:713_17: Diṭṭhato diṭṭhasambandhato sutato sutasambandhato saddhāya ruciyā ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakhantiyā
anya-e0301n0:713_18: nānākammabalena nānāiddhibalena dhātukkhota vasena devatopasaṃhāravasena anubodhavasena paṭivedhavasenāti
anya-e0301n0:713_20: Tattha diṭṭhaṃnāma pubbe pañcahidvārehi gahitaṃ pañcālambaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:713_21: Taṃpi kālantare kāraṇalābhe sati suddhe manodvāre āpātaṃ āgacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:713_23: Pubbe hi kiñci disvā aññaṃ yaṃkiñci anumānentassa adiṭṭhaṃpi taṃsadisaṃ atītaṃpi anāgataṃpi paccuppannaṃpi bahuāpātaṃ āgacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:713_26: Sabbaññudesanaṃ sutvā gahitaṃ na kiñci anārammaṇaṃnāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:713_30: Ākāra parivitakko nāma atthacchāyaṃ byañjanacchāyaṃ kāraṇacchāyañca nissāya tathā tathā parivitakkanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:713_31: Diṭṭhinijjānakhantināma paññāyavā attano laddhiyāvā punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā evamevāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:713_33: Etthaca anantarūpanissaya paccayabhāvonāma cittasantānassa mahāvipphāro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:713_34: Sakiṃpi ārammaṇaṃ suṭṭhu āsevitvā niruddhakālato paṭṭhāya vassasatepi vassasahassepi bhavantarepi taṃārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:713_36: Cittañcanāma diṭṭhādīhi yathāvuttakāraṇehi saṃvaddhitaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:713_37: Kiñci nimittaṃ labhitvā ekasmiṃ khaṇe anekasahassesupi diṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu pharamānaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:713_38: Tehica kāraṇehi niccaṃ codīyamānaṃ cittasantānaṃ kāyagelaññādike cittadubbalapaccaye asati niccakālaṃpi bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhātuṃ ajjhāsayayuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:713_39: Na hi cittaṃnāma avibhūte ārammaṇe ramati.
anya-e0301n0:713_41: Tasmā bhavaṅgasampayutto manasikāro punappunaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ cāletvā laddhapaccayesu ārammaṇesu punappunaṃ āvajjanaṃ niyojetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:713_42: Tadā tāni ārammaṇāni tadabhininnākāra pavattamanasikāra sampayuttassa bhavaṅga cittassa āpātaṃ āgacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:713_43: Na hi aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattamānassa cittassa ārammaṇantare abhininnākāronāma natthīti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:713_47: Evaṃ pañcadvārepi rūpasattānaṃ atimahantārammaṇesu tadārammaṇuppādo natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:713_48: Avibhūte panā lambaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hotīti idañca ukkaṭṭha paricchedavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:713_49: Ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanappavattivasena avibhute ālambaṇe voṭṭhabbanavāropi āgato.
anya-e0301n0:713_50: Yoca pañcadvārebhavaṅgacalanamattavasena moghavāro nāma catuttho vāro vutto.
anya-e0301n0:713_52: Suddhamanodvārepi hi ārammaṇe āpātamāgate vīthicittaṃ anuppajjitvā dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite nivattanakavārānaṃ pamāṇaṃ nabhavissatiyeva,
anya-e0301n0:713_53: visayeca āpātāgate bhavaṅgeca calite sati visayappavattināma na na hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:713_54: Iti imasmiṃ manodvārepi tadārammaṇa javana voṭṭhabbana moghavāra saṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:713_56: Tattha tadārammaṇavārassa ārammaṇabhūtā abhivibhūtānāma javana vārassa vibhūtānāma.
anya-e0301n0:714_0: Etthaca ārammaṇassavā cittassavā atibalavatāya abhivibhūtatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:714_1: Dubbalepi hi citte pathavipabbatādivasena atibalavantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ativibhūtaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:714_2: Atibalavante ca citte atisukhumaṃpi nibbānaṃ ativibhūtaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:714_17: Etthaca saddhā ruci ākāra parivitakkādi vasena pavattavārā viññātavāro,
anya-e0301n0:714_19: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana saddhāruciyādiva senagahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tathāpi hoti.
anya-e0301n0:714_24: Tattha ekekasmiṃvāre tadārammaṇavārādivasena cattāro cattāro vārā.
anya-e0301n0:714_25: Tesuca kāma mahaggatā nuttara paññatti vasena paccuppannātītānāgatakāla vimuttavasenaca ārammaṇadhammā yathārahaṃ yojetabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:714_26: Etarahi pana atītabhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇavasena ca vārabhedaṃ kappenti.
anya-e0301n0:714_28: Na hi manodvāre pañcadvāre viya ārammaṇānaṃ khaṇavasena balava dubbalatā sambhavo atthi.
anya-e0301n0:714_29: Tadā avijjamānānaṃpi atītānāgatānaṃ kālavimuttānañca tattha āpātāgamanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:714_31: ekāvajjanavīthiyā ārammaṇaṃnāma dhammatoca kālatoca abhinna meva icchanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
anya-e0301n0:714_32: Imeca sattā taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā aññamaññassa cittaṃ jānantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:714_33: Paracittaviduniyo pana devatā ākārasallakkhaṇena vināpi jānanti.
anya-e0301n0:714_34: Tattha paccuppannaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānanakāle āvajjanaṃ bhāvayaṃ parassa cittaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:714_36: Udāhu parato taṃ taṃ javanena sahuppannaṃvā.
anya-e0301n0:714_37: Javanānica yaṃ āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ taṃ vā jānanti,
anya-e0301n0:714_40: yadi tāva āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ āvajjati jānantica.
anya-e0301n0:714_45: Atha paccekaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ āvajjati jānantica.
anya-e0301n0:714_51: Ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva yaṃ āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:714_52: Tadeva āvajjati jānanticāti dhammato abhinnaṃ vatvā taṃ cittaṃ niruddhaṃpi addhāvasena santativasenaca
anya-e0301n0:714_54: Ācariyānandamatena pana parassa taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ taṃ adhippāyajānanakāle āvajjanajavanāni
anya-e0301n0:714_55: paccekaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ cittaṃ āvajjati jānanti ca.
anya-e0301n0:714_56: Na cettha dhammato kālatoca bhinnaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:714_57: Sabbesaṃpi hi ārammaṇaṃ cittameva hoti paccuppannañcāti.
anya-e0301n0:714_61: Yadi pana āvajjane na cittanti āvajjite javanāni rūpanti jānanti.
anya-e0301n0:714_64: Evaṃ sati javanāni dhammato nirāvajjanāni nāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:714_66: Evañca sati tāni kālato nirāvajjanānināma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:714_67: Yasmā ca atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti paṭṭhāne vutto.
anya-e0301n0:714_68: Tasmā idha khaṇavaseneva paccuppannaṃ vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:714_70: Itarathā sabba vīthicittavāresupi ārammaṇānaṃ atītādibhāvo addhāsantativaseneva vattabbo siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:714_72: Cittuppādā daseritāti cittuppattikkhaṇavasena dasa īritāni kathitāni.
anya-e0301n0:714_75: Ekacattālīsāti pañcaviññāṇamanodhātūhi vajjitānaṃ kāmāvacaracittānaṃ vasena ekacattālīsaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:715_1: Vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi ekaṃ vibhūtameva labbhatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:715_2: Na hi avibhūte ārammaṇe appanānāma sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_4: Na hi atisantataraṃ appanājavanaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ anubandhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_5: Tattha hi chabbīsati mahaggata lokuttara javanesu yaṃkiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotaratīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:715_6: Ñāṇarahitaṃ dvihetukajavanaṃ athirasabhāvattā appanāya anantarūpanissayo nahotīti vuttaṃ ñāṇasampayutta kāmāvacarajavanānamaṭṭhannanti.
anya-e0301n0:715_7: Parikammopacārānulomagotratunāmenāti ettha indriyasamatādīhi paritobhāgehi appanā karīyati sajjīyati etenāti parikammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:715_11: Yassa pavattiyā aciraṃ kālaṃ appanā sambhavo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_12: Anulomanti appanāpavattiyā paccanīkadhammavidhamanena appanāya anukūlaṃ appanāhitaṃ appanā vahanticceva attho,
anya-e0301n0:715_13: yassa pavattiyā appanā vibandhako paccanī konāma natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_16: Taṃ duvidhaṃpi gavaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti gottaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:715_19: Ettha ca cattāripi javanāni parikammajavanānīti vā upacārajavanānitivā anulomajavanānītivā vuccantiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:715_21: Idha pana catunnaṃpi nāmānaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ parikammo pacārānuloma gotrabhunāmenāti evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:715_23: Nanu itarānipi appanaṃ parisaṅkharontiyevāti evamādikā codanā anokāsā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_25: Tattha pathamena eva saddena pañcamaṃ gotrabhusambhavo paṭikkhitto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:715_28: Kāmagottaṃ abhikkamitvā uparibhūmantarappattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_29: Dutīyena dutīyaṃ gotrabhu sambhavo paṭikkhitto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:715_30: Tadā hi aladdhāsevanaṃ anulomaṃ attano anantare cittaṃ gotrabhubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkotīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_31: Eteneva pañcamato paraṃ catutthatoca oraṃ appanāya asambhavo sādhito hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:715_36: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana mandamajjhima mahāpaññavasena tidhā bhinditvā pañcakkhattuṃpi parikammajavanānaṃ uppatti anuññātā viya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:715_37: Itaraṭṭhakathāsu pana suṭṭhu vicāretvā paṭisiddhattā sā na gahetabbāvāti.
anya-e0301n0:717_0: “Chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvena papātāsannapuriso viya appanāvasena patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_0: Tattha bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvenāti bhavaṅgabhāvassa āsanna bhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:718_1: Pañcamajavanato hi paṭṭhāya javanasantānaṃ anupubbena parikkhīṇajavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_7: Yasmā pana appanānāma uppajjamānā catutthatovā pañcamatovā paṭṭhāya uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:718_9: Sāhi vasībhūtāpi catuttha pañcamesu uppattiṃ alabhamānā sabbaso nuppajjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:718_11: Tasmā catutthaṃvā pañcamaṃvāti idaṃ ādimattaniyamanatthaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_12: Teneva hi appanāvīthimotaratīti ca tatoparaṃ appanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hotīti ca vakkhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:718_13: Yadi pana pañcamato paṭṭhāya javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_14: Evaṃ sati kasmā tato paṭṭhāya patanakhette appanājavanaṃ pavattatīti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:718_15: hatthe thapitaleḍḍussa patanakhettaṃnāma hatthato muttamatte hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_16: Evaṃ santepi hatthabalena khipitaṃ leḍḍu dūraṃpi gacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:718_17: Ettha ca leḍḍussa javonāma hatthajavamūlako hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_22: Sarīrabalaṃ viya purimānaṃ parikammajavanānaṃ balaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_23: Uttānaseyyassa bāladārakassa balaṃ viya ādikammikavīthiyaṃ kāmajavanānaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_24: Vuddhipattassa purisassabalaṃ viya samāpattivīthiyaṃ kāmajavanānaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_25: Yathā ca bāladārakena khittaṃ leḍḍu hatthato muttamattepi patati.
anya-e0301n0:718_26: Evaṃ ādikammikavīthiyaṃ appanājavanaṃ ekavāraṃ javitvā patati.
anya-e0301n0:718_27: Yathāvuddhipattena khittaṃ leḍḍu patanakhettepi apatitvā dūraṃpi dūrataraṃpi gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:718_28: Tathā samāpattivīthiyaṃ appanājavanaṃ ciraṃpi cirataraṃpi pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:718_29: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana appanājavanaṃ patanakhette pavattaṃpi bhūmantarapattiyāvā ārammaṇantaraladdhiyāvā patitaṃnāma nahotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_31: kasmā pañcamato paṭṭhāya javanaṃ patitanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:718_32: Nanu apati tattā eva suṭṭhu balavabhāvato sattamajavanacetanā sīghaṃ anantare bhave vipākadāyinīca ānantariyakammañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_33: Majjhe pañcacetanā tathā balavabhāvābhāvato cirena tatīyabhavādīsu vipākadāyinīca honti,
anya-e0301n0:718_36: Yadi hi sīghaṃ vipākadānatāya balavatīnāma siyā.
anya-e0301n0:718_38: Sā hi imasmiṃyeva bhave vipākaṃ detīti.
anya-e0301n0:718_40: Eka vassajīvīnaṃ tiṇarukkhānaṃ pariṇāmoviya pathamacetanāya pariṇāmo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:718_55: Te hi pathamaṃ vassaṃ ruhanti vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:718_58: Dutīyaṃ pana nidāgha samayaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:718_63: Te hi eka dve vassāni vidatthiratanamattāva honti.
anya-e0301n0:718_68: Evameva pathamajavanacetanā sabbaso aladdhāsevanatāya asārā abalā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_69: Visuṃ ekaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetuṃ ekañca maraṇakālaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_71: Sattama javanacetanā pana laddhāsevanatāya thokaṃ sārabhūtā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_76: Patitajavanesu pana antima javanatāya dubbalattā dutīyaṃ maraṇakālaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:718_78: Avasesānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ majjhimacetanānaṃ suṭṭhu laddhāsevanānaṃ saṇika tara pariṇatabhāvo vuttanayānusārena veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:718_79: Naṃ kevalañcettha tiṇa rukkho pamāya pāṇopamāyāpi ayamattho dīpetabbo.
anya-e0301n0:718_87: Attano attano visaye sīghataraṃ viññuttaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:718_89: Dīghāyukajātikānaṃ pana gabbhavāsādīni sabbāni saṇika meva sijjhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:718_90: Etthaca mahaggata kusalāni sattama javanaṭṭhāne ṭhitānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:718_92: Appanājavanāni aciraṭṭhitikaṭṭhena supakka sālibhattasadisānīti tānipi acirataraṭṭhitikānieva honti.
anya-e0301n0:718_94: Imasmiṃ bhavepi appakena kāmacchandādinā paccanīkadhammena paṭibāhitāni sabbaso avipākabhāvaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:718_95: Tasmātāni tena pariyāyena dubbalāni nāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:719_0: Yasmā ca ānantariyakammānaṃ phaladānaniyatatānāma kālaniyamena vinā na sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:719_3: Tesañhi asukasmiṃ bhaveeva vipaccantīti evaṃ niyamo natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:719_4: Tasmā duvidhassa niyamassa siddhattā eva sattamajavanacetanāya anantariyakammatā siddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:719_6: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana nanuca sattamajavanacetanāya balavatāya upapajjavedanīyabhāvo hoti ānantariyatāpīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo siyā.
anya-e0301n0:719_7: Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena antimajavanacetanāya susaṅkhatattāsā
anya-e0301n0:719_9: Na apatitajavanacetanā viya balavatāyāti uttaraṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n0:719_11: Evañhi sati pathamajavanacetanā kassa anantarapaccayabhāvena susaṅkhatattā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānāma jātāti vattabbā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:719_12: Mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana dubbalāpi antimajavana cetanā sanniṭṭhānakiccavisesayuttatāya phalavipaccane sattivise
anya-e0301n0:719_13: sayuttā hotīti upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyakāca sā hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:719_15: Yathābhinīhāra vasenāti tassa tassa parikammabhāvanā cittassa kasiṇanimittā dīsuvā aniccalakkhaṇādīsuvā abhinīharaṇānurūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:719_17: Idañca anekavāre pavattānaṃ appanājavanānaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:719_20: Imasmiṃ atthe sati pañcamevā chaṭṭhevā ekantena bhavaṅgapāto hotīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:721_0: “Katthaci appanāvāre sattajavana paripūraṇatthaṃ appanāvasānepi kāmāvacarajavanappavattiṃ vadantānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:721_1: nikāyantarikānaṃ vādo idha evasaddena nivattito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:722_1: Nirantarapavattānaṃ javanānaṃ bhinnavedanatānāma natthīti vuttaṃ somanassasahagata javanā nantarantiādi.
anya-e0301n0:724_0: “Bhinnavedanānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā”tikāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:725_0: Na hi idha āsevanapaccayabhāvo pamāṇaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:725_1: āsevana paccanikānaṃ phalajavanānaṃpi parikammajavanehi aññamaññañca abhinnavedanatāya icchitabbattāti.
anya-e0301n0:728_1: Arahatta phale maggavīthiyaṃ maggakusalānantaraṃ pavattamānepi ayaṃ pubbāpara niyamo parikammajavanehi
anya-e0301n0:728_2: eva saha appanājavanānaṃ hotīti katvā kriyajavanānantaraṃ arahattaphalañcāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:728_6: Upekkhakā kriyato paraṃ cha appanājavanāni sambhavantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:728_7: Tattha dvattiṃsāti arahattaphalasabbapañcamajjhānavajjitānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpakusalānaṃ soḷasannaṃ maggakusalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:728_9: Dvādasāti pañcamajjhānikānaṃ rūpārūpamaggakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimaphalānañca vasena dvādasa.
anya-e0301n0:728_10: Aṭṭhāti pañcamajjhānavajjitānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpakriyānaṃ catunnaṃ arahattaphalānañca vasena aṭṭha.
anya-e0301n0:728_11: Chāti pañcamajjhānikānaṃ pañcannaṃ rūpārūpakriyānaṃ arahattaphalassaca vasena cha.
anya-e0301n0:728_12: Puthujjanānaṃ sekkhānañca kāmapuññatihetuto paraṃ catucattālīsa appanā sambhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:728_13: Vītarāgānaṃ arahantānaṃ tihetukāmakriyato paraṃ cuddasa appanā sambhavantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:729_4: Teneva ṭīkāsu sabbatthāpīti pañcadvāra manodvārepīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:729_8: Tattha ca atiukkaṭṭhe atiduggateca jane agahetvā majjhimakena mahājanena.
anya-e0301n0:729_9: Evañhi sati iṭṭhāniṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhuvavatthānaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:729_14: Na hi sakkā iṭṭhaṃvā aniṭṭhaṃvā ārammaṇaṃ vipākacittaṃ vañcetuntica.
anya-e0301n0:729_15: Apica dvāravasenāpi iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā veditabbāti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:729_16: Tasmā indriyānindriyabaddhasantānagate eke kasmiṃ rūpakalāpe vaṇṇādīsu rūpesu kiñci iṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:729_20: tattha kiñci iṭṭhaṃ hoti kiñci aniṭṭhanti yathā kiṃsmiṃci ekasmiṃ pupphe vaṇṇo iṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:729_28: Tathā buddhassa sarīragatepi ekasmiṃ kalāpe vaṇṇo iṭṭho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:729_32: So hi vaṇṇo yadi nivatthapārutassa vatthassa bhaveyya.
anya-e0301n0:729_34: Kadāci iṭṭhaṃ kadāci aniṭṭhanti aggināma hemante iṭṭho sukhavipākassa paccayo.
anya-e0301n0:729_38: Tathā sukha samphassaṃ vatthaṃ pakatikāye iṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:729_45: kusalavipākāni pañcaviññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa tadārammaṇānīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:729_48: Tattha abhiiṭṭheti suvaṇṇa rajata maṇivaṇṇādike haritālavaṇṇādike koseyya vatthavaṇṇādi ke devaccharāvaṇṇādikeca
anya-e0301n0:729_50: Yasmā cettha aniṭṭhārammaṇa samāyogo akusalakammasseva vipaccanokāso hoti.
anya-e0301n0:729_54: Vedanāniyamo pana ādāse mukhanimittassa viya attano ussāha balena vinā kevalaṃ kammabalena nibbattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:729_55: vipākānaṃ paridubbalattā tathā tathā kappetvā pakappetvā gahaṇā bhāvato yathārammaṇameva siddho hotīti
anya-e0301n0:729_58: Athakho vipallāsarahite khiṇāsavasantāne pavattānaṃ kāmakriyajavanānaṃ viyathārammaṇameva vedanāyogo
anya-e0301n0:729_59: hotīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ tatthāpi somanassasahagata kriyajavanāvasāne tiādi.
anya-e0301n0:729_61: Somanassasahagata kriya javanā vasāneti buddhavaṇṇādike atiiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattānaṃ somanassa sahagata kriyajavanānaṃ avasāne.
anya-e0301n0:729_62: Upekkhāsahagata kriya javanā vasāneti aniṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatteca pavattānaṃ upekkhāsahagatakriyajavanānaṃ avasāne.
anya-e0301n0:729_64: Vuttañhi tattha kāmāvacara tihetuka somanassa sahagatakriyadvayaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pañcannaṃ somanassasahagata vipākānaṃ anantarapaccayotiādi.
anya-e0301n0:729_65: Idañca pakatinīhārena pavattānaṃ kriyajavanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:729_66: Tathā rūpena pana cittātisaṅkhārena pavattānaṃ kriyajavanānaṃ iṭṭhepi upekkhāvedanāyogo aniṭṭhepi somanassa vedanāyogo hotiyeva. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:730_1: Idhānanda bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati manāpaṃ uppajjati amanāpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:730_3: So sace ākaṅkhati paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyanti.
anya-e0301n0:730_5: Sace ākaṅkhati appaṭikūle paṭikūla saññī vihareyyanti.
anya-e0301n0:731_2: Uppajjati manāpāmanāpanti etena khīṇāsavānaṃ kāmakriyajavanānaṃ pakatinīhārena iṭṭhe so manassayogo aniṭṭhe upekkhā yogo dassito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:731_4: Appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharatītiādinā pana tesaṃ tathārūpe cittābhisaṅkhāre sati iṭṭhepi upekkhāyogo aniṭṭhepisomanassa yogo vutto hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:731_5: Yaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ satatavihārasutte idha bhikkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti.
anya-e0301n0:731_7: Upekkhako viharati sato sampajānotiādinā chasudvāresu somanassa paṭikkhipanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:731_8: Taṃpi tesaṃ tathā rūpacittābhisaṅkhārabāhullavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:731_9: Yasmā vā khīṇālavāpi buddharūpadassanādīsu padhānasāruppaṭṭhānadassanādīsu ca somanassitā hontiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:731_10: Tasmā kevalaṃ rāgādivatthu bhūtāni rūpārammaṇādīni iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni sandhāya idaṃ vuttantipi yuttaṃ. Ettha ca.
anya-e0301n0:731_15: Kathaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharati iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāyavā pharati.
anya-e0301n0:731_17: Evaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharatītiādinā paṭisambhidāmagganayena idha tathārūpo cittābhisaṅkhāro nāma veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:731_19: khīṇāsavā yadā devaccharā vaṇṇādikaṃ atiiṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpātamā gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:731_21: Aniccatovā upasaṃharanti tattha aniṭṭhabhūtaṃ asubha lakkhaṇaṃvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃvā upekkhā kriya javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:732_3: Tattha iṭṭhabhūtaṃ averatāvādilakkhaṇameva somanassakriyajavanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:732_5: Tasmā tāni javanāni kāmavipākāniviya sabbadāpi ārammaṇānurūpameva vedanāyuttāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:732_7: Na hi tāni lakkhaṇāni devaccharāvaṇṇādīhi vinā visuṃ labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:732_9: Tasmā yathā ānisaṃsadassanena bhāvanāya pubbāpariyavisesadassanenaca uddhumātakādīsu ati aniṭṭhesupi somanassuppatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:732_10: Yathāca mahā moggalānattherassa buddhasubuddhatādassanena attasampattidassanenaca aniṭṭhabhūtepi aṭṭhikaṅkalikapetarūpe somanassuppatti pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:732_11: Yathā ca mahākassapattherassa tathārūpena cittābhi saṅkhārena kuṭṭhino hatthato laddhe aniṭṭhabhūte pūtikummāsepi somanassuppatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:732_12: Evamevaṃ idhapi asubhapharaṇādiko cittābhisaṅkhāro atiiṭṭhe upekkhājavanānaṃ atianiṭṭheca somanassajavanānaṃ uppattiyā paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:732_13: Ayañhi ārammaṇānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvonāma lokiyamahājanānaṃ icchāvasena siddho hoti agambhīro vipallāsadhammānaṃ kilesānañca vatthubhūto. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:732_15: Yaṃ rūpaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ uññātaṃ avaññātantiādi.
anya-e0301n0:732_16: Ettha hi tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti etena ārammaṇadhammānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvo nāma lokiyamahājana sammutiyā siddhoti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:732_17: Tasmā yañca appahīnavipallāsānaṃ lokiyamahājanānaṃ devaccharāvaṇṇā dīsu ati iṭṭhesu atiiṭṭhākārato gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:732_18: Yañca buddhavaṇṇā dīsu atiiṭṭhesu aniṭṭhākārato gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:732_20: Yaṃpana paññavantānaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ devaccharāvaṇṇādīsu aniṭṭhākārato gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:734_0: “Kusalākusalānaṃ pana appahīnavipallāsesu santānesu pavattiyā atiiṭṭhepi iṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhākārato
anya-e0301n0:737_0: Ye hi te dhamma cakkhurahitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:737_1: Teyeva vipallāsa vasena cittavasānugā ārammaṇavasānugāca hontīti kusalā kusalāniyeva yebhuyyena yathārammaṇaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:737_3: Na hi khīṇāsavā lokiyamahājanasammatesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu cittavasānugā ārammaṇavasānugāca hontīti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:738_0: Rūpā saddā gandhā rasā, phoṭṭhabbāca manoramā;
anya-e0301n0:740_0: Tasmā somanassa kriya javanānantaraṃpi tadārammaṇāni somanassupekkhā vedanāyuttāni eva siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_3: kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatāuppajjatīti kusalakusalānantaraṃ eva tadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_4: Na abyākatānantaraṃ naca katthaci kriyānantaraṃ tadārammaṇassa vuttaṭṭhānaṃ dissati.
anya-e0301n0:740_6: Bhavaṅgañcanāmetaṃ nadisotoviya paṭisotagāmināvaṃ savipphārikaṃ evajavanaṃ anubandhatīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_9: Paṭṭhāne pana kusalattike pañhā vāre ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅge tīsu abyākatapadāvasānavāresu sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ tadārammaṇameva padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:740_11: Tasmā dvīsupi vāresu sekkhāvā puthujjanāvā kusalaṃ aniccato vipassanti kusalaṃ assādentītiādikaṃ vatvā
anya-e0301n0:740_12: punaca kusale niruddhe akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_13: Arahato pana javanaṃpi tadārammaṇaṃpi padhāna meva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:740_14: Tasmā arahā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati icceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_15: Napana vuttaṃ kriyābyākate niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:740_16: Yadi cetaṃ vucceyya tadārammaṇameva padhānaṃ kataṃnāma siyā.
anya-e0301n0:740_17: Avuttepica tasmiṃ vipassatīti iminā tadārammaṇaṃpi gahitameva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:740_21: Vijjamāneca tasmiṃ avacane kāraṇaṃ natthīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:740_23: Anantarapaccayavibhaṅgesu pana kusalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa akusalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa kriyaṃ vuṭṭhānassātica vipākadhammadhammā
anya-e0301n0:740_24: khandhā vuṭṭhānassa nevavipāka nāvipākadhammadhammā khandhā vuṭṭhānassātica evamādinā kriyajavanānantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:740_25: bhavaṅgena saha tadārammaṇassapi vuṭṭhānanāmena vuttaṭṭhānaṃ dissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:740_26: Tasmā yañca vuttaṃ na katthaci kriyānantaraṃ tadārammaṇassa vuttaṭṭhānaṃ dissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:740_28: Naca chaḷaṅgupekkhāva to khīṇāsavassa santavuttipi kriyajavanaṃ savipphārikaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:740_29: Kusalajavanassa viya tassapi oḷārikakāyavacī payogasamuṭṭhā panatoti.
anya-e0301n0:742_0: Ṭīkāvādassa uttaraṃ vadantena yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi abyākatā nantaraṃpi tadārammaṇaṃ vucceyya.
anya-e0301n0:742_1: Parittārammaṇe voṭṭhabbanā nantaraṃpi tassa pavattiṃ maññeyyunti kriyajavanānantaraṃ tadā rammaṇaṃ na vutta”nti.
anya-e0301n0:743_0: Na hi paṭṭhāne imasmiṃ vutte idaṃnāma maññeyyunti avuttaṃnāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:743_1: Na ca arahā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassatītiādinā vipassanācāravasena vuttaṭṭhāne pañcadvārika parittārammaṇa vārapasaṅgo atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:743_6: Teneva hi paṭṭhāne tesaṃ itarītarānantarapaccayatā navuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:743_7: Etthaca kriyajavana domanassajavanāna meva anantaraṃ tadārammaṇa niyamaṃ dassentena therena itaresaṃ
anya-e0301n0:743_8: kusalākusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ pana tādiso niyamo natthīti dassito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_9: Tasmā aṭṭhannaṃ kāmakusalānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lobhamūlānaṃ dvinnaṃ mohamūlānanti aṭṭhārasannaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:743_10: ārammaṇānurūpaṃ sabbāni tadārammaṇāni bhavaṅgāni ca pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:743_14: Yassa pana dvihetukānivā tihetukānivā kusalajavanāni bahulaṃ samudācaranti.
anya-e0301n0:743_15: Tassa kadāci akusalajavanesu javitesu akusalānantaraṃpi dvihetukānivā tihetukānivātadārammaṇāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:743_17: Tassa kadāci dvihetukesuvā tihetukesuvā kusalajavanesu javitesu kusalānantaraṃpi ahetukatadārammaṇāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:743_21: Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadā rammaṇatā uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:743_23: Ekānihi tadārammaṇānināma paṭisandhijanakena ekena kammena nibbattānipi nānāvīthīsu nānāppakārāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:743_24: Pavatti vipākajanakehi pana nānākammehi nibbatthesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:743_25: Tasmāti yasmā domanassānantaraṃ somanassuppatti nāma natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0301n0:743_26: Somanassapaṭisandhikassāti catūsu somanassamahā vipākesu ekamekena gahita paṭisandhikassa sattassa.
anya-e0301n0:743_30: Paricitapubbanti imasmiṃ bhaveyeva taṅkhaṇato purimakhaṇesu gahaṇa bahulatā vasena paricitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_34: Upekkhāsahagata santīraṇanti dvīsu upekkhāsahagatasantī raṇesu iṭṭhe kusalavipākaṃ aniṭṭhe akusalavipākaṃ upekkhā sahagata santīraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_35: Yesaṃ pana pakatiyā itarāni cattāri upekkhāsahagata vipākāni bahulaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:743_36: Tesaṃ tānipi āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ nahontīti na vattabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:743_37: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde yebhuyyaniyamasote patitattā akusalajavanānurūpaṃ ahetukaṃ upekkhā santīraṇa dvaya meva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_38: Teneva hi parato theravādānaṃ vicāritaṭṭhāne akusalajavanānantaraṃ ahetuka tadārammaṇa meva dīpentassa
anya-e0301n0:743_39: tassa theravādassa aparipuṇṇavādabhāvaṃ dassetvā yadā kusalajavanānaṃ antarantarā akusalaṃ javati,
anya-e0301n0:743_40: tadā kusalāvasāne āciṇṇa sadisameva akusalāvasāne sahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ yuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_42: Tasmā chapi upekkhāsahagatavipākāni āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ hontiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_43: Etthaca upekkhāpaṭisandhikassa tāva atimahantāti vibhūtesupi buddhavaṇṇādīsu abhiiṭṭhārammaṇesu domanassaṃ
anya-e0301n0:743_44: uppādentassa tadārammaṇasambhavo natthīti domanassa javanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_45: Somanassapaṭisandhikassa pana sabbesupi iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtesu mahantesu avibhūtesuca chaḷārammaṇesu domanassa
anya-e0301n0:743_47: Nacamūlabhavaṅga sambhavoti katvā domanassānantaraṃ chasu upekkhāsahagatavipākesu yathārahaṃ ekaṃ āgantuka bhavaṅgabhāvena pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:743_48: Tathā tasseva buddhavaṇṇādīsu atiiṭṭhabhūtesu atimahantesu ativibhūtesuca chaḷārammaṇesuvā mahaggatapaññattīsuvā domanassaṃ uppādentassāti.
anya-e0301n0:743_49: Ettha ca yasmā abhidhamme dhātuvibhaṅge sabbadhammesuvā pana pathama samannāhāroti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_50: Mahāhatthipadopama sutteca ajjhatti kañceva āvuso cakkhu aparibhinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_53: Neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_54: Yatoca kho āvuso ajjhattikañceva cakkhu aparibhinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_63: Neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_64: Yatoca kho āvuso ajjhattikoceva mano aparibhinno hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_67: Evaṃ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:743_69: Sace āvajjanena dhammatovā kālabhovā yaṃyaṃ niyametvā āvajjitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:743_73: Na pana ekāvajjana vīthiyaṃ sabbāni vīthicittāni āvajjanenavā aññamaññaṃvā dhammatovā kālatovā bhinnā lambaṇāni hontīti veditabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:744_1: Yadi ce taṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ ādimhi āvajjanena āvajjitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ agahetvā aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0301n0:744_4: Āvajjanādīhica saddhiṃ dhammato kālato ca bhinnārammaṇaṃnāma siyāti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:744_5: yathā pana maggavīthiyaṃ gotrabhuvodānāni phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ phalāni nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassaca phalacittaṃ
anya-e0301n0:744_8: Yañca ekasmiṃbhave bhavaṅgassa paṭisandhiyā saha dhammatoca ārammaṇa toca abhinnattaṃ tattha tattha vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:744_11: Tamanantaritvāti taṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ attano anantarapaccayaṃ katvā.
anya-e0301n0:744_13: Pāḷiyaṃ pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃca etaṃ vidhānaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:746_0: “Kāmataṇhā nidāna kammanibbattattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:747_1: Tadārammaṇāni pana parittārammaṇānevāti natesaṃ avasāne tadārammaṇuppatti pasaṅgo atthi.
anya-e0301n0:747_2: Abhiññājavanānica kānici parittārammaṇānipi santatarāni hontīti tesaṃpi avasāne taduppatti natthiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:750_2: Na hi tesu uppannānaṃ parittārammaṇānaṃpi kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ avasāne tadārammaṇuppatti atthi.
anya-e0301n0:750_3: Tadārammaṇūpa nissayassa kāma bhavaṅgassa abhāvato mahaggata bhavaṅgassa ca santa tarassa tadārammaṇa kiccā bhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n0:750_4: Cakkhuviññāṇa sota viññāṇāni pana rūpasattānaṃ cakkhusotaindriya pavattiānubhāvato sampaṭicchanasantīraṇānica
anya-e0301n0:750_9: Tesaṃ pana ekantaparittā rammaṇabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
anya-e0301n0:753_0: Cittañhi nāma vikappabalevā appanāpattabhāvanākammavisese vā sati nibbāne viya aparicitepi ārammaṇe pavattatiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:755_2: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kiṃvā etāya yutticintāyāti vatvā sabbāni vibhāvaniyaṃ vutta kāraṇāni paṭikkhittānīti.
anya-e0301n0:756_0: Kāme javana sattālambaṇānaṃ niyamesatīti kāmabhūmipariyāpannānaṃ javanānaṃ sattānaṃ ārammaṇānañca vasena tividhe niyame sati.
anya-e0301n0:756_1: Vibhūte timahanteca tadārammaṇamīritanti etena tadārammaṇaṃnāma pavattamānaṃ vibhūtārammaṇevā atimahantārammaṇe vā pavattatīti ayameva niyamo dassito.
anya-e0301n0:756_2: Na pana yattha tadā rammaṇaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:756_4: Tasmā uḷārakammanibbattānaṃ suvisadavatthukānaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ uppannāvīthiyo yebhuyyena vibhūtārammaṇāeva atimahantā rammaṇāevaca hontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:756_5: Keci pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā rūpārūpabhūmīsu vibhūtārammaṇavīthiyo atimahantārammaṇavīthiyoca nalabbhantīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:757_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi hi pakatikāle ārammaṇadubba laṭṭhāneeva kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ chakkhattuṃ pavatti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:757_5: Keci pana chakkhattunti idaṃ mucchākālavasena vuttanti maññanti.
anya-e0301n0:757_6: Mandavattiyanti maraṇāsannakāle bahucittakkhaṇātītakassa vatthussa dubbalattā itarakālesuca mudutarabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:757_7: kenaci upadduta bhāvena ajjhotthaṭabhāvenaca vatthussa dubbalattā tannissitānaṃ javanānaṃ mandībhūtavegatā
anya-e0301n0:757_9: Maraṇakālādīsūti maraṇāsannakāle mucchākāle visaññibhūta kāle atitaruṇakāleca,
anya-e0301n0:757_10: tattha mucchākālonāma asayha rūpehi dukkhadhammehi atibhūtānaṃ adhimattato karajakāyassa vihaññappattikālo.
anya-e0301n0:757_11: Visaññi bhūtakālonāma pītivegenavā niddābhibhūtatāyavā yakkhagahaṇenavā surāmadādi vasenavā pakatisaññāya vigatakālo.
anya-e0301n0:757_12: Atitaruṇakālonāma gabbhagatassavā sampatijātassavā dārakassa ajjhatta vatthūnaṃ atimudukālo.
anya-e0301n0:757_13: Tādisesu hi kālesu antarantarā chadvārikavīthiyo pavattamānāpi yebhuyyena paripuṇṇajavanavārā na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:757_17: Pañcavāramevāti idaṃ pana maraṇā sannakālavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:757_20: Ye pana jhānasamanantaraṃvā paccavekkhaṇa samanantaraṃvā abhiññāsamanantaraṃvā cavantivā parinibbāyantivā.
anya-e0301n0:757_21: Tesaṃ jhānādīniyeva pañcavārato adhikānivā ūnānivā maraṇā sannajavanānināma hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:757_23: Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriya kālādīsūti ettha aññesaṃpi mahāmoggalānattherādīnaṃ evarūpo lahuppavattikālo ādisaddena saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:757_24: Vuttañhi visuddhimagge ayaṃ pana matthakapattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:757_26: Sakalena pana vākyena thapetvā yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ lahuka pavattikālaṃ aññasmiṃ kāle bhagavatopi chavā sattavā paccavekkhaṇacittāni pavattanti.
