anya-e0301n0:757_28: Cattāri pañcavā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantīti etthapi bhagavatopi lahukappavattiyaṃ pañca paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:759_0: Bhagavato cattāri aññesaṃ pañcapīti yuttaṃ viya dissatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_0: Tattha yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto bhagavā aggikkhandhaudaka dhārādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ pāṭihāriyānaṃ pavattanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n0:760_12: Etthaca lahukappavattiyā icchitattā dve dve paccavekkhaṇavārā catupañcajavanikāeva bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:760_13: Dvinnañca javanavārānaṃ antarā dve eva bhavaṅgāni bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:760_14: Tānica dve pāṭihāriyāni passantānaṃ ekappahāreneva pavattāni viya paññāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:760_15: Etarahi pana keci ādikammikajjhānapaccavekkhaṇesupi cattāri pañcavājavanāni vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:760_20: Tadā hi sabbānipi mahaggatajavanāni puna āsevanābhāvato paridubbalāni hontīti ekavārameva javantīti.
anya-e0301n0:760_22: Kiccasiddhiyāeva payuttānīti kiccasiddhito paraṃ kattabbābhāvato ādikammikakālepi vasībhūtakālepi ekavārameva
anya-e0301n0:760_24: Yathāca abhiññājavanādi evaṃ maggajavanānipi taṃ taṃ kilesappahānakiccasiddhito paraṃ kattabbā bhāvato ekavārameva javantīti vuttaṃ cattāro pana.La.
anya-e0301n0:760_26: maggacetanāya anantarikaphalattā sakiṃ uppanneyeva magge phalassavāro āvatoti natthi maggacittassa punuppattiyā okāsoti vuttaṃ cattāro pana.La.
anya-e0301n0:760_28: Javanuppattiyā pakatiyā sattakkhuparamattā mandassa pañcamaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ dve phalacittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:760_29: Tikkhassa catutthaṃ uppannamaggato paraṃ tīṇīti vuttaṃ tato paraṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:760_31: Nirodhasamāpattikāle pana pubbabhāgeyeva tādi sassa payogābhisaṅkhārassa katattā dvinnaṃ vārānaṃ upari cittappavatti natthīti vuttaṃ nirodha.La. Javatīti.
anya-e0301n0:760_32: Etthaca dvikkhattunti idaṃ ukkaṭṭha niddesavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_33: Ekaṃvā dvevā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hotīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_34: Catutthāruppajavananti anāgāmino kusalabhūtaṃ arahato kriyabhūtaṃ nevasaññānāsaññā yatana javanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_35: Vuṭṭhānakāleca nirodhassa nisandamattattā ekavārameva vajanaṃ pavattatīti vuttaṃ vuṭṭhānakālecātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:760_36: Tattha anāgāmi phalaṃvā arahattaphalaṃvāti anāgāmiphalevā arahattaphalevā.
anya-e0301n0:760_39: Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyanti jhānasamāpatti phalasamāpattivasena sakalāyapi samāpattivīthiyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_40: Bhavaṅgasotoviya vīthiniya mo natthīti idaṃ ciṇṇavasībhūtakālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:760_41: Akatā dhikārassa pana jhānasamāpattiyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya dve tīṇi cattārītiādinā jhānajavanāni anukkamena vaddhamānāni pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:760_42: Katā dhikārānaṃ pana mahāpurisajātikānaṃ paṭiladdhakālato paṭṭhāya ciṇṇavasībhāvāneva honti.
anya-e0301n0:760_45: Tena ādikammikakālādīsu ekavārādivasenapi avasesānaṃ pavattiṃ sampiṇḍetīti.
anya-e0301n0:761_1: Evaṃ pubbāparaniyāmavasena vīthicittānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni puggalabhedavasena bhūmibhedavasenaca tesaṃ pavattiṃ dassento duhetukānantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:761_4: Dvīhi pana ahetuka vipākehi gahita paṭisandhikā ahetukā natthi paṭisandhihetu etesanti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:761_5: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃpi vipākāvaraṇasabbhāvato mahagga tajjhānānipi tāva nuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:761_7: Kriyajavanāni pana khīṇāsavānameva āvenika bhūtānīti vuttaṃ kriyajavanāni cevaappanājavanānica na labbhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:761_8: Tattha vipākā varaṇaṃ nāma ahetuka paṭisandhikatā dvihetuka paṭisandhikatāca.
anya-e0301n0:761_9: Tathā ñāṇasampayuttavipākānica sugatiyanti sugati bhave pariyāpannānaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ tathā ñāṇampayuttamahāvipākānica na labbhantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:761_10: Etthaca sugatiyanti etena duggatipariyāpanne ahetuka puggale nivatteti.
anya-e0301n0:761_11: Na hi tesaṃ imasmiṃ vākye itaresaṃ anuññātāni ñāṇavippayuttavipākānipi labbhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:761_13: Tattha duggatiyaṃ pariyāpannānaṃ ahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttavipākānica ñāṇavippayuttāni mahāvipākānica na labbhantīti paripuṇṇa yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:761_15: Kasmā panettha sugatipariyāpannānaṃ ahetukānaṃ cattāri ñāṇasampayuttavipākāni duggatipariyāpannānañca
anya-e0301n0:761_16: aṭṭhapi sahetuka mahāvipākāni na labbhantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:761_17: Nanu paṭṭhāne sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:761_18: Ettha hi ekasmiṃ bhave ekassa sattassa kadāci sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ kadāci ahetukaṃ bhavaṅganti evaṃ mūlabhavaṅge
anya-e0301n0:761_19: pavattibhedo natthīti katvā sahetukaṃ bhavaṅganti idaṃ tadārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n0:761_21: Sahetukantica sāmaññavacanattā dvihetukaṃ tihetukañca tadārammaṇaṃ viññātabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:761_22: Ahetukassa bhavaṅgassāti idha pana tassa tadārammaṇassa anantaraṃ uppannaṃ mūlabhavaṅgameva adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:761_25: Tasmā dvinnaṃ ahetukānaṃpi aṭṭhasahetuka tadārammaṇānipi labbhamānānieva siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:761_27: ahetu kesu tāva duggatipariyāpannānaṃ sahetukatadārammaṇasambhavo sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0301n0:761_28: Tasmā ahetukassa bhavaṅgassāti idaṃ kusalavipākabhūtaṃ ahetukabhavaṅgaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:761_32: Yathāca kusalānaṃ yogasādhanīyattā pavattiyaṃpi yogakammavasena ñāṇayogo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:761_34: Tesaṃ pana ayogasādhanī yattā pavattiyaṃ bhavaṅgañāṇasaṅkhātena upanissayaññāṇena vinā ñāṇayogo na sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:761_35: Tasmā sahetukaṃ bhavaṅganti idhapi ñāṇavippayuttabhūtaṃ sahetukatadārammaṇameva gahetuṃ yuttanti katvā
anya-e0301n0:761_36: dvihetukānaṃ ahetukānañca ñāṇasampayuttatadārammaṇa paṭikkhepo therena katoti.
anya-e0301n0:761_37: Ācariyabuddhadattattherena pana yena vipākacittena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:761_38: Tena sadisaṃ vā tato hīnaṃ vā tadārammaṇaṃ tesaṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:761_39: Na paṇītanti katvā dvinnaṃpi ahetukānaṃ aṭṭhamahāvipākāni paṭikkhipitvā sattatiṃsacittapaṭi lābho vutto.
anya-e0301n0:761_41: Apare pana yathā ahetukānaṃ sugatipariyāpannānaṃ dvihetuka tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:761_44: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi katthaci tesaṃ dvinnaṃpi avisesena aṭṭhamahāvipākapavatti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:761_45: Paṭisandhiviññāṇa sahagatā tayo hetū etesanti tihetukā.
anya-e0301n0:761_49: Sabbaso anusayapahānena sabbesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ saha niruddhattā anusaya paṭibaddho hi tesaṃ tabbhāvoti.
anya-e0301n0:761_53: Tesañhi ādito sotāpattimaggeneva diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahīnattā taṃ sahagatāni pañcajavanāni nalabbhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:761_57: Catunnaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ paccekaṃ yathāsakaṃ maggajavanānieva labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:761_58: Uparimānañca phalānaṃ heṭṭhimehi puggalehi anamigatattā heṭṭhimānañca uparimesu puggalantaresu anuppajjanato
anya-e0301n0:761_59: catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃpi paccekaṃ yathāsakaṃ phalajavanānieva labbhantīti vuttaṃ lokuttara.La.
anya-e0301n0:761_61: Etthaca uparimagge āgate heṭṭhimamaggānubhāvassa sabbaso paṭipassaddhivasena uparimānaṃ puggalantaratāsiddhi veditabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:761_62: Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pārisesato labbhamānavīthicittāni dassetuṃ gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:761_63: Pariniṭṭhi tasikkhākiccattā natthi sikkhitabbakiccaṃ etesanti asekkhā.
anya-e0301n0:761_65: Tesaṃ tevīsatikāmavipāka vīsatikriya arahattaphala vasena catucattālīsa vīthicittāni sambhavā yathāsambhavaṃ uddise.
anya-e0301n0:761_66: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchājavanavajjitānaṃ sattannaṃ akusalānaṃ ekavīsatiyā kusalānaṃ tevīsatiyā
anya-e0301n0:761_67: kāmavipākānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ heṭṭhimaphalānaṃ āvajjanadvayassaca vasena chapaññāsa vīthicittāni sambhavā uddise.
anya-e0301n0:761_68: Avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ puthujjanānaṃ kāmavipāka lokiyakusalākulāvajjana dvayavasena catupaññāsa vīthicittāni sambhavā uddiseti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:762_1: Sabbānipi vīthicittāni upalabbhanti puggalānaṃ dvārānañca ettheva paripuṇṇasambhavato.
anya-e0301n0:762_3: Rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ vajjitabbesu soḷasavīthi cittesu channaṃ cittānaṃ uparivākye vuccamānattā paṭighajavana tadārammaṇa vajjitānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:762_4: Arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ pathamamagga rūpāvacarahasana heṭṭhimāruppavajjitāni paṭighajavana tadārammaṇavajjitānica vīthi cittāni labbhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:762_5: Etthāpi vajjitabbesu aṭṭhatiṃsa vīthicittesu soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ uparivuccamānatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:762_7: Taṃtaṃ pasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārika vīthicittāni na labbhantevāti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ tāva ghānādittayaṃ
anya-e0301n0:762_8: natthīti ghānajivhākāyapasāda rahitānaṃ rūpībrahmānaṃ ghāna jivhākāyadvārikāni cha vīthicittāni nalabbhanteva.
anya-e0301n0:762_9: Yāni sandhāya channaṃ cittānaṃ uparivākye vuccamānattāti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:762_10: Arūpabhūmiyaṃ pana pañcapi pasādā natthīti pañcadvārikāni dvipañcaviññāṇa manodhā tuttika santīraṇattayavasena soḷasavīthicittāni nalabbhanteva.
anya-e0301n0:762_11: Yāni sandhāya soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ upari vuccamānatāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:762_12: Kāmabhūmiyaṃ pana taṃtaṃ pasādarahitatā jaccandhādīnaṃ vasena yo jetabbā.
anya-e0301n0:762_13: Kāme asīti vīthicittāni yathārahaṃ labbhare labbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:762_15: Arūpe dve cattālīsa yathārahaṃ labbhareti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:762_16: Etthaca brahmalokevā upari chakāmāvacara devalokesuvā aniṭṭhārammaṇāni nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:762_17: Tasmā rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ labbhamānatāvacanaṃ tattha ṭhatvāvā idha āgantvāvā
anya-e0301n0:762_18: idha anaṭṭhehi rūpasaddehi samāgacchantānaṃ vasena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:762_19: Keci pana idha āgatānaṃyeva brahmānaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogo hotīti thāni cattāri rūpabhūmiyaṃ laddhānināma na honti.
anya-e0301n0:762_22: Idha āgatānaṃyeva uppannānipi brahmattabhāve uppannattā brahmaloke uppannāni icceva vattabbattā.
anya-e0301n0:762_23: Naca tattha ṭhitāpi idha aniṭṭhāni nagaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:764_0: Tassa vādassa paṭikkhipanatthaṃ vuttaṃ “idha pana tattha ṭhatvāpi imaṃ lokaṃ passantānaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇassa asambhavo na sakkā vattu”nti.
anya-e0301n0:764_1: Tena tattha ṭhatvā imaṃ lokaṃ passantānaṃ uppannāni tāni cattāri cittāni tattha laddhānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:764_2: Idha āgatānaṃ uppannāni idha laddhānināma hontīti anuññātaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:765_0: Taṃ taṃ bhūmipariyāpanne sattasantāne uppannānieva taṃtaṃbhūmiyaṃ uppannānīti siddhattā.
anya-e0301n0:765_4: Yāvatāyukanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave bhavanikanti vīthito paṭṭhāya yattakaṃ kālaṃ jīvitasantānaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:765_6: Abbhocchinnā pavattati asati nirodha samāpattiyanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:770_1: Evaṃ pavattikāle pavattisaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattisaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n0:770_2: Evaṃ vuttanayena pavattiyaṃ pavattisaṅgahonāma vīthicittavasena udīritokathito.
anya-e0301n0:770_3: Idāni sandhiyaṃ pavattisaṅgaho nāma vīthimutta cittānaṃ vasena vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:770_4: Etthaca paṭisandhiyaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiyā kathitāya tato paraṃ bhavaṅgakāleca cutikāleca tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:770_5: pavatti kathitāyeva hotīti katvā sandhiyamicceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:772_0: Parato maraṇuppattiyaṃ pathamaṃ cutiṃ dassetvā pacchā anantare paṭisandhiyā vakkhamānattā idha sandhiggahaṇena
anya-e0301n0:772_1: atītā nantara cutipi gahetabbāti adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “tadāsannatāya taṃgahaṇeneva gahitacutikālecā”ti.
anya-e0301n0:773_0: Vīthimuttānañhi visayappavattināma atītānantarabhave maraṇuppattiyaṃeva siddhāti ekasmiṃ bhave visayappapattiyā
anya-e0301n0:773_1: saha tesaṃ paṭisandhipamukhānaṃ vīthimuttacittānaṃ pavattidassanatthaṃeva tāya atītānantaracutiyā saddhiṃ
anya-e0301n0:773_5: Atthato pana sukhaṃca sukhahetu sukhapaccayāca veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:773_6: Yebhuyyena tato ayato apagatā ettha nibbattā sattāti apāyo.
anya-e0301n0:773_14: Niccaṃ vā rayanti kampanti phandanti sattā dukkhappattā etthāti nirayo.
anya-e0301n0:773_15: Manussā viya uddhaṃ uccā ahutvā tiro añcitā āyatāti tiracchānā.
anya-e0301n0:773_16: Yuvanti nānā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānāpi sattā samānajātitāya ekībhūtāviya honti etāyāti yoni. Jāti.
anya-e0301n0:776_2: Ito apakkamma cavitvā bhavantare gatāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_4: Divaṅgatāpi hi loke kālaṅkatā petāti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:776_5: Idha pana sukhasamussayato pecca pakaṭṭhaṃ pavāsaṃ dūraṃ gatāti atthena yāva tato na muccanti.
anya-e0301n0:776_6: Tāva niccaṃ dukkhappattā lakkhaṇasaṃyuttādīsu āgatā tatīyā apāyikasattā adhippetā.
anya-e0301n0:776_10: Asurakāyoti ettha surā vuccanti upari devā suranti iddhivisesehi dibbanti,
anya-e0301n0:776_13: Vepacitti pahārādādayo sandhāya surapaṭipakkhā sura sadisāvāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_14: Viyaṅkaramātā uttaramātādayo vini pātike sandhāya khuddakasurā cūḷakasurāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_15: Yamarājā dayo vemānikapete sandhāya ekadesena surasadisāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_17: Lokantarika nerayike sandhāya sabbaso suraguṇa rahitāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_18: Tepi hi buddhavaṃsanidānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ jātidukkha niddesesuca asurakāyāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:776_19: Tathā kālakañcikapete sandhāya sabbaso surabhāvarahitāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:776_20: Iti pañcannaṃ asurānaṃ vasena atthavibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:776_22: paripūrissanti asurakāyāti imasmiṃ suttapade cattāropi apāyā asurakāyāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṇṇitā.
anya-e0301n0:777_0: Tattha vepacitti pahārādādayo asurā tāva tiṃsesu devesu saṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n0:777_3: Tepi hi vinipātikāsurā viya tihetukāpi duhetukāpi ahetukāpi hontīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:777_4: Yamarājāno pana vessabhū nottica petti rājā somo yamo vessavaṇoca rājāti evaṃ kathā vatthupāḷiyaṃ āgatā
anya-e0301n0:777_5: vessabhūādayo sayaṃ mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā vemānikapetarājāno hutvāpi nerayikesu sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca
anya-e0301n0:777_7: Teneva hi sabbe petalokāpi nirayalokāpi yamalo kātica yamavisayātica vuccantīti.
anya-e0301n0:777_8: Yeca cātumahārājikapari yāpannā pāpajjhāsayā kururakammakārino revativimāne yakkhāti āgatā saṃkiccajātake
anya-e0301n0:777_9: rakkhasāti āgatā yakkharakkhasānāma ito gantvā ussadanirayesu nerayikānaṃ nānākamma kāraṇāyo karonto
anya-e0301n0:777_11: Tesaṃpi kālo upakāloti evamādīhi nāmehi nāradajātake āgatānaṃ niraya pālānaṃ upariyamarājānaṃ āṇāpavattatiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:777_15: Etthaca nirayabhūmināma paccekaṃ soḷasussadapari vārānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahānirayānaṃ vasena anto pathaviyaṃ ṭhitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:777_16: Arañña pabbata samudda dīpakādīsupi nānāniraya bhūmiyo hontiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:777_17: Tasmā tādisassa visuṃ vavatthitassa okāsassa atthitāya nirayotveva vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:777_18: Sesānaṃ pana tissannaṃ apāyabhummīnaṃ tādisassa okāsassa natthitāya yoni visaya kāya saddehi yojetvā khandhāvā khandhappavattipadesāvā gahitāti.
anya-e0301n0:778_0: Ussito uggato ussannovā mano etesanti manussā.
anya-e0301n0:778_1: Tehi anantesu cakkavāḷesupi itarabhūmikānaṃ sattānaṃ tikkhatarasūra vicitracittā honti.
anya-e0301n0:778_2: Paripuṇṇānaṃ kusalākusalakamma pathānaṃ ānantariyakammānañca ettheva sambhavatoti.
anya-e0301n0:778_3: Tesupi pana jambudīpavāsinoeva atisayena ussitamanā honti.
anya-e0301n0:778_4: Itare pana tehi samānavaṇṇāditāya manussā icceva vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:778_5: Imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe pana vattabbameva natthi, yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:778_6: tīhi bhikkhave ṭhāne hi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke manusse adhiggaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:778_10: Akkharacintakā pana vadanti manūti mahāsammatarājā vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:778_11: Imeca janā tena thapitesu mariyādadhammesu ṭhitā tassa puttaṭṭhāniyā honti.
anya-e0301n0:778_13: Idha pana bhūmipariyāyoti katvā manussāti itthiliṅgaṃ ekavacanañca katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:778_15: Yesu pana cattāro mahārājāno rajjaṃ kārenti.
anya-e0301n0:778_21: Tattha paṭisandhivasena gandharukkhesu appenti upagacchantīti gandhappā.
anya-e0301n0:778_26: Sabbe te yebhuyyena pāpajjhāsayā kururakammakārino ca honti.
anya-e0301n0:778_27: Tasmā cattāro mahārājāno aññamaññaṃvā manussānaṃ vā aviheṭhanatthāya tesu nānārājānaṃvā nānāsenāpatiṃvā thapesuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:779_1: Tattha hi yakkhoyakkhinīgandhappo gandhappī kumbhaṇḍo kumbhaṇḍī nāgo nāgīticatasso avaruddhakajātiyo āgatā.
anya-e0301n0:779_2: Tattha sarīrobhāsasirisampattiyutto amanusso yakkhotica devotica devatātica vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:779_3: Sarīro bhāsa sirisampattirahito vigaccharūpo amanusso yakkhotveva vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:779_7: Pubbe nihīnakammakatā kāci gandhappiyo manussitthīnaṃ sarīrabbhantaresupi jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:779_8: Yā vedaganthesu yoginītica loke joginītica vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:779_9: Abhilakkhitarattīsu gocarapasuta kāle jutiatthena juṇhātica vuccanti,
anya-e0301n0:779_14: Evaṃ ratanaṭṭhānānivā vanappati rukkhevā dibbosadharukkhevā dibbagandharukkhevā udakasarevā rakkhitvā asanti bhakkhanti.
anya-e0301n0:779_16: Nāgo nāgīti ettha anto pabbatevā anto pathaviyaṃvā nibbattā vasundharadevayakkhajātiyopi idha nāgātveva vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:779_17: Yā mahāparinibbāna sutte bhūmicālasuttapade pathavī devatāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:779_18: Yāsaṃ kīḷāpasuta vasena kadāci bhūmicālo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:779_19: Yāsañca mantapadāni vatthu vijjātica bhūmivijjātica brahmajālasutte vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:779_20: Tesuca nānā iddhimantā avaruddhakā pāpātiratā kibbisakammakārino kīḷā soṇḍavasenavā ghāsasoṇḍavasenavā
anya-e0301n0:779_21: petesucanirayesuca pakati vaṇṇenavā soṇagijjhakākādivaṇṇenavā satte viheṭhayantā vicaranti.
anya-e0301n0:779_22: Sabbañce taṃ suttantesuvā jātakesuvā vedaganthesuvā kusalehi veditabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:780_0: Saha puññakārino tettiṃsa janā māghenanāma jeṭṭhapurisena saha ettha nibbattāti tettiṃsā.
anya-e0301n0:780_2: Kāmañcettha sabbacakkavāḷesupi ayaṃ dutīyadeva loko janavasatasutte āgata nayena sakkaṭṭhāniyānaṃ pajāpati
anya-e0301n0:780_3: varuṇa īsānādīnaṃ tettiṃsa devarājūnaṃ nibandhano kāso hoti.
anya-e0301n0:780_6: Māghapurisā pana tesu samudāgatesu devarājaṭṭhānesu paccājātā honti.
anya-e0301n0:780_7: Etarahi dharamānāca tasmā tesaṃ vasena ayaṃ vacanattho katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:780_9: Tāva dissanti tiṃsatīti imasmiṃ vidhurajātake tāva saddo tiṃsasaddaparivāramatto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:780_10: Tathā idhāpīti katvā tiṃsamattānaṃ sakkaṭṭhāniyānaṃ devarājakulānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhā nattā tāvatiṃsānāmāti yuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:780_11: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana yathāvuttaṃ niruttinayaṃ kappetvā māghavatthūsuca tesu tesuca ṭhānesu sakkānaṃ tettiṃsa saṅkhāeva vuttātipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:780_13: Pāḷiyaṃeva brahmāsanaṅkumāro tettiṃse attabhāve abhinimminitvā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pallaṅkesu nisīditvāti vuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:780_16: Taṃ sahacaritattā pana so deva lokopi tattha nibbattadevāpi yāmātveva vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:780_17: Vipulāya sirisampattiyā samannāgatattā niccaṃ tusanti ativiya haṭṭhatuṭṭhamukhā honti etthāti tusitā.
anya-e0301n0:780_18: Yathārucite bhoge sayameva nimminitvā nimminitvā ramanti etthāti nimmānaratī.
anya-e0301n0:780_19: Attano ruciṃ ñatvā parehi nimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattenti etthāti paranimmitavasavattī.
anya-e0301n0:780_20: Brūhanti vaḍḍhanti atipaṇītehi jhānādi guṇehi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantīti brahmāno.
anya-e0301n0:780_21: Mahantā brahmāno mahābrahmānoti vattabbe mahāsaddassa lopo.
anya-e0301n0:781_4: Pure ucce ṭhāne odahanti tiṭṭhantīti purohitā.
anya-e0301n0:781_10: Dvisahassoti dvīsu cakkavāḷa sahassesu issaroti attho.
anya-e0301n0:781_12: Tattha loke mahājanā visuṃ visuṃ kuladevatāyonāma upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0301n0:781_17: Gharadevatā gāmadevatā rukkhadevatādayopi tesaṃ mahādevarājānaṃ upaṭṭhakāeva sampajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:781_21: Tatthaca ghara devatādayo mahādevarā jāno adisvāva upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0301n0:781_27: Yadā pana oḷārikaṃ rūpaṃ māpetvā attānaṃ dassenti.
anya-e0301n0:781_30: Yaṃ pana brahmanimantana suttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ brahmānaṃ pakatirūpaṃ kassaci āpātaṃ na gacchatīti.
anya-e0301n0:781_31: Taṃ brahmapuro hitā dīnaṃ uparimānaṃ brahmānaṃ pakatirūpaṃ kassaci brahmapārisajjādinovā devassavā manussassavāāpātaṃ nagacchatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:781_32: Heṭṭhimānaṃ pana pakatirūpaṃ uparimassa āpātaṃ āgacchissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:781_33: Teneva hi janavasabhasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimāhi devā uparimadevānaṃ oḷārikaṃ katvā māpitameva attabhāvaṃ passituṃ sakkontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:781_38: Heṭṭhimatalato pana visesa karaṇatthaṃ ābhāvasena nāmagahaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:782_7: Tattha subhāti ekagghanā acalasaṇṭhitā ābhāeva vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:782_12: Tesaṃ ākārassa rasso antimaṇakārassa ca hakāro daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:782_13: Imesu pana dvīsu talesu pakatikāyappabhā adhimattā honti.
anya-e0301n0:782_14: Tasmā tāsaṃ vasena parittābhātiādikaṃ nāmaṃ siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:782_16: Evañca katvā verañjasutte pathamatalavāsino brahmakāyikā devāti āgatā.
anya-e0301n0:782_18: Tatīyatalavāsino subhādevāti catutthatale vipulaṃ phalaṃ etesanti vehapphalā.
anya-e0301n0:782_19: Athavā iñjanajātikehi somanassajjhānehi nibbattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ heṭṭhimatalānaṃ tejosaṃ vaṭṭādikena antarāyena
anya-e0301n0:782_20: bhūmitalena saha āyukappanivattivasena iñjitaṃ puññaphalaṃ atthi.
anya-e0301n0:782_21: Tesu hi yaṃ subhākiṇṇānaṃ devānaṃ catusaṭṭhikappānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:782_22: Taṃ tasmiṃ tale ādikappikānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:782_23: Pacchimikānaṃ pana tesaṭṭhikappa dvāsaṭṭhikappa ekasaṭṭhi kappādi vasena iñjitaṃ paṭilīnaṃ puññaphalaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:782_24: Āneñjajātikena upekkhājhānena nibbattānaṃ pana kenaci antarāyena tādisaṃ iñjitaṃ puññaphalaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:782_25: Tasmā jhāna sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ visesena īhitaṃ abhivaḍḍhitaṃ puññaphalaṃ ettha atthīti vehapphalā.
anya-e0301n0:783_0: Natthi saññāmukhena gahitā cattāro arūpakkhandhā etesanti asaññā.
anya-e0301n0:783_2: Cittace tasikānaṃ pana natthitāya tesaṃ asattapasaṅgatā sambhavatīti sattagahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:783_4: Etthapi nibbattakajjhānassa hīnamajjhimapaṇītatā visesassa atthitāya tadanurūpaṃ brahmānaṃpi pārisajja purohita mahābrahmatta viseso sambhavatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:783_5: Āyuvemattatāya pana aññamañña adassanādīnañca natthitāya pārisajjādivasena bhūmivibhāgo natthīti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:783_7: Oḷārikānaṃ kāmarāgapaṭighānusayānaṃ natthitāya suddhānaṃ anāgāmiarahantānameva āvāsāti suddhāvāsā.
anya-e0301n0:783_8: Tattha pathamabhūmivāsino appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ navijahantīti avihā. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:783_9: oḷārikānaṃ pañcannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahīnattā natthi cittassa vihaññanaṃ samathavipassa nādhammesu avipphārikatāpatti etesanti avihā.
anya-e0301n0:783_10: Dutīyabhūmi vāsino na kenaci cittapariḷāhena tappantīti atappā.
anya-e0301n0:783_11: Tatīya talavāsino parisuddhehi pasādacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhu paññā cakkhūhi sampannattā suṭṭhu passantīti sudassā.
anya-e0301n0:783_12: Catutthabhūmivāsino pana tato atisayena suṭṭhu dassanabhāvena samannāgatāti sudassino.
anya-e0301n0:783_14: Pañcamabhūmi vāsino upari aññassa bhūmantaragatassa rūpibrahmuno natthitāya natthi rūpīnaṃ sattānaṃ majjhe
anya-e0301n0:784_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmīti ettha yattakaṃ ākāsapadesaṃ pharitvā ākāsānañcāyatana saññitā catukkhandhā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:784_3: Puthujjanā sotāpannā sakadāgāminocāpi puggalā suddhāvāsesu sabbathā sabbapakārenapi nalabbhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:784_4: Etthaca sakadāgāmīnaṃ paṭikkhepena anāgāmi maggaṭṭhassapi tattha paṭikkhepo siddho hotīti uparimānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:784_5: tiṇṇaṃ ariyānameva tattha paṭilābho imāya gāthāya vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:784_6: Sesaṭṭhānesūti pañcasuddhāvāsato asaññāpāyatoca avasesesu ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu,
anya-e0301n0:785_2: Paṭisandhihi bhavantare okkamanaṃ anupavisananthi atthena okkantīti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:785_7: Ādisaddena jāti badhira jaccaghānaka jātimūga jacceḷa jaccummattaka paṇḍaka ubhato byañjanaka napuṃsaka mammādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:785_8: Tattha yassa cakkhuṃ uppādetuṃ asamatthena kammena paṭisandhi laddhā.
anya-e0301n0:785_20: Pakativacanepi ekamekaṃ akkharaṃ mahussāhena uppādento vibacchavacano mammonāma.
anya-e0301n0:785_21: Etthaca cakkhuṃ uppādetuṃ samatthena kammena laddhapaṭisandhikassa pavattikāle taṃvā aññaṃvā kammaṃ cakkhuṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0301n0:785_22: Asamatthenakammena laddhapaṭisandhi kassa pana vatthuvipannassa pavattikāle aññaṃpi kammaṃ cakkhuṃ uppādetīti natthi.
anya-e0301n0:785_23: Tasmā gabbhaseyyakānaṃpi jaccandhabhāvo paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:785_25: Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho jātīti vuttattā cakkhussa uppajjanārahakālo cakkhussa jātikālonāma.
anya-e0301n0:785_26: Tadā anuppanna cakkhuko jaccandhonāmāti evaṃ attano attano uppajjanāraha kālavasena tassa tassa āyatanassa jātikālo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:787_1: Mātu kucchiyaṃ andho hutvā nikkhantoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:787_2: Tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddhanti vadantīti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:788_0: Loke mātukucchiyaṃyeva andho hutvā nikkhantassapi ekaccassa taṃ taṃ sippavijjāṭhānesu paññāveyyattiyabhāvassa diṭṭhattā.
anya-e0301n0:788_1: Thapetvā hi mahābodhisatte aññeca pacchimabhavike satte avasesānaṃ dvihetuka tihetukānaṃpi mātukucchimhi
anya-e0301n0:788_2: parūpakkamenavā mātuyā visamapayogenavā nānābādhenavā uppannānaṃpi cakkhusotānaṃ vipattināma natthīti
anya-e0301n0:788_4: Bhummassitānañca vinipātikāsurānanti ettha bhūmiyaṃ jātāti bhummā.
anya-e0301n0:788_5: Bhūmisambandhesu rukkhaṭṭhaka pabbataṭṭhaka vimānesu nibbattā āḷavaka sātāgira hemavatādayo mahiddhikā bhummādevā.
anya-e0301n0:788_6: Ye loke baliharaṇa vasena pūjanīyaṭṭhena yakkhātipi vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:788_7: Ye pana bhummadevajātikāpi samānā attano puññanibbattassa kassaci bhogasukhassa abhāvā kicchajīvi kappattā vicaranti.
anya-e0301n0:788_8: Te tesaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ bhummadevānaṃ paraṃpara pārisajjesu pariyāpannattā bhumme deve sitā nissitāti atthena bhummassitānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:788_10: Puññanibbattassa nivāsaṭṭhānassa abhāvā rukkhagumbaleṇaguhāsusānā dīsu vivittesu bhūmipadesesu nissāya vasantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:788_11: Teyeva virūpā hutvā bhavantare nipatantīti vinipātikā.
anya-e0301n0:788_12: Vinipātikāca te heṭṭhāvuttaṭṭhena asurācāti vinipātikā surā.
anya-e0301n0:788_13: Te pana gāmasamīpevā antogāmevā vivittaṭṭhānesu vasitvā gāmavāsīhi chaḍḍitāni bhattasitthapūvakhajjamacchamaṃsādīni
anya-e0301n0:788_14: pariyesitvāvā tāni alabhitvā dārakevā gilānevā pīḷetvāvā sakkontā pana aññepi manusse tāsetvā pīḷetvāvā
anya-e0301n0:788_18: Na hi sabbe vinipātikā surānāma ahetu kāevāti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:788_20: Evañca katvā tesaṃ ekaccānaṃ piyaṅkaramātā uttaramātā dhammaguttā phussamittādīnaṃ dhammābhisamayopi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:788_21: Ekacce yakkhajātikāpi rakkhasajātikāpi vemānikapetāpi paradattupajīvi petāpi ettha saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:789_1: Yasmā āyuparicchedonāma ekabhūmipariyāpannānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ asesasā dhāraṇaniyamaparimāṇavasena pavatto.
anya-e0301n0:789_2: Apāyānaṃ manussānaṃ bhumma devānañca tādiso niyamaparimāṇonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:789_3: Na hi sakalacakka vāḷapariyāpannā ekabhūmakā sabbanirayā ekaāyuparicchedā honti.
anya-e0301n0:789_6: Catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ āpāyikapuggalānaṃ āyuppamāṇa gaṇanāya niyamo natthi,
anya-e0301n0:789_8: Tattha nirayesu abbudādīnaṃ dasannaṃ nirayānaṃ bhagavatā vutto āyuparicchedopi tattha tattha nibbattakena kammenevasiddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:789_9: Manussānanti idaṃ jambudīpagāsīnaṃ vasena vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:789_10: Te saññeva hi āyukappassa ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca atthi.
anya-e0301n0:789_12: Tesu hi uttarakuruvāsīnaṃ niyamato vassa sahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:789_14: Evaṃ sante tesu dīpesu ādikappikānaṃpi soeva paricchedoti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:789_17: Tasmā tesupi āyuparicchedānaṃ ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca natthīti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:789_18: Nisandamattattā jambudīpagatiyā ekagatikā nahontīti pana vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:789_19: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ uttarakurukā manussā amamā apariggahā.
anya-e0301n0:789_21: Tattha avasesāyunāti asaṅkhyeyyato orohitvā niccalaṃ ṭhitena vassasahassenāti atthoti.
anya-e0301n0:790_1: Sabbesaṃpi mahesakkhānaṃ appesakkhānañca bhummadevānaṃ vemānikapetādīnañca idha adhippetattā.
anya-e0301n0:790_3: Cātumahārājikānaṃpanadevānanti idaṃ uparime cātumahārājike sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:790_5: Pañca vassasatānīti idañca yebhuyyavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:790_6: Yasmā pana kassapabuddhassa sāvakabhūtā sotāpannadeva puttā ākāsaṭṭhaka vimānesu nibbattā yāva nimirājakālāpi tiṭṭhantīti jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:790_7: Tasmā kesañci ākāsaṭṭhakadevānaṃpi kammapamāṇatā siddhā hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:790_9: Na hi sotā pannānaṃ sattakkhattuto paraṃ kāmabhave paṭisandhināma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:790_10: Na ca tasmiṃ devaloke sahassakkhattuṃ nibbattamānāpi tattakaṃ kālaṃ saṃpāpuṇituṃ sakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:790_12: Manussaloke hi paññāsavassāni cātumahārājike eko dibbarattidivo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:790_15: Tena dibbavassena tesaṃ pañcavassasatāni manussagaṇanāya navutivassasatasahassaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:790_17: Catuguṇanti āyupamāṇassa diguṇavuddhiyāceva dibbassa rattidivassa diguṇavuddhiyāca vasena catūhi bhāgehi guṇitaṃ vaḍḍhitanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:790_19: Tattha āyupamāṇassa diguṇavuddhināma heṭṭhimānaṃ devānaṃ āyupamāṇato uparimānaṃ devānaṃ āyupamāṇassa diguṇavuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:790_24: Vasavattīnaṃ dibbāni soḷasavassa sahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:791_0: Dibbassa rattidivassa diguṇavuddhināma heṭṭhimānaṃ devānaṃ rattidivato uparimānaṃ rattidivassa diguṇavuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:791_1: Etena manussaloke ekaṃ vassasataṃ tāvatiṃse eko dibbarattidivo.
anya-e0301n0:791_5: Sahassaṃ cha cavassasatāni vasavattiyaṃ eko dibbarattidivoti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:791_6: Rattidivānañca diguṇavuddhiyā siddhāya māsasaṃvaccharānaṃpi diguṇavuddhi siddhāva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:791_7: Evañcasati yathāvuttāni tāvatiṃsādīnaṃ dibbavassasahassādinipi attano attano rattidivamāsasaṃvaccharetieva veditabbānīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:791_8: Tathāca sati uparimānaṃ āyuparimāṇāni heṭṭhimānaṃ āyuparimāṇato catuguṇānīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:791_12: Dibbagaṇanāya ca tathā siddhāya sati manussagaṇanāyapi catuguṇabhāvo siddhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:791_13: Tasmā manussagaṇanāyapi heṭṭhimānaṃ navutivassasatasahassādīni catūhi uparūpariguṇitāni uparimānaṃ tikoṭisaṭṭhivassasata
anya-e0301n0:791_14: sahassādini bhavantīti katvā tāni sabbānipi ādiantadassana vasena niddisanto navasatanti gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:791_15: Vassānaṃ navasataṃ koṭiyo ca ekavīsa koṭiyo ca tathāsaṭṭhivassa satasahassāni ca vasavattīsu devesu āyuppamāṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:792_0: Yasmā avitakkavicāramattaṃ jhānaṃ oḷārikassa vitakkassa samatikkamā pathamajjhānato suṭṭhubalavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:792_2: Tasmā taṃ tatīyajjhānena ekato hutvā samatale bhūmantare vipākaṃ detīti vuttaṃ dutīyajjhānavipākaṃ tatiyajjhānavipākañca dutīyajjhānabhūmiyanti.
anya-e0301n0:792_3: Tenevaca bhūmīnaṃ ṭhitikkamopi catutthajjhāna vaseneva siddho.
anya-e0301n0:792_4: Therena pana heṭṭhā pañcakanayavaseneva jhānāni vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:792_5: Tasmā idhapi teneva nayena vipākāni gahetvā catutthajjhānavipākaṃ tatīyajjhānabhūmiyantiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:792_8: Catubbidhā hi kappāmahākappo asaṅkhyeyyakappo antarakappo āyukappoti,
anya-e0301n0:792_9: tattha āyukapponāma tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ taṃtaṃ āyuparicchedo vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:792_10: Antarakapponāma ekassavivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyeyyassa abbhantare manussānaṃ āyukappassa hāyanavaḍḍhanavasena
anya-e0301n0:792_16: Ekamekena manunāmakena mahāsammatarājena upalakkhitā antarakappāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:792_17: Keci pana ekasmiṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi mahāsammatarā jānaṃ ekameva icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:792_19: So catubbidho saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti.
anya-e0301n0:792_23: Yathā vivaṭṭaṃ tiṭṭhamāno kappo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:792_24: Te pana cattāro asaṅkhyeyyakappā eko mahākapponāma.
anya-e0301n0:792_25: Etthaca yo janāyāmavitthāre setasāsaparāsimhi vassasata vassasataccayena ekekabījaharaṇena parikkhīṇepi eko mahākappo parikkhayaṃ nagacchati.
anya-e0301n0:793_5: Vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsatīti evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ayaṃ loko nirantaraṃ sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati.
anya-e0301n0:793_8: Aṭṭhame udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhakānaṃ vasena catusaṭṭhivāresu antime udakavāre udakaṃ pahāya vātavāro hotīti ayamattho siddho hoti. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:793_11: Antarā sattasu sattasu vāresu tejosaṃvaṭṭā hontīti siddhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:793_14: Antarā tesaṭṭhiyā vāresu tejosaṃvaṭṭā āposaṃvaṭṭāca hontīti siddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:797_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvāro siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:798_0: Evañca vinaṭṭhe loke ekasmiṃ kappepi pathamajjhānabhūmi avinaṭṭhānāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:798_3: mahā brahmānaṃekokappoti ettha asaṅkhyeyya kappova sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:798_5: Tena vuttaṃ kappassāti idaṃ asaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:798_7: Tejosaṃvaṭṭakappesu hi pathamajjhānatalaṃ vivaṭṭamānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ vivaṭṭati.
anya-e0301n0:798_9: Tasmā vivaṭṭassa pacchimaḍḍhena saṃvaṭṭassaca pubbaḍḍhena saha ekaṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyikappaṃ gahetvā dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
anya-e0301n0:798_10: tasmiṃ tale eko āyukappoti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:798_11: Dutīya talato paṭṭhāya pana mahākappova gahetabbo.
anya-e0301n0:798_12: Appakaṃ ūnakaṃvā adhikaṃvā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā upaḍḍhehi saha sattakappāni sandhāya ābhassarānaṃ aṭṭhakappānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:798_15: Ekova visayo ārammaṇaṃ yassa taṃ ekavisayaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:799_4: Tattha janakaṃ nāma paṭisandhipavattīsu vipākakkhandha kaṭattārūpānaṃ nibbattikā kusalākusalacetanā.
anya-e0301n0:799_6: Pavattinibbattikā pana kammapathaṃ pattāpi apattāpi antamaso pañcadvārikajavanacetanāpi supinante kusalākusalacetanāpīti.
anya-e0301n0:799_7: Upatthambhakaṃnāma vipaccituṃ aladdhokāsāvā vipakkavipākā vā sabbāpi kusalākusalacetanā.
anya-e0301n0:799_8: Sā hi janakabhūtāpi samānā attanovipākavārato purevā pacchāvā sabhāṅgaṃ kammanta raṃvākammanibbattakkhandhasantānaṃvāupatthambhamānā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:799_10: Yaṃ pana visuddhimagge upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:799_12: Na hi paccayasāmaggiyaṃ sati kiñcikammaṃ pavattivipākamattassapi ajanakaṃnāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:799_13: Tattha kammantarassa upatthambhanaṃnāma aladdhokāsassa aññassa janakakammassa okāsakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:799_15: Tadā hi kusale javite aññaṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ kusalakammaṃ okāsaṃ labhati.
anya-e0301n0:804_1: Kammanibbattakhandhasantānassa upatthambhanaṃnāma aññena laddhokāsena kusalakammenavā akusalakammenavā
anya-e0301n0:804_2: nibbattassa khandhasantānassa jīvitantarāye apanetvā jīvitaparikkhāre samudānetvā ciratara pavattikaraṇaṃ.  Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:806_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ balanti.
anya-e0301n0:807_0: Ettha pana kusalaṃpi akusalakammanibbattassa khandhasantānassa akusalaṃpi kusalakammanibbattassa upatthambhakaṃnāma natthīti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:807_1: Akusala kamma nibbattassapi hi mahiddhikānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ khandhasantānassa pavattikāle pubbakataṃ kusalaṃ vuttanayena upabrūhanaṃ karotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:807_2: Tathākusalakammanibbattassapi kesañci vinipātikāsurādīnaṃ khandhasantānassa pavattikāle pubbakataṃ akusalaṃ ciratarappavattiṃ karotiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:807_4: Tāpi hi janakabhūtāpi samānā attano vipākavārato purevā pacchā vā vipākavāra gahaṇa kālepi vā kammantaraṃvā
anya-e0301n0:807_5: kammanibbatta khandhasantānaṃvā dubbalataraṃ katvāvā vibādhayamānā sabbasovā upacchindamānā pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:807_6: Tattha upapīḷake tāva kammantarassa vibādhanaṃnāma aññassa janakakammassa dubbalabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:807_7: Kammañhi nāma āyūhanakāle balavantaṃpi pacchā katena ujupaṭipakkhena kammantarena vibādhiyamānaṃ puna vihatasāmatthiyaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:807_9: Mahesakkhesu mahiddhikesu nibbattakaṃpi samānaṃ appesakkhesu nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:807_13: Purisatta bhāvanibbattakaṃpi samānaṃ itthattabhāvaṃvā napuṃsakabhāvaṃ vā nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:807_17: Tathā āyūhanakāle mahānirayesu nibbattakaṃpi akusalaṃ pacchākatena balavakusalena vibādhiyamānaṃ ussadesuvā petesuvā nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:807_19: Ussadesu nibbattakaṃpi petesuvā tiracchā nesuvāti ādisabbaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:808_1: Tathā hi kammaṃ nāma katakāledubbalaṃpisamānaṃ pacchāsabhāgenabalavatākusalenavā akusalenavā upatthambhīyamānaṃ suṭṭhu balavaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:808_2: Kammanibbatta khandhasantānassa vibādhanaṃnāma aññena kammena nibbattassa sattassa gahitapaṭisandhito
anya-e0301n0:808_3: paṭṭhāya yadākadāci sarīre nānāantarāye uppādetvāvā ṭhānantarakhettavatthu gomahiṃsa dhana dhaññabhoga
anya-e0301n0:808_4: sampattīnaṃ puttadārañāti mittānañca vipattiṃ katvāvā dukkhuppatti karaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:808_10: Cakkhādīsu pana kammajasantathisīsesu yena kammena yaṃkiñci ekaṃvā dvevā tīṇivā sabbaso bhijjanti.
anya-e0301n0:808_13: Upaghā takanti pana upacchedakantica atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:808_14: Tathā hi majjhimaṭṭha kathāyaṃ pathamaṃ upacchedakanāmena vatvā upaghātakantipi etasseva nāmanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:808_15: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pathamaṃ upaghātakanāmena vatvā upacchedakantipi tassevetaṃ nāmanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:808_16: Visuddhi maggepi maraṇassatiniddese tadeva kammupacchedakakammanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:809_1: Tadāhi pathamaṃ pāpakammabalena duggatinimitte upaṭṭhahante puna kalyāṇa kammaṃ taṃ paṭibāhitvā sugatinimittaṃ dassetvā sagge nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:809_2: Kalyāṇakammabalena sugatinimitte upaṭṭhahante puna pāpakammaṃ taṃ paṭibāhitvā duggatinimittaṃ dassetvā apāye nibbatteti.
anya-e0301n0:809_4: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kusalākusalakammakkhaya karassa maggakammassapi kammantarupacchedakahā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:809_6: Imasmiṃ bhave laddhāni mahaggatakammāni yena akusalena parihāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:809_9: Kammanibbattakhandhasantānupacchedanaṃ pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave āyu kammesu vijjamānesu laddhokāsassa
anya-e0301n0:809_10: kassaci aparādhakammassa balena kalalakālato paṭṭhāya antarāva kenacirogenavā bhayenavā upakkamenavā
anya-e0301n0:810_0: Etthaca kammantarassavā kammanibbattakhandhasantānassavā upatthambhanā dīni sandhāya imesaṃ catunnaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:810_3: sandhāya upatthambhakassa kusalabhāvo upapīḷakaupaghātakānaṃ akusalabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0301n0:810_4: So pana majjhimaṭīkāyaṃ aṅguttaraṭīkāyañca aruccamāno viya vutto.
anya-e0301n0:810_5: Mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana so keci vādopi kato.
anya-e0301n0:810_6: Tatthapana saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttānurūpaṃ vuttattā visuṃ pāḷinayoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:810_9: yadidaṃ pāṇātipātī hotītiādinā upaghātakaṃ pāṇātipātavaseneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:810_11: yadidaṃ sattānaṃ viheṭhakajātiko hotītiādinā vihiṃsādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:810_13: Yadidaṃ pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotītiādinā pāṇātipātaviratiādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:810_14: Sabbañcetaṃ manussattaṃ āgatasseva sattassa vasenāti evaṃ visuṃ pāḷinayo veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:810_15: Mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana aṅguttaraṭīkāyañca kammantarupatthambhanādīni anicchantehi janakādibhāvonāma vipākaṃ paṭiicchitabbo.
anya-e0301n0:810_16: Nakammanti vipākasseva upaghātakatā yuttā viya dissatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:811_0: Kiccavasenāti jananaṃ upatthambhanaṃ upapīḷanaṃ upacchindananti catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0301n0:811_1: Tattha ekā pāṇātipātacetanā cattāri kiccāni sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:811_2: Sā hi yāva vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ nalabhati.
anya-e0301n0:811_3: Tāva upatthambhanādīsu tīsu kiccesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ kiccaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:811_5: Tadā ekāya cetanāya ekāeva paṭisandhi hotīti evaṃ sāketapañhe vuttanayena ekaṃ apāyabhavaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n0:811_7: Pavatti vipākajananena saha itarāni tīṇi kiccāni bhavasatasahassepi kappasatasahassepi sādhetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:811_8: Dhammadinnāyanāma uggasena rañño deviyā vatthu ettha vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:811_9: Sā pana yadā attano vipākavārato pure ariyabhūtassavā puthujjanabhūtassapi kalyāṇa cittasamaṅginovā upacchedanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:811_10: Tadā upacchinditvā kammanta rasseva okāsaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:811_14: Sakiṃ laddhapaṭisandhivārato pana paṭṭhāya anekesu attabhāva satasahassesupi upacchedanādīniyeva karoti.
anya-e0301n0:811_15: Ettha mahāmoggalāna tthera vatthu sāmāvati vatthu vaggumudātīriyabhikkhu vatthu dussimāra kalāburājavatthūni kathetabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:811_16: Yasmā pana idaṃ upacchedakakammaṃ nāma tiracchānagatānaṃ bahulaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:811_17: Tasmā suṭṭhu balavaṃ akusalakammaṃ dubbalassa akusalakammassavā akusalakammanibbattakhandhasantānassavā upacchedakaṃnāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:811_18: Teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ bahukasmiñhi akusalakamme āyūhite balavakammaṃ dubbala kammassa vipākaṃ
anya-e0301n0:811_19: paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:812_0: Apica pavattiyaṃpi kammantarajanitaṃ bhavaṅgasantānaṃ anupacchinditvā pañcasu cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā
anya-e0301n0:812_1: bhāva dasaka saṅkhātesu santati sīsesu aññatarassa santatisīsassa sabbaso upacchindanaṃpi imasseva kiccanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:812_2: Yaṃ pana mahāṭīkāyaṃ aṅguttaraṭīkāyañca upapīḷikaṃ aññassa vipākaṃ chindati.
anya-e0301n0:812_3: Na sayaṃ attano vipākaṃ janetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:812_5: addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na detīti idaṃ disvā vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:812_6: Addhānaṃ pavattituṃ nadetīti ettha pana sukhasantānaṃvā dukkhasantānaṃvā cirakālaṃ pavattituṃ nadeti iccevattho.
anya-e0301n0:812_7: Na pana upaghātakaṃ viya bhavaṅgasantānena saha aññassa kammassa vipākaṃ chindatīti.
anya-e0301n0:814_1: Upaghātakaṃ upacchedanapubbakanti idaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ”.
anya-e0301n0:815_0: Idha pubbakatena upacchedanakakammena maritvā sagge nibbattānaṃ vatthūnaṃ aṭṭhakathāsuyeva āgatattāti.
anya-e0301n0:817_0: Apare pana ācariyā vadantītiādinā upaghātakassa sayaṃ vipākanibbattakattā bhāvavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:818_0: Teneva kammena apāye nibbattānaṃ dussimāra kalāburājā dīnaṃ tassa kammassa upacchedakakammabhāvena aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattāti.
anya-e0301n0:819_1: Garukanti aññena kammena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ kusalapakkhe mahaggatakammaṃ akusalapakkhe niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā saha pañcānantariyakammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:819_4: Tañhi pamādavasenavā nīvaraṇadhammapavattiyāvā parihāyiyamānaṃ nikantibalenavā paṭibāhiyamānaṃ vipākaṃ na detīti.
anya-e0301n0:819_5: Tathā ekassa bahūsu ānantariyakammesu katesu ekasmiṃ vipaccante sesāni na vipaccantīti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:819_6: mahaggatakammaṃ tāvathapetvā pamādadhammanīvaraṇadhammanikantidhamme attano balavatarañca mahaggatakammantaraṃ
anya-e0301n0:819_7: aññena puññakammena appaṭibāhaniyaṭṭhena garukaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:819_8: Ānantariyakammāni pana thapetvā attano balavataraṃ ānantariyakammaṃ aññena kenaci dhammena appaṭibāhaniyaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0301n0:819_11: Tattha tadākatanti antima javanavīthito pubbabhāge āsanne kataṃ yaṃkiñci kusalākusalakammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:819_12: Micchādiṭṭhikammaṃ pana vipassanādivasena pavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhikammañca antimajavanavīsiyaṃpi katanti gahetabbaṃ. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:819_13: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnāti.
anya-e0301n0:819_14: Etena tato micchādiṭṭhikammato aññaṃ antimajavanavīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetuṃ na sakkotīti siddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:819_16: Sakiṃ karitvāpivā pacchā punappunaṃ somanassajanakaṃ santāpajanakañca.
anya-e0301n0:819_17: Kaṭattākammanti kāriyitthāti kammanti evaṃ katakāraṇāeva kammanti vattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:819_18: Garukādibhāvena vattabbaṃ kammaṃ na hotīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:819_19: Tattha purimāni tīṇi imasmiṃ bhave katāni upapajjavedanīyakammānieva.
anya-e0301n0:819_20: Kaṭattākammaṃ pana atītabhavesu katehi aparapariyāyavedanīyehi saha imasmiṃ bhave kataṃ garukā sannāciṇṇabhāvarahitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:819_22: Mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana kaṭattākammaṃ purima jātīsu kataṃeva gahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:819_24: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattāvā pana kammaṃnāma hotīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:819_25: Na ca atītabhavesu katāni mātughātakādīnipi aparapariyāya kammāni etehi tīhi muttānītivā amuttānītivā
anya-e0301n0:819_27: Tadā hi tāni garuka kammasantāne pavattānipi honti.
anya-e0301n0:820_0: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ aññāṇavasenakataṃ kaṭattāvā pana kammaṃnāmāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_1: Na tāni aññāṇavasena kabhānīti sakkā visesetuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_2: Tāni hi purimabhavesu aññāṇa vasena katānipi honti.
anya-e0301n0:820_4: Tāni pana visesanāni imasmiṃ bhave katānaṃ garukādīhi tīhi muttānaṃ sattamajavana kammānaṃ vasena vuttānīti
anya-e0301n0:820_5: tehi saha purimajātīsu katāni aparapariyāya kammāni kaṭattā kammaṃnāmāti veditabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:820_6: Evañca katvā yattha taṃpubbakataṃ kammanti āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_7: Tatthapi imasmiṃ bhavevā atītabhavesuvā pubbakāle katanti attho veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:820_8: Imesu pana catūsu kammesu vijjamānesu garukameva anantare bhave paṭisandhiṃ deti.
anya-e0301n0:820_15: Kasmā idha āsannaṃ āciṇṇato pathamaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_16: Nanu pāḷiyaṃ āsannato āciṇṇameva pathamaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:820_20: Aṭṭhakathāsuca teneva kamena pākadānavāro vihitoti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:820_21: sabhāvato balavadubbalakkamena pāḷiyaṃ āciṇṇaṃ pathamaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_22: So pana kamo kadāci pākadānapariyāyopi sambhavatīti katvā aṭṭhakathāsu teneva kamena pākadānavāro vihito.
anya-e0301n0:820_23: Āsannaṃpi hisamānaṃ cittaṃ tosetuṃvā santāpetuṃvā asakkontaṃ hutvā dubbalaṃ balavato āciṇṇassa nivattakaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:820_24: Yasmā pana mahākammavibhaṅgasutte pubbevāssataṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_26: Maraṇakālevāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnāti evaṃ āciṇṇaduccaritassapi ekaccassa āsannena kalyāṇa kammena saggagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_27: Tathā pubbevāssataṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:820_28: Micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnāti evaṃ āciṇṇa sucaritassapi ekaccassa āsannena pāpakammena apāyagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_29: Yasmāca ubhinnaṃpi balavabhāve sati āsannameva pariyattaṃ bhavituṃ arahati.
anya-e0301n0:820_30: Tasmā idha therena āsannameva pathamaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_31: Etthaca pubbevāssakataṃ hotīti idaṃ āsannānussaritakammavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:820_32: Tambadāṭhikanāmassa coraghātakassa mahāvātakālanāmassaca upāsakassa vatthu ettha kathetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:822_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ jaraggavopamaṃ dassetvā āsannameva pathamaṃ vipākaṃ detīti ekaṃsena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:823_0: Na hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ evaṃ ekaṃsena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:823_1: Naca uṭṭhātuṃpi asakkonto so jaraggavo pajadvārassa āsanne ṭhitopi pathamataraṃ nikkhamissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:826_0: “Diṭṭhadhamme veditabbaṃ vipākānubhavana vasenāti diṭṭhadhammavedanīya”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:827_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:827_1: Ettha hi vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti etena idha vedanīyasaddo kammasādhano vipākātidheyyoca hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:827_2: Evañca sati idha aññapadatthasamāso eva labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:827_4: Diṭṭhadhammaṃ upecca tassa anantare pajjitvā pāpuṇitvā veditabbaṃ phalaṃ etassāti upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:827_5: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upapajja saddassa atthaṃ vadantena upapajjitvāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:827_7: Tasmā diṭṭhadhammassa samīpe anantare pajjitabbo gantabboti upapajjo.
anya-e0301n0:827_8: Dutīyo attabhāvo upapajjeveditabbaṃ phalaṃ etassāti upapajjavedanīyanti evamattho pāṭhassa vasena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:827_9: Upapajjātivā anantare bhave pavatto eko nipāto.
anya-e0301n0:829_0: “Diṭṭhadhammato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbanti upavajjavedanīya”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:830_0: Upapajjavā vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:830_3: Diṭṭhadhammā nāgatā nantara bhavehi añño atta bhāva parivatto.
anya-e0301n0:830_4: Te neva hi mahāṭīkāyaṃ aṅgutta raṭīkāyañca aparapariyāyeti diṭṭhadhammānantarānāgatato aññasmiṃ attabhāvapariyāye attabhāvaparivatteti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:830_5: Suttapadesu pana aparevā pariyāyetica aparāparevā pariyāyetica dvidhā pāṭho diṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:830_6: Tattha pacchimasmiṃ pāṭhesati idha majjhe ekassa aparasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:830_7: Saṅgahapoṭṭhakesu pana majjhe dīgho yākāranaṭṭhoca aparāpariyasaddo dissati.
anya-e0301n0:832_0: “Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariya vedanīya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:833_0: Na hi majjhe upapajjabhavaṃ vajjetvā pathamo diṭṭhadhammova idha tatīye pade adhikatoti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:834_0: [149] Atthato pana byañjanatoca sabbaṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:835_0: Aparevā pariyāye vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:835_6: Natassa vipākoti evaṃ vuttapāṭhavasena ācariyehi tathāgahitanāma dheyyaṃ sabbaso aladdhavipākavāraṃ kammanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:835_7: Tattha sattasu kusalākusalajavanesu pathamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammave danīyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:835_8: Sā hi aladdhāsevanatāya sabbadubbalattā aciraṭṭhi tikāca hoti appataravipākācāti.
anya-e0301n0:835_9: Paccayaṃ laddhā diṭṭhadhammeeva ahetukamattaṃ phalaṃ datvā vigacchati.
anya-e0301n0:835_10: Na ekaṃpi maraṇakālaṃ atikkamma santānaṃ anubandhituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:835_12: Paccayotica attano phaluppattiyā okāsadāyako nānā iriyāpathesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇasamā gamādiko yokoci paccayopi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:835_13: Ṭīkāsu pana paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāyātiādinā mahantaṃ katvā paccayo vutto.
anya-e0301n0:835_14: So kākavaliyādīnaṃ viya pākaṭataraphaladānaṃ sandhāya vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:835_15: Na hi kammapathajavanasantāne pavattamānā itarāpivā pathamajavanacetanā iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamāyogavasenapi laddha
anya-e0301n0:835_16: paccayā kāci attano balānurūpaṃ phalaṃ na detīti atthi.
anya-e0301n0:835_17: Nacatāya diyyamānaṃ sabbaṃpi phalaṃ mahājanassavā kammakārakasseva vāpākaṭameva siyāti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:835_18: Yaṃ pana ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭha kathāyaṃ ekaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ deti.
anya-e0301n0:835_20: Taṃ aladdhapaccayāni sesāni sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:835_21: Na hi eko diṭṭhadhammo ekasseva diṭṭhadhammavedanī yassa okāsoti sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0301n0:835_22: Atthasādhikā pana sanniṭṭhāpakabhūtā satthamajavanacetanā upapajja vedanīyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:835_23: Sā hi laddhāsevanatāya thokaṃ sārabhūtā hotīti pathamacetanā viya sīghataraṃ vipaccituṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:835_24: Balavatīca hotīti ekaṃ bhavaṃ janetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:835_25: Patita java nesu pana antimajavanatāya majjhimacetanāyo viya ciraṭṭhitikā na hotīti paccayaṃ laddhā anantare
anya-e0301n0:835_26: eva bhave paṭisandhiṃvā pavatti phalamevavā datvā vigacchati.
anya-e0301n0:835_29: Yaṃpana ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ekaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0301n0:835_34: Idha missaka kammāni katvā anantarabhave missakakammaphalaṃ anubhontāni vemānika petavatthūni aññānica
anya-e0301n0:835_35: taṃtaṃkammaṃ katvā anantarabhave eva sugati yaṃ kabbipākabhūtaṃ vipattiṃ anubhavantāni duggatiyaṃvā tabbipākabhūtaṃ
anya-e0301n0:835_36: sampattiṃ anubhavantāni anekāni vatthusatāni ettha kathe tabbānīti.
anya-e0301n0:837_1: Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:840_0: “Cuti anantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa okāso”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:843_0: “Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti vuttaṃ”. Taṃpi na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:844_1: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparapariyāya vedanīyanti tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:844_3: Na cettha paṭisandhivasena evaṃ vuttanti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:844_5: Majjhe pana pañcajavana cetanā aparapariyāya vedanīyaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:844_6: Etā hi suṭṭhu balavantī sārabhūtāca hontīti na sīghaṃ vipaccituṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:844_8: Tasmā tatīyabhavato paṭṭhāya yadā okāsaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:844_9: Tadā pañcavāre paṭisandhiṃ datvā saṃsārapavattiyā sati kappasatasahassepi pavattivipākaṃ dentīti.
anya-e0301n0:844_10: Imāniyeva pana tīṇi kammāni attano attano khette sabbaso vipākavāraṃ alabhamānāni ahosikammaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:844_11: Khettañca nesaṃ pathamassa diṭṭha dhammacutiyā paricchinnaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:845_1: Pākaṭṭhānavasenāti apāyādikassa vipaccanaṭṭhānassa vasena tathā cattāri kammānināma hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:845_3: Kammadvāravasenāti kammasiddhiyā aṅgabhūtānaṃ kāyādi kammadvārānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0301n0:845_5: Atipātanañcettha sarasato patituṃ adatvā antarāeva payogabalena pātanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:845_7: Agamanī yavatthusaṅkhātesu vatthukāmesu micchā caranti etenāti kāmesumicchācāro.
anya-e0301n0:845_8: Tattha parapāṇe pāṇasaññino tassa jīvitindriyasantānupacchedakassa kāyavacīpayogassa samuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipātonāma.
anya-e0301n0:845_9: Sayameva attano jīvitindriyaṃ pātentassa pāṇātipātonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:845_10: Parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tato viyogakāraṇassa kāya vacīpayogassa samuṭṭhāpikā acchindakacetanā adinnādānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:845_11: Agamanīyavatthūsu maggenamaggapaṭipādakassa kāyapayogassa samuṭṭhāpikā assādacetanā kāmesumicchācāronāma.
anya-e0301n0:845_12: Keci panaetthapi agamanīya vatthusaññinoti padaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:845_14: Agamayanīvatthu tasmiṃ sevanacittanti hi tattha vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:845_15: Etena agamanīyavatthumhi sati gamanīya saññāyavā agamanīya saññāyavā sevantassa kammapatho hoti yevāti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:845_16: Itarathā agamanīyavatthu tathā saññitā tasmiṃ sevanacittanti vuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:846_0: Apare pana sayaṃ payogaṃ katvā attani parena karīyamānaṃ maggena maggapaṭipādanaṃ assādentassa sevanacitte satipi natthi kammappathabhedo.
anya-e0301n0:846_2: Sevanacitte pana sati payogo appamāṇanti eke.
anya-e0301n0:846_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sevana payogena saha caturaṅgikova vuttoti aññe.
anya-e0301n0:846_8: Itarathā itthīnaṃ yebhuyyena payogakiccaṃ natthīti tāsaṃ micchācāro dullabho siyāti ca vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:846_11: Ṭīkāsu pana sā dhammarakkhitāpi na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:846_13: Dhammoti hi idha pāsaṇḍiyadhammova aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:846_15: Sabrahmacāri niyopi upajjhāyinī ādikā tassā mātādiṭṭhāniyāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:847_2: surāmerayapānaṃ bhikkhave āsevitaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ tiracchānayonisaṃvattanikaṃ pettivisayasaṃvattanikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_5: Aṭṭhakathāsupi koṭṭhāsato pañcapi pāṇātipātā dayo kammapathāevāti vuttanti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:847_6: mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tāva tassa sabhāgattena micchācāre upakārakattena dasasupi kammapathesu anupavesoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_7: Tattha sabhāgattaṃ gahetvā vibhāvaniyaṃ surāpānaṃpi ettheva saṅgayhatīti vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvatoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_8: Upakārakattaṃ gahetvā paṭisambhidāmaggaṭīkāyaṃ kusalākusalāpica paṭisandhijanakāyeva kammapathāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:847_9: Vuttāvasesā paṭisandhijanane anekanti kattā kamma pathāti na vuttāti imassa vākyassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāvase sāti surāpānādayo tabbiramaṇādayoca.
anya-e0301n0:847_13: Sāca puññapathassāti kammapathūpanissayāni tāni tadāsannakammavasena sandhijanakānipi hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_14: Tattha tadāsannakammavasenāti tassa surāpānassavā surāpānaviratiyāvā āsanne pavattānaṃ tammūlakānaṃ apuññakammānaṃvā puññakammānaṃvā vasenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:847_16: yo suraṃ pivitvā surāmadahetu pāṇā pātādīsu yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0301n0:847_17: tassa surāpānaṃ tassati kammassa balavūpanissayo hoti pubbacetanāṭhāniyañca.
anya-e0301n0:847_20: Yathā hi pubbāparacetanā yopi kammapathapattassa kammassa parivārabhūtāeva paṭisandhiṃ janenti, na itarā.
anya-e0301n0:847_22: Na hi kammapathasuttesu sarūpato āgatānieva paṭisandhiṃ janenti.
anya-e0301n0:847_27: Tāni tatthasarūpato na vuttānīti sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_28: Tathā hi paṭisambhidā maggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kusalākusalāpica paṭisandhijanakāyeva kammapathāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:847_29: Vuttāvasesā paṭisandhijanane anekanti kattā kammapathāti na vuttāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_30: Tasmā idaṃpi paṭisandhijanane anekantikattā tattha sarūpato na vuttantica.
anya-e0301n0:847_31: Yaṃ tadā sannakammavasena paṭisandhijanakanti pubbe vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:847_32: Taṃ tattha sarūpato vuttesu tadā sannakammesu anupaviṭṭhantica sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:847_33: Tassa pana duvidhaṃ kiccaṃ paṭisandhijananaṃ kammajananañcāti.
anya-e0301n0:847_34: Tattha paṭijananato kammajananamevassa mahantaṃ mahāvipphārañca hotīti katvā sakkena devānamindena kumbhajātake –
anya-e0301n0:852_1: Tadubhayaṃ panassa kiccaṃ gahetvā surāmerayapānaṃ bhikkhave āsevitaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:852_5: Tathāhi mūlaṭīkāyaṃpunabbhavaṃdetipunabbhavāya saṃvattetīti pāṭhe kammasahajātā punabbhavaṃdeti.
anya-e0301n0:852_7: Keci pana imamatthaṃ anupadhāretvā imāya pāḷiyā tassa visuṃ ekantakammapathabhāvaṃ maññanti.
anya-e0301n0:852_8: Yaṃ pana koṭṭhāsato pañcapi kammapathāevāti aṭṭhakathāvākyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:852_9: Tattha evasaddena tesaṃ cetanādhammattā jhānādikoṭṭhāsikattaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0301n0:852_10: Cetanā hi kammapathaṃ pattāpi apattāpi koṭṭhāsato kamma pathakoṭṭhāsikāeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:852_11: Teneva mūlaṭīkāyaṃ kammapathā evāti kammapathakoṭṭhāsikāevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:852_14: Kecipana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā iminā vākyena tassa visuṃ kammapathabhāvaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:853_0: Khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbenasabbaṃ tassa kammapathabhāvo paṭikkhittoyeva,
anya-e0301n0:853_1: tattha hi purimānaṃ catunnaṃ kāyakammādibhāvañca kammapathabhāvañca visuṃ vatvā surāpānaṃpatvā kāyakammamevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:853_6: Tattha hi tatīye surāpānamissakattā pañcakammavasena icceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:853_8: Etāsupica paṭisandhijanane anekanti kattāeva paṭikkhittoti na nasakkā vattuṃ evañhi sati sabbā pāḷiṭṭhakathāṭīkāyo saṃsanditā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:853_9: Kāyakammanti ettha kāyo tividho sasambhārakāyo pasādakāyo copanakāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:853_10: Idha kāyaviññattisaṅkhāto copanakāyo adhippetoti vuttaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhāteti.
anya-e0301n0:853_11: Copanakāyo hi kadāci kāyaṅgena attanoadhippāyaṃ parassa viññā panatthāyapi karīyatīti kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:853_12: So yevaca kammānaṃ pavattimukhattā dvāranti kāyadvāraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:853_13: Tasmiñhi tena tena upakkama kiccena pavattamāneeva jīvitindriyupacchedādikiccasiddhito taṃjana kassa
anya-e0301n0:853_14: cetanādhammassa āyūhana kiccanibbattica kāyakammanāma lābhoca hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:853_16: Etthaca yasmāsabbānipi kammāni pubbaṅgamabhūtena sampayuttamanena vinā nasijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:853_20: Tasmā manodvāraṃ sabbakammasādhāraṇattā kammāni visesetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:853_22: Yasmāca purimāni sattavidhāni kammāni kevalaṃ manomattena nasijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:853_23: Taṃsamuṭṭhitehi pana kāya vacīpayogehi eva sijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:853_24: Tasmā teeva tesaṃ kammānaṃ pavattimukhasaṅkhyaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ kāyadvāreti.
anya-e0301n0:854_0: Yasmā pana kāyadvāre vuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:854_1: Vacīdvāre vuttito vacīkammaṃnāmāti ettakamatte vutte pāṇātipātādīni tīṇi kāyakammaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:854_2: Musāvādādīni cattāri vacīkammaṃnāmāti evaṃ dvārena kammānaṃ nāmavavatthānaṃ asiddhaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:854_3: Yadā hi purimāni dve āṇattivasena appakena vacīdvāre bhijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:854_5: Vacīkammanti saṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyuṃ kasmā vacīdvāre vuttito vacīkammaṃnāmāti vuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:854_8: Yadāpana majjhimāni cattāri hatthamuṭṭhādivasena appakena kāyadvāre sijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:854_15: Micchācāroceti kāyakammaṃnāmāti idaṃ vavatthānameva niratthakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:854_18: Bāhullavuttitoti vuttepana ekamekena bāhullasaddena chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni vajjetvā vuttappakāraṃ dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0301n0:855_0: Manokammāni pana dvārantaresu carantānipi caraṇamattāni eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:855_1: Na dvārantarāni tesaṃ kammasiddhiyā aṅgaṃ honti.
anya-e0301n0:855_3: Yasmā pana kāyadvārassa kāyoti nāmaṃ anekesu suttasahassesu sayameva siddhaṃ pākaṭañca.
anya-e0301n0:855_6: Tasmā sabbattha kāyadvāraṃ vacīdvāraṃ manodvāranti vutte kammena dvārassa vavatthāna kiccaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:855_7: Yattha pana kāyakammadvāraṃ vacīkammadvāraṃ manokammadvāranti āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:855_8: Tattheva dvārakathādīsu kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi visuṃ vattabbaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:857_0: “Kāyakammassaca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ kāyadvāranti vuccatīti”. Taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:859_0: “Tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi nasiyāti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:860_0: Na hi kāyavikārena karīyamānaṃ vacīkammaṃ kāyadvāre pavattamānaṃpi tassa dvārassa nāmaṃ bhindituṃvā attano nāmaṃ dātuṃvā sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:862_2: Tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho.
anya-e0301n0:863_0: Na hi kāyakammadvāranti nāmaṃ idha vuttaṃ atthīti. [Kāyakammaṃ]
anya-e0301n0:864_3: Visati paresaṃ aññamaññasammodabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaggirasaṃ saṃcuṇṇeti paribhindati mithu bhedaṃ karoti etāyāti pisuṇā.
anya-e0301n0:864_4: Attano piyabhāvaṃ paresañca mittasuññabhāvaṃ karoti etāyātivā pisuṇā.
anya-e0301n0:864_9: tassa hadayaṃ pharamānā usati dahatīti pharusā.
anya-e0301n0:864_11: Sādhujanehi adhigantabbaṃ saṃsukhaṃ hitañca phalati visarati vināseti hitasukhamaggaṃ bhindatīti samphaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:864_13: Atthadhammāpagatassa paṭibhāṇacittassa bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇā dikassa vācā vatthumattassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:864_14: Yattha diṭṭhadhammahitabuddhiyāvā samparāyika hitabuddhiyāvā upāyadīpakaṃ kiñci atthadhammavinayapadaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:864_16: Tattha parassavisaṃ vādanapurekkhārena visaṃ vādaka kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā musāvādo.
anya-e0301n0:864_19: Ettha ca kamma pathoti paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggo vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:864_20: Yathā hi rajānaṃ uṭṭhānapadeso rajapathoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:864_21: Tathā loke sandissamānesu sattānaṃ kāyavacīcittābhisaṅkharaṇakiccesuyehi kiccehi paṭisandhijanakāni kammāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0301n0:864_23: Tāni kāyavacīcittā bhisaṅkharaṇakiccāni paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggattā kammapathoti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:864_25: Aṅgasampannāni akusalesu pāṇaghāta kiccādīni kusalesu tabbiramaṇakiccādīni dasavidhāni kiccānīti.
anya-e0301n0:864_26: Kammāniyeva sugatiduggatīnaṃ taduppajjanakasukhadukkhānañca pathabhūtattā kammapathonāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:865_0: Parassa bhedapurekkhārena bhedakakāyagacīpayogasamuṭṭhā pikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā pisuṇāvācā.
anya-e0301n0:865_5: maraṇamattaṃvā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti etasmiṃ ghaṭṭiyamāneti mammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:865_11: Mammacchedakoti jātiādīsu ghaṭṭana vasena pavatto pharusa kāyavacī payogo.
anya-e0301n0:865_12: Aya mattho sīlakkhandha ṭīkā vasena veditabbo. Athavā.
anya-e0301n0:865_19: Yathā pana paraṃ akkositvā khamāpentassa khamāpanakammaṃ parassa dūre ṭhitassapi matassapi sampajjati.
anya-e0301n0:865_21: Akkosādhippāyena caṇḍā mahiṃsī taṃ anubandhatūtivā corā taṃ khaṇḍā khaṇḍikaṃ karontūtivā muddhā te phalatu
anya-e0301n0:865_22: sattadhātivā evamādinā nayena paraṃ abhisapantassapi kammapathabhedo hotiyevātica vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:866_1: Sopi bhāratayuddha sītāharaṇādikesu paṭibhāṇacittesu vācāvatthumattesueva kammapathabhedo.
anya-e0301n0:866_2: Socakho pare taṃ anatthaṃ saccato gaṇhanteyeva.
anya-e0301n0:866_4: Tathā rājakathādīsu dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathāpabhedesupi kammameva.
anya-e0301n0:866_6: Atthadhammavinayanissitaṃ katvā kathentassa pana sabbaṃpi satthakameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:866_8: Sā catubbidhā saddavācā virativācā cetanāvācā copanavācāti.
anya-e0301n0:866_9: Idha pana saddasahitā vacīviññattisaṅkhātā copana vācā adhippetāti vuttaṃ vacīviññattisaṅkhāteti.
anya-e0301n0:866_10: Copanavācā hi kadāci vācaṅgena attano adhippāyaṃ parassa viññāpanatthāyapi karīyatīti vacīviññattīti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:866_11: Sāyevaca kammānaṃ pavatti mukhattā dvāranti vacīdvāraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:866_12: Tāya hi taṃtaṃvacīpayogakiccena pavattamānāya eva visaṃvādanādikiccasiddhito taṃsamuṭṭhāpakassa cetanādhammassa
anya-e0301n0:867_1: Abhijjhāyanti assādamatte aṭṭhatvā parabhaṇḍassa attano pariṇāmanavasena atirekataraṃ jhāyanti nijjhāyanti etāyāti abhijjhā.
anya-e0301n0:867_2: Byāpādenti parasatte vināsaṃ āpanne katvā cintenti etenāti byāpādo.
anya-e0301n0:867_4: Atthidinnantiādinayapavattaṃ sabbaṃ sappurisa maggaṃ sappurisapaññattaṃ bhinditvā natthi dinnantiādinayena
anya-e0301n0:867_6: Tattha parasantakaṃ disvā kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanarajjanamattesu aṭṭhatvā ahovata idaṃ mamassāti evaṃ
anya-e0301n0:867_7: attano katvā cittena pariṇāmentasseva abhijjhākammapathabhedo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:867_12: Aññaṃvā īdisaṃ labheyyanti evaṃ assādentassa kammameva.
anya-e0301n0:867_13: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:867_14: Yāva na ahovata idaṃ mamassāti attano pariṇāmetīti.
anya-e0301n0:867_15: Antamaso ḍaṃsamakasādikepi ārabbha ime nassantu vinassantu.
anya-e0301n0:867_18: Kadāvā nassanti vinassantīti evaṃ para sattassa khandhajīvavināsaṃ cintentasseva byāpādo.
anya-e0301n0:867_20: Vuttañhetaṃ parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:867_21: Yāva na ahovatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vināseyyāti tassa vināsaṃ cintetīti.
anya-e0301n0:867_22: Kammassavā kammavipākassavā sabbaso paṭibāhikā natthikāhe tukākriyavasena tividhā niyata micchādiṭṭhieva kammapathabhedo.
anya-e0301n0:867_24: Sabbaññudesanaṃ paṭibāhitvā pavattā ariṭṭhakaṇṭakādīnaṃ diṭṭhiyopi kammapathāevāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:868_0: Niyatāti cettha yathā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni yattakaṃ passitvā saddhādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa cittuppādo
anya-e0301n0:868_2: Tattakaṃ passanto kusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ okkamatīti vutto.
anya-e0301n0:868_3: Tathādiṭṭhiṭṭhā nāni kāraṇa paṭirūpakāni yattakaṃ passitvā micchādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa
anya-e0301n0:868_5: Tattakaṃ passitvā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto akusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ okkamati,
anya-e0301n0:868_7: Tathā pana apassitvā kevalaṃ micchādhimokkhamattena evameva bhavissatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sakaṃ ācariyakaṃ
anya-e0301n0:868_8: samayaṃ paggaṇhitvā ṭhito atekicchonāma nahoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:868_11: Tattha hi phaladāna niyamavaseneva ubhinnaṃpi sammattamicchattadhammānaṃ niyatasaññāpaṭilābho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:868_12: Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanāsu pana gahaṇaniyamavasenāpi tassā niyatabhāvo vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_3: Imāni hi tīṇi kammāni yadā kāyaṅgavā caṅgāni acopetvā manasmiṃeva sijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:869_5: Yadā pana tāni copetvā kāyavacīdvāresu sijjhanti,
anya-e0301n0:869_7: Etena imesaṃ tīsupi dvāresu pavattiṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0301n0:869_9: Kāyavacīdvāresu pana appakameva pavattantīti vuttaṃ manasmiṃyevabāhullavuttitoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_10: Tattha manasmiṃ yevāti kusalā kusalajavanacittasaṅkhāte manodvāreeva.
anya-e0301n0:869_11: Etena purimesupi kāyadvāre vacīdvāreti padesu evasaddasambhavo dīpito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_12: Evañhi sati tatthapi dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upapannaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:869_14: idha evasaddena ayaṃpi visesattho dīpito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_15: Pāṇavadhādīsu hi vadhāmi naṃ avaharāmi na ntiādinā saṃvidhānākārena pavattā cetayitakriyāeva padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:869_17: Tasmā tesu kāya vacī payogā kammasiddhiyā ekaṃ aṅgaṃ honti.
anya-e0301n0:869_18: Taṃ sahajātāca abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikāeva hutvā abbohārikattaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:869_19: Parabhaṇḍā bhijjhāyanādīsu pana abhijjhādīnaṃ attapadhānānaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu pavattānaṃpi kāya vacīpayogākammasiddhiyā aṅgameva nahonti.
anya-e0301n0:869_21: Iti imesu kammesu kāya vacīdvārānaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ aṅgabhāvapaṭikkhipanatthaṃ manasmiṃ yevāti eva gahaṇaṃ idheva katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:869_22: Tesu pana dvāresu pavattimatta sabbhāvaṃ sandhāya bāhullasaddopi idha gahitoti.
anya-e0301n0:872_0: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttāpi kevalaṃ manokamma kiccavisesena pavattamānā abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā honti.
anya-e0301n0:873_1: Ettha ca dasannaṃpi imesaṃ kammapathānaṃ pubbāparacetanāyo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane anekantikapakkhaṃ gatāti paṭisambhidā maggaṭīkāyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:873_2: Tasmā tāpi imaṃ sattaṃ māressāmi imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyissāmītiādinā nayena ādito paṭṭhāya pavattā balavapaccaye laddhā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhanti.
anya-e0301n0:873_4: Yāni pana kusalākusalāni kammapathabhedaṃ appattāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:873_14: Dvīhi mūlehīti kadāci dosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:873_15: Moho pana sabbasādhāraṇattā visesakaro na hotīti idha na gahito.
anya-e0301n0:875_0: “Nidhipāṭhakapamāṇato duṭṭhaniggahatthaṃ parasantakaṃ harantānaṃ rājūnaṃ brāhmaṇānañca sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:875_2: Attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantīti evamādīni vatvā sakasaññāya eva yaṃkiñci harantānaṃ kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:876_1: Tesañca tathāharantānaṃ haraṇaṃ haraṇakāle kadācidosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi eva sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:876_2: Yo pana moho mahāsammatādīnaṃdhammikarājūnaṃ kāle pavattaṃ porāṇaka nidhisatthaṃ thapetvā pacchā adhammikānaṃrājūnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_3: kāle pavattesu yebhuyyena adhammikesu dhammasattha rājasattha saṅkhātesu nidhipāṭhesu dhammikasaññīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_5: Yoca rājūnaṃ abhisekakāle dinnaññevasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃtiṇakaṭṭhodakanti vacanaṃ upādāya sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:876_6: rājūhi dinnanti evaṃ saññīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ uppanno.
anya-e0301n0:876_7: Yoca natthi sukata dukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti evaṃ diṭṭhikānaṃ kammaphalasambandhā pavādīnaṃ uppanno.
anya-e0301n0:876_12: Moho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyāti vacanato sabbepi akusalakamma pathāti mūlakāeva idha vattabbā siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:876_14: kammesuca kammaphalesuca sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ janānaṃ kaṅkhā pariyuṭṭhāna cittenasahevatadanurūpāniadinnādānādīni
anya-e0301n0:876_15: cattārikammāni karontānaṃ tāni kammāni suddhena mohamūlena jāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:876_16: Evañhi sati parato vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhijanakesu gahaṇaṃpi upapannaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:877_1: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃpi kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāya kammanti ettha dve pariyāyā veditabbā. Kathaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:877_2: vakkhamānesu hi puññakriyavatthūsu yaṃkiñci puññakriyavatthuṃ kāyaṅgaṃ copetvā pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:877_4: Kāyaṅga vācaṅgāni acopetvā manodvāreeva pavattitaṃ manokammaṃ nāmāti ayameko pariyāyo.
anya-e0301n0:877_5: Ayaṃ pana mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva raho ca.
anya-e0301n0:877_6: Mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahoca.
anya-e0301n0:877_7: Mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahocātica.
anya-e0301n0:880_2: Tattha hi dānamayaṃpi kāyavacī manokammavasena tidhā vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:880_4: Yasmiṃ pana dussilye pavattamāne kāyo aparisuddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:880_6: Yaṃ pana kusalaṃ pavattamānaṃ tadaṅgapahānādivasena taṃ dussilyaṃ pajahitvā kāyadvāraṃ sodhayamānaṃ kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:880_7: Taṃ kāyacopana rahitaṃpi kāyaṅga saṃvaraṇa kiccattā kiccasīsena kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:880_9: Etthaca taṃ dussilyaṃ pajahitvāti yasmiṃ citte uppajjamāne pāṇaghātādikaṃ kāyadussilyaṃ uppajjeyya.
anya-e0301n0:880_10: Tassa cittassa uppajjituṃ appadānavasena taṃ kāyadussilyaṃ pajahitvā.
anya-e0301n0:880_11: Kāyadvāraṃ sodha yamānanti yasmiṃ dussilye uppajjamāne kāyaṅgaṃ asuddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:880_13: Kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānanti sayaṃ kāyaṅgasaṃvaraṇakiccasampādanena kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrentanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:880_15: Avayesaṃ pana sabbaṃpi kalyāṇakammaṃ tīsu dvāresu pavattaṃpi manodvāraṃeva sodhayamānaṃ manosaṃvaraṃeva
anya-e0301n0:880_19: Ayaṃ pana anekasatesu kammapathasuttesu āgato. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:880_21: Imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu sattusāsane kalyāṇadhammapūraṇaṃnāma yāvadeva pāpadhammapahānatthāya eva hotīti pacchimoyeva padhānanti veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:880_25: Kāya vacīkammāni sāvajjāni nīvāretvā anavajjāni susamāhitāni katvā sammādahati thapeti,
anya-e0301n0:880_29: Adhikusaladhamme anuppannevā uppādenti uppannevā vaḍḍhentīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:880_31: Pūjenti kāyavācāhi attānaṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassentīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:881_0: Visesena āvaranti ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti byāvaṭānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃvā veyyāvaccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:881_13: atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākotiādinā dasavatthukaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karonti etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:881_14: Sabbāni pana tāni punenti cittasantānaṃ sodhenti etehīti puññāni.
anya-e0301n0:881_18: Ettha ekamekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti purimaṃ majjhimaṃ pacchimanti.
anya-e0301n0:881_19: Tattha dāne tāva paṭiggāhakassa pariccāgakaraṇaṃ majjhimaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:881_20: Tato pubbe iminā paccayena dānamayaṃ puññaṃ pavattayissāmīti evaṃ paccayuppādanato paṭṭhāya dānaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0301n0:881_21: dānaṃ uddissa tīsu dvāresu pavattā kusalacetanā purimaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:881_22: Pacchā bhāge pana attanā dinnadānaṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ attamanacittaṃ uppādentassa pavattā kusalacetanā pacchimaṃnāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:881_23: Sabbaṃpi cetaṃ akusale vuttanayena balavapaccaye laddhā paṭisandhiṃ deti.
anya-e0301n0:882_1: Tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāyavā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:882_6: Kattabbame vidanti ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:882_12: Sabbasattavimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ pāramitādānaṃ paṇītanti ayamattho visuddhimagge sīlaniddesaṃ nissāya veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:882_14: evaṃ sesesupiyathā sambhavaṃ tikadvayaṃ vibhajitvā vattabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:882_19: Tattha purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ samādānakiccaṃ kammavācāya siddhaṃhoti.
anya-e0301n0:882_20: Antimavatthuajjhāpannenavā sikkhāpaccakkhānenavā kammavācāya bhinnāya sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:882_22: Tadā bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ avijahitvā ṭhito dussīlonāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:882_23: Thapetvāpana antimavatthuṃ aññasikkhā padāni vītikkamantassa yaṃ vītikkamati.
anya-e0301n0:882_26: Na hi taṃ puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:882_27: Paṭikammaṃ karontassa pana saṃvaro pākatiko hoti.
anya-e0301n0:882_28: Sañcicca vītikkamantovā paṭikammaṃ akarontovā alajjīnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:882_32: Liṅganāsanaṅgaṃ katvā saraṇagamane bhinne sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0301n0:883_0: Gahaṭṭhasīle pana pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇavaseneva samādānaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:883_4: Visuṃ visuṃ gaṇhante pana yaṃ vītikkamati,
anya-e0301n0:883_7: Paricchinnakālā tikkamane pana sabbaṃ samādānaṃ vūpasammatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:883_8: Dussīlabhāvo panettha pañcannaṃ niccasīlānaṃ bhedena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:883_16: Tattha bhikkhu bhāve ṭhitassa bhikkhusīlaṃ sāmaṇerabhāve ṭhitassa sāmaṇerasīlaṃ pakatigahaṭṭhānaṃpañcasīlaṃ
anya-e0301n0:883_18: Tesañhi taṃ taṃ yathāsakaṃ sīlaṃ niccaṃ suddhaṃ katvā rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati.
anya-e0301n0:883_19: Arakkhantānaṃ bhikkhubhāvādiko sāvajjo hoti asuddho. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:883_26: Gihinivatthaṃ pahāya kāsāyavatthadhāraṇena pabbajitasaṅkhepagatānaṃ eva niccasīlaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:883_27: Yathā hi pakatimanussānaṃ pañcasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati.
anya-e0301n0:883_29: Tathā pabbajitavesadhārīnaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati.
anya-e0301n0:884_0: Upari vuccamānā samathavipassanāvasena duvidhā bhāvanā bhāvanānāma.
anya-e0301n0:884_2: Dhammavinayapari yattiyā saha anavajjakammasippavijjāṭhānesu paricayakaraṇa cetanāpi ettheva saṅgayhati.
anya-e0301n0:884_3: Ratanattaye pana mātāpitūsu kulejeṭṭhesu ācariyesu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu aññesuca guṇavayavuddhesu
anya-e0301n0:884_4: yathārahaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ vandanaṃ añjalikaraṇaṃ sāmicikaraṇaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇanti evamādisabbaṃ apacāyanaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:884_5: Tesaññeva aññesañca āgantukagamikaaddhikānaṃ gilānānaṃ jiṇṇānaṃ kicca karaṇīyesu sabrahmacārīnaṃ cīvarakammādīsu
anya-e0301n0:884_6: paresaṃ taṃtaṃpuñña kammesuca parisuddhena hitapharaṇacittena attanokiccesu viya kāyavācāhi vāyāmakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n0:884_8: Attanā katassa yassakassaci puññassa parehi sādhāraṇakaraṇaṃ pattidānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:884_9: Parehi dinnāya pattiyā anumodanaṃ attamanatāpavedanaṃ pattā numodanaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:884_10: Adinnassa puññassa anumodanaṃ pana anumodanameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:884_14: Tattha attānaṃ uddisikaṃ anumodantasseva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:884_15: Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ dānapuññesueva visesato pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:884_16: Tañhi uddisakaṃ katvā devatānaṃvā paradattupajīvipetānaṃvā vemānikapetānaṃvā vinipātikāsurānaṃvā dinnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:884_17: anumoditañca tesaṃ taṅkhaṇeeva diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyaṃ jātanti.
anya-e0301n0:884_18: Atthahita paṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya yoniso manasikāre ṭhatvā savanañca kathanañca dhammasavanaṃ dhamma desanācanāma.
anya-e0301n0:885_0: Natthi dinnaṃ natthiyiṭṭhantiādinayapavattāya dasavatthukāya micchā diṭṭhiyāvā issaranimmānādidiṭṭhiyāvā
anya-e0301n0:885_1: diṭṭhamaṅgalādidiṭṭhiyāvā visuddhaṃ katvā tehi tehi vatthūhivā yuttīhivā kāraṇehivā kammasakatā ñāṇasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0301n0:885_13: Diṭṭhujukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyama lakkhaṇantiti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:885_14: Satiyeva hi kammasakatāñāṇe dānādīni tīṇi sampajjantīti.
anya-e0301n0:887_0: “Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattā bhāvena kāya dvārādīsu appavattanatoti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:888_0: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakaṃ abhiññākusalaṃ kāyadvārādīsu pavattamānaṃpi kāyavacīkammasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0301n0:888_3: Kevalaṃ bhāvanākammavisesattā tañca mahaggata kusalaṃ bhāvanākamma meva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:888_4: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidā magge pathamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:888_13: Appanāpattanti bhāvanā balena ārammaṇe anupavisitvā acalaṭṭhitibhāvena pavattanato appanāpattaṃ kammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:890_0: “Pubbabhāgapavattānaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvatoti” kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:891_0: Na hi tesaṃ kāmāvacaratāmattaṃ appanāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:892_6: Dhammasaṅgahe dassanena pahātabbesu taṃ avatvā bhāvanāya pahātabbesu eva vuttattā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:892_11: sesā pana cattāro diṭṭhigatavippayuttacittuppādā dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādāca siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbāti tattha vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:892_15: Paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbadhammesueva nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayassa uddhaṭattā itarattha tassa anuddhaṭattāti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:892_16: sahajātā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayenapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:892_17: Nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattāca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayotica
anya-e0301n0:892_18: sahajātā bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanāsampayuttakānaṃdhammānaṃ cittāsamuṭṭhānānañcarūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
anya-e0301n0:892_20: Naca nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayasattiyā vinā vipākuppādanaṃnāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:892_21: Yadievaṃ sā pavattivipākaṃpi najanetīti sakkā vattuntice.Na.
anya-e0301n0:892_24: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃvā.La.
anya-e0301n0:894_1: Adhimokkhasampayogena tato balavantaṃpi uddhaccasahagataṃ nākaḍḍhatīti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:895_0: Na hi adhimokkhavirahamattena vicikicchāsahagataṃ sabbadubbalantica adhimokkhasampayogamattena uddhaccasahagataṃ tato balavantantica sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:895_1: Satthari kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatīti evamādinā nayena vuttāya vicikicchāya attano visaye mahāhatthināgassa
anya-e0301n0:895_3: Tathā hisā ekantena dassanenapahātabbesu padhānabhāvena vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:895_5: Sabhāvaviruddhattāyeva pana vicikicchāsahagataṃ adhimokkharahitaṃ hotīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:895_10: Sabbaṃpivādvādasavidhaṃ akusalakammaṃ sattā kusalapākāni hutvā vipaccati,
anya-e0301n0:896_0: Yasmā kusalakammāni apāyabhūmiyaṃpi pavattiyaṃ mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā mahiddhikānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:896_1: santāne sayameva attanovipākassa okāsaṃ katvā sukhavipākaṃ janayanti.
anya-e0301n0:896_2: Aññesaṃpi āpāyikānaṃ tena tena kāraṇena iṭṭhārammaṇa samāyoge sati attano vipākassa okāsaṃ labhitvā sukhavipākaṃ janayanti.
anya-e0301n0:896_4: Na hi tāni sukhavipākāni akusakammassa vipākāni bhavituṃ arahanti.
anya-e0301n0:896_6: yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyyātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:896_7: Tattha mahāvipākāni sugati kāmaloke ahetukāni aṭṭhapi sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke tesuca pañcacakkhuviññāṇa sotaviññāṇa
anya-e0301n0:896_8: sampaṭicchana santīraṇa yugaḷāni rūpaloke vipaccatīti vuttaṃ yathārahaṃ vipaccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:896_9: Rūpāvacara kusalañhi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpāni janayantaṃpi sayaṃ vipaccamānaṃ ārammaṇantare aññabhūmika vipākabhāvena navipaccati.
anya-e0301n0:896_10: Kāmavirāgabhāvanābhāvena pana appanāpatta kamma visesattā kāmataṇhāya avisayabhūte nimittā rammaṇe attanā
