anya-e0301n0:1049_47: Dūre ṭhitānaṃ pana paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso mandataro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1049_53: saddonāma nissayadhātuparaṃparāya pavattitvā dūraṃpi desaṃ gacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1049_54: Evaṃ gacchantoca gatagataṭṭhāneeva ṭhatvā savanūpacāre ṭhitānaṃ sotasahassaṃpi ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0301n0:1049_55: Mahante pana cetiyādike antarite sati yato ākāso ujuṃ vivaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1049_58: Evaṃ gacchantoca yāva sotapasāde allīyitvā nuppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1049_64: Yathā anto kucchigato gandho bahi naghāyiyati.
anya-e0301n0:1049_65: Tathā anto kucchigato saddopi bahi nasuyeyya.
anya-e0301n0:1051_3: tassa so gocaro siyā.” Tipi vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1052_0: Na hi cakkhādidvayassa bahiddhā visayadesagamanasaṅgo atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1052_2: Pasāda maṇḍabhūtattā āpātamāgataṃ ārammaṇanimittaṃ sampaṭicchatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1054_0: Viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā taṃtaṃ gocaragahaṇa sabhāvattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1055_3: Ṭhānato desato uppattikāraṇato visuṃvisuṃ vavatthapīyatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1055_6: Ācariyānandattherenapanettha gandharasaojā katthaci vinībhuttā dissantīti pañcavidhameva avinibbhogarūpaṃ icchitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1056_2: Sāyeva hi paṭṭhāne nānākkhaṇika kammapaccayabhāvena vuttā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1056_3: nānākkhaṇikā kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattāca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0301n0:1056_6: hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetu paccayena paccayotiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1056_8: So hi kappasaṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ okāsa lokaṃpi nānāsarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena saka laṃ rūpamayaṃ kāyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1056_9: sattalokaṃpi nānārukkhatiṇādīnaṃ abbhapaṭalameghavuṭṭhijalaaggi vātādīnañca saṇṭhāpanavasena sakalaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1056_14: Rūpavirāgabhāvanābhūtaṃ arūpakusalaṃ kammajarūpaṃ najanetīti vuttaṃ pañcavīsatividhaṃpīti.
anya-e0301n0:1056_15: Atisaṅkhatanti atītakāle yathākā lantare rūpaṃ janeti,
anya-e0301n0:1056_19: Ajjhatta meva ajjhattikantivā ikasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1056_21: Khaṇekhaṇeti ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu.
anya-e0301n0:1056_22: Ācariyānandatthero pana sabbesaṃpi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ ekekassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva uppādaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva nirodhañca āha.
anya-e0301n0:1057_0: Yassavā pana samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n0:1058_0: Tathā tāni cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeeva nirujjhanti. Na uppādakkhaṇe. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1059_0: Yassa kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, tassa abyākatā dhammā nirujjhantīti. Noti.
anya-e0301n0:1061_2: Arūpe taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:1061_4: Pañcavokāre taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nirujjhati,
anya-e0301n0:1063_0: Arūpe kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1063_2: Pañcavokāre kusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ kusalā dhammāca uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1064_2: Tasmā nayidaṃ arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1064_3: Cittajarūpaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce. Tampi na.
anya-e0301n0:1065_2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1065_3: Noca tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1066_0: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca nauppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1067_0: Ettha hi asaññasattānanti etena rūpajīvitindriya meva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1067_2: purimakoṭṭhāse pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:1067_4: pacchimakoṭṭhāseca sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ icceva vuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_5: Pacchimakoṭṭhāse pana arūpa jīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n0:1067_6: Tathā gahaṇatthaṃ yamaka pāṭhantarābhāvato sabbaññuvisayeca ṭhāne pāḷiyo saṃsanditvā balavatiyā pāḷiyuttiyāeva ṭhātabbatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_8: Arūpadhammā lahupavattino ṭhitikkhaṇoca tesaṃ visuṃ gaṇanūpago natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1067_11: Tattha sabbepi rūpadhammā ekacittakkhaṇaparimāṇena attano uppādakkhaṇena yuttā khaṇe khaṇe nirantarameva uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_12: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya sahuppannattāca pana dvinnaṃ tesaṃ uppādādivā nirodhantovā yāvajīvaṃpisaheva hotītipi tassa adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_18: Yadidaṃ yathālābhayojanāti katvā attano adhippāye ṭhatvā diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yamakapāṭhaṃ yathālābhayo janāyaeva sakkā yojetunti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_19: Rūpavirāgabhāvanāvisesabhūtaṃ arūpakusalaṃ tasmiṃ loke rūpasahitaṃ paṭisandhiṃ najaneti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_21: Tasmā rūpasantatisīsassa sabbaso abhāvā tatruppannāni sabbāni chacattālīsacittāni rūpaṃ janetuṃ na na sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1067_22: Arūpavipākā pana tattheva niyamuppannāti arūpapākasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1067_24: aññānipi bahūni āruppe uppannāni anokāsatthā rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpentīti vuttaṃ tattha anokāsatānāma ādito
anya-e0301n0:1067_25: paṭṭhāya uppannassa rūpasantatisīsassa abhāvo eva daṭṭhabboti.
anya-e0301n0:1069_0: “Rūpavirāgabhāvanānibbattattā hetuno tabbidhuratāyā”tipi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1070_1: Jhānaṅgavirahena aṅgadubbalānipi rūpaṃ na janentīti dvipañcaviññāṇagahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1070_2: Itarā nipi pana pannarasakāmarūpa paṭisandhicittāni khīṇāsavānaṃ parinibbānacuti cittanti imāni cittāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1070_3: Evaṃsantepi tāni sabbānipi bhavaṅgakāle akhīṇāsavānañca cutikāle samuṭṭhāpentīti tesaṃ idha agahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1072_0: Paṭisandhicittaṃ pana cuticittañca ekūnavīsati bhavaṅgasseva antogadhattā cittantaraṃ na hotīti na tassa vajjanaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1073_1: Kasmā pana yathā vuttāni pannarasa paṭisandhicittāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentīti,
anya-e0301n0:1073_3: Cittañhināma uppādakkhaṇeeva paripuṇṇaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā balavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1074_0: Tasmā attano balavantakkhaṇe uppajjamānabhāvena dubbalaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya uppannattā sayaṃpi paridubbalaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1074_1: hotīti sabbānipi tāni tadā rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhā pentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1074_2: Etthaca keci anantarāsevanādipaccayā cittassa uppādakkhaṇeeva pharanti.
anya-e0301n0:1074_3: Rūpassa pana upatthambhakabhūtā utuāhārā pacchājātapaccayadhammāca ṭhitikkhaṇeevapharantīti tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1076_0: “Pacchājāta paccayarahitaṃ pana āhārādīhica anupatthaddhaṃ dubbalavatthuṃ nissāya pavattattā attanoca
anya-e0301n0:1076_1: āgantukatāya kammajarūpehica cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1076_2: Tattha pacchājāta paccaya rahitanti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1077_0: Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe pacchājāta paccaya rahitassa piutussa rūpajanakabhāvassa vakkhamānattā.
anya-e0301n0:1077_1: Na hi attanā avijjamānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ purimacittakkhaṇe ṭhitassa kassaci rūpassa pacchājāta paccayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1077_3: Khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ pana pakatiyāva vūpasantavaṭṭamūle santāne pavattattā santataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1077_4: Puna āyusaṅkhārānaṃ parikkhayena dubbalatare pariyantagate ca vatthumhi nissitattā dubbalatarañca hotīti taṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti,
anya-e0301n0:1077_5: ācariyānandatthero pana sabbasattānaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti icchati. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1078_0: Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati.
anya-e0301n0:1078_1: Rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ yeca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1079_0: Pana vacanato aññesaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1079_1: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpaka cittassa gabbhagamanādi vinibaddhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0301n0:1079_2: na ca yuttaṃ cutoca cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1079_3: Nāpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti pāḷi atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1081_0: Tasmiṃ pāṭhe tesaṃ cavantānaṃ noca kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti vacanaṃ na kevalaṃ cuticittasseva rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0301n0:1081_1: athakho tato purimānaṃ sabbesaṃ maraṇāsanna cittānaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpanābhāvaṃpi sādhetiyevāti dīpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1081_2: Cuti cittasmiṃhi kāyasaṅkhārassa nirodhe paṭisiddhe tato pubbe yāva sattarasamacittā etthantare tassa uppādopi paṭisiddhoeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1082_1: Soca suṭṭhu oḷāriko rūpadhammoti nacuticitte tannirodhābhāva vacanena itarāni sukhumānipi rūpāni cuticittaṃ najanetīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1084_0: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagamanādi vinibaddhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1085_0: Tānieva hi gabbhagamanādīni imassatthassa sādhakāni bhavituṃ arahanti oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa asamuṭṭhāpakaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1087_0: Na ca yuttaṃ cutoca cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa pavattatīti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi akāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1088_0: Na hi cutito paraṃ katipayakhaṇamattaṃ cittajarūpapavattiyā koci virodho atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1090_0: Nāpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti pāḷi atthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1090_2: aññatra kāyasaṅkhārāti na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1091_1: yathā rūpadhammā ādito paṭisandhikāle ekacittakkhaṇamatte paccayaparittatāyavā attano dandhavutti tāyavā dubbalā honti,
anya-e0301n0:1091_2: tathā pariyosānepi maraṇakāle parikkhīyamānapaccayatāyavā nirodhāsannatāyavā paridubbalāeva hontīti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1091_3: Tasmā vatthussa ādiantanissitāni paṭisandhicuticittāni samadubbalānieva hontīti sakkā viññātunti.
anya-e0301n0:1093_0: Abhidhammatthavikāsaniyañca pāḷivirodhaṃ maññamāno kiñcimattampi avicāretvā ṭīkāsu vuttanayameva suṭṭhu vikāsayitvā gatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1097_0: Na hi aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ calanaphandanamattaṃpi viññattiyā vinā sijjhati.
anya-e0301n0:1097_2: Naca yathāvuttaṃ appanājavanaṃ viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ sakkotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1097_3: Pi saddena taṃ nakevalaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakamattaṃti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1097_5: vakkhamānehi cittehi abhisaṅkhataṃ yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ apatamānaṃ acalamānaṃ dhāreti upatthambhetīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1097_9: Etthaca yathānisinnassavā ṭhitassavā bhavaṅga citte abbokiṇṇe pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti patanti.
anya-e0301n0:1097_10: Na tathā imasmiṃ chabbīsatividhe jāgaraṇacitte vakkhamānesucadvattiṃsa vidhesu jāgaraṇacittesupavattamānesu.
anya-e0301n0:1097_11: Tesu pana pavattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1099_0: “Na eva metesu dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsati yā jāgaraṇacittesu pavattamānesū”ti pāṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1100_0: Na evametesu chabbīsatiyā jāgaraṇacittesu vakkhamāne suca dvattiṃsa vidhesu pavattamānesūti pana pāṭho yutto.
anya-e0301n0:1100_2: Na hi pañcadvārikāni javana cittānipi viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpenti.
anya-e0301n0:1100_3: Iriyāpathupatthambhana mattaṃ vā pisaddena gahithaṃ sandhāya voṭṭhabbanādīni pañcadvārikānipi gahitāniti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1100_4: Etthaca iriyāpathonāma gamanādinā tena tena avatthāvisesena pavattā rūpadhammāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1100_5: Evaṃ santepi kiñcicittaṃ rūpa sāmaññameva janeti na tatoparaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1100_6: Kiñci aññacittassa vasena yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ rakkhituṃeva sakkoti,
anya-e0301n0:1100_8: Kiñci viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā appavattañca iriyāpathaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1100_9: Aññānica kāyika vācasika vikārāni janetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1100_11: Tāni heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimaṃ kiccaṃ janetuṃ sakkontiyevāti dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1102_2: Iriyā pathassa viññattiyā saha avinābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1103_3: Somanassajavanāni terasāti hasituppādena saddhiṃ lobhamūlato mahā kusalato mahā kriyato ca cattāricattārīti terasa somanassajavanāni.
anya-e0301n0:1103_7: Sabbaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattanti vacanato vicāraṇakiccarahito hasituppādo
anya-e0301n0:1103_8: sabbaññubuddhānaṃ nasambhavatīti evaṃ pavatto vādo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1103_9: Tasmiṃvāde hi sati itaresaṃpi ahetukacittānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttamahā kriyajavanānañca buddhānaṃ asambhavo āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1103_10: Tasmā tesaṃ hasituppādacittena pavattassa sitakammassa pubbāparapavattānaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇapubbaṅgamatā ñāṇānuparivattatā ca veditabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:1103_11: Sītuṇhotu samaññātāti idaṃ sītaṃ idaṃ uṇhanti evaṃ sabba lokiyamahājanehi suṭṭhu paricchinditvā ñātā.
anya-e0301n0:1103_13: Na pana cittamiva jāyanta mattāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1105_0: “Pacchājātādipaccayupatthambhalābhena ṭhitikkhaṇeeva utuojānaṃ balavabhāvoti vuttaṃ tejodhātu ṭhitippattātiādi”.
anya-e0301n0:1106_1: yadi utuno balavabhāvo rūpuppādanañca pacchājātapaccayāyattaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1106_2: Evaṃ sati so paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeyya,
anya-e0301n0:1106_7: Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāroti kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidho ajjhattasantāna gatoasitapītakhāyitasāyitavasena catubbidho,
anya-e0301n0:1106_9: Tadubhayāpica saṃsagga vasena laddhupatthambhā evarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentīti vuttaṃ ajjhoharaṇa kāleti.
anya-e0301n0:1106_10: Etthaca bahiddhāsambhūtena utunā saha ajjhatta sambhūtānaṃ catusamuṭṭhānānaṃ utuojānaṃ viya bahiddhāsambhūtāya
anya-e0301n0:1108_0: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe thapitamatto eva aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1108_1: Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhoharīyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_0: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana yadi bahiddhasambhūtā ojā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya,
anya-e0301n0:1109_1: evaṃ sati yathā bahiddhasambhūto utu ajjhattañca bahiddhāca rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_4: Tasmā sā ajjhattaṃ patvāpi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhā petiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1109_6: Sā pana tassā upatthambhanapaccayoeva hotīti adhippāyena mukhe thapitamattoeva.
anya-e0301n0:1109_9: kenāha aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetīti majjhimaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1109_10: Yasmā pana upādinnakā utu ojānāma suṭṭhu paṇītarūpā honti,
anya-e0301n0:1109_11: tasmā bahiddhā ojāpi ajjhattaṃ patvā tena utunā suṭṭhu sediyamānā tāyaca ojāya suṭṭhu upatthambhīya mānā
anya-e0301n0:1109_13: Ajjhoharaṇakāleti idañca suṭṭhu balavabhāvappatta kālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1109_14: Visuddhimagge pana mātarā paribhuttāhāropi dārakassa sararaṃ pharitvā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_15: Sarīre makkhitāhā ropi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1109_16: Mukhe thapitamattoeva aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpetītica pubbe vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_18: Etthaca catūsu samuṭṭhānesu utueva mahanto mahāthāmo mahāvipphāroca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_19: So hi sakalassapi okāsalokassa bahiddhā saṅkhāralokassaca samuṭṭhā pako vināsako ca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1109_21: Itarāni pana tīṇi tassa parivāramattānieva sampajjantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_2: Yadievaṃ vippasannāni kho te āvuso sāriputta indriyāni.
anya-e0301n0:1110_3: Katarena tvaṃ etarahi vihārena viharasīti kasmā vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_4: Indriyasambhārānaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ samāpatti cittasamuṭṭhitānaṃ visadavippasannatāvasena upacari tattāti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_5: Tathā hi ekābaddhapavattāni catujarūpāni ekasmiṃ vippasanne sabbāni vippasannāneva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_7: Utucittāhārā pana tesaṃ navannaṃ upatthambhanapaccayā hontīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1110_8: Ettha ca uppalapadumāni viya kammajarūpāni daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0301n0:1110_12: Tathā hi taṃ cittasahabhū cittānuparivattidhammesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_14: Nanunidhikaṇḍasutte suvaṇṇatā susaratā susaṇṭhānaṃ surūpatātiādinā tādisena kammavisesena saddasampattināma vuttāti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1110_15: kammavisesena pana yathā suvisado sumadhuro saddo pavattati,
anya-e0301n0:1110_16: tathā ṭhānakaraṇagatānaṃ upādinnakasarīrānaṃ susaṇṭhitatā vāta semhādīhi apalibuddhatāca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1110_17: Tasmā tammūlikāsaddasampatti kammaphalesu pakkhipitvā susaratāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1111_4: Tathā hi dandhattādi kara dhātukkhota paṭipakkhapaccaya samuṭṭhānatā etassa vuttāti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:1111_5: kammajarūpānināma udake pakkhittāni satapākatelāni viya pakatiyāva kammānurūpaṃ lahu mudu kammañña bhūtāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_6: Tasmā tesaṃ visuṃ lahutādi vikāronāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1111_7: Yato tesaṃ ekasmiṃbhave ekāaddhā paccuppannatāva labbhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_8: Evañca katvā yamakesupi tesaṃ kālabhedo paṭisandhivutiparicchinnena addhā paccuppanneneva gahitoti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_9: Yasmā pana cittaṃnāma nānānīvaraṇabhedavasenavā sukha dukkha pīti passaddhi saddhā paññādi vasenavā nānā khaṇesu nānā avatthā yuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_11: Tasmā tehi tīhi samuṭṭhita rūpānieva nānākhaṇesu garukalahukādi vasena nānāvikārayuttāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_12: Yato tesaṃ santati samaya vasena kālabhedo labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1111_13: Evañca katvā yamakesupi akammajānaṃ pavattikāle khaṇasantativasenapi kālabhedo gahitoti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_15: Satica kamma samuṭṭhāne ābādharūpe tatovuṭṭhānabhūto kammajo lahutādi guṇopi visuṃ labbhamāno siyāti. Na.
anya-e0301n0:1111_16: Yesañhi vasena imasmiṃ sarīre kammavipākajānāma ābādhā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_17: Tāni upapīḷakupa ghātakakammānipi gatikālapayoga vipattiyo labhamānāni eva sarīraṭṭhakā pathavādayo vātapittādayoca
anya-e0301n0:1111_19: Utusamuṭṭhānāsu pana khubbhitāsu itarāni tadanugatikāni eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_23: vipāsāyapi ruppatītiādinā utupadhānova rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanapaccayo vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1111_25: Yato yathāvutto kammajo lahutādiguṇonāma visuṃ labbhamāno siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1112_0: Yasmā pana avihiṃsā kammanibbattā sattā tesaṃ upapīḷakādīnaṃ kammānaṃ suvidūratāyaceva sarīrakoṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1112_2: Tasmā tadatthaṃ sandhāya appābādhasaṃvattanikā esā māṇavapaṭipadā.
anya-e0301n0:1112_5: Evañca katvā rūpakaṇḍena kammassakaṭattārūpesu eva etaṃ rūpattayaṃ niddiṭṭhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1112_6: Rūpakalāpānāma ekasmiṃ paramāṇusmiṃpi bahuvidhā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1112_7: Tasmā catujarūpa kalāpesu ghanabhāvena pavattamānesu kalāpantarabhūtā ākāsadhātupi dissamānāeva hotīti katvā catujesu tassā gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1112_8: Kāmaṃ sabbānipi anipphannarūpāni kenaci paccayena anipphāditāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1112_10: Yathā itarāni cittādi paccaya visesena dissamāna visesāni hontīti vuttaṃ lakkhaṇarūpāni na kutoci jāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1112_11: Jāyamānādi rūpānanti jāyamāna jiyyamāna miyyamānānaṃ rūpakalāpānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1112_13: Etthaca rūpakaṇḍe utusamuṭṭhānanti ca āhārasamuṭṭhānanti ca vuttaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1113_1: jaratā aniccatā pāḷiyameva na kutoci samuṭṭhānāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1113_2: Tasmā idhapi tāsaṃ nakutoci samuṭṭhānesu gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1113_3: Upacayasantatiyo pana pāḷiyaṃpi kutoci samuṭṭhānesu vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1113_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi tāhi saddhiṃ visati kammajarūpāni sattarasa cittajarūpāni cuddasa utujarūpāni terasa āhāraja rūpāni vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:1113_5: Tasmā idha tāsaṃ nakutocisamuṭṭhānatā navattabbāti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:1113_6: rūpajanakānaṃ jananabyāpāronāma attanā janitarūpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe eva pharati. Na-
anya-e0301n0:1113_8: tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe labbhamānā upacayasantatiyoyeva kutoci jātapariyāyaṃ arahanti,
anya-e0301n0:1113_9: na jaratā aniccatāyoti katvā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathā yaṃca tāsaṃeva kutoci samuṭṭhānesu gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1113_10: pubbe ajātā dhammā paccaye sati jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1113_12: Jātā pana dhammā paccaye sati jiyyanti, miyyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1113_14: tasmā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ pavatti ekantena paccayāyattā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1113_15: Pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ pavatti pana ekantena paccaya nirapekkhā hotīti iminā pariyāyena tāsaṃ tesu gahaṇaṃ agahaṇañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1113_16: Yaṃ pana suttapadesu jarāmaraṇaṃ bhikkhave saṅkhataṃ paṭicca samuppannanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1113_18: Asati na paññāyatīti iminā pariyāyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1113_19: Idha pana pubbe vuttanayena itara anipphannarūpāni viya cattāripi etāni cittādipaccayavisesena dissamānavisesāni
anya-e0301n0:1113_20: na hontīti catunnaṃpi na kutoci jātatā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1113_21: Evaṃsantepi sārataraṃ pāḷinayaṃ atidhāvanto viya hotīti upacayasanta tīnaṃ kutoci samuṭṭhānesu saṅgahoeva seyyoti.
anya-e0301n0:1114_1: Eko eva jāti saṅkhāto uppādo etesanti ekuppādā.
anya-e0301n0:1114_4: Tasmā tena yāni rūpāni ekāyaeva jātiyā jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1114_7: Ye pana kalāpagata rūpagaṇanāya ekasmiṃ kalāpepi anekāni jātiādīni kappenti,
anya-e0301n0:1114_10: Vuttañhi tattha ekekakalāpa pariyāpannānaṃ rūpānaṃ saheva uppādādipavattito ekekakalāpassa uppādādayo
anya-e0301n0:1114_11: ekekāva hontīti yathā ekekassa kalāpassa jīvitindriyaṃ kalāpā nupālakaṃ upādāya rūpanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1114_12: Evaṃ kalāpuppādādi sabhāvā jātiādayo upādāyarūpānicceva vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:1114_15: So rūpassa upacayotica yo rūpassa upacayo.
anya-e0301n0:1114_16: Sārūpassa santatītica vuttattā tāni jātiādīni lakkhaṇarūpāni visuṃvisuṃ rūpānaṃeva,
anya-e0301n0:1114_18: Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūtiādinā vuttattā cakkhādi jīvitādīnipi ekasmiṃ kalāpe anekānieva āpajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1114_19: Tasmā tathā kappanaṃ akatvā ekasmiṃ kalāpe aññāni upādārūpāni viya lakkhaṇarūpānipi ekekānievāti niṭṭhaṃ gantabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1115_0: Eko samāno mahābhūtasaṅkhāto nissayo etesanti ekanissayā.
anya-e0301n0:1115_4: Tāni ekantena sahavuttīni nāma hontīti vuttaṃ sahavuttinoti.
anya-e0301n0:1115_10: Yasmā pana cittajo saddo viññattivikārena vinā napavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1115_12: Tasmā cittajaṃ saddanavakaṃvā vacīviññattinavakaṃvā nasambhavatīti adhippāyena vacīviññatti sadde hi ca sahavacīviññatti dasakanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1115_13: Ettha pana viññatti vikāro saddena vinā napavattatīti idaṃ tāva yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1115_14: Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1115_18: paṭiccasamuppāda niddesesu paṭisandhikkhaṇato uddhaṃ pavattaututoceva cittatoca saddanavakanti.
anya-e0301n0:1116_0: Mahāaṭṭhakathā nayena viññatti rahito vitakka vipphāra saddonāma asota viññeyyo cittajo saddo labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1116_2: paṭṭhānepi cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti āvataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1116_3: Tasmā vinā viññattighaṭṭanāya uppajjamāno asota viññeyyo vitakkavipphārasaddonāma natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1116_4: Visuddhimagge assāsa passāse cittajaṃ saddanavakaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1116_5: cittaje assāsa passāsa koṭṭhāsepi ojaṭṭhamakañceva saddocāti navāti,
anya-e0301n0:1116_6: saddanavakeca āgate saddalahutādi dvādasakaṃpi āgatameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1116_15: Saccasaṅkhepe pana sadda lahutādi dvādasakaṃ visuṃ agahetvā cittaja kalāpā satteva vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1118_0: Mahāṭṭhakathānayena viññattirahite asota viññeyye vitakka vipphārasadde saddanavakaṃ dassetvā puna vādantaraṃ dassentena. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1118_1: mahājanasannipātassa dūrato apaññāyamānakkharapadabyañjanattho cittasamuṭṭhānanighosasaddo aviññattiko evāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1118_2: Tathā migapakkhīnaṃca aññamaññaṃ bhāsaṃ ajānantānaṃ andhadamiḷādinaṃ aviññattiko cittasamuṭṭhānasaddo atthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1119_0: Tattha viññattirahito asotaviññeyyo vitakkavipphāra saddo aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0301n0:1119_1: Mahājanasannipātassa citta samuṭṭhāna nighosasaddopi āsanne ṭhitānaṃ paññāyamānakkharapada byañjanattho saviññattikoeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1119_2: Itarathā sabbepi citta jasaddā dūratare ṭhitānaṃ apaññāyamāna padabyañjanāeva hontīti sabbepi viññattirahitā siyunti.
anya-e0301n0:1119_3: Naca migapakkhiādīnaṃ cittajo saddo viññattirahito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1121_0: Saddanavakaṃ panettha accharā saṅghāta pāṇippahārādi sadda sahitaṃ aṭṭhakamevāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1122_1: Tasmā visuddhimagge vuttanayena assāsapassāsevā avacīghosesu kadāci cittasahitesu ukkāsita khipita vamita
anya-e0301n0:1122_3: Utujakalāpesu pacchimā dvepi kasmā bahiddhā nalabbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1122_4: Nanu bahiddhāpi rūpānaṃ lahu garu mudu thaddha kammaññatā dissantīti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1122_5: tā pana bhūtānaṃ omattādhimatta vasena honti,
anya-e0301n0:1122_7: Kasmā pana ākāsadhātuca lakkhaṇarūpānica rūpakalāpesu nagahitānīti vuttaṃ kalāpānantiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1122_8: Ākāsadhātukalāpānaṃ pariccheda mattattā kassaci rūpakalāpassa aṅgabhūtā avayavabhūtā na hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1122_9: lakkhaṇarūpānica sabbesaṃpi kalāpānaṃ uppādādi lakkhaṇa mattattā vikārarūpāni viya kalāpānaṃ bhedakarāni
anya-e0301n0:1122_14: Tesaṃ pana kalāpa bheda karaṇa meva kalāpaṅganti ca dīpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1122_15: Evañca katvā ekanirodhaṅgarahitassapi viññattidvayassa kalāpabheda karattāeva tesu gahaṇaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hotīti veditabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1123_1: Yathārahanti sabhāvakā bhāvakānaṃ paripuṇṇāpari puṇṇindriyānañca arahānurūpato.
anya-e0301n0:1123_3: Nañhi idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ kāmaloke pavattiyaṃ na labbhatīti atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1125_0: “Yathārahanti sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ anurūpato”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1126_0: Na hi anūnānīti idaṃ puggalavasena visesanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1127_2: aṇḍajā yoni jalābujā yoni saṃsedajāyoni opapātikā yonīti.
anya-e0301n0:1127_3: Ye kho te sāriputta sattā aṇḍakosaṃ abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja jāyanti,
anya-e0301n0:1127_5: Ye kho te sāriputta sattā vatthikosaṃ abhinibbhijja abhinibbhijja jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1127_10: Devā nerakā ekacce ca manussā ekacceca vinipātikā ayaṃ vuccati sāriputta opapātikā yonīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1128_3: Vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppattitvā viya nibbattā abhinibbattāti opapātikā.
anya-e0301n0:1128_6: Iṭṭhesu sappi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu sattā jāyantievāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1128_7: Etthaca purimesu dvīsu pāḷinayena aṇḍaṃ vuccati aṇḍakoso.
anya-e0301n0:1128_9: tato jātā vijātā nikkhantāti aṇḍajā jalābujātica vuccantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1128_10: Tattha jaraṃ jīraṇaṃ bhedaṃ yāti upetīti jalābūti saddanītiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1128_12: Taṃ āvunāti paṭicchādeti avativā rakkhatīti jalābu,
anya-e0301n0:1128_16: Upapattikkhaṇeeva paripuṇṇaaṅgapaccaṅgattā tato tato uppatitvā viya jāyantīti opapātikā.
anya-e0301n0:1130_0: Aṇḍajādayopi aṇḍakosādimhi okkamantā uppatantā eva nāma hontīti tesaṃpi opapātikattapasaṅgaṃ maññamāno
anya-e0301n0:1130_1: upapāto nesaṃ atthīti opapātikāti vatvā ukkaṃsagati paricchedavasena cettha visiṭṭhaopapāto gahito.
anya-e0301n0:1131_1: tattha opapātikā aṅgapaccaṅgehi saha sabbaso paripuṇṇena attabhāvena jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1131_3: Saṃsedajānaṃ pana āyatanāni eva paripuṇṇāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1131_4: Aṅgapaccaṅgāni pana puna vaḍḍhitvāeva paripuṇṇāni jātānīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1131_6: Cakkhusotaghānabhāvasekānikadācipi na labbhanti jātibadhira jaccaghānakānaṃ abhāvakānañca sambhavatoti appoyo.
anya-e0301n0:1131_7: Tattha tāni sabbānipi sugati duggati jātiyānaṃ ahetukasaṃsedajānaṃ kadāci nalabbhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1131_8: Sugatiyaṃ pana opapātikabhāvonāma seṭṭho attabhāva paṭilābhoti nayena kenaci omakena kammena labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1131_9: Tasmā sugatijāti yānaṃ opapātikānaṃ aparipuṇṇindriyatānāma natthi aññatra abhāvakehi ādikappikehiti.
anya-e0301n0:1131_10: Duggatijātiyānaṃpi pana tesaṃ kadāci cakkhu sota bhāva vekallatāeva vattabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1131_12: Kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthīti hi aṭṭha kathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1132_0: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasā yatanāni pātubhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1133_2: Kassaci ekādasā yatanānītiādisu catūsu vākyesu saṃsedajopapātikā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1133_3: Kassaci sattāyatanānīti ettha pana gabbhaseyyakova vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1133_4: Tattha yasmā sattāyatanaṃ nāma paṭisandhikkhaṇe na labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1133_9: Kassaci navāti cakkhusota dvaya vekalla vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_11: Tadā suddhajaccaghānakena saddhiṃ tayo dasakavārā vuttā siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_12: Tathā jaccandhaghānaka jaccabadhiraghānakehi saddhiṃ tayo navakavārā ekoca aṭṭhakavāro vutto siyā tiṇṇaṃ vipannānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1133_13: Tathā avuttattā pana natthi aghānako opapāti koti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1133_14: Tasmiṃ pana vibhaṅge indriyavāre napuṃsakānaṃ opapātikānanti avuttattā thapetvā ādikappike abhāvakopi opapātiko natthiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1133_15: Pāḷiyaṃ avuttaṃpi pana saṃsedajānaṃ vuttapakāraṃ cakkhādivekallaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbaṃ. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1133_16: sattati ukkaṃsatova rūpāni saṃsedajopapāta yonīsu. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1133_18: Tattha tiṃsāti jivhākāya vatthu dasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsarūpānīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_19: Idañhi vacanaṃ saṃsedajānaṃ vasena vuttanti mahāṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1133_20: Ācariyā nandattherena pana yamake ghānajivhānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāva vuttitā vuttāti jivhā vekallatā viya ghānavekallatāpi natthīti icchitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1134_2: Aghānakānaṃ itthīnaṃ upapajjantīnaṃ tāsaṃ itthindriyaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0301n0:1134_6: Aghānakānaṃ purisānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0301n0:1135_0: Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena ghānavekallatāpi atthīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1137_0: Apare pana yamake ghānajivhānaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti ajivhassa asambhavato aghānakassapi abhāvameva vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0301n0:1137_1: Tatthāpi yathā cakkhusotāni rūpabhave ghāna jivhāhi vinā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1137_2: Na evaṃ ghānajivhā aññamaññaṃ vinā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1137_3: Dvinnaṃpi rūpabhave anuppajjanatoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ kāmabhave apavatti vasena tesaṃ sahacāritā vuttāti na na sakkā vattunti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1138_0: Okāsavāre hi ekantasahacāritā vuttamattena puggalesu ekantasahacāritā na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1138_2: Rūpādīsu khandhesu sañjanti laggantīti sattā. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1138_3: rūpe kho rādha yo chando, yo rāgo, yā nandi, yā taṇhā,
anya-e0301n0:1138_12: Evañcakatvā dhammahadayavibhaṅge gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ ahetukānaṃ napuṃsakānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe cattārindriyāni
anya-e0301n0:1138_13: pātubhavanti kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ upekkhindriyanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1138_16: Tathā hi kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sesāni cattāri sattasattati rattimhi jāyantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1138_17: Tattha sesānīti kāyāyatana manāyatanato avasesāni cattāri cakkhusotaghānajivhā yatanāni.
anya-e0301n0:1139_0: Gabbhaseyyakassa pacchimabhavikassa upapajjantassa ekadasa masattāhā orato ṭhitassa rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
anya-e0301n0:1140_0: Yaṃ pana yassavā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha,
anya-e0301n0:1140_2: Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha.
anya-e0301n0:1140_3: Noca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti ettha aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1141_1: Tesaṃ ghānāyatanānibbattakakammena gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttantica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1141_2: Etthaca cakkhughānesu vuttesu sotajivhā avuttāpi atthato siddhāeva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1143_0: “Pavattikāleti sattame sattāheti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1144_0: Aṭṭhakathā virodhato īdisesu ca ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathā pamāṇatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1146_0: “Ṭīkākāramatena ekādasame sattāhe vāti” vuttaṃ. Tampi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1147_0: Nahi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddiṭṭhato vutto vinicchayo ṭīkākāra matonāma sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1149_2: Tato sattāhā tikkamena jivhādasakanti evaṃ anukkamenāti vuttaṃ”.
anya-e0301n0:1152_0: “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi hi ayamattho dassito vā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1153_4: Tañhi viññāṇādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvapavattikkamena pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ pañcapadaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1153_6: Naca aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhitto uppattikkamo therena idha kamenāti iminā pāṭhena dassitoti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1155_0: Sākhāvatthaṃ atikkamma pacchā sattame sattāhe cakkhu sotaghānajivhādasakāca uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1156_0: Ettha ca kalalādīnaṃ uppattikkamo saṃyuttake vutto. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1157_0: Pathamaṃ kalalaṃ hoti, kalalā hoti abbudaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1158_0: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesiyā nibbattate ghano;
anya-e0301n0:1159_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpicāti.
anya-e0301n0:1160_1: Tattha pathamanti pathamena paṭisandhiviññāṇena tissoti vā phussotivā nāmaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1160_2: Athakho tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabindupamāṇaṃ kalalaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1163_0: Kalalā hoti abbudanti tasmā kalalā sattāhaccayena maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇaṃ abbudaṃnāma hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1166_0: Abbudā jāyate pesīti tasmāpi abbudā sattāhaccayena vilīna tipusadisā pesināma sañjāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1166_2: Gāmadārakā hi supakkāni maricāni gahetvā sāṭakantare bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā pīḷetvā maṇḍaṃ ādāya kapāle pakkhipitvā ātape thapenti.
anya-e0301n0:1169_0: Pesiyā nibbattate ghanoti tato pesito sattāhacca yena kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhāno ghanonāma maṃsapesi piṇḍo nibbattati.
anya-e0301n0:1174_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyantīti pañcame sattāhe dvinnaṃ hatthapādānaṃ sīsassaca atthāya pañcapīḷakā jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_1: Yaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃpañcame kho bhikkhave sattāhe pañcapīḷakā jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_3: Kesā lomā nakhāpicāti dvācattālīsame sattāhe etāni jāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_4: Ettha ca chaṭṭhasattāhādayo chasattāhā pasādanissayānaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā pariṇatakālā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_5: Cakkhādīni pana ekādasama sattāhassa pariyo sānadivase ekato jāyantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1174_6: Yaṃ panettha tilatelassa yathābindūtiādinā kalalassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1174_9: Na hi tadā tādisaṃ pakaticakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ vaṇṇajātaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃvā tassa paññāyeyyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_17: So pana ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa āpātaṃ nāgacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1174_19: Tesaṃ chattiṃsa parimāno aṇu pana titticchidda tālacchiddehi paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭivaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1174_20: Sakalaṃ pana kalāpattayaparimāṇamattabhūtaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paramāṇutopi parittakameva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1174_21: So hi santānānubandhavasena pavattattā khaṇe khaṇe upacitarūpakalāpasamūhoeva hotīti heṭṭhima koṭiyā ekūnapaññāsakalāpaparimāṇoeva siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1174_22: Tato parittake sati santāna ghaṭanasseva asambhavatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1174_23: Yaṃ pana mahāṭīkāyaṃ te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1174_27: Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva abbudabhāva pesibhāva ghanabhāvādi pattakāle mātuyā āmāsayagatāya
anya-e0301n0:1174_28: ajjhohaṭāhāra sinehabhūtāya ojāya jalābumūlā nusārena vatthusmiṃ pharaṇakālaṃ upādāya, yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1175_0: Yañcassa bhuñjati mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1176_0: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato tiroti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca tena so tattha yāpetīti tassa hi nātito uṭṭhito nāḷo mātuudara paṭalena ekābaddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_6: Tattha pana nābhināḷassa uṭṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya nātito uṭṭhito nāḷoti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1177_7: Na hi abbudādikāle tassa nātināḷonāma uṭṭhito siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_8: Saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ pana yaṃkiñci laddhaṃvā attano kheḷaṃvā ajjhoharaṇakāle ojāpharaṇaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0301n0:1177_10: Cuticittopari sattarasamacittassāti cuticittato upari pubbakāle sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa.
anya-e0301n0:1177_11: Kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti tesaṃ tato paṭṭhāya anuppannattāyeva tato satta rasamaṃ cuticittaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_13: Puretaranti tassa sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1177_15: Cittajāhārajarūpañcāti cittajarūpasantānaṃ āhāraja rūpasantānañca vocchijjati anupādinnakasantāne tesaṃ uppattiyā asambhavato.
anya-e0301n0:1177_17: Bhāvadasakaṃnāma kāmarāganidānakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti tabbirāga bhāvanākammanibbatte rūpaloke tassa alābho vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1177_18: Āhārajakalāpānica na labbhanti ajjhohaṭā hārā bhāvato,
anya-e0301n0:1177_20: Ācariyānandatthero pana tattha labbhamāna rūpakalāpesupi gandharasānaṃ ojāyaca abhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_21: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1177_33: Etthaca pāḷiyaṃ rūpaloke phoṭṭhabbe paṭikkhittepi kiccantarasabbhāvā mahābhūtānaṃ tattha paṭilābho avārito eva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_35: Yena te dhammamattabhāvepi tiṭṭheyyaṃ tasmā tesaṃ avacanaṃ tattha abhāvameva dīpetīti ācariyassa adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:1177_36: Tathā pana bhūtacatukkaṃ tattha atthiyeva, yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1177_37: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1177_38: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ pana phoṭṭhabba dhātuca tattha paṭikkhittā.
anya-e0301n0:1177_39: Tasmā sabbesaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammabhāve samānepi yena kiccavisesena gandho raso phoṭṭhabbaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārotica vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1177_40: Tassa natthitāya tesaṃ tena nāme na tattha anupalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya vibhaṅge kathāvatthumhi yamake sūti sabbattha tesaṃ tattha paṭikkhepo.
anya-e0301n0:1177_41: Mahābhūtānaṃ pana nisanda dhammamattabhāvena vijjamānānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu anupavesoti yutto siyāti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_42: Tīṇidasakāni jīvitanavakañcāti ettha ācariyānanda matiyā cakkhusattakaṃ sotasattakaṃ vatthusattakanti evaṃ tīṇi sattakāni jīvitachakkañcāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1177_43: Abhiricchatīti alabbhamāne pathamaṃ vajjite tattha labbhamānatāvasena avasissati.
anya-e0301n0:1177_45: Etthaca rūpaloke viya kāmaloke jīvitanavakaṃ kasmā visuṃ na vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_46: Rūpaloke pana āhārupatthambhakassa aññassaca sakalasarīrabyāpino anupālaka jīvitassa abhāvā etadeva tadubhayaṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n0:1177_47: ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ anupāletīti pākaṭaṃ tattha jīvitanavakanti visuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1177_48: Kāmaloke pana aññāni upatthambhakā nupālakāni bahūni pākaṭānica honti.
anya-e0301n0:1177_49: Tasmā jīvitanavakaṃ apākaṭanti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1177_50: Kāmalokepi pana etaṃ asitādipācakaggivasena tassevaca udayabhūtassa sakalasarī rānupālakassa usmāsaṅkhātassa kāyaggino vasena pākaṭameva.
anya-e0301n0:1178_0: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
anya-e0301n0:1179_0: Apaviddho tadā seti, niratthaṃva kaliṅgaranti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1180_0: Tattha āyūti tesu dvīsu aggīsu patiṭṭhitaṃ jīvitameva vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1180_2: Yesu tikkhamandavasena visama bhūtesu kāye nānābādhā uppajjanti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1180_4: Visamavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannā gato hoti atiuṇhāyaatisītalāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1180_5: Samabhūtesu pana sattā nirābādhā honti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1181_0: Visuddhimagge pana sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanava kañceva tīṇi ojaṭṭhamakāni cāti tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1181_1: Tattha aṭṭhasūti pācakaggiassāsa passāsavajjitesu tīsu tejokoṭṭhāsesu pañcasu vāyo koṭṭhāsesūti aṭṭhasu.
anya-e0301n0:1181_2: Iti kāmalokepi sakalasarīrabyāpīsu tejovāyo koṭṭhāsesu labbhamānattā etaṃ sakala sarīreeva daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_4: kasmā panettha kāmaloke viya rūpaloke rūpakalāpānaṃ nirodhakkamo na vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_6: rūpalokepi hi maraṇakāle pana cuticitto pari sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikāla mupādāya kammajarūpāni nuppajjantītiādiko nirodhakkamo kāmalokasadisoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1181_9: Tasmā tatthapi cuticittato paraṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇa parimāṇe ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittajarūpasantānaṃ vocchijjati.
anya-e0301n0:1181_10: Tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparaṃparā ekadviti accharākālamattaṃpi pavattitvā vocchijjatīti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1181_11: Naca ettakamattena kālena pavattamānāyapi rūpasantatiyā matakaḷevaraṃnāma sakkā laddhuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1181_12: Passantānaṃ ekakkhaṇena viya sarīrassa antaradhānassa paññāyanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_15: Tesañhi sarīrāni paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva sabbaso paripuṇṇena kammajakāyena nibbattattā kammajarūpehi ghanapūritāni sallahukabharāni ca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1181_17: Tasmā tesaṃ cutikāle kammajarūpesu niruddhesu tāni tinna patiṭṭhāni hutvā ciraṃ santānaṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ nasakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1183_0: “Maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesaṃpi tisamuṭṭhānāni dvisamuṭṭhānānica saheva nirujjhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1184_0: Evañhi sati sabbesaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ maraṇāsannacittāni rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpentīti āpajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1184_1: Na hi maraṇāsanna citta samuṭṭhitāni rūpāni kammajarūpehi saheva nirujjhantīti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1184_3: Tathā utujarūpānipi cittajarūpanirodhato thokaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhantīti na na sakkā viññātuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1184_4: Naca tāvattakena kālena tesu pavatta mānesupi sarīranikkheponāma sakkā bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n0:1184_5: Brahmānaṃ pana thina middhādīnaṃ nīvaraṇajātiyānaṃ atthitāya tadanurūpaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ tadanugatikānañca
anya-e0301n0:1184_6: utujarūpānaṃ lahukagarukatādivikāro na na sambhavatīti lahutādittayaṃpi gahetvā vuttaṃ tevīsarūpesūti.
anya-e0301n0:1184_8: Tāniyeva cakkhu sotavatthu viññattidvayavajjāni asaññīnaṃ sattaraseva rūpāni hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1184_10: Na vā cintetabbo rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanavikārassa bahukāraṇattāti.
anya-e0301n0:1184_13: Pavattetūti paṭisandhiyā ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya sakale pavattikāle pana nakiñcipi nalabbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1184_15: Na hi idaṃnāma rūpaṃ pavatte nalabbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1185_1: Evaṃ cittacetasika rūpasaṅgahaṃ katvā idāni yathā nuppattaṃ nibbānasaṅgahaṃ karonto nibbānaṃpanātiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:1185_5: Cattāroca ariyamaggā cattārica sāmaññaphalāni asaṅkhatāca dhātu,
anya-e0301n0:1185_8: Na hi lokavohārasiddhā paññatti lokuttarānāma sakkā bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_9: Catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbanti cakkhumantena candamaṇḍalaṃviya cakkhunā paṭiladdhamaggañāṇehi ariyajanehi
anya-e0301n0:1185_12: Tattha catumaggañāṇenāti etena tādi samhā paṭipattimaggato vimukhānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ jaccandhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1185_13: viya canda maṇḍalassa tassa avisayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_14: Na ca jaccandhānaṃ cakkhumhi anupaladdhamattena candamaṇḍalaṃ natthināma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_18: Tadubhayena panassa paññavantānaṃ kalyāṇakaputhujjanānaṃ anumānato siddhataṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0301n0:1185_19: na hi anumānatopi attano buddhiyaṃ asiddhassa apākaṭassa sacchikiriyāya vāyāmopināma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1185_21: Evaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato vijjamānataṃ dassetvā idāni kevalaṃ vijjamānamattameva na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_22: Athakho mahātejavantaṃ mahojavantañca taṃ hotīti dassetuṃ maggaphalānamālambaṇabhūtanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1185_23: Etena nibbānena vināmagga phalānaṃ akiccasiddhiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_24: Tato tassa mahātejavanta taṃ mahojavantatañca dīpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_25: Yathā hi mahiddhiko eko rājā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1185_26: Tassa raṭṭhe ekasmiṃ mahāgāme eko gāmabhojako ekoca corajeṭṭhako mahāparivāro vasati.
anya-e0301n0:1185_28: Tattha gāmabhojako nagaraṃ gantvā rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
anya-e0301n0:1185_31: Taṃ sutvā corajeṭṭhako idāni idhavasantassa mamajīvitaṃ natthīti attano parivārena saddhiṃ aṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1185_32: Gāmabhojakoca taṃaṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭhaṃpi muñcituṃ adatvā gahetvā vadhi.
anya-e0301n0:1185_38: Pubbe rañño anupaṭṭhā nakāle gāmabhojako viya puthujjanañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1185_40: Taṇhā pavattamānā ajjhattabahiddhādi bhedesu khandhādidhammesu vinandhamānāva pavattati. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1187_0: Tasmā sā veḷugumbe veḷusākhā viya vinanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena vānasamaññaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ vānasaṅkhātāyataṇhāyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1187_3: Etena vānato nikkhantanti nibbānanti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1187_7: Ekavidhaṃpīti yathā cittaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhaṃpi jātidhammattā jātibhūmisampayogādi bhedena kāla disādesapuggalabhedenaca vatthuto bhinnameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1187_9: Idaṃ pana sabhāvatopi vatthutopi abhinnameva hutvā ekavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1187_10: Idañhi anamatagge saṃsāre atīte etarahi anāgateca parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃvā paccekabuddhānaṃvā buddhasāvakānaṃvā sabbesaṃpi ekameva hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1187_12: Viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1187_13: Tattha viññāṇanti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena siddhattā etaṃ tabbhāvenaeva suṭṭhu abhibyattaṃ katvā ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1187_14: Anidassananti animittadhammattā bālaputhujjanānaṃ dassanavisayabhūtena kenacinimittena nidassituṃvā kālabhedena
anya-e0301n0:1187_15: disādesapuggalasantāna bhedena hīnapaṇītādibhedena ca bhinnaṃ katvā nidassituṃvā nārahatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1187_17: Sabbatopabhanti vaṭṭadukkhapaṭipakkhasiddhehi anantehi guṇobhāsehi sabbato pabhāvantanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1187_18: Tathā aniddisitabbadhammattāca pana anamatagge saṃsāre sabbāsuca disāsu asukasmiṃ nāma kāle asukāyanāma disāya natthīti navattabbaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1187_19: ariyamaggaṃ bhāventena yadā kadāci yattha katthaci avassaṃ adhigantabbatāvasena sabbadā sabbattha ca labbhamānattā.
anya-e0301n0:1188_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yākāci loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti.
anya-e0301n0:1188_2: Na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1188_3: Eva meva kho bhikkhave bahūcepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1188_4: Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃvā paññāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1189_0: Aṭṭhakathāsuca na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyatīti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu
anya-e0301n0:1189_2: Tadāpi tucchā nibbāna dhātūti nasakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1189_3: Buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti.
anya-e0301n0:1189_4: Tadāpi nasakkā vattuṃ pūrā nibbānadhātūti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1189_5: Brahmanimantanasutteca viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1189_7: Nibbānato hi añño koci dhammo pabhassaratarovā jotivantatarovā parisuddhatarovā paṇḍara tarovā natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1189_10: Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāyaṃnāma nibbānaṃ natthīti navattabbanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1190_0: Evaṃsantepi etaṃ niruddhatekālikadhamma sannissayena viññāya mānattā niruddhadhammabhedena bhinnaṃ katvā
anya-e0301n0:1190_2: Tattha upādīyati taṇhādiṭṭhīhi bhusaṃ gaṇhīyatīti upādi.
anya-e0301n0:1190_4: Soyeva ekadesenavā anavasesenavā pahīnehi kammakilesehi sesoti upādiseso.
anya-e0301n0:1190_5: Saṃvijjati tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā adhigatakāleti saupādisesā.
anya-e0301n0:1190_8: Natthi tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā adhigatakāleti anupādisesā,
anya-e0301n0:1190_19: ekā hi dhātu idha diṭṭhadhammikā saupādisesā bhavanetti saṅkhayā.
anya-e0301n0:1190_21: Aṅguttare pana sattanipāte ubhatobhāgavimutta paññāpi muttānaṃ dvinnaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhupādisesavasena
anya-e0301n0:1190_22: kāyasakkhidiṭṭhipatta saddhāvimuttadhammānusārīsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ sekkhānaṃ āraddhavipassa kassaca
anya-e0301n0:1190_23: yogīkalyāṇaputhujjanassa kilesu pādisesavasena saupādisesatā anupādisesatāca vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1190_28: uddhaṃ sotaakaniṭṭhagāmīti pañcannaṃ anāgāmīnaṃ sakadāgāmissa tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannānanti navannaṃ sekkhapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1191_2: Etthaca maggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ khayo saupādi sesaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1191_4: Yasmā pana paṭisandhivandhānāma kilesesu satieva jāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1191_7: Yāvacutiyā pavattamānaṃ paccuppannakhandhasantānaṃ pana khīṇāsavassapi purimabhave pavattakammakilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1191_9: Tasmā taṃ khīṇesupi kilesesu yāvacutiyā pavatta tiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1191_14: Tato paraṃpi anamatagga saṃsāre bhavaparaṃparāya anuppādopi tena saheva siddho.
anya-e0301n0:1191_16: Evaṃsantepi khandhāvasesassa bhāvā bhāvalesaṃ upādāya ayaṃ bhedo vuttoti vuttaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyenāti
anya-e0301n0:1192_0: Yasmā pana saṅkhatadhammānāma sapalibodhadhammattā nānāpalibodhehi niccakālaṃ janaṃ pīḷenti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_2: Sanimitta dhammattāca kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnañca sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ vatthu bhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_3: Sapaṇihitadhammattāca sabbadukkhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ āsādukkhaṃnāma niccakālaṃpi janenti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_4: Tasmā tappaṭipakkhasiddhena guṇabhedena tividhaṃbhedaṃ dassetuṃ suññatantiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:1192_6: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā hi sati bālānaṃ yattakā pāpakammapalibodhā apāya dukkhapalibodhāca sandissanti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_7: Paṇḍitānaṃca tato attānaṃ rakkhanatthaṃ yattakā kalyāṇakammapalibodhā sandissanti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_8: Sakkāyadiṭṭhinirodhoyeva sabbe te sakkāyadiṭṭhimūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_10: Tasmā sonirodho tehi palibodhehi vivitto hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1192_11: tathā rāgakkhayoyeva rāgamūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1192_15: Iti nibbānaṃ sabbapali bodhehi vivittattā suññataṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1193_1: Yena samannāgatā saṅkhatadhammā sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇānañca vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1193_2: Tathā sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ sabbesaṃ verānaṃ sabbesaṃ rogādi anatthānaṃ vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1193_4: Kāla disā desa santānādi bhedena hīnapaṇītādi bhedenaca bhedaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1193_5: Nibbānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ nimittadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena siddhattā natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1193_7: Tañhi sabbesaṃ kile sādīnaṃ anatthānaṃ vatthubhūte nimittadhamme viddhaṃsetvā tesaṃ anatthānaṃ abhāvaṃ sādhentaṃ niccaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n0:1193_13: Idaṃ dasasu disāsu asukāyanāma disāya nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1193_16: Idaṃ manussaloke idaṃ devaloke idaṃ brahmaloketi vā idaṃ manussānaṃ idaṃ devānaṃ idaṃ brahmānantivāti.
anya-e0301n0:1193_17: Tathā paṇītādi bhedena bhinnaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1194_4: Saṅkhatadhammāca labbhamānāpi bhijjanadhammattā punappunaṃ laddhuṃ āsā dukkhaṃnāma vaḍḍhenti.
anya-e0301n0:1194_8: nibbānaṃ pana sayaṃ pipāsavinayadhammattā āsāsaṅkhātaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃvā chandapaṇidhiṃvā vinentaṃ vidhamentaṃ vattatīti natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1194_11: Tattha manussa dibba brahma sampattiyo labhitvā anubhavanavasena pavattaṃ pītisomanassa sukhaṃ vedayitasukhaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1194_14: Sabbe te apariyantaṃ āsādukkhaṃ bhiyyo vaḍḍhentiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1194_15: Tasmā sabbaṃ vedayitasukhaṃnāma āsā dukkhajanakattā ekantena dukkhameva hoti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1194_18: Dhammasenāpatināca katamaṃ taṃ āvuso sāriputta nibbāne sukhaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1194_19: yadettha vedayitaṃ natthīti puṭṭhena etadevettha āvuso nibbāne sukhaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1194_21: Santisukhaṃnāma attani uppannānaṃvā uppajjituṃ paccupaṭṭhi tānaṃvā kilesādīnaṃ apāyadukkhādīnañca attano sammāpayogaṃ paṭicca vimuccanasukhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1194_23: Etasmiñhi asati puthujjanānaṃ manussa dibbabrahmasampattiyo anubhavantānaṃpi avassaṃ pattabbaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhitāneva honti aviciniraya bhayādīnīti.
anya-e0301n0:1194_24: Tasmā sabbassa vedayitasukhamūlakassa āsādukkhassa santisukhadīpakaṃ idaṃ appaṇihitapadaṃ nibbānassa ekaṃ mahantaṃ guṇapadaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_0: Ākāra bhedenāti tividhassa suññatādikassa guṇakoṭṭhāsassa bhedena.
anya-e0301n0:1195_1: Etthaca yadetaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ anusayitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva nirujjhanaṃ khiyyanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1195_2: Taṃ khayadhātu nirodhadhātu saṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_8: duvidhañhi nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ kāyasacchikaraṇaṃ ñāṇasacchikaraṇañca. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1195_14: Tattha anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ niccaṃ santāpetvā paridayhitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva
anya-e0301n0:1195_16: Evaṃ kāyena sacchikatvā puna paccavekkhanto ajjhattaṃ taṃ nirujjhanaṃ ñāṇena paccakkhato passati.
anya-e0301n0:1195_19: Tesu kāya sacchikaraṇaṃ anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepeti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_22: Tassa pana nirujjhanassa suññatadhammattā mandabuddhīnaṃ tasmiṃ tucchasaññā niratthakasaññā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_23: Animitta dhammattā tasmiṃ abhāvamattasaññā paramatthato avijjamānasaññā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1195_24: Appaṇihitadhammattā taṇhāvasikā janā tasmiṃ sukhaṃ nāma kiñci natthīti maññanti.
anya-e0301n0:1196_0: Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhamattaṃ nibbānaṃnāma nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1196_3: naca abhāvamattaṃ tesaṃ vatthu bhavituṃ arahati.
anya-e0301n0:1196_6: Tasmā yo tassa khayanirodhassa paccayo atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1196_10: Nibbānassaca guṇapadāni nāma anantānaṃ vaṭṭadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena sijjhanti,
anya-e0301n0:1196_13: tattakāni tesaṃ khaya nirodhe anantāni guṇapadāni hutvā sijjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1196_14: Yo khayanirodhopi tāva visuṃ dhammabhāvenaviññātuṃ dukkarogambhīro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1196_19: Vūpasantatātica tesaṃ sabbaso khayanirodhoevāti vaṭṭadukkhapariyāpannānaṃ sabba vedayītasukhānaṃ ukkaṃsagatā
anya-e0301n0:1196_21: Tassa pana paramatthato vijjamānabhāve tāva idaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1197_0: Atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1197_1: No ce taṃ bhikkhave abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1197_2: na yimassa jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.
anya-e0301n0:1197_3: Yasmāca kho bhikkhave atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1197_4: tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1198_8: Tasmā visuṃ dhammabhāvaṃ sandhāya natthi jātaṃ etthāti ajātantīpi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1198_11: Asati na jāyantīti jātaṃ viya ajātaṃpi tesaṃ atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1198_15: Evaṃsati attani kilesānaṃ ajātatthāya sammā paṭipajjantānaṃpi sabbe kilesadhammā jātāyeva siyuṃ. No ajātā. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1198_19: Evañca sati loke sabbe purisakārā purisathāmā purisaparakkamā niratthakā eva siyunti imamatthaṃ sandhāya no cetaṃ bhikkhave.La.
anya-e0301n0:1198_22: Tasmā attani ajātatthāya sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ te ekantena najāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1198_23: Evaṃ sati sabbe purisakārā purisathāmā purisaparakkamā satthakā eva hontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya yasmāca kho bhikkhavetiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1198_26: Dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evaṃ vuttassa nirodhassa paramatthato vijjamānabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1198_31: Ajjhattapariyā pannānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ uppādassapi sabbaso abhāvo ajāta nironāma.
anya-e0301n0:1198_32: Yo sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbupadhinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1198_35: Kilesānaṃ jārāmaraṇādīnañca vatthubhūtassa nimittassa abhāvā animittonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1198_37: Tena vuttaṃ suññataṃanimittaṃ appaṇihitañceti tividhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1198_39: Tañhi visuṃ asaṃmisso kevalo upalabbhamāno eko paramattha dhammoti padaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1198_45: Attano uttaritarassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvato anuttaranti.
anya-e0301n0:1198_47: mahante sīlakkhandhādike dhamme esiṃsu adhigacchiṃsūti mahesayo, buddhā.
anya-e0301n0:1203_1: Evaṃ chahi paricchedehi cattāro paramatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṃ taṃtaṃrāsisaṅkhātaṃ samuccayaṃ dassento ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n0:1203_2: Ye salakkhaṇā dvāsattatividhā vatthudhammā mayā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1203_3: Idāni tesaṃ samuccayaṃ yathāyogaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1203_4: Tattha salakkhaṇāvatthudhammāti padehi dasavidhāni anipphannarūpāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0301n0:1203_5: Na hi tāni attano āvenikabhūtena sabhāva lakkhaṇena aniccatādi sāmaññalakkhaṇenaca salakkhaṇāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1203_10: Dabbañcanāma idha sarūpato labbhamāno sabhāvo eva.
anya-e0301n0:1203_11: Etena nibbānassapi maggaphala paccavekkhanañāṇesu sarūpato labbhamāna sabhāvatā vuttā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1203_12: Anipphannarūpānaṃ viya ca vatthudhamma sannissayena dissamānadhammamattabhāvaṃ vā paññattidhammānaṃ viya
anya-e0301n0:1203_13: parikappitākāramattabhāvaṃvā sasavisāṇa kacchapalomādīnaṃ viya sabbaso abhūta parikappita mattabhāvaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1203_16: Tesu hi dvāsattatividhesu ekacce eva dhammā purimesu tīsu saṅgahesu āgatā.
anya-e0301n0:1203_18: Etthaca vatthudhammāsalakkhaṇāti padehi anipphannarūpānaṃ salakkhaṇatā paṭikkhipane yaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1204_10: Pupphāsavādayo hi loke cha pañca rattimattaṃ vā sattaṭṭharattimattaṃ vā sayaṃpi kumbhesu parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1204_12: Ime pana anamatagge saṃsāre sayaṃpi sattasantāne parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1204_14: Sakalaṃ sattasantānaṃ sadā āsavapūritameva hoti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1204_15: cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1204_17: Tattha esā taṇhā pariyuṭṭhānavasena uppajjamānā ettheva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1204_18: Uppajjitvāca puna anusayabhāvena parivāsaṃ katvā nivīsamānā ettheva nivīsatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1204_20: Tāva santānaṃ gūthapūritakūpaṃ viya dubbisodhaṃ katvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1204_24: Tasmā ekantena imeyeva cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madani yaṭṭhenaca āsavānāma bhavituṃ arahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1205_1: yathā hi kudhita kuṭṭhino mahāvaṇamukhehi yūsasaṅkhāto āsavo visanditvā pilotikakhaṇḍāni dūseti,
anya-e0301n0:1205_3: Āyataṃvā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savantipasavanti vaḍḍhentīti āsavā. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1205_4: bhavato ābhavaggā dhammato āgotratumhā savanti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti āsavā.
anya-e0301n0:1205_6: Avadhica duvidho mariyādavisayo abhividhivisayocāti tattha yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ bahikatvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1205_9: Yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ byāpetvā anto katvā pavattati,
anya-e0301n0:1205_13: Tasmā bhavaggañca gotrabhuñca byāpetvā anto katvā savantīti attho veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1207_0: Avadhica mariyādaabhividhivasena duvidhoti vatvā puna taṃ vibhāvento “tattha āpātaliputtā devo vuṭṭhotiādīsuviya kriyaṃ bahikatvā pavatto mariyādo.
anya-e0301n0:1207_1: Ābhavaggāsaddo abbhuggatotiādīsuviya kriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhī”ti vadati.
anya-e0301n0:1208_0: Na hi avavidhivisayabhūto bhavaggo lokattayabyāpakaṃ saddassa abbhuggamanakriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1208_1: Naca avadhibhūto attho kriyaṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:1208_2: Kriyāeva pana taṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti yutto.
anya-e0301n0:1208_13: Idha pana taṃ nāmena tadārammaṇā taṇhāeva adhippetā,
anya-e0301n0:1208_17: Vakkhati hi kāmabhava nāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetāti.
anya-e0301n0:1210_0: Purimatthova vutto. So anupapanno, theramatānugatassa idhādhippetassa atthassa avuttattā.
anya-e0301n0:1211_0: Bhavāsavoti ettha duvidho bhavo kammabhavo upapattibhavo ca.
anya-e0301n0:1211_5: Tasmiṃ duvidhe bhave nikantivasena pavatto rūpārūparāgo.
anya-e0301n0:1213_0: “Sassata diṭṭhisahagatoca rāgo ettheva saṅgayhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1214_0: Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigata vippayutta lobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjatīti hi aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1214_1: Yattha pana kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1214_2: Tattheva sassatadiṭṭhi sahagato rāgo yākāci kusalākusala kammabhavanikanti yākāci upapattibhavapatthanā.
anya-e0301n0:1214_4: Idha pana yathāvuttaṃ bhavāsavaṃ thapetvā sabbo lobho kāmāsave eva saṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1217_4: Nanu aññepi mānādayo cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhādiyuttā eva hontīti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1217_5: Imesu pana kāmāsave parivuṭṭhe sati sabbekāmavisayā mānādayo parivuṭṭhāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1217_10: Iti ime eva pārivāsiyaṭṭhādīsu padhānabhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1217_11: Itare pana tadanubandhamattāeva sampajjantīti na te āsavāti visuṃ vattuṃ arahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1217_12: Attani patitaṃ janaṃ anassāsikaṃ katvā ajjhottha ranto hanati māretīti ogho.
anya-e0301n0:1217_15: Yadica avahaññanaṭṭheca duttaraṭṭhenaca oghānāma siyuntiādiko pasaṅgo mānādīnañca oghabhāva parihāro vutta nayena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1218_1: Bhavantaracutiyā saha bhavantarapaṭisandhiṃ gantenti ghaṭentīti ganthā.
anya-e0301n0:1218_3: Tasmā rūpārūpa rāgāpi ettha saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1218_7: Vaṭṭadukkhato vimuttiyā amaggabhūtaṃyeva gosīlagovatādikaṃ parato āmasanaṃ tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇaṃ sīlabbataparāmāso.
anya-e0301n0:1218_9: Kāyasaddo pana sabbattha rūpakāye nāmakāyeca pavattoti atitakāyena paccuppanna kāyaṃ paccuppannakāyenaca anāgatakāyaṃ gantheti ghaṭetīti kāyagantho. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1219_0: Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo tividha mahādiṭṭhiyo aññāpivā sāsane lokeca sandissamānā viparītagāhabhūtā diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1219_1: Yathāgahitaṃvā purimadiṭṭhiṃ idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti upādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1219_4: Tadubhayaṃ saṃsāramuttiyā maggoti daḷhagahaṇaṃ sīlabbatu pādānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1219_5: Attavādupādānanti ettha attā vuccati parikappabuddhiyā gahito ekekasmiṃ satta santāne padhānissaro.
anya-e0301n0:1219_6: Yaṃ lokiyamahājanā sattotivā puggalotivā jīvotivā tathāgatotivā lokotivā sañjānanti.
anya-e0301n0:1219_7: Yañca nānātitthiyā issaranimmitaṃvā adhiccasamuppannaṃvā accantasassataṃvā ekaccasassataṃvā ucchedaṃvā paññapentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1219_8: Taṃ attānaṃ abhivadanticeva upādiyantica sattā etenāti attavā dupādānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1219_10: Tattha abhivadantīti visiṭṭhaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1220_1: Idha assutavā puthujjano rūpaṃ attato samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1221_0: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti rūpameva attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_1: Rūpavantaṃvā attānanti attā me rūpavāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_2: Attani vā rūpanti attānaṃ paṭicca rūpaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_3: Rūpasmiṃvā attānanti rūpaṃ paṭicca attā tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1221_4: Kathaṃ rūpakāyaṃ uddissa ajja ahaṃ thaddhomhīti vā ajja ahaṃ mudukomhītivā vadanto pathavi saṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ attato samanupassatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_5: Ajja mama kāyo thaddhotivā mudūtivā vadanto sesadhammevā dhammamuttakaṃvā attānaṃ gahetvā taṃ attānaṃ pathavīvantaṃ samanupassatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_6: Ajja thaddhabhāvovā mudubhāvovā mayi jātoti vadanto attani pathaviṃsa manupassatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_7: Ajjāhaṃ thaddhabhāve ṭhitomhi mudubhāve ṭhito mhīti vadantopathavimhi attānaṃ samanussatināma.
anya-e0301n0:1221_10: Ahaṃ marāmi marissāmītiādinā hi aniccatāyaṃpi sādiṭṭhi pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1221_14: Parato saṃbhuñjissāmītivā sukhitomhi dukkhitomhītivā vedanaṃ attato samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1221_15: Ajja mama kāyo sukhito dukkhitotivā mamacittaṃ sukhitaṃ dukkhitantivā attānaṃ vedanāvantaṃ samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1221_16: Ajjasukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā mayijātanti attani vedanaṃ samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1221_17: Ajjāhaṃ sukhita bhāve ṭhitomhi dukkhitabhāve ṭhitomhīti vedanāya attānaṃ samanupassatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1222_0: Saññāya sabbesuca paññāsamattesu saṅkhāresu visuṃ visuṃ vitthāretvā vattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1222_4: ahaṃ dassane samatthomhīti viññāṇasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
anya-e0301n0:1222_6: Aha masmi ahaṃ eko satto ekopuggalo eko jīvo eko loko eko naro manusso devosakko brahmātivā ahaṃgacchāmi
anya-e0301n0:1222_7: ahaṃ tiṭṭhāmi ahaṃ nisīdāmi ahaṃ nippajjāmi ahaṃ samiñjemi pasāremītiādinā vā khandhapañcakaṃvā ekamekaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1222_9: Apariññātavatthukānañhi ekamuhutta mattepi yaṃkiñci attanovā parassavā attapaṭisaṃyuttavacanaṃ kathentānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1222_10: cittaṃvā vacanaṃvā yathāvutte rūpārūpadhamme kadāci attato upādiyitvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1223_0: Yasmā pana attanimittaṃnāma vasavattanākāraṃ paṭicca upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1223_1: Vasavattanā kāroca rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paccayāyatta vuttikattaṃ khaṇi kattañca suṭṭhu passantānaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1223_2: Tasmā pariññātavattukānaṃ atta paṭisaṃyuttavacanaṃ kathentānaṃpi cittaṃ paduminipatte udakabindu viya
anya-e0301n0:1223_4: Sattānaṃ cittasantāne kusale dhamme anuppannevā uppādetuṃ uppannevā vā setuṃ adatvā nīvārentīti nīvaraṇāni.
anya-e0301n0:1223_9: Paṭṭhāneāruppekāmacchandaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ paṭiccauddhaccanīvaraṇanti vuttattā pana thapetvā rūpārūparāge avaseso
anya-e0301n0:1223_15: Kasmā panettha thinamiddha nīvaraṇanti ca uddhacca kukkucca nīvaraṇanti ca dve dve dhammā ekaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ katvā vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:1223_17: Tathā hi kiccato tāva thinamiddhadvayaṃ cittuppādānaṃ līnabhāvā pādanakiccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1224_4: Tāva antarā aparikkhiyyamānā hutvā kāraṇalābhe sati punappunaṃ uppajjantīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1224_10: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ puthujjanassa sattapi anusayā anusayavāre saha anusentīti uppajjanavāre saha uppajjantīti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1224_11: Yathāha puthujjanassa avijjānusayoca anuseti. Kāmarāga. Paṭigha. Māna. Diṭṭhi.
anya-e0301n0:1225_1: sarūpato pariyuṭṭhānaṃ apatvā santāne pavattamānehi kusalākusalā byākatacittuppādehi saha anurūpā aviruddhā hutvā senti.
anya-e0301n0:1225_2: Visuṃ sampayuttadhammabhāvena avuṭṭhitā hutvā sayitā hontīti anusayā.
anya-e0301n0:1225_4: Pakatiyā yathānusayitesueva kāmarāgādīsu punappunaṃ uppajjitvā diguṇa tiguṇādi vasena punappunaṃ senti.
anya-e0301n0:1226_0: Tīsu rāgādīnaṃ avatthāsu pathamāvatthāya ṭhitānaṃ kāmarāgā dīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1226_1: Tisso hi avatthā anusayāvatthā pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā vītikkamāvatthāti.
anya-e0301n0:1226_2: Tattha ye kāmarāgādayo uppajjitvā kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ cālenti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_4: Ye manasmiṃ eva javanacittasahajātā hutvā pavattanti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_6: Ye pana javanasahajātabhāvaṃpi apatvā vāsanādhātuyo viya cikkasantānā nusayitā hutvā pariyuṭṭhānappattiyā bījabhāvena tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_7: subhanimittādikeca ārammaṇe āpātamāgate yesaṃ vasena āvajjanaṃ rāgādipātubhāvatthāya ayoniso bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_8: abhāvitañca cittaṃ yesaṃ vasena damathaṃ naupeti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_18: Yadā pana te samuṭṭha hitvā pariyuṭṭhānabhāvaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0301n0:1226_21: Etadatthaṃ sandhāya kathāvatthumhi tesaṃ sārammaṇadhammabhāvo saṅkhārakkhandhabhāvoca patiṭṭhāpito hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1227_0: Yathā pana phaladhārimhi rukkhamhi visakaṇṭake dinne rukkhānusayito phaluppattiyā paccayabhūto sineho parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1227_2: Evaṃ sānusaye citta santāne yasmiṃ khaṇe maggo pātubhavati,
anya-e0301n0:1227_3: tasmiṃ sahamagguppādā so so anusayo parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1227_5: kuto vītikkamoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya maggo anāgatasāmaññaṃ kilesajātaṃ pajahatīti tattha tattha vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1227_8: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ maggo yekilese pajahati,
anya-e0301n0:1227_9: te atītākivā anāgatātivā paccuppannātivā navattabbāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1227_10: Etenaca maggo kilesamukhena yāni kusalākusalakammānica upādinnakakhandhapañcakeca pajahati,
anya-e0301n0:1227_12: Yadi evaṃ maggena pahīnā sabbe tebhūmakadhammā kālavimuttānāma ataṅkhatā nāma apaccayānāma siyunti.Na.
anya-e0301n0:1227_14: Te hi magge anuppanne ime nāmadhammā uppajjissanti nirujjhissantīti evaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ āhacca ñāṇena
anya-e0301n0:1227_16: Evañca katvā visuṃ sampayuttadhammabhāvaṃ apattānaṃ anusayāvatthāya vā vāsanāvatthāyavā kammasamaṅgītāvatthāyavā
anya-e0301n0:1227_17: āsayajjhāsayā dhimutticaritavatthāsuvā ṭhitānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ jātivasena paramattha dhammatā akusalāditāca
anya-e0301n0:1229_0: “Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanā rahā santāne anuanusayitā viya hontīti tadavatthā anusayāti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:1229_3: Tattha anusayānāma santāne kadācipi anuppanna pubbā anāgata kilesā evāti katvā santāne anu anusayitā viya hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1230_0: Na hi te anuanusayitā viya honti. Ekantena anusayitāeva hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1232_0: “Te pana nippariyāyato anāgatakilesā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1233_0: Na hi maggena appahīnā anusayā anāgatānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:1233_3: Etena atītapaccuppannāpi taṃsabhāvattātathā vuccantīti idaṃvipaṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1233_4: uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅga pattānaṃeva ekantena tekālikatā hotīti tadapattānaṃ anusayānaṃ paccuppannatā pariyāyova vattuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n0:1233_5: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ yassa kāmarāganusayo uppajjati,
anya-e0301n0:1233_6: tassa paṭighānusayo uppajjatītiādinā paccuppannakāliko uppādavāro eva vutto,
anya-e0301n0:1233_9: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:1233_13: Taṃ pariyuṭṭhānapattānaṃ ekantapaccuppannakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1233_14: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ bhutvā vigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ samudācāruppannanti catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1233_15: Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ ārammaṇā dhiggahi tuppannaṃ avikkhambhituppannaṃ asamugghāṭituppannanti catubbidhaṃ maggavajjhanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1233_16: Tattha vattamānuppannaṃ samudā cāruppannanti idaṃ dvayaṃ khaṇapaccuppannameva.
anya-e0301n0:1234_0: Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃnāma attano khandhesu anusayitānaṃ maggena appahīnānaṃ anusayānaṃeva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1234_1: Ārammaṇādhiggahituppannaṃ nāma subhanimittādike ārammaṇe sakiṃ javitvā yāva tammūlako pariyuṭṭhānavego na vūpasammati,
anya-e0301n0:1234_2: tāva adhimattathāmagata bhāvena ṭhitānaṃ tesaññeva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1234_3: Anusayā hi nāma anamatagge saṃsāre punappunaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapattānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena uparupari thira tara
anya-e0301n0:1234_5: Na yenavā tenavā vāyāmena pajahituṃ sakkuṇeyyā.
anya-e0301n0:1234_6: Evaṃ santepi yadā yo yo anusayo paccayalābhena pariyuṭṭhāna bahulo hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1234_7: tadā so so visesena adhimattathāma gatabhāvaṃ patvā ṭhito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1234_8: Yadā yo yo paṭipakkhadhamma samādānena niggahapatto hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1234_9: tadā so so mandathāma gatabhāvaṃ patvā ṭhito hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1234_10: Avikkhambhituppannaṃnāma samatha vipassanāhi suṭṭhuaniggahitānaṃ tesaññeva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1234_11: Asamugghāṭi tuppannaṃnāma maggena appahīnānaṃ bhūmiladdhānaṃ tesaṃeva nāmanti.
anya-e0301n0:1234_12: Yasmā pana lokuttaradhammānāma kilesānaṃ accantapaṭipakkhā hontīti heṭṭhimā maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhā sekkhā
anya-e0301n0:1234_13: attano maggaphalakkhaṇesu upari maggājjhehipi anusayehi sānusayātivā nirānusayātivā thāmavatātivā athāmagatātivā
anya-e0301n0:1234_15: Tasmā anusayānaṃ tādise paccuppanna bhāve satipi hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:1234_16: Tenahi thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahatīti vutta doso natthīti veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:1235_1: tāni pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmacchando byāpādoti pañca orambhāgiyāni.
anya-e0301n0:1235_2: Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjāti pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyānīti suttante abhidhammeca dasasaṃyojanāni āgatāni.
anya-e0301n0:1235_3: Itarāni pana abhidhammeeva āgatānīti tato visesakaraṇatthaṃ suttanteti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1235_5: Sabhāga dhammasaṅgahavasena pana idha aññathā kamo vutto siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1235_7: Kilissantivā malīnabhāvaṃ nihīnabhāvañca gacchanti sattā etehīti kilesā.
anya-e0301n0:1235_8: Kāmabhavanāmenāti vatthukāmadīpakena kāmanāmena rūpārūpabhavadīpakena ca bhavanāmena.
anya-e0301n0:1235_9: Tādisaṃ kāma bhavasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vatthu etissāti tabbatthukā.
anya-e0301n0:1235_10: Tathā pavattanti sīlabbatāni parato āmasanākārena idaṃ me saccaṃ moghamaññanti abhinivisanākārena khandhesu attābhinivesākārenaca pavattaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1235_12: Ayaṃ pāpasaṅgaho akusalaṅgaho navadhā vuttoti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1236_1: Missaka saṅgahe pāṇātipātādīni pāpakammāni karontānaṃpi cittassa ārammaṇe ujukaraṇaṃnāma jhānena vinā na sijjhatīti vuttaṃ sattajhānaṅgānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1236_2: Kalyāṇevā pāpakevā ārammaṇe ujukaṃ cittapaṭipādanasaṅkhātassa upanijjhāyana kiccassa aṅgānīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1236_5: Kalyāṇakamma pāpakammasaṅkhātāsu sugati duggati vivaṭṭasaṅkhātāsuca nānādisāsu taṃtaṃdisāti mukhappavattisaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n0:1236_6: cittassa gatināma sammāvā micchāvā pavattehi dassanādīhi eva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ dvādasamaggaṅgānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1236_7: Cittassa ujugatiyāvā vaṅkagatiyāvā gamanassa pathaṅgāni upāyaṅgānīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1236_8: Tattha micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappa micchāvāyāma micchāsamādhayo pāpakamma duggatibhava saṅkhātāsu ahitadisāsu
anya-e0301n0:1236_10: itarāni kalyāṇakamma sugatibhava vivaṭṭadhammasaṅkhātāsu hitadisāsu ujugatiyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1236_11: Tattha pāṇātipātakamme vitakka vicāra domanassekaggatā saṅkhātaṃ caturaṅgikajjhānaṃ micchāsaṅkappa micchāvāyāma
anya-e0301n0:1236_14: Vibhaṅge pana suttantesuca micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāsatīti imepi cattāro āgatā.
anya-e0301n0:1236_16: Tathā tathā pavattānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacananti katvā idha nagahitā.
anya-e0301n0:1238_0: “Sugati duggatīnaṃ nibbānassa ca abhimukhaṃ pāpanato maggā;
anya-e0301n0:1239_0: Na hi aṅgāni maggānaṃ pathabhūtānināma honti;
anya-e0301n0:1239_1: Maggasaddoyeva pathapariyāyo aṭṭhakathāsu vutto na aṅgasaddoti;
anya-e0301n0:1241_0: “Maggassavā aṭṭhaṅgikassa aṅgāni maggaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi anupapannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1242_0: Idha hi katthaci citte tiyaṅgiko katthaci caturaṅgikotiādinā nānāmaggova adhippetoti.
anya-e0301n0:1242_3: Attādhīnavuttike dhamme attano gatiyaṃ sabbaso vattetuṃ samatthabhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1242_4: Iti tesu tesu kiccesu attano ādhipaccasaṅkhātaṃ indaṭṭhaṃ karonti sādhentīti indriyāni.
anya-e0301n0:1242_9: Bhāvadvayaṃ itthākārādivasena pavattiyaṃ catusamuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃ sakalakhandhapañcakasseva vā issaro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1242_11: Tathā hi yasmiṃ santāne paṭisandhiyaṃ itthibhāvo pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1242_12: Tasmiṃ sabbe kammādipaccayā catusamuṭṭhānarūpasantatiṃ samuṭṭhāpentā itthākārasahitameva samuṭṭhāpenti,
anya-e0301n0:1242_16: Jīvitadvayaṃ rūpā rūpasantatīnaṃ ratti diva māsa saṃvaccharānukkamena addhānapharaṇe sahajātadhammānaṃ issaro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1242_26: Yathā hi silāyaṃ pathavī sahajātehi anabhibhavanīyā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1242_27: Attanāvate abhibhavitvā visuṃ avijjamāneviya katvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1242_28: Yathā ca udake āpo aggimhi tejo vāte vāyo.
anya-e0301n0:1243_5: Ākhyātikaṃpi hi padaṃ saññāsaddabhāve ṭhitaṃ nāmikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n0:1243_7: Evañhi sati tassa padantarena saha samāsabhāvo navirujjhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1243_8: Anaññātaññassāmīti evaṃ paṭipannassa indriyaṃ anaññā taññassāmītindriyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1243_9: Ādimanasikārato paṭṭhāya tādisena ussāhena saha vipassanaṃ ārabhantassa tasmiṃ ussāhe apaṭipassaddheyeva
anya-e0301n0:1243_13: pathamamaggena anaññātaṃ ñatvāpi kilesappahānakiccassa apariniṭṭhitattā tassa jānanakiccassa vippakatabhāvena
anya-e0301n0:1243_14: yathā diṭṭhe tasmiṃ catusaccadhamme amatapadeeva vā punappunaṃ jānanakicca yuttānaṃ indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1243_15: Aññātāvindriyanti aññā tāvino pariniṭṭhita ājānana kiccassa khīṇāsavassa indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1243_16: Tividhaṃ petaṃ tathārūpe jānane sampayutta dhammānaṃ issaro hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_0: Tattha imesaṃ sattānaṃ pākaṭe rūpakāye attagāhadaḷhattaṃ tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ ādito pañca pasādindriyāni vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:1244_1: Tassa attassa itthipuma tābhedo imesaṃ vasena hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1244_2: Tasmiṃ vā itthipurisa gāho tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ kadanantaraṃ bhāvindriyadvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_3: Soca attā imassa vasena jīvasaññaṃ labhati.
anya-e0301n0:1244_4: Tasmiṃvā jīvagāho tabbimuttica imassa apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ tadanantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_5: Idaṃ pana bhāvindriyato pure vattabbaṃpi rūpārūpa missakattā idha vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_6: Nāmakāye attagāhadaḷhattaṃ tabbimuttica imassa apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ nāmindriyesu manindriyaṃ ādito vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_7: Soca arūpī attā imesaṃ vasena saṃkiliṭṭho vipphanditoca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1244_8: Tasmiṃvā sukhitadukkhitagāho tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ tadanantaraṃ pedanindriyapañcakaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_9: Tassa saṃkiliṭṭhassa vodānappattiyā taṃtaṃgāhavimuttiyāvā paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saddhādipañcindriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1244_10: Tāya paṭipattiyā vodānappatti yā ādi majjha pariyosāna dassanatthaṃ ante tīṇi lokuttarindriyāni vuttānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1246_0: “Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ agahaṇanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1247_0: Nahi santesupi aññesu indriyabhāvārahesu dhammesu ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhiyā tesaṃ aññesaṃ bhagavato therassaca agahaṇanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1247_4: Baliyanti uppannuppanne paṭipakkhadhamme sahanti maddantīti balāni.
anya-e0301n0:1247_10: Parissayāti abalā rāgādi parissayāti attho. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1247_12: Tasmā assaddhiyasaṅkhātena paṭipakkhadhammena kampetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatā saddhābalaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1249_0: Pāpabaladukaṃ paṭipakkhena yojetuṃ nalabbhatīti katvā “ahirikānottappadvayaṃ pana sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāve nevāti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1250_0: Sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvotica paṭipakkhehi akampiyatā tica atthato nānattābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1250_5: So pana padesa issaro sakalissaroti duvidho.
anya-e0301n0:1250_6: Tattha indriyāni paresaṃ visaye sayaṃ paravase vattitvā attano visayeeva parehi attano vase vattāpentīti padesissarā nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1250_7: Pubbāti saṅkhāravasena pubbāgamanavasena vā visesetvā pavattaṃ adhipatiṭṭhānaṃ patvā pana añño dutiyo issaronāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1251_1: Chandavato kiṃnāma kammaṃ nasijjhatīti evaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāravasenavā pubbe atītabhavesu suṭṭhu āsevitachandāgamanavasenavā
anya-e0301n0:1251_2: tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpakammesu sampayuttadhamme mahoghoviya tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne niccaṃ paggahitadhure
anya-e0301n0:1251_5: Nanu cettha pacchimā tayo dhammā adhipatibhāvaṃ gaṇhantā indriyabhāvaṃ avijahitvāva gaṇhantīti adhipatibhūtāva
anya-e0301n0:1251_9: Yathā hi rājā cakkavattī ekassa attano purohitassa santike ekaṃ dibbavijjaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1251_15: Tattha adhipatikiccaṃnāma taṃtaṃkicca visesaṃ anapekkhitvā atulyabalena abhibhavitvā sahajāta dhamme
anya-e0301n0:1251_16: attano attano kiccesu anivattamāne katvā dhura vāhitā.
anya-e0301n0:1252_0: Āharanti sahajātādipaccayasāmaññato atirekena asādhāraṇapaccayasattivisesena haranti pavattentīti āhārā.
anya-e0301n0:1252_1: Āharantivā ajjhattasambhūtā te te paccayadhammā paccayuppannadhammāca attānañceva attano attano paccayakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1252_2: paccayuppannakiccañca suṭṭhu haranti vahanti etehīti āhārā.
anya-e0301n0:1252_4: Etthaca sabbe sattāti etena sabbe ajjhattasambhūtā paccayapaccayuppannadhammā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1252_9: Idha pana catubbidho āhārapaccayadhammova vuttoti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1252_10: paccayaṭṭhena pana āhāranāmakānaṃ sabbesaṃ catuvīsatipaccayadhammānaṃ majjhe yedhammā cattāro āhārāti visesetvā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1252_11: Te tesaṃ paccayāhārānaṃpi āhārabhūtāti siddhā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1252_12: Imasmiṃ atthe catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ mahanta bhāvo pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_0: Tattha yathā yavabījānaṃvā sālibījānaṃvā ānubhāvo nāma kaḷiraṅkurānaṃ uppādāna padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_1: Tatoparaṃ pana sassabhāvaṃ patvā cha pañca māse vaḍḍhiyāvā ṭhitiyāvā pathavi rasaāporasānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_2: Evamevaṃ kabaḷī kārāhārūpajīvīnaṃ kāmasattānaṃ kammassa ānubhāvonāma paṭisandhirūpuppādane padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_3: Tatoparaṃ pana yāvatāyukaṃ vaḍḍhīyāvāṭhitiyāvā utuāhārānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_4: Kammajarūpāni hi yāva āsannamaraṇā pavattamānānipi utuāhārehi anuggahitānieva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_5: Utuca āhāru patthambhitoyeva attano kiccaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_6: Tasmā tesaṃ sattānaṃ catusantatirūpaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārena anupatthambhīyamānaṃ ciraṃ napavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1253_8: Yathāca sakuṇāvā ḍaṃsamakasā dayovā tuṇḍena āhāraṃ gahetvā attabhāvaṃ posenti.
anya-e0301n0:1253_10: Evameva ime sattā phassena ārammaṇesu rasaṃ gahetvā vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ sampādetvā taṇhāvepullaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1253_11: patvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ pūretvā yāvajjatanāpi vaṭṭe anukaṇṭhamānā pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_1: ārammaṇarasaṃ alabhitvā vedanā paribhogarahitena taṇhuppattiyā okāso natthīti tividhavaṭṭameva nasiyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_2: Yathāca te sakuṇādayo pakkhe viyūhitvā antarā apatamānā rukkhato rukkhaṃ vanato vanaṃ vicaritvā attānaṃ yāpenti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_3: Pakkhesu asantesu gamanaṃ asampādentā patitvā maranti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_4: Evamevaṃ ime sattā āyūhanalakkhaṇāya cetanāya cetayitvā kammasamaṅgitaṃ sampādetvā bhavato bhavaṃ vicaritvā yāvajjatanā vaṭṭe saṃsaranti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_8: Tadabhāveca tadanusayitassa kilesavaṭṭassa abhāvoti vaṭṭaṃnāma na siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_9: Yathāca te sakuṇādayo cakkhunā gocaraṭṭhānaṃvā taṃtaṃdisābhāgaṃvā vibhāvetvā yāvajīvaṃ attānaṃ yāpenti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_10: Cakkhusmiṃ asante kiñcigahetabbavatthuṃvā gantabbaṭṭhānaṃvā alabhitvā tattheva maranti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_11: Evamevaṃ sampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇavijānalakkhaṇena viññāṇena taṃtaṃārammaṇaṃ labhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ phassādayo uppādetvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭenti.
anya-e0301n0:1254_13: phassādīnaṃ ārammaṇalābhoyeva natthīti vaṭṭameva na siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1255_0: Cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃvā sattānaṃ anuggahāya kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷārikovā sukhumovā,
anya-e0301n0:1256_2: Catunnaṃpana āhārānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭevā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavevā ṭhitiyāvā anuggahāyavā pavatti ākāro vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1256_10: Ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanaṃ pana kabaḷīkārāhārassa mahantaṃ kiccaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1256_12: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitiyātica anuggahāyātica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1257_0: Apica yathā upanissayāsevanapaccayā suttanti kapariyāyā abhidhammapariyāyātica duvidhā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_4: Nahi paṭṭhāne arūpā hārā asahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ āhāraṭṭhena paccayānāma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_6: Tāni hi dubbalakiccaṭṭhānavatthukattā rūpādīsu abhinipātamattāni hontīti na tesu vijjamānā vedanā ekaggatā jhānakiccaṃ sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_8: Jhānaṅgānaṃ nāyakabhūtoca vitakko tesu natthīti tattha tāvedanā ekaggatāyo taṃ na sādhentīti.
