anya-e0301n0:1257_9: Vīriyupatthambharahitā dhammā sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvappattā nahontīti avīriyesu soḷasāhetukacittesu samādhibalakiccaṃ na sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_10: Vīriyapacchimakaṃ balanti hi vuttanti āha avīriyesu balāni nalabbhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_11: Heturahitā ca dhammā vaṭṭassa vivaṭṭassaca pattiyā pathabhāvaṃ nagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_12: Hetupacchimako maggoti hi vuttanti āha ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1257_13: Vicikicchāsampayuttecitte ekaggatā adhimokkharahi tattā ekantena saṃsappanasabhāvāya vicikicchāya abhibhūtattā
anya-e0301n0:1257_14: ca maggindriyabalabhāvāya balavatī nahotīti vuttaṃ vicikicchā citte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na
anya-e0301n0:1257_16: Dvihetuka tihetuka javanesvevāti ettha dvihetuka tihetukasaddena momūhadvayahasanajavanāni nivatteti.
anya-e0301n0:1259_1: javanabhāvasāmaññattā pana hasanacittepi tesaṃ abhāvo dassetabboyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1260_0: Yathāsambhavanti laddhapubbāti saṅkhārassa laddhapubbāgamassa ca ekekassa adhipatino sambhavānurūpaṃ ekova labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1260_3: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne yathā indriyapaccayavibhaṅge arūpinoindriyā sampayuttakānaṃdhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca
anya-e0301n0:1260_6: Tattha pana chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānantiādinā ekekādhipati vibhāgavaseneva vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1260_7: Evañhi sati adhipati indriyānaṃ viseso pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1260_9: Kusalā kusalā byākatehi samākiṇṇo kusalādi samākiṇṇo.
anya-e0301n0:1261_2: Bujjhantivā tāni taṃ samaṅgino etāyāti bodhi.
anya-e0301n0:1261_4: Vuttañhetaṃ mahā niddese bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu- ñāṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:1261_7: Adhisīlā dhicittā dhipaññā saṅkhātāsu tīsu sikkhāsu pariyāpannānaṃ satthusāsanadhammānaṃ etaṃnāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1261_8: Te pana koṭṭhāsato satta vidhā hontīti āha cattārosatipaṭṭhānātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1261_9: Sampayutta dhammesu pamukhā padhānā hutvā kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhanti nānārammaṇesu cittagamanaṃ nivattetvā
anya-e0301n0:1261_10: tesveva kāyādīsu citta nibandhanavasena pavattantīti paṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0301n0:1261_12: Cattārisatipaṭṭhānānīti vattabbe dhammabhāvaṃ apekkhitvā cattārosatipaṭṭhānā tivuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1261_14: Rūpakāye rūpasamūhe assāsapassāsādikassa avayavakāyassa taṃtaṃkāyabhāvenavā aniccādibhāvenavā yāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāye sammoho pahiyyati.
anya-e0301n0:1261_16: Navappabhedāsu vedanāsu sukhavedanādi kāyaavayavavedanāya taṃtaṃ vedanābhāvena udayabbayavasena ca anupassanā vedanānupassanā.
anya-e0301n0:1261_17: Soḷasa pabhedesu sarāgā dīsu cittesu sarāgādikassa avayavacittassa taṃtaṃ cittabhāvena udayabbayavasenaca anupassanā cittānupassanā.
anya-e0301n0:1261_18: Pañcapabhedesu nīvaraṇādīsu dhammesu kāmacchandādikassa avayavadhammassa taṃ taṃ dhammabhāvena udayabbayavasenaca anupassanā dhammānupassanā.
anya-e0301n0:1263_0: “Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo. Assāsa passāsānaṃvā samūho kāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundara meva.
anya-e0301n0:1265_0: “Kāyassa anupassanā kāyānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1266_1: Etena hi kāye anupassanā kāyānupassanāti ayamatthova padhānato dassitoti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_0: Na hi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ saññāsaṅkhārāva visesetvā dhammāti vuttā atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_6: Yadievaṃ ekāya dhammānupassanāya vuttāya itarāpi siddhāti satipaṭṭhānaṃ ekameva vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1271_11: Soca tathā anupassantassa visesato sukhumassa attavipallāsassa pahānāya hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_14: Naca taṃtaṃ kāyabhāvena gahito taṃtaṃ rūpadhammasamūho nibbattita paramatthadhammonāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_16: Soca tathā anupassantassa visesato oḷārikassa subhādi vipallāsassa pahānāya hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_17: Tathā vedanācittesupi oḷārikavipallāso sukhumavipallāsoti dve dve vipallāsā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1271_20: Tattha vedanā cittā nupassanā oḷārikavipallāsānaṃ pahānāya visuṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1271_28: Na taṃ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ anivattanavutti vasena pavattassa sammāvāyāmassa etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1271_29: So pana tathā pavatto ekopi samāno kiccasiddhivasena catudhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1272_0: Tattha uppannānaṃpāpakānanti asukasmiṃ kāle dese ṭhāne vā ahaṃ idañcidañca nāma pāpaṃ akāsiṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1272_1: idañcidañcanāma mayhaṃ uppannanti evaṃ attano santāne uppannabhāvena viditānaṃ akusalānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1272_2: Pahānāyāti tesaṃ attano santāne ajjatagge yāvaparinibbānāpuna anuppādadhammatāpādanakaraṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1272_3: Vāyāmoti sīla pūraṇa samatha vipassanābhāvanākammesu daḷhaṃ vāyāmo.
anya-e0301n0:1272_4: Anuppannānanti attano santāne uppannapubbanti aviditānaṃ parasantānesuvā suttantesuvā disvāvā sutvāvā viditānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1272_5: Anuppādāyāti yesaṃ akusala mūlānaṃ atthitāya imesaṃ sattānaṃ īdisāni kilesajātāni vā pāpakammānivā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1272_8: Ahaṃpi svevā parasuvevā bhavantaresuvā tāni attano santāne uppādessā miyevāti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1272_10: Anuppannānaṃkusalānanti catubhūmakesu kusaladhammesu sattavisuddhipabhedesu imenāma visuddhidhammā mayā
anya-e0301n0:1272_11: appattā anadhigatāeva hontīti evaṃ ñatvā samaye anatikkanteeva appattānaṃ anadhigatānaṃ upari visuddhidhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1273_0: Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ bhiyyo bhāvāyāti yāni sīlādīni kusalāni mayi uppannāni.
anya-e0301n0:1273_3: Svevā parasuvevā bhavantaraṃ patvāvā bhijjissanti yevāti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā attano santāne uppannānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1273_5: Etesu pana catūsu mukhesu yena kenaci ekena mukhena uppanno vāyāmo catukiccasādhakoeva hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1273_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana maggakkhaṇe eva ekassa tassa catukiccasādhakatā vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:1274_1: tassa tassa yogakammassa siddhi samiddhi nibbattīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1274_2: Sā pana saṅkhepato abhiññeyyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsiddhi,
anya-e0301n0:1274_7: Ijjhatītivā iddhi satthusāsane yogakammena ijjhantānaṃ sabbesaṃ mahaggata lokuttaradhammānaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1274_11: So pana catunnaṃ adhipatidhammānaṃ vasena catudhā hotīti vuttaṃ cattāro iddhipādātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1274_14: Etthaca sabbe mahaggatānuttarabhūtā uttarimanussa dhammānāma napākatikena chandenavā vīriyenavā cittenavā paññāya vā adhigantabbā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1274_15: Yena kenaci palibodhena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyena adhipatibhāvapattena chandādināeva adhigantabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1274_16: Tasmā ime cattāro dhammā adhipatibhūtāva idha adhippetāti daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:1276_4: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti.
anya-e0301n0:1276_7: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhīti imāya pāḷiyā sameti.
anya-e0301n0:1276_8: Evaṃsantepi idha abhidhammapariyāyova adhippetoti taṃ na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1277_0: Vibhaṅge pana pathamavāre lokiya lokuttaramissakā citta cetasikarāsīeva iddhipādāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1277_18: Tato tato vuṭṭhahitvā uppāditamaggo iddhināmātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1277_19: Idha pana uttaracūḷabhājaniye āgatanayena cattāro adhipatidhammāeva iddhipādāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1278_3: Pākaṭaṭṭhānato pana catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhāya thāmo veditabbo. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1278_15: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññāya thāmo veditabbo. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1278_19: samantato bujjhati paṭivijjhati bujjhanti vā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:1278_20: Sā hi catusaccadhammaṃ bujjhamānā ekakkhaṇe soḷasahi atthehi saddhiṃ samantato bujjhati,
anya-e0301n0:1278_21: na ekadesa toti tassā sambodhiyā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena sambodhiyā aṅgo sahakārībalavapaccayoti sambojjhaṅgo.
anya-e0301n0:1278_23: Sā hi kāyādīsu catūsu attano gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamānā anupubbena sabbapamāda pakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1278_24: vidhametvā sabbaṃ appamādapakkhañca pūretvā catumaggaññāṇa saṅkhātaṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1278_25: Vipassanāya bhūmibhūte ajjhatta bahiddhādhamme vicināti kakkhaḷattaphusanādīhi aniccatādīhica vividhā
anya-e0301n0:1278_26: kārehi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānoviya tesu daṭṭhabbākāraṃ asesaṃ upadhāretīti dhammavicayo.
anya-e0301n0:1278_28: Sopi hi attano gocarabhūtesu tesu dhammesu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamāno anupubbena sabbaṃsammoha
anya-e0301n0:1278_29: pakkhaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ asammohapakkhaṃ pūretvā sayaṃ catumaggañāṇa sambodhi hutvā samuṭṭhahatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1278_31: Tampi hi catubbidhesu attano gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānaṃ anupubbena sabbaṃ kusalesu
anya-e0301n0:1278_32: dhammesu līnasaṅkoca kosajjapakkhaṃ kilesajātaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhurasaṃpaggahapakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ
anya-e0301n0:1279_1: Sāpi hi vuttappakāresu gocaresu suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā kusalesu dhammesu sabbaṃ cittassa aratiukkaṇṭhapakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1279_2: vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhammarati dhammanandidhammārāma pakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1279_4: Sāpi hi vuttapakāresu gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa sārambha darathapakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1279_5: vidhametvā sabbaṃ vūpasantasītalapakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1279_8: Tatramajjhattatā saṅkhātā upekkhāeva sambojjhaṅgoti upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo.
anya-e0301n0:1279_9: Sāpihi vuttappakāresu satiādīnaṃ gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa līnuddhaccapakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1279_10: vidhametvā samavāhitapakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1279_17: Yathā sammādiṭṭhi daṭṭhabbasabhāvesu pharamānā pavattati tathā tassā saṃvidhānanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1279_18: Teneva hi so paññākkhandhe saṅgahitoti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1279_25: Passaddhidvayaṃ passaddhisāmaññena ekaṃ katvā cuddasete sabhāvatoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1279_26: Sattadhāti vuttappakārānaṃ satipaṭṭhānacatukka sammappadhānacatukkādīnaṃ vasena sattadhā.
anya-e0301n0:1279_27: Idāni tesaṃ cuddasannaṃ kiccānaṃ ṭhānabhedaṃ dassetuṃ saṅkappapassaddhicātiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:1281_0: “Sattadhā tattha saṅgahoti vatvā puna taṃ dassetuṃ saṅkappapassaddhicātiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1282_0: Na hi tattha satta sarūpaṃ labbhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1282_3: Chandoca cittañca ekaṃ iddhipādaṭṭhānanti evaṃ navadhammā ekaṭṭhānikā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1282_4: Ekaṃ vīriyaṃ catusammappadhāna iddhi pādindriya balabojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena navaṭṭhānikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1282_5: Ekā sati catusatipaṭṭhāna indriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena aṭṭhaṭṭhānikā.
anya-e0301n0:1282_6: Eko samādhi indriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena catuṭṭhāniko.
anya-e0301n0:1282_7: Ekāpaññā iddhipādindriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena pañcaṭṭhānikā.
anya-e0301n0:1282_8: Ekā saddhā indriya bala vasena duṭṭhānikāti.
anya-e0301n0:1282_9: Te pana sattatiṃsa pabhedā dhammā pubbabhāge nānārammaṇā nānākhaṇikāca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1282_10: Maggaphalesu pana navaṭṭhānikaṃ vīriyaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃkatvā navasuṭhānesu atta paṭipakkhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1282_11: pāpa dhammānaṃ paccaya yamugghātavasena nava kiccāni sādhayamānaṃ ekameva pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1282_13: Tasmā te ekakkhaṇe ekacitte sabbe ekato upalabbhantīti vuttaṃ sabbe lokuttare hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1282_14: Navāsaṅkappa pītiyoti ettha vāsaddo kvaci saddattho.
anya-e0301n0:1282_15: Saṅkappo kvaci dutīyajjhānikā dikepītica kvaci catutthajjhānikādike lokuttare nahontīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1283_0: Lokiyepīti sīlavisodhanādivasena pavatte kāmā vacarakusalādike lokiyakusala kriyacittuppādepi.
anya-e0301n0:1283_1: Yathā yoganti sīlavisodhanakamma samathakammanāmarūpapariggahādikammesu yujjitabbānaṃ viratittayādīnaṃ anurūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1283_2: Chabbisuddhipavattiyanti sīla visuddhādīnaṃ channaṃ visuddhīnaṃ anukkamena pavattikāle.
anya-e0301n0:1283_3: Etena diṭṭheva dhamme maggaphalapatiṭṭhābhāvatthāya pūrite catupārisuddhi sīlepi saddhāsatiādayo bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgahitā eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1283_4: Tathā maggapādakatthāya uppāditesu mahaggatajjhānesu mīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1284_0: Evaṃ bhāvito kho kuṇḍaliya indriyasaṃvaro tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti.
anya-e0301n0:1284_1: Evaṃ bhāvitāni tīṇi sucaritāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti.
anya-e0301n0:1284_2: Evaṃ bhāvitā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
anya-e0301n0:1284_3: Evaṃ bhāvitā satta bojjhaṅge vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1285_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi nakevalaṃ balavavipassanā maggaphalesueva bojjhaṅge uddharanti.
anya-e0301n0:1285_1: Vipassanāpādaka kasiṇajjhāna ānāpāṇā suka brahmavihārajjhānesupi uddharantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1286_2: Atītādi bheda bhinnānaṃ rūpānaṃ khandho rāsīti rūpakkhandho.
anya-e0301n0:1286_3: Ekasmiṃ ruppana lakkhaṇe rāsiṃ katvā ñāṇena pariggahitā rūpadhammāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1286_4: Tathā ekasmiṃ vedayitalakkhaṇe sañjānana lakkhaṇe rāsiṃ katvā pariggahitā atītādibhedabhinnā vedanāsaññāyo vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho canāma.
anya-e0301n0:1286_7: Tehi chasuvā upapattidvāresu tīsuvā kammadvāresu ekato saṅgamma samāgamma phusanacetayitādīhi attano
anya-e0301n0:1286_8: attano kiccehi dassanasavanādīni sādhāraṇakiccānivā kāyika vācasikamānasikānivā sayana nisajjaṭṭhāna
anya-e0301n0:1286_9: gamana kathana cintanādīni sabbāni kiccāni karonti vidahantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1287_1: Saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saṅkhārāti vuccanti.
anya-e0301n0:1287_8: Saṅkhata mabhisaṅkharontīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saṅkhārāti vuccantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1288_0: Tattha rūpaṃ rūpatthāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle sayana nisajjādivasena pavattā yā yā rūpavikati icchīyati,
anya-e0301n0:1288_1: tasmiṃtasmiṃ kāle tassā tassā rūpavikatiyā jātatthāya iriyāpatha parivattanādi vasena taṃ taṃ rūpavikatiṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1288_2: Khajjabhojjādikaṃ vatthālaṅkārādikaṃ mañca pīṭha geha rathādikaṃ sabbaṃ upabhoga paribhogabhūtaṃ bāhira rūpaṃpi gahetvā yojetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1288_4: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vedanaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontā cittakammanaccagītādīni taṃ taṃ vedanupakaraṇāni
anya-e0301n0:1288_5: sampādana vasena samparāyikañca abhisaṅkharontā mānusakaṃvā dibbaṃvā taṃtaṃ vedanaṃ patthetvā dāna sīlādi
anya-e0301n0:1288_8: Saṅkhāresu pana phassaṃ phassatthāya cetanaṃ cetanatthāyātiādinā dānaṃ dānatthāya sīlaṃ sīlatthāya pāṇātipātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1288_9: pāṇātipātatthāyātiādinā vā sabbaṃ lokapavattiṃ ñatvā vitthāretabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:1288_11: kasmā saṅkhāresu pākaṭā cetanādayo vitakkādayo lobhādayo saddhāsatipaññādayoca dhamme visuṃ visuṃ khandhabhāvena avatvā vedanāsaññāva vuttāti. Vuccate.
anya-e0301n0:1289_0: Yathā hi cheko mahābhisakko bhesajjamūlāni gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ karonto tesu mūlesu imāni thūlānipi mudūni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1289_1: Imāni khuddakānipi kakkhaḷāni hontīti ñatvā tato pathamataraṃ kakkhaḷāni visuṃ uddharitvā suṭṭhu koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:1289_2: Sesāni pana sabbāni mudūni ekato katvā koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:1289_3: Tato ubhayāni missetvā silāyaṃ pisetvā bhesajjakamme upaneti.
anya-e0301n0:1289_5: Evamevaṃ bhagavāpi nāmarūpadhammesu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā niccasukhaatta vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthāya anuyuñjantā
anya-e0301n0:1289_6: devamanussā vibhāge akate tīsu dhammesu kilamissantīti ñatvā nāmadhammesu vedanāsaññācittasaṅkhāte tayo
anya-e0301n0:1289_7: dhamme visuṃ uddharitvā ekamekaṃ khandhaṃ nāma katvā desesi.
anya-e0301n0:1289_8: Tathā hi yathā macchānāma udake sati ukkaṇṭhitā nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1289_10: Yathāvā madhukarāvā bhamarāvā yasmiṃ vane puppharasa phalarase labhanti,
anya-e0301n0:1289_13: Evameva imesaṃ sattānaṃ sukha saññitesu patisaraṇesu vedanāsadisaṃ patisaraṇaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1289_15: Yadica tāhi vinā yathicchitaṃ sukhavedanaṃ labheyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1289_17: Tathā phassacetanādīhi vitakkavicāravīriyādīhi lobhadosādīhi saddhāsatipaññādīhi ca saṅkhārakkhandhadhammehi
anya-e0301n0:1289_18: diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca yaṃkiñci saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontāpi sukhavedanatthāyaeva abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0301n0:1289_19: Yadica tādisena abhisaṅkharaṇena vināpi yathicchitaṃ sukhaṃ labheyyuṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1289_20: tehi dhammehi attho natthīti konāma te dhamme abhisaṅkharissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_0: Iti sukhasaññitesu dhammesu vedanānāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ sukhasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_1: Tasmā bhagavā taṃ visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_2: Tathā imesaṃ sattānaṃ attasaññitesu patisaraṇesu saññāsadisaṃ patisaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1290_3: Tathā hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye uppannā te te sattā attāno attano visayesu sabbaṃ jānitabbaṃ saññāya sañjānitvā viññuttaṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_4: Tathā viññuttaṃ āpajjantā yattakaṃ pare jānanti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_6: Ko amhākaṃ uttaritaroti evaṃ loke ñāṇasammabhaṃ saññaṃ paramaṃ attānaṃ katvā vicaranti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_7: Iti attasaññitesu dhammesu saññānāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ paramukkaṃ sagataṃ attasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_8: Tasmā bhagavātaṃpi visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_9: Tathā imesaṃ sattānaṃ niccasaññitesu patisaraṇesu cittasadisaṃ patisaṃraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1290_10: Tathā hi sattā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃnāma aniccaṃ sukhapattānaṃ dukkhaṃ natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1290_28: kadāci na jānātītivā evaṃ cetasikadhammānaṃ anicca bhāvonāma kesañci lokiyajanānaṃpi pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_33: Taṃ pana sayaṃ niccaṃ pavattamānaṃ hutvā kadāci sukhena yuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1290_35: Iti cittaṃnāma niccasaññitesu dhammesu paramukkaṃ sagataṃ niccasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1290_36: Tasmā bhagavā taṃpi visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1292_0: “Bhājana bhojana byañjana bhattakāraka bhuñjaka vikappavasena pañceva vuttā”ti vatvā taṃ vibhāvantena “rūpañhi vedanā nissayattā bhājanaṭṭhāniyaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1292_5: Ettāvatāca adhippe tatthasiddhīti pañceva vuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1293_0: Na hi taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etapparamavinicchaye āgataṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1293_2: Na ca bhagavatā bhājanādivikappasiddhimattaṃ uddissa pañceva khandhā vuttāti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1296_1: Sabba sabhāgadhamma pariyādānavasena sāsavā anāsavāca dhammā pañcakkhandhāti vuttā,
anya-e0301n0:1296_3: Āyatanti attano phaluppattiyā bhusaṃ ussahantā viya hontīti āyatanāni.
anya-e0301n0:1296_4: Āyatanasaddo pana chasu ajjhattikesu dvāradhammesu pavattamāno sañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena,
anya-e0301n0:1296_7: Tattha citta cetasikā dhammā ekasmiṃvā bhave anamataggevā saṃsāre punappunaṃ saha jāyamānā cakkhādīsu chasu dvārapadesesueva jāyanti,
anya-e0301n0:1296_11: Ākiritvā thapitā viya pavattamānāpi tesveva pavattanti,
anya-e0301n0:1296_13: Tasmā cakkhādīni chasañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhenaca āyatanānināma.
anya-e0301n0:1297_0: Yathāca sampannapupphaphalesu khemesu rukkhesu tato tato pakkhino nilinatthāya āhāratthāyaca niccaṃ samosaranti.
anya-e0301n0:1297_1: Evaṃ rūpādīsu chasuṭhānesu tato tato cittacetasikā dhammā ārammaṇakaraṇatthāya niccaṃ samosaranti.
anya-e0301n0:1297_3: Tadubhayāni pana tesaṃ citta cetasikānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanānināma.
anya-e0301n0:1297_6: Tattha cakkhusotāni sattānaṃ hitakriyāsu bahupakārattā kāmarūpa byāpitattā ca pākaṭānītiādimhi vuttāni.
anya-e0301n0:1297_11: Sesāni pana tesaṃ visayattā tadanukkameneva vuttānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1298_0: Kassaci pana puggalassavā sattassavā manussassavā devassavā brahmunovā vase avattitvā attanoeva sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0301n0:1298_1: Visuṃ visuṃ vavatthitasabhāvattāvā yathāsabhāvaṃ dhārīyanti sallakkhīyanti vavatthapīyantīti dhātuyo. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1298_9: Tāva abhijjamāno acchijjamāno ekova vattatīti evaṃ gahitassa jīvassa abhāvaṭṭhena.
anya-e0301n0:1298_10: Cakkhādayoca dhammā sabbaso sattākārarahitā satta kiccarahitāca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1298_14: Tesaṃ pana daṭṭhabbākāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1298_28: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1299_1: Saññā saṅkhārakkhandhā vedanāsalla sūlayogā āturā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1299_2: Puthujjanānaṃvā saññā āsā dukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi viya ayathābhuccanimittagāhato vanamigoviya.
anya-e0301n0:1299_3: Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanapurisā viya.
anya-e0301n0:1299_7: Asaṅkhatāpidhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1299_9: Manoviññāṇadhātu gahitārammaṇaṃ muñcitvāpi aññaṃ gahetvā pavattanato vanamakkaṭo viya,
anya-e0301n0:1299_12: lobhadosādi nānāppakāra kilesayogato raṅganaṭo viya daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n0:1299_13: Ariyasaccānīti ettha santassa dhammassa bhāvo saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1299_19: Dukkhadukkha saṅkhāradukkha vipariṇāmadukkha saṅkhātehi tīhi dukkhehi taṃ samaṅgipuggalassa abhiṇhapīḷanato.
anya-e0301n0:1299_20: Tattha saṅkhāradukkhaṃ nāma kammajānaṃ uppattiyā pageva taṃtaṃkammā bhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1299_21: Tathā utujādīnaṃ uppattiyā pageva taṃtaṃ utucittāhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1300_0: Cakkhu hi nāma rūpibrahmānaṃpi purimabhave jhānabhāvanā saṅkhātaṃ mahantaṃ kammābhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhaṃ anubhavantānaṃyeva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1300_2: Kāmasattānaṃ pana purimabhave kammasaṅkhāradukkhaṃ anubhavitvā uppannaṃpi yāvajīvaṃ pavattiyā āhārādisaṅkhāradukkhañca
anya-e0301n0:1300_5: Pavattamānañca paccayavekallevā jāte antarāyevā āgate yadākadāci bhijjati.
anya-e0301n0:1300_7: Tasmā taṃ assādetvā tadatthāya kammaṃvā āhārādipaccayaṃvā paṭijagganaṃ vā saṅkharontānaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre saṅkhāradukkhassa pariyantonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1300_8: Iti sabbaṃ cakkhu apariyantena saṅkhāradukkhena puggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1300_10: Idaṃ cakkhu nāma paccayavekallevā jāte antarāyevā āgate yadā kadāci bhijjanajātikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1300_11: Tasmā tassa bhijjanabhayena pageva paccaya sampādanadukkhaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttisaṃvidhānadukkhaṃ bhijjananimittāni
anya-e0301n0:1300_12: disvā vā bhijjamānevā bhinnevā socanaparidevanādidukkhañca vipariṇāma dukkhaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1300_13: Iti sabbaṃ cakkhu apariyantena vipariṇāmadukkhena puggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1300_15: Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana tadubhayena dukkhena saheva sijjhati.
anya-e0301n0:1300_16: Evaṃ cakkhu dukkhadukkha saṅkhāra dukkha vipariṇāma dukkhasaṅkhātehi tīhi dukkhehi taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1301_2: Yaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasseva dukkhanirodhamaggattaṃ taṃ kathaṃ hotītiādinā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1301_10: Tāva tesaṃ vuttappakārehi saṅkhāra dukkhādīhi namuccatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1301_12: Cakkhādīsuca pavattamānesu vuttappakāraṃ sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ āgacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1301_14: Tasmā tesaṃ pavattinirodhabhūtassa nibbānasseva dukkhanirodhattaṃ tathaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1301_16: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggoca uppajja māno ekantena taṃ pajahati.
anya-e0301n0:1302_0: Evaṃsantepi saccasaddo pariyāya saccesupi vattatīti vuttaṃ cattāriariyasaccānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1302_1: Tattha dukkhasacce tāva sakkāyapariyā pannā ajjhattadhammāeva ariyasaccaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1302_2: Teyeva hi asmimānassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtā hutvā yāvataṃ mānaṃ na samūhanati.
anya-e0301n0:1302_5: Asmimānoca tesveva ajjhattadhammesu nivisatīti tesu pariññātesu pariññākiccaṃ siddhameva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1302_6: Tabbiparī tena pana anindriya baddhadhammā maggaphaladhammāca aṭṭhaṅgikavajjā udayabbaya pīḷanato saṅkhāradukkhavipariṇāmadukkhehica
anya-e0301n0:1302_9: Sohi attasamaṅgino satte attanica ārammaṇadhammesuca assādaṃ janayitvā niccaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato anukkaṇṭhamāne
anya-e0301n0:1302_10: karotīti tesaṃ lobhasadiso añño ñātivā mittovā sahāyovā attāvā attaniyaṃvā natthiviya khāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1302_11: Tasmā taṃsadiso añño koci vaṭṭadukkhasaṃvidhāyakonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1302_12: Tañca pajahituṃ sakkontassa añño dujjahonāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1303_1: nanu avijjāpi sabbassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhāvena vuttāti sāpi samudaye ariyasacceeva vattabbāti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:1303_2: yathāhi eko cheko uyyānapālo sampattiyuttaṃ bhūmi bhāgaṃ labhitvā attano ñāṇabalena bhūmibhāgañca nānābījānica
anya-e0301n0:1303_4: Tattha bhūmi uyyāna pālassa bījānaṃ rukkhānañca patiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:1303_7: So hi bhūmiyaṃ bījesu rukkhesuca yaṃyaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1303_17: Kā pana uyyānasampattiyā paccayaparaṃparāti vutte pana bhūmieva ādito vattabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1303_21: Paṭiccasamuppāda nayañhi patvā paccayaparaṃ paravasena dukkha dhammānaṃ pavatti nivattividhāne avijjāeva ādi pabhavapadhānabhūtā hoti, na taṇhā.
anya-e0301n0:1303_22: Saccadesanāyaṃ pana tesaṃ nibbattakadhammavidhāne taṇhāeva sāmijeṭṭhaka padhānabhūtā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1303_23: Na avijjāti natthi samudayāriyasaccabhāve avijjāya okāsoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1304_0: Ariyasaddo cettha katthaci kadāci kesañci kutoci kathañci avitathabhāvena uttamatthavācakoti.
anya-e0301n0:1304_1: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena saccasaddassa attho vibhāvito dukkhaṃariya saccanti ettha pīḷanaṭṭho,
anya-e0301n0:1304_4: vipariṇāmaṭṭhoti imehi catūhi atthehi cakkhādikassa ekekassa tebhūmakadhammassa dukkhasaccatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1304_5: Tattha saṅkhataṭṭha vipariṇāmaṭṭhā pubbe saṅkhāra dukkhavipariṇāmadukkhesu vuttanayāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1304_16: Tattha yathā ekissā duggatitthiyā kucchimhi putto uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1304_17: Soca nānārogehi sayaṃ niccaṃ pīḷito hutvā paṭijagganadukkhehi mātarañca niccaṃ pīḷetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1304_18: Yañca tassā kucchimhi tādisassa puttassa uppajjanaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1304_20: Evamevaṃ ye cakkhādayo dhammā jarāmaraṇehi niccaṃ pīḷīyanti,
anya-e0301n0:1304_21: te paṭijagganadukkhehi taṃ samaṅgīnaṃ puggalaṃ niccaṃ pīḷentiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1304_24: Yathāhayo bhikkhave cakkhussa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1304_27: Yo bhikkhave sotassa ghānassa jivhāya kāyassa manassa uppādotiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1305_0: Santāpaṭṭhoti rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi bhusaṃ paridayhanaṭṭho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1307_0: Ādipanaṃ santāpanaṃ paridayhananti idha atthato ekanti.
anya-e0301n0:1307_2: ariyamaggopi cirakālaṃ pāramitābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena antimabhaveca sīlādivisuddhibhāvanābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena puggalaṃ susaṃ pīḷetiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1307_6: So hi vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ anubhūtassa puggalassa sakiṃ uppajjamāno sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ khepento uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1307_7: Nirujjhamānoca sabbaṃ āyatiṃ anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vūpasamento nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:1307_8: Vūpasantaṃca anāgata dukkhaṃ upādāya vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ gaṇanupagaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1307_10: Tasmā tassa vipariṇāmapaccayāpi puggalassa kāci hānināma natthīti na so dukkhasaccasaṅgahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1307_11: Lokiyadhammā pana uppajjamānā pavatta mānāca pubbe vuttapakārehi saṅkhāradukkhehi bhusaṃ pīḷetvā eva uppajjanti pavattantica.
anya-e0301n0:1307_12: Nirujjhamānā mahantaṃ pariḷāhadukkhaṃ janetvā apariyante khuracakkasadise vaṭṭadukkhayante puggalaṃ yojentāva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1307_14: Etena nibbānassapi sampāpakapaccayābhisaṅkharaṇalesaṃ gahetvā dukkhasaccattapasaṅgo nivattito hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1308_0: Dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccanti ettha bhavābhavasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhakkhandhaṃ samudeti.
anya-e0301n0:1308_1: Punappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ katvā udayati uṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍhetivāti dukkhasamudayo,
anya-e0301n0:1308_5: palibodhaṭṭhoti catūhi atthehi lobhassa dukkhasamudayatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1308_6: Tattha āyūhanaṭṭhoti bhavābhava saṅkhātassa ekekasmiṃ bhavepi vatthukāmapaṭisaṃyuttassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0301n0:1308_7: bhiyyo paribyūhanaṭṭho rāsikaraṇaṭṭho nidānaṭṭhoti tadeva nirantaraṃ katvā anuppadānaṭṭho niyyātanaṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n0:1308_10: Palibodhaṭṭhoti tato tassa tassa muccanupāyassa nīvāraṇa vasena palibundhanaṭṭho uparundhanaṭṭhoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1308_11: Dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti ettha vaṭṭadukkhassa nirujjhanaṃ anuppāda dhammatāpatti vasena khiyyānaṃ dukkhanirodho.
anya-e0301n0:1308_12: Dukkhaṃ vā nirujjhati napavattati etasminti dukkhanirodho.
anya-e0301n0:1308_15: amataṭṭhoti catūhi atthehi nibbānassa dukkhanirodhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1309_0: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti ettha dukkhanirodhaṃ gameti sampāpetīti dukkhanirodhagāminī.
anya-e0301n0:1309_1: Attano santāne paṭilābhakaraṇa vasena paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipadā.
anya-e0301n0:1309_6: adhipateyyaṭṭhoti catūhi atthehi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggassa dukkhanirodhamaggatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1309_7: Tattha niyyānaṭṭhoti avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādikaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ paṭinivattetvā avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodhotiādikaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1309_10: Dassanaṭṭhoti aññāṇaadassanasaṅkhātassa sammohassa pahāna vasena catusaccadhammassa paṭivijjhanaṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1309_11: Adhipateyyaṭṭhoti taṇhā dāsabyavimuttiyā bhūjissabhāvapattivasena sayameva attano adhipati hutvā virocanaṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1309_12: Lokiyamaggā hi taṇhāya ārammaṇabhāve ṭhitā taṇhādāsabyaṃ nātivattantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1309_13: Etthaca ime sattānāma ekantena dukkhapaṭikūlā honti dukkhabhīrukā.
anya-e0301n0:1309_16: Attano pana ekantadukkhaṃvā ekantadukkhajanakaṃvā te najānanti.
anya-e0301n0:1309_17: Tasmā te attano dukkhamuttiyā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1309_21: Atītānāgatapaccuppannabhūtā attano attano attahāvapariyāpannā tebhūmakadhammāeva attano attano ekantadukkhānāma. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1310_0: Tathā ime sattā ekantena sukhakāmā honti sukhābhinandino.
anya-e0301n0:1310_4: Tasmā te attano sukhavaḍḍhiyā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1310_6: Kiṃ pana ekantasukhaṃ koca ekanta sukhamaggoti.
anya-e0301n0:1310_8: Ekantadukkhajanakassa pahānamaggoeva attano ekanta sukhamaggonāmāti imamatthaṃ dassento imāni catusaccapadāni kathesīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1312_0: “Dukkhassa anuppādanirodho ettha etenātivā dukkhanirodho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha etenāti idaṃ nayujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1313_0: Na hi nibbānaṃ dukkhassa anuppādanirodha kriyāsādhane dukkhena sahakārī kāraṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_1: Sesacetasikāti vedanā saññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā.
anya-e0301n0:1313_2: Atītādivasena tividha bhinnānaṃ ajjhattādi oḷārikādi hīnādi dūrādivasena duvidhabhinnānañca dhammānaṃ rāsaṭṭhena khandhavohāro hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_3: Nibbānassa pana tādi so bhedo natthīti vuttaṃ bhedābhāvenātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1313_4: Tañhi atītādike tividhabhede ekaṃpi na hoti. Kasmā.
anya-e0301n0:1313_6: Tañhi tekālikadhammānaṃ khayavirāganirodhabhūto animitta dhammoyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_9: Idaṃ etarahīti evaṃ kālabhedena niddisitabbaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_11: Kevalaṃ pana anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe yattakāni anattha padāni dissanti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_13: Dukesu pana ajjhattadukaṃ patvā taṃ bahiddhāeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1313_17: Hīnadukaṃ patvā paṇītameva hoti, na hīnaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1314_2: Etthaca dvārachakkaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃevāti sesadhammālambaṇaṃ sandhāya ārammaṇachakkaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvārā.La.
anya-e0301n0:1314_3: Pariyāyenāti channaṃ dvārānaṃ channaṃ ālambaṇānaṃ tesu dvārālambaṇesu uppannānaṃ viññāṇānañca kamena dhātuyo aṭṭhārasa bhavantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1314_7: Maggayuttā ekūnatiṃsadhammā phalabhūtāca sattatiṃsa dhammā catusacca vinissaṭā catūhi ariyasaccehi vinissaṭā vimuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1319_1: Evaṃ sattahi paricchedehi pathamassa nāmarūpapariccheda ñāṇassa vidhānaṃ dassetvā idāni dutīyassa paccayapariggahañāṇassa
anya-e0301n0:1319_3: Idāni yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhūtā yedhammā yathā yehi hetādīhi paccayākārehi paccayā upakārakā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1319_4: Taṃ vibhāgaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paccayuppannabhūtānaṃ vibhāgañca tesaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vibhāgañca
anya-e0301n0:1319_5: tesaṃpaccayākārānaṃ iha vibhāgañca imasmiṃ vuccamāne paccayasaṅgahe yathārahaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1321_0: “Paccaye dassetu”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ taṃ vibhāganti iminā na sameti.
anya-e0301n0:1323_0: “Iha imasmiṃ samuccaya saṅgahānantare ṭhāne”ti iha saddassa atthavibhāvanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1324_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati idāni saddo niratthako hotīti,
anya-e0301n0:1324_6: Sahajātadhammehi saheva kalāpavasena abhinibbatti pātubhāvoti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1324_7: Yathāsakaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca tena avinābhāvīhutvā samuppādo paṭicca samuppādo,
anya-e0301n0:1324_8: atthato pana sabbesaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhūtānaṃ saṅkhata dhammānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitāsaṅkhātaṃ sabbasaṅkhatasādhāraṇaṃ ekaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1324_10: Tatthaca idappaccaya tāti ayaṃ imassa paccayo ayaṃ imassa paccayoti evaṃ niddisitabbo ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā.
anya-e0301n0:1324_14: na paṭicca phalaṃ samuppajjati etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0301n0:1324_17: Visuddhimagge pana samuppajjanaṃ samuppādoti ayamattho paṭikkhitto.
anya-e0301n0:1324_18: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ayameva adhippeto viya dissati. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1325_2: uppādāvā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādāvā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu,
anya-e0301n0:1325_6: Iti kho bhikkhave tatra tathatā avitathatā anaññathatā idappaccayatā.
anya-e0301n0:1326_0: Ettha hi ṭhitāva sā dhātūtiādinā tatra tathatā avitathatātiādināca yathāvuttaṃ idappaccayatā saṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1326_2: Na cettha bhāvasādhane kate sati paṭiccasaddena saha samuppādasaddassa asamānakattutāsaṅkhāto byañjanayuttivirodho atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1326_6: Saṅkhatadhammesuca gambhīresu sati aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ viya idaṃpi saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ gambhīrameva hotīti nayidha gambhīravacanavirodho sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:1326_8: Tādisena pana sāmaññalakkhaṇena sampannā yathāvuttā avijjādayo saṅkhatadhammā paṭiccasamuppannānāma. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1326_9: katameca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppannādhammā jarāmaraṇaṃ bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:1326_11: Iti sabbesaṃ paccayapaccayuppanna bhūtānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paccayā satta vuttitāsaṅkhāto paṭiccasamuppādoca
anya-e0301n0:1326_12: so nīyati ñāyati paṭivijjhīyatīti katvā nayocāti paṭiccasamuppādanayo.
anya-e0301n0:1326_13: Paṭhapeti saṅkhatadhamme nānāpakārehi paccayabhedehi pavatteti deseti etthāti paṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1327_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccayadhamme bhāve vijjamāne sati te te bhavanti sīlenāti tabbhāvabhāvino.
anya-e0301n0:1327_4: Imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti evaṃ pavatto saṅkhatadhammaniyāmo.
anya-e0301n0:1327_9: Āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitiṃ ārabbhāti ettha hetu ārammaṇā divasena tathātathā upakārakatāsaṅkhāto paccayasatti viseso āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitināma.
anya-e0301n0:1327_10: So hi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu viya paccayadhammuddhāramatte aṭṭhatvā hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccahotiādinā
anya-e0301n0:1327_11: paccayasatti visesuddhāravasena āhacca matthakaṃ pāpetvā desitattā āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitīti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1327_12: Paccayadhammā tiṭṭhanti attano paccayuppannābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccaṃ patvā anosakkamānā hutvā pavattanti etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:1328_0: Ubhayaṃ pana vomissitvā papañcenti ācariyāti idaṃ paṭicca samuppādaṃ papañcente sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1328_1: Tehi taṃ papañcayantā paṭṭhāna nayaṃpi āharitvā papañcentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1328_2: Yathā sūriyo udayanto andhakāre vidhametvā dabbasambhāre mahājanassa pākaṭe karoti.
anya-e0301n0:1328_3: Evamevaṃ uppannaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā catusacca dhammaṃ vidati pākaṭaṃ karotīti vijjā.
anya-e0301n0:1328_5: So hi uppajjamāno dhammesu aññāṇaadassana saṅkhātaṃ andhakāraṃ janetvāva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1328_6: Paṭicca phalaṃ eti āgacchati etasmā etenāti vā paccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1328_9: Saṅkhataṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ abhisaṅkharonti sattā etehīti saṅkhārā.
anya-e0301n0:1328_17: Phusanti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti vā phasso.
anya-e0301n0:1328_21: Niccapipāsavasena ārammaṇahetu niccaṃ cañcalati pattheti vāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1328_22: Tassanti paritassanti cañcalanti sattā etāyāti vā taṇhā.
anya-e0301n0:1329_1: Bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti sukhadukkhāni etenāti vā bhavo.
anya-e0301n0:1329_3: Jāyanti pātubhavanti saṅkhata dhammā etāyāti vā jāti.
anya-e0301n0:1329_5: Jīranti jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vā jarā.
anya-e0301n0:1329_7: Socanti cittapariḷāhaṃ gacchanti etenāti vā soko.
anya-e0301n0:1329_9: Taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ parikittetvā devanti kandanti etenāti vā paridevo.
anya-e0301n0:1329_16: Avijjādi saṅkhārādipaccayapaccayuppanna paraṃparavidhinā samudayo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1329_17: Etassakevalassadukkhakkhandhassāti avijjādikassa etassa sakalassa dukkharāsissa kenaci sukhena asaṃmissassa
anya-e0301n0:1329_20: Tattha suttantikanayena tāva avijjā catubbidhā dukkhapaṭicchādikā samudayapaṭicchādikā nirodhapaṭicchādikā maggapaṭicchādikācāti.
anya-e0301n0:1329_21: Abhidhammanayena pana pubbantapaṭicchādikā aparanta paṭicchādikā pubbantāparantapaṭicchādikā paṭiccasamuppādapaṭicchādikāti
anya-e0301n0:1330_0: Saṅkhārā suttantikanayena sāsavā kusalākusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjā bhisaṅkhāroti pana tividhā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_4: Abhidhammanayena pana sabbāpi lokiyalokuttarabhūtā kusalākusalacetanā saṅkhārānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1330_6: Aṭṭhakathāyañca kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yasmā neva avijjā na kusalā kusalamūlāni upanissayapaccayattaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_8: Avijjāca kusalākusalamūlā nica kiriyadhammānaṃ upanissaya paccayā na honti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_9: Tasmā kiriyadhammā paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ nagahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_10: Saṃyuttepi yato kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_12: So avijjā virāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
anya-e0301n0:1330_15: Attano anurūpapaccayavasena pana tesaṃpi paṭicca samuppādo avāritoyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1330_20: Nāmarūpanti lokiya viññāṇa sahajātaṃ vedanādikhandhattayaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kammajarūpaṃ pavattiyaṃ cittaja rūpañca suttantikanayena.
anya-e0301n0:1330_21: Abhidhammanayena pana sabbaṃ kusalākusala vipākasampayuttaṃ khandhattayaṃ vuttappakārarūpañca.
anya-e0301n0:1330_22: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana laddhapacchājātapaccayaṃ sabbaṃpi catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ gahitameva.
anya-e0301n0:1333_0: Saḷāyatananti cha ajjhattikāyatanāni eva sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ vibhattāni.
anya-e0301n0:1333_1: Ekacce pana ācariyā bāhirāyatanāni phassassa paccayā hontīti katvā tānipi idha gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_0: Phassavedanādayopi nayadvaye taṃ taṃ viññāṇasampayuttā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1335_6: Kammanibbattā pana sabbepi lokiyavipākakkhandhā sabbānica kammajarūpāni upapattibhavo suttantikanayena.
anya-e0301n0:1335_7: Abhidhammanayena pana lokuttara khandhāpi vibhaṅge āgatāeva.
anya-e0301n0:1335_9: Sokādīsu ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa socanākārena pavattā domanassavedanā sokonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1335_15: Yesaṃ pana khandhadukkhe avijjā appahīnā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_16: Tesaṃ itarasaccesupi sā appahīnāeva hotīti te khandhapavattiyaṃeva sukhasaññaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_20: Tasmā khandhapavattipaccayabhūtā puññā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāradhammāeva tesaṃ avijjānivuṭānaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1335_21: dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisaraṇā hontīti vuttaṃ avijjāpacca yāsaṅkhārāti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_22: Etthaca visesato paccuppannakhandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya duccaritabhūtā apuññābhisaṅkhārā sambhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_23: Anāgata khandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya sucaritabhūtā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā sambhavantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1335_24: Saṅkhāresu sati appahīnabhavataṇhānaṃ sattānaṃ cutianantaraṃ punabhavābhinibbattiyā koci vibandho nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1335_25: Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanāti ime attabhāvasaññitā pañcadhammā bhavantare pātu bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_26: Tattha pana viññāṇameva padhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1335_27: Saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇanti viññāṇeca sati tassa udayabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ uppattiyā vibandhonāma natthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1335_29: Ettāvatā sāmaññato paripuṇṇonāma kāyo rūpa kāyoca vutto hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_30: Evaṃsantepi tesu dvīsu kāyesu yedhammā sattapaññattiyā padhānaṅgabhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_31: Yehica phassā dīni upari aṅgāni āgatāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_33: Te visuṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1335_34: Nāmarūpe sati tesaṃpi uppattiyā vibandho natthiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1335_35: Saḷāyatanasamuṭṭhitoca phasso saḷāyatane sati ekantena sambhavatīti vuttaṃ saḷāyatanapaccayāphassoti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_36: Phassasamuṭṭhitāca vedanā phasse sati ekantena sambhavatiyevāti vuttaṃ phassapaccayāvedanāti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_37: Sukhavedanāsadiso taṇhāya avassayonāma natthīti vuttaṃ vedanāpaccayātaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_38: Kāmupādānañcanāma ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe punappunaṃ samudācaritvā daḷhattappattā taṇhāeva,
anya-e0301n0:1335_39: diṭṭhiyoca attanica attano ārammaṇesuca assādana khamana rocana bhūtāya taṇhāya vasena daḷhattaṃ āpajjantīti vuttaṃ taṇhāpaccayāupādānanti.
anya-e0301n0:1335_40: Upādiyantāca tassa tassa upādāniyassa atthassa hitavuḍḍhisaññitaṃ taṃtaṃ kammabhavaṃ āyūhantiyevāti vuttaṃ upādānapaccayābhavoti.
anya-e0301n0:1337_0: Kammabhave sati ekantena punabhavopi sambhavatīti vuttaṃ bhavapaccayājātīti.
anya-e0301n0:1337_1: Jātiyāca sati ekantena jarāmaraṇaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ jātipaccayājarāmaraṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:1337_3: Sokādivacanañcettha īdisena tabbhāva bhāvibhāvena pavattassa sakalassa vaṭṭadhammassa ādīnavarāsidassa natthaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1337_6: Addhānavante dhamme bhuso dhāretīti addhā. Kālo.
anya-e0301n0:1337_7: So hi tekālike dhamme santānānupabandhavasena kappaparaṃparā vassa utu māsa pakkha ratti diva paraṃparāca hutvā apatamāne dhārento viya upaṭṭhātīti. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1337_8: bhuso dahanti tiṭṭhanti pavattanti tekālikā dhammā etthāti addhā. Kāloyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1337_9: So pana sayaṃ abhinnopi bhedavante dhamme upādāya bhinno viya upacarituṃ yuttoti vuttaṃ tayoaddhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1339_0: “Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhāti vuttaṃ”. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1340_7: Ākiranti tattha tattha pakiritvā thapitā viya hontīti ākārātipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_11: Mūlayanti sabbepi vaṭṭadhammā ettha tiṭṭhanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti mūlāni. Patiṭṭhā.
anya-e0301n0:1340_13: Yasmā eko puriso ekāya aṅguliyā samuddo dakaṃ gahetvā mahājanassa mukhe pakkhipitvā catūsu mahāsamuddesu
anya-e0301n0:1340_14: udakassa loṇabhāvaṃ saññāpento viya bhagavāpi avijjā paccayā saṅkhārātiādinā ekameva paccuppannabhavaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1340_15: paripuṇṇaṃ desetvā anamataggassa sakalassa saṃsāravaṭṭassa pavattiṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0301n0:1340_16: Paripuṇṇaṃ desentenaca nāma tassa ekassa bhavassa hetuca desetabbo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_18: Tattha hetū nāma purimabhave siddhā avijjā saṅkhārā.
anya-e0301n0:1340_20: Iti ekabhavavisayāpi ayaṃ desanā ekadesena atītānāgata sādhāraṇāca hotīti vuttaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārāatītoaddhātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1340_21: Etthaca addhuno addhāvantānañca abhedaṃ viya katvā vacanaṃ dhammato visuṃ addhāsaṅkhātassa kālassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_22: Kāloyeva lokaṃ pavatteti nivattetīti pavattaṃ micchāvādañca nīvāreti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_23: Na hi sayaṃ abhāvabhūto kālo kassaci pavattako nivattakoca bhavituṃ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_24: Kasmā panettha ekamekassa paccuppannassa attabhāvassa pavattiṃ dassento bhagavā atītabhave hetuñca anāgatabhave phalañca dassetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_28: Tattha ahetu apaccayā sattā pavattanti nivattanti saṃkilissanti visujjhantīti pavattā diṭṭhi ahetudiṭṭhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1340_29: Brahmā pajāpati issaranimmānādivasena abhūta hetudassanaṃ visamahetudiṭṭhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1340_31: anāgate jātināma natthīti pavattā diṭṭhi ucchedadiṭṭhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1340_33: sova bhavato bhavaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1340_34: Evaṃ nicco hutvā sandhāvantopana avijjādīhi sādhetabbo nahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1340_35: Tasmā avijjāsaṅkhārehi bhavantare puna viññāṇuppattiṃ vadantena sassatadiṭṭhi nīvāritā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1341_1: Jātiyā sati sokādayo ekantena sambhavantīti evaṃ tabbhāva bhāvibhāva lakkhaṇassa abhāvato.
anya-e0301n0:1341_2: Satipi hi jātiyā rūpa loke arūpalokeca te na sambhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1341_5: Jātiyāvā avijjādikassavā vuttappakārassa sakalassa vaṭṭapavattassa mahāādīnavarāsidassanatthanti dassetuṃ
anya-e0301n0:1341_7: Tattha nissandaphalanidassananti jātiyā mahāādīnava rāsisaṅkhātassa udayaphalassa nidassananti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1341_8: Kasmā pana imassa paccuppanna bhavassa atītapaccayā dve avijjā saṅkhārā eva pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1341_9: Kiṃ pana te eva dve imassa paccayā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1341_11: Atha kasmā te pāḷiyaṃ na vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:1341_14: Tabbhāva bhāvibhāvalakkhaṇena tadavinābhāvibhāvalakkhaṇenaca laddhāti dassento avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇenātiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:1341_16: Tattha avijjā saṅkhāraggahaṇenāti pāḷiyaṃ ādito vuttena avijjāsaṅkhāra vacanena.
anya-e0301n0:1341_18: abhāveca abhāvato avijjāgahaṇena taṇhupādānānipi gahitāni bhavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1341_20: abhāveca abhāvato saṅkhāraggahaṇena kammabhavopi gahito bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1343_1: Kammabhāva sāmaññato saṅkhāraggahaṇena kammabhavo gahitoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1344_0: Tathā avijjā saṅkhārā gahitā bhavantīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1344_1: Tadavinā bhāvibhāvena taṇhupādānavacanena avijjāca bhavavacanena saṅkhārāca gahitāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1344_9: Catutthaṃ phalapañcakaṃ eko saṅkhepoti catusaṅkhepā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1344_11: Catūsu pana saṅkhepesu siddhesu pathamena dutīyassa dutīyena tatīyassa tatīyena catutthassāti evaṃ tisso
anya-e0301n0:1344_12: sandhiyopi sijjhantiyevāti vuttaṃ tisandhi catusaṅkhepāca bhavantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1344_13: Etthaca hetupañcakaṃ phalapañcakanti etaṃ lokassa pākaṭavohāravasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1344_14: Hetuphala saddā pana paccayapaccayuppannapariyāyā eva hontīti dutīyapañcakassa pathamaṃ upādāya phalapañcakatā
anya-e0301n0:1344_15: tatīyaṃ upādāya hetupañcakatāca na na sambhavati.
anya-e0301n0:1344_16: Tathā tatīyassapi catutthaṃ upādāya hetupañcakatā dutīyaṃ upādāya phalapañcakatācāti.
anya-e0301n0:1344_18: Na phalato hetūti codanā anokāsāeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1344_19: Dvīsu pana hetupañcakesu saṅkhārakammabhavānaṃ viseso aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1344_20: dānaṃ dassāmīti cittaṃ uppādetvā māsaṃpi saṃvaccharaṃpi dānupakaraṇāni sajjantassa uppannā purimacetanāyo āyūhanasaṅkhārānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1344_21: Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato uppannā cetanā bhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1344_22: Ekāvajjanesuvā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhana saṅkhārānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1344_26: Kammabhavo upapattibhavoti dve bhavā dvādasasu aṅgesu ekasseva bhava aṅgassa avayavānāma hontīti vuttaṃ kammabhavasaṅkhātobhave kadesotiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1344_27: Etthaca saṅkhārakammabhavānaṃ viseso vutta nayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1346_0: “Kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti ettha āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1347_2: Avasesācāti idaṃ jātijarāmaraṇehi saddhiṃ viññāṇādiphalapañcakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1347_3: Etthaca yadetaṃ pubbe jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena viññāṇādi phala pañcakaṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1347_6: Evaṃ santepi dhammavibhāga rakkhaṇatthaṃ upapattibhavasaddena catutthapañcakaṃ gahitanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1347_10: Soca akusala mūlanti vuttaṃ avijjā taṇhāvasena dve mūlānīti. Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1347_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana purimaṃ pañcakadvayaṃ ekaṃ bhavacakkaṃ pacchimaṃ pañcakadvayaṃ ekaṃ bhavacakkanti katvā purimaṃ avijjāmūlaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1347_17: Cakkanti pana yato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭasantānassa ārabbho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1347_19: Tasmā idha dutīyena hetuphala yugaḷena saddhiṃ sabbaṃ ekameva cakkanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1348_0: Kasmā panettha āgamanasambhāresu avijjāeva sīsaṃ katvā vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1348_2: Nanu ubhayattha ubhayaṃpi sīsaṃ katvā vattabbanti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:1348_4: Tasmā vedanaṅgato paraṃ vaṭṭaṅgaṃ ghaṭentena vedanā nurūpātaṇhāeva vattabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1348_5: Na avijjāti gamanasambhāresu tāva avijjāya okāso natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1348_6: Sabbapathamaṃ ārabbhaṭṭhāneca sabbapadhānā avijjāeva vattabbā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1348_7: Sāca saṅkhāruppādane avirajjhanakaṅgabhūtāti na tesaṃ antare ekassa aṅgassa atthāya kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti āgamanasambhāresu taṇhāya okāso natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1353_3: Keci pana paṭiloma paṭiccasamuppāda dassanametanti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1353_4: Paṭiloma paṭicca samuppādonāma avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādiko nirodhavāro.
anya-e0301n0:1353_5: Idāni sokādi vacanaṃ na kevalaṃ nissandaphala nidassanatthameva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1353_6: Athakho jarāmaraṇena saddhiṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ hutvā upari vaṭṭamūladhammapaṭipādakānaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ nidassanatthaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1353_9: Tepi hi sayaṃ āsavasambhūtā hutvā puna āsavuppādāya paccayā hontīti etena tesaṃ jarāmaraṇaṅge gahaṇaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0301n0:1353_10: Jarāmaraṇamucchāya abhiṇhaso pīḷitānaṃ bālānaṃ āsavā abhiṇhaso samuppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1353_13: Evañca sati avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti puna ābandhameva vaṭṭanti attho. Etthaca –
anya-e0301n0:1355_0: Avijjā taṇhā vaḍḍhanti, yato vaṭṭaṃ pavattatī tipi.
anya-e0301n0:1356_5: Tadubhayaṃ vipākaṃ etassāti katvājarāmaraṇasokādikaṃ dukkhaṃ sammohavepakkaṃ pariyeṭṭhivepakkantica vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1356_6: Tattha sammohonāma ñātibyasanā dinā phuṭṭhosocati paridevati uratāḷi kandati,
anya-e0301n0:1356_11: evaṃ kenaci dukkhena phuṭṭho sukhaṃ pattheti pariyesatīti evaṃ pavattā pariyiṭṭhitaṇhā.
anya-e0301n0:1356_12: Ettha pana yasmā jarāmaraṇasadisaṃ mahantaṃ visaṭaṃ niyatañca imassa lokassa dukkhaṭṭhānaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1356_14: Tasmā ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadesanā jarāmaraṇanidānā hoti. Yathāha-
anya-e0301n0:1356_15: kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyatica jiyyatica miyyatica cavatica upapajjatica.
anya-e0301n0:1356_16: Athaca panimassaṃ dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1356_17: Yesu pana aṅgesu ādito paṭṭhāya ñātesu jarāmaraṇaṃ samūlaṃ khanitvā tato attānaṃ mocetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1356_18: Tāni dassetuṃ jātiādīni purimāni aṅgāni desitāni. Apica.
anya-e0301n0:1356_19: Ekasmiṃ bhave ṭhatvā āgamanasambhārehica gamanasambhārehica āgatiyāca gatiyāca saddhiṃ attabhāvanibbattiyā
anya-e0301n0:1356_20: dassitāya atīte anāgateca sakalasaṃsāre tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave tassa tassa attabhāvassa nibbatti dassitāeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1356_23: Tasmā jarāmaraṇavacanenavā sokādivacanenavā avijjaṃ acintetvā vaṭṭapavattassa mahāādīnavarāsidassanameva paccetabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1356_25: Iccevaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādinā nayena paṭhapesīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1356_26: Iccevaṃ ābandhaṃ anādikaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭantipi yojenti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_0: Tattha iccevaṃ ābandhanti jarāmaraṇamucchāyātiādinā vutta nayena punappunaṃ ābandhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1357_3: vaṭṭassa ādibhūtattā sā ādimhi vuttā na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_4: Vaṭṭakathāya sīsa bhūtattāeva sā ādimhi vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1357_5: Evaṃ vuttāya pana tāya vaṭṭassa anādikabhāvopi dassito.
anya-e0301n0:1357_6: Avijjā hi nāma bahiddhā na labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1357_8: Tasmā idha atītabhave avijjāya siddhāya tassāadhiṭṭhānabhūto attabhāvopi tasmiṃ bhave sijjhatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1357_9: Sijjhanto ca imassaṃ dasanoyaṃ vutta nayena aññāya avijjāya eva sijjhati,
anya-e0301n0:1357_11: Evañca sabhi puna tassapi adhiṭṭhānabhūto attabhāvo sijjhatiyevāti avijjā attabhāvocāti ubhayaṃ petaṃ anavaṭṭhitaṃ anādikameva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_12: Vaṭṭassa pana tividhassapi padhānapaccayabhūtattā sā vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_13: Yadi sā vaṭṭassa ādibhūtā na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_15: Tassā pana paccaye vuttepi tassa paccayassapi paccayo vattabboti āgacchatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1357_16: Evañca sati tassa tassāti niṭṭhānameva napaññā yeyyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1357_20: avijjaṃ pāhaṃ bhikkhave sāhāraṃ sanidānaṃ vadāmi.
anya-e0301n0:1358_3: hetu hutvā paccayo hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1358_6: Rukkhānaṃ rukkhamūlassa viya bhūmiyaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ ārammaṇesu suppatiṭṭhi tabhāvasādhanaṭṭho mūlaṭṭhonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1358_10: Saddatthato pana hinonti vuddhiviruḷhivepullapattivasena suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahanti sahajātadhammā ettha etenavā
anya-e0301n0:1358_13: Upakārakotica sayaṃ yādisena sabhāvena upalabbhamāne anuppannāvā dhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1358_14: Uppannāvā tiṭṭhanti ṭhitāvā uparuparivuddhiviruḷhiyā paccayattaṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1358_18: Tathā upaladdhiyaṃ pana sati anurūpānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ anuppannānaṃvā uppajjanato uppannānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1358_19: ṭhitibhāvapattito ṭhitānaṃ vā uparuparivuddhiviruḷhiyā paccayattupagamanato suṭṭhu karānto viya sādhento
anya-e0301n0:1358_20: viya hotīti katvā upakārako tveva vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1358_21: Iti ārammaṇe thirabhāvavuddhi viruḷhibhāvasādhana saṅkhātena mūlabhāvena upakārakā chahetudhammā hetupaccayo nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1359_0: Āramanti cittacetasikā dhammā suṭṭhu ratiṃ anubhavantā viya ajjholambamānā pavattanti etthāti ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1359_5: Ārammaṇadhammāpi hi keci garukatā attano ārammaṇikadhamme sāmino viya dāse attano vasevattayamānā attani niccaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāreeva karontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1359_9: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayānaṃ dhammato viseso natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1359_10: Atthato pana purimacitte niruddhepi pacchā santānaṃ ucchijjituṃ adatvā santānānubandhavasena sārammaṇadhamma
anya-e0301n0:1359_12: Dhammantare uppādiyamānepi yaṃkiñci dhammaṃ anuppādetvā paṭisandhādīnaṃ kiccaṭṭhānānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā cittaniyāmaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1359_13: nāma sādhetvā anurūpasseva dhammantarassa uppādanaṃ samanantarapaccayatāti.
anya-e0301n0:1359_14: Evañhi sati nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa asaññasattā cavantassaca purimapacchimabhāgapavattānaṃ cittuppādānaṃpi anantaratā samanantaratāca upapannā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1359_15: Nahi abhāva bhūto antare kālo tesaṃ antaraṃ karotināma.
anya-e0301n0:1359_19: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kālānantaratā samanantarapaccayoti vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā saṇṭhānābhāvato suṭṭhu anantarāti samanantarāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1359_20: Etena yathāsaṇṭhānavantānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ anantaratānāma majjhe paricchedasahitāyeva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1359_22: Tasmā purimapacchimānaṃ tesaṃ ekībhūtānaṃ viya pavattisamanantaratānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1360_0: Ye pana dhammā attani jāte eva jāyanti, no ajāte.
anya-e0301n0:1360_3: tesaṃ jātatthāya viya sayaṃ tehi saha jātabhāvena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1360_5: Padīpajālañhi uppajjamānaṃ pakāsasaṅkhātena ālokena saheva uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1360_6: Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ upatthambhanavasena upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1360_7: Evañca sati imassa paccayassa purimena saha viseso pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1360_8: Nahi saha jātasaddo evarūpaṃ aññamaññopatthambhanaṃ bodhetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1360_11: So pana sahajātanissayo vatthupurejāta nissayoti duvidho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1360_12: Tattha sahajātova samāno paṭakoṭṭhako viya cittakammānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvena upakārako dhammo sahajātanissayo.
anya-e0301n0:1360_13: Pathavī viya tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ pure jāto hutvā adhiṭṭhānabhāvena upakārako vatthupurejāta nissayo.
anya-e0301n0:1360_15: Yathā hi sālibhattassa uppattiyā sūdovā ukkhalivākaṭṭhaṃvā aggivānissayo eva hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1360_18: na hi tāsuasati bhattuppattiyā sūdādīnaṃpi thāmonāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1360_19: Tathā yahiṃ paccaye asati nissayadhammāpi natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1360_21: So paccayo nissayatopi balavataraṭṭhena upanissayoti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1361_0: So pana ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1361_1: Tattha garukatā ārammaṇa dhammā garukatattāeva adhipatibhūtā balava nissayabhūtāca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1361_2: Anantarapaccayadhammāca tehi vinā cittasantānapavattiyā eva abhāvato balavanissayāeva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1361_3: Pakatūpanissayoti ettha pana pakato upanissayoti pakatūpanissayo.
anya-e0301n0:1361_4: Pakatotica yathā kate sati anurūpe kāle tasmiṃsantāne ekantena paccayuppannadhammā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0301n0:1361_6: Karaṇañcettha saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññātica rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi patthanātica vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1361_7: attano santāne pubbabhāge vuttappakārena suṭṭhu uppādanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1361_8: Kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo utu bhojanaṃ senāsananti evaṃ vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ suṭṭhu upasevanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1362_0: Puretaraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1362_1: So duvidho ārammaṇapurejāta nissaya purejāta vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1362_2: Nissayārammaṇadhammā eva hi keci purejāta tāmattavisiṭṭhā purejātapaccayoti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:1362_3: Ācariyānandattherena pana nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1362_4: Evaṃ santepi pure jātatāvisiṭṭhehi nissayārammaṇasattivisesehi añño visuṃ purejātasattivisesonāma nadissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1362_5: Pure ropetvā jātānaṃ rukkhapotakānaṃ viya pacchā āsiñciyamānaṃ udakaṃ pure jātānaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1362_6: vuddhaviruḷhabhāvañca pacchāpi attanā sadisassa rūpasantānassa pavattiyā paccayabhāvañca pāpetvā upatthambhanavasena
anya-e0301n0:1362_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanāviyāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1362_9: Mūlaṭīkāyañca etena manosañce tanāhāravasena pavattamānehi arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhita bhāvaṃ dasseti,
anya-e0301n0:1362_10: teneva āhārāsā viyāti avatvā cetanāgahaṇaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1362_11: Sā pana pacchājātā sasampayuttā āhārāsā cetanā purejātānaṃ tesaṃ gijjhasarīrarūpānaṃ cirakālaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārena
anya-e0301n0:1362_12: vināpi amilāta bhāvaṃ uparūparica vuddhaviruḷharūpasantānuppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ pāpetvā upatthambhatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1362_13: Yasmā supākaṭena pacchājātapaccayeka desena sakalassa pacchājātapaccayassa sādhanatthāya ayaṃ upamā idha vuttā viya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:1362_14: Cetanā gahaṇañca pacchājāta paccayaṃ patvāpi cetanāeva padhānā jātāti dassanatthaṃ gahitanti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1362_15: Evañhi sati pacchājātassa atthassa pacchā jātāya eva upamāya sādhanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1363_0: Āsevanti taṃ suṭṭhu bhajanti aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā dhammā suṭṭhu sevamānā viya bhajamānā viya tassa
anya-e0301n0:1363_1: purimassa sabbapāripūraṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā eva punappunaṃ pavattantīti āsevanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1363_2: Āsevetivā te dhamme attano parivāsaṃ suṭṭhu gāhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1363_4: Apica kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa anantaradhammassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1363_5: attasadisassavā attasadisabhāvāpādanaṃ vāsanaṃ āsevanaṭṭhoti mūlaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1363_6: Tattha payogena karaṇīyassāti etena āvajjanadvayañca sabbavipākadhammeca nivatteti.
anya-e0301n0:1363_7: Nahi āvajjana dvayassa dvattikkhattuṃ pavattamānassapi vaḍḍhetuṃvā hāpetuṃvā payogena karaṇīyatānāma atthi paridubbalattā.
anya-e0301n0:1363_8: Vipākesuca ariyaphalāni parikammapayogena karaṇīyānipi maggacetanānubhāvena vinā kevalena tena payogeneva sādhetabbāni na honti.
anya-e0301n0:1363_9: Kevalaṃ kammavegena santāne pātitesu lokiyavipākesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1363_10: Punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattananti uparupari paguṇa balavabhāvāpādanena saha pavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1363_11: Evañhi sati pariyattidhamma vijjāsippuggahaṇesu purimābhiyogo viya āsevanaṭṭhena anantare pavattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1363_12: sajātiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paguṇabalavabhāvāya upakārako dhammo āsevanapaccayo nāmāti siddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1364_0: Kāyaṅgavācaṅgacittaṅgābhisaṅkharaṇabhūtena cittappayogasaṅkhāte na kiriyābhāvena upakārako dhammo kammapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1364_2: Tattha jeṭṭhasissa mahā vaḍḍhakiādayo viya sakiccaparakiccasādhanavasena pavattā sabbāpi sahajātacetanā sahajātapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1364_3: Yathā pana itthipurisānaṃ sakiṃ sannipātappayogo kāmasukhānubhavanakiccañca kālantare puttapātubhāvatthāyavatthumhi bījanidhāna kiccañca sampādeti.
anya-e0301n0:1364_5: pātubhāvatthāya santāne kiriyā visesanidhāna kiccañca sampādetvā niruddhā kusalākusala cetanā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1364_7: Vipaccana bhāvoca nāma loke sabbesaṃ pupphaphalādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vipakkabhāvaṃ pattakāle sabbākārena mandabhāvo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1364_8: Evaṃ nirussāhasanta bhāvasaṅkhākena mandamandākārena santāne pātubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1364_10: Sabbarattiṃ niddāyantassa purimabhavasiddhe kammādi ārammaṇe pavattānipi tāni vuṭṭhitakāle kiñcijānanacitta pavattiyā paccayā nahontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1364_11: Pañcaviññāṇādīni pana pacchājānanacitta pavattiyā paccayā hontānipi vatthārammaṇa ghaṭṭanānubhāva balena saheva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1365_0: Arūpino tayo āhārā sahajātadhammānaṃ jananaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhenaca,
anya-e0301n0:1365_1: kabaḷīkārāhāro pana imassa catusamuṭṭhāni kassa kāyassa upatthambhanaṭṭheneva upakārakatā āhārapaccayo. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1365_3: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa āhārapaccayena paccayoti avatvā imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayotveva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1365_5: Janayantāpi hi āhārā attanā janitānañca tadaññesañcasantānaṭṭhitiyā paccayabhāvatthāya upatthambhanena saheva janentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1366_2: Tattha sahajātadhammānaṃ attano attano kiccesu issarabhūtā arūpindriyadhammā sahajātindriyapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1366_3: Pacchā jātānaṃ pañcaviññāṇa dhammānaṃ dassanādi kiccesu issarabhūtā pure jātā pañcapasādindriyadhammā pure jātindriyapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1366_4: Sahajātānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ ciratarapavattiyaṃ issarabhūtaṃ rūpajīvitaṃ rūpajīvitindriyapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1366_5: Kasmā panettha bhāvindriyadvayaṃ idha na gahitanti. Vuccate,
anya-e0301n0:1366_8: Bhāvadvayassa pana sahajāta dhammānaṃ atthāya etaṃ tayaṃpi natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1366_9: Kevalaṃ pana taṃsahite santāne kammādīhi attano attano paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikadhammānaṃ itthākārādivaseneva yo pavattiniyamo atthi,
anya-e0301n0:1366_11: Tasmā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tādise niyāmakicce issarattāyeva dvayaṃ indriyaṃnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1366_12: Na indriyapaccayatte nāti taṃ idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1366_13: Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tasmiṃ bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ nipatitvā viya jhāyanaṭṭhena olokanaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo jhānapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1366_14: Duggati sugati nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo maggapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1366_15: Etthaca yenayena sammādassanādinā lakkhaṇavisesena sampannattā kusalabhūtā sammādiṭṭhādayo sugati nibbāna sampāpakaṭṭhena maggapaccayānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:1366_16: Abyākatabhūtānaṃpi tesaṃ so so lakkhaṇaviseso atthiyevāti tesampi tenevaṭṭhena maggapaccayatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1366_17: Satipi maggaṅgānaṃ taṃtaṃ sampāpakaṭṭhenaca upakārakatte taṃsamuṭṭhitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ so attho na pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0301n0:1366_18: Tesaṃ pana maggapaccayadhammehi samuṭṭhitattāyeva maggapaccayuppannatā paccetabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1367_0: Ekuppādatādīhi pakārehi samaṃ ekībhūto viya hutvā aññamaññayuttabhāvena upakārako dhammo sampayuttapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1367_1: Samānepi sahajātabhāvena nissaya nissita bhāvenaca yuttabhāve ekuppādatādikassa sampayogalakkhaṇassa
anya-e0301n0:1367_4: tattheva tadāsaṅkā vigamanatthaṃ ayaṃ vippayuttapaccayonāma vuttoti tadāsaṅkhā rahitesu ārammaṇānantarādīsu
anya-e0301n0:1367_6: Heṭṭhāvuttappakāresu eva paccayadhammesu yo yo atthitā saṅkhātena khaṇapaccuppanna samaṅgibhāvena tādisasseva
anya-e0301n0:1367_7: khaṇapaccuppanna samaṅgino dhammassa sahajātādivasena upakārako so so atthipaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1367_8: Yasmiṃ vijjāmāne sati añño uppajjituṃ okāsaṃ nalabhati.
anya-e0301n0:1367_9: So tassa aññassa okāsadāna saṅkhātena sayaṃ antarahitabhāvena upakārako dhammo natthipaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1367_11: Teneva cittena gacchati nisīdati tiṭṭhatītiādinā pacchimacitte ṭhitānaṃpi purimacittaṃ vattatiyevāti lokassa abhimāno hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1367_13: Tattha tadāsaṅkā nivattanatthaṃ ayaṃ paccayo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1368_1: Yasmiṃ avigate añño uppajjituṃ okāsaṃ nalabhati,
anya-e0301n0:1368_2: so tassa okāsadānasaṅkhātena sayaṃ vigatabhāvena upakārako dhammo vigatapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1368_3: Vattamānatā saṅkhātena avigatabhāvena tādisasseva dhammassa upakārako dhammo avigatapaccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1368_4: Purimapaccaya dukameva cettha nānattha pasaṅganivattanatthaṃ ñāṇavisadatthañca pariyāyantarena vigatadukaṃnāma katvā desitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1368_5: Tathā hi atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto.
anya-e0301n0:1368_6: Natthīti ayaṃ dutīyo antotiādinā nānāatthadīpakā atthi natthi saddā sāsane lokeca dissanti.
anya-e0301n0:1368_7: Pubbe vuttasseva ca atthassa puna pariyāyantarena vacanaṃ sotūnaṃ ñāṇavisadatthāya hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1368_8: Ṭīkākārā pana bahuṃ tesaṃ paccaya dukānaṃ nānatthasambhavaṃ vaṇṇentiyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1369_1: Idāni yathā uddiṭṭhe catuvīsatipaccaye pathamaṃ chahi rāsīhi saṅgahetvā puna rāsīnaṃ anukkamena tesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1369_2: paccayānaṃ niddesaṃ dassento chadhānāmantunāmassāti gāthādvaya māha.
anya-e0301n0:1369_3: Nāmaṃ nāmassa chadhā chabbidhehi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1369_8: dvayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ dvayasseva nāmarūpassa navadhāti evaṃ chakkapañcakādivasena paccayā chabbidhā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1371_0: “Paññattināmarūpāni nāmassa dvidhā dvipakārā paccayā hontīti vuttaṃ”. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1372_0: Paccayakathā hi nāma paccayato paccayuppannato paccayasattitoti tīhi pakārehi vuttāyeva suvuttā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1372_1: Yasmā pana anantarādipaccayānāma cittasantānassa avicchedāya kiccaṭṭhānānukkamapaṭipādanāya eva ca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1372_2: Tasmā kusalādīsu arūpadhammesu yokoci dhammo yassa kassaci aviruddhassa dhammassa paccayo na na hotīti
anya-e0301n0:1372_4: Tattha aviruddhassātietena aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ somanassadomanassānañca aññamaññaṃ anantara paccayapaṭikkhepo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1372_7: kevalaṃ payogasādhanīyesu javavega sahitesu cittuppādesu eva labbhatīti vuttaṃ purimāni javanānītiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1372_8: Tattha javanānīti maggaphalajavanavajjāni lokiya kusalā kusalakriyajavanāni pacchimānaṃjavanānanti phalajavanavajjānaṃ kusalākusalakriyajavanānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1372_9: Bhinnajātikā hi dhammā aññamaññaṃ sabbākārapāripūraṃ parivāsaṃnāma gahetuṃvā gāhāpetuṃpā na sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1372_12: Tasmā bhinnajātikaṃ phalajavanaṃ maggato parivāsaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1372_13: Maggopi attano parivāsaṃ phalassa dātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1372_16: Yasmā kāmāvacarabhāvato mahaggatā nuttara bhāvappattināma āsevanabalena hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1372_17: tasmā gotrabhu jhāna maggānaṃ bhūmi bhedo idha appamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1373_4: Cetanānāma pavattamānā dve kiccāni sādheti sahajātānaṃ saṃvidhānañca āyatiṃ vipākapātu bhāvatthāya tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1373_7: Bījanidhānakiccaṃ pana kusalākusalabhāvappattāyaeva cetanāya hotīti vuttaṃ sahajātācetanātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1373_8: Tattha sahajātācetanāti antamaso pañcaviññāṇa sahajātāpi cetanā.
anya-e0301n0:1373_9: Sāpi hi sahajātānaṃ saṃvidahanasaṅkhātena kammabhāvena pavattattā kammaṃevanāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1373_12: Ambabījādīni viya pariṇatabhāvaṃ patvā khaṇantareeva sampādetīti vuttaṃ nānākkhaṇikā cetanātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1373_13: Tattha nānākkhaṇikācetanāti attano paccayuppannadhamma pavattikkhaṇato visuṃ bhūte atītakāle siddhā kusalā kusalacetanā.
anya-e0301n0:1374_1: Yathānāma pure jātā sālarukkhapotakā pacchā anuvassaṃ vassantānaṃ vuṭṭhidhārānaṃ vasena vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ
anya-e0301n0:1374_2: vepullaṃ patvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne yāvakappāvasānāpi mahantassa sālavanasaṇḍassa pavattiyā paccayā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1374_3: Evaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya purimacittakkhaṇesu uppannā sakalasarīre kammajakāyo cittajakāyo utujakāyo
anya-e0301n0:1374_4: āhāraja kāyoti sabbe sakalasarīraṭṭhakā catusamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammā pacchājātānaṃ pathamabhavaṅgādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1374_5: cittacetasikānaṃ vasena vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā uparupari catusamuṭṭhānika rūpaparaṃparāpavattiyā
anya-e0301n0:1374_6: paccayattaṃ upagacchantīti vuttaṃ pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1374_12: Yadaggena hi maraṇāsannakāle vatthurūpaṃ cuticittassa purejātapaccayataṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1374_13: Tadaggena cuticittaṃpi tassa vatthurūpassa pacchājātapaccayo na hotīti navattabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1374_15: Yathā hi upatthambhanto āhāro vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitameva upatthambhati.
anya-e0301n0:1375_1: Tasmā te kāyekadese vatthumhi uppannāpi sakalaṃ imaṃ catujakāyaṃ upatthambhetuṃ sakkontiyevāti vuttaṃ imassakāyassāti.
anya-e0301n0:1375_2: Cakkhādīni pasādavatthūni rūpādīhi sahaladdhaghaṭṭanānieva viññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1375_3: Ghaṭṭanañca ṭhitipattakāleevāti tesaṃ niccakālaṃpi attano viññāṇassa purejātapaccayatā siddhi hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1375_4: Viññāṇañcanāma pañcavokārabhave vatthunissayena vinā uppajjituṃ nasakkotīti,
anya-e0301n0:1375_5: yadā purejātaṃvā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitaṃvā vatthuṃ na labhati,
anya-e0301n0:1375_6: tadā paṭisandhikālevā maraṇāsannakālevā yaṃ yaṃ labhati,
anya-e0301n0:1375_8: Yadā pana pure jātaṃ suṭṭhu balavantañca vatthuṃ labhati,
anya-e0301n0:1375_12: Nahi tadā viññāṇapaccayena uppannaṃ vatthupurejātaṃ bhavituṃ sakkotīti vuttaṃ chavatthūni pavattiyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1376_0: Pañcālambaṇānica pañcaviññāṇavīthiyāti idaṃ niyamasiddhigahaṇa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1376_1: Sabbāni pana paccuppannabhūtāni nipphannarūpāni manoviññāṇa vīthiyā purejātapaccayā hontiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1376_2: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0301n0:1376_3: Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhaṃ, kāyaṃ, rūpe, sadde, gandhe, rase,
anya-e0301n0:1376_5: paccuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
anya-e0301n0:1376_7: Aṭṭhakathāyañca uppādakkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitipattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpameva purejātapaccayoti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1376_8: Etthaca kiñcāpi paṭṭhāne paccuppannārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassaanantarapaccayena
anya-e0301n0:1376_9: paccayoti evaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃpi paccuppannārammaṇatāya vuttattā paccuppannabhūtāni kammanimitta
anya-e0301n0:1376_10: gatinimittāni ārabbha pavatti kāle paṭisandhicittānaṃpi ārammaṇapurejātaṃ labbhamānaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0301n0:1376_11: Evaṃsantepi purejātapaccayassa paccaniye paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākā byākato eko khandhotiādinā pāḷiyaṃeva taṃ paṭikkhittanti.
anya-e0301n0:1376_12: Etthaca āruppe viya paṭisandhikkhaṇepi vatthupure jātassa abhāvā aparibyattattāvā tassa ārammaṇassa ārammaṇamattabhāveeva
anya-e0301n0:1376_14: Ārammaṇamevagarukatanti paccavekkhanavasena assādanādivasenaca garukataṃ iṭṭhārammaṇa māha.
anya-e0301n0:1376_15: Tañca kho tassatassa puggalassa icchāvasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1376_16: Gūthakuṇapādīnipi hi tadabhinandantānaṃ kimimakkhika sunakha gijjha kākādīnaṃ garukatānieva ārammaṇāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1378_0: “Garukatanti garuṃ katvā paccavekkhita”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ anupapannaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1379_0: Cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatītiādinā assā danādivasenapi assa niddesassa pavattattāti.
anya-e0301n0:1379_1: Rāgādayo pana dhammāti etena rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi patthanāti evaṃ vuttehi dhammehi saha dasa akusalakammapathā
anya-e0301n0:1379_3: Tattha anantariyavajjāni tāni samatikkamamukhena yathārahaṃ ajjhattaṃ sabbesaṃ catubhūmaka kusalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1379_4: anantariyakammāni pana kāmāvacarakusalānameva uppattiyā balavanissayā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1379_5: Tāniyevaca sabbāni yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhāca rāgādīnaṃ pāṇātipātādīnañca sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1379_6: kāyikasukhadukkhādīnañca abyākatadhammānaṃ uppattiyā balava nissayā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1379_7: Saddhādayoti etena saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññāti evaṃ vuttehi dhammehi saha sabbe dānasīlādayo catubhūmakaku
anya-e0301n0:1379_8: salānaṃ rāgādi akusalānaṃ sukhadukkhādicatubhūmaka abyākatā nañca uppattiyā balavanissayā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1379_9: Sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsananti etena nibbānavajjā sabbe catubhūmakā byākatā gahitā,
anya-e0301n0:1379_10: tepi hi yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhāca kusalākusalā byākatadhammānaṃ uppattiyā balavanissayā hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1379_11: Kammaṃvipākānanti ettha suṭṭhu balavaṃ kammaṃ adhippetaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1379_13: Kasmā panettha rūpadhammā paccayuppannesu na gahitā.
anya-e0301n0:1379_14: Nanu tesaṃpi bahiddhā rukkhatiṇādīnaṃ vuddhiviruḷhi vepullatthāya ajjhattañca ārogyādiatthāya pathavirasa
anya-e0301n0:1380_2: Yathā hi arūpasantānena kattubhūtena saddhādayo nipphāditā utubhojanādayoca upasevitā.
anya-e0301n0:1380_4: Yasmiñca utubījādike kammādikeca sati rūpaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1380_5: Na taṃ tena rūpena pakataṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1380_6: Sacetanasseva hi uppādanupasevanapayogavasena cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ pakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1381_2: Tattha yena santānena pubbe kiñci suṭṭhuuppāditaṃvā hoti upasevitaṃvā,
anya-e0301n0:1381_3: tasseva pubbe attanā uppāditupasevitā dhammā kālantare attano upanissayapaccayā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1381_4: Pakaraṇasaṅkhātañca tathā uppādanupasevanaṃnāma sacetane arūpasantāneeva labbhati,
anya-e0301n0:1381_8: asati na hotīti evaṃ vuttena suttantikapariyāyena pana upanissayo nāma rūpadhammānaṃ majjhepi vattabboyevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1384_0: Na hi attano parassaca uppannā rāgādayo parassa attano ca santāne rāgādīnaṃ balavanissayā na honti.
anya-e0301n0:1384_1: Samānacchandānaṃ itthi purisādīnaṃ manopadosika devādīnañcettha rāgādayo nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1387_0: Tāya hi attano rāgādayo saddhādayoca ajjhattaṃ kusalādīnaṃ attano saddhāyo pana bahiddhā kusalassāti evaṃ aparipuṇṇassa atthassa vibhāvitattāti.
anya-e0301n0:1390_0: Nayadassanamattabhūtaṃpi hi saṃvaṇṇanāvākyaṃnāma nayamukhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1390_1: Garukataṃārammaṇanti ettha sabbaṃ lokiyakusalaṃ heṭṭhimamaggaphalanibbānāni ca kāmāvacara kusalassa arahattamaggaphalanibbānāni
anya-e0301n0:1390_3: Nibbānaṃ aṭṭhavidhalokuttarassa thapetvā paṭighadvaya momūha dvaya dukkhasahagata kāyaviññāṇāni avasesaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1390_4: sabbaṃ lokiya kusalākusalābyākatadhammajātaṃ lobhasahagatacittassāti evaṃ paccaya paccayuppanna vibhāgo
anya-e0301n0:1392_0: “Garuka taṃālambaṇanti paccavekkhanaassādādinā garukataṃ ārammaṇa”nti vatvā taṃ vibhāventena “tañhi jhānamagga
anya-e0301n0:1392_1: phalavipassanā nibbānādibhedaṃ paccavekkhana assādādimaggaphalādidhamme attādhīne karotīti ārammaṇādhipatināmā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1393_0: Dāna sīla uposathakamma pubbe suciṇṇagotrabhu vodāna maggaphala nibbānāniceva rāgadiṭṭhicakkhusotādīnicāti pana vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1393_1: Vipassanātica idaṃ gotrabhuvodānāniyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1393_3: Sahajātānaṃnāmarūpānanti dvihetuka tihetuka javanasaha jātānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:1393_4: Aññamaññaṃ sahajāta rūpānañcāti aññamaññassaca paṭisandhikkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ pavattiyaṃ citta samuṭṭhānarūpānañca.
anya-e0301n0:1393_6: Pañcavokārabhave paṭisandhikkhaṇe viññāṇaṃ vatthunā vinā patiṭṭhaṃ nalabhati.
anya-e0301n0:1393_7: Vatthucatena vinā patiṭṭhaṃ nalabhatīti vuttaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti.
anya-e0301n0:1393_10: Cittasamuṭṭhāna rūpānica cittaṃ kiñci upatthambhetuṃ nasakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1395_1: Na sahajātamattatoti pavattiyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmānaṃ aññamaññapaccayo na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1395_2: Tasmā vuttaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññanti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1395_3: Tattha na sahajātamattatoti etena yadi sahajātamattato aññamaññapaccayatāsiyā.
anya-e0301n0:1395_4: Evaṃsati pavattiyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmānaṃ aññamaññapaccayo siyāti anuññātaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1395_5: Sahajātapaccayepi pana pavattiyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmānaṃ paccayo nahotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1396_0: Chavatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ettha vatthusahajāta nissayo vatthupurejātanissayo vatthārammaṇapurejātanissayoti tividho vatthunissayo.
anya-e0301n0:1396_1: Tattha paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ vatthusahajātanissayo.
anya-e0301n0:1396_5: Yaṃ pana purejātaṃ vatthu yassa cittassa nissayoceva hoti ārammaṇañca,
anya-e0301n0:1396_7: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭṭhāne ārammaṇa nissaya purejātavippayutta atthiavigatanti tīṇīti.
anya-e0301n0:1396_8: Kathañca taṃ cittassa nissayoca ārammaṇañca hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1396_9: Paccuppannaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha sammasanavasenavā assādanādivasenavā iddhividhakiccādhiṭṭhānavasenavā cittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0301n0:1396_10: evaṃ taṃ cittassa nissayoca ārammaṇañca hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1396_12: ajjhattaṃ vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato vipassati, assādeti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_0: Ettha pana ācariyā imaṃ vatthārammaṇapurejātanissayaṃnāma maraṇāsannakāleeva vācanāmaggaṃ āropayiṃsu.
anya-e0301n0:1397_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva aniṭṭhe ṭhāne āvajjanena vinā vīthicittānaṃ pavatti paṭisiddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_3: Tathā ekāvajjanavīthi yañca cittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃnāma dhammatoca kālatoca abhinnameva icchanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
anya-e0301n0:1397_5: Tasmā yadā paccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbhaaniccādivasena sammasanti,
anya-e0301n0:1397_10: Yadi hi tānivā aññaṃvā ārammaṇaṃ gaṇheyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1397_12: āvajjanena āvajjitaṃ agahetvā aññaṃ gahetvā pavattanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_14: Pacchā uppannāni paccekavatthūnivā aññaṃvā gahetvā pavattanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_15: Naca tathā sakkā bhavituṃ aṭṭhakathā virodhato.
anya-e0301n0:1397_16: Tasmā so vatthārammaṇa purejātapaccayo pakati kāle na sakkā laddhunti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_17: Maraṇāsannakāle pana sabbāni āvajjanādīni cittāni ekameva vatthuṃ nissāya pavattantīti taṃ ārabbha pavattānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1397_18: āvajjanādīnaṃ tesaṃ tadeva vatthuca ārammaṇañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1397_19: Evañhi sati tesaṃ nirāvajjanatāvā bhinnārammaṇatāvā natthīti ayaṃ tesaṃ adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n0:1398_0: Tattha pana yadi āvajjanena āvajjitaṃ vatthuṃ agahetvā attano attano nissayavatthūni gaṇheyyuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1398_1: Nirāvajjanānināma javanāni bhaveyyunti idaṃ tāva na yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1398_9: Nahi santatighanavasena ekībhūtamiva pubbāparaṃ pavatta mānesu bahūsu vatthusu ekamekaṃ vatthuṃ idamevāti
anya-e0301n0:1398_11: Naca tathā asakkuṇeyyesu ṭhānesu ekantena dhammatovā kālatovā bhinnā rammaṇatānāma sakkā laddhunti iti bhinnārammaṇatāpi tesaṃ natthi yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1398_12: Ettāvatā imassa vatthārammaṇapurejātanissaya vidhānassa pakatikālepi labbhamānatā sādhitā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1399_1: sabbaṃ paccuppannaṃ attano rūpakāyaṃ ārabbha rūpaṃ me aniccantivā etaṃ mamātivā samanupassantānaṃ ajjhattarūpesu
anya-e0301n0:1399_2: idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tassacittassa ārammaṇaṃ nahotīti navattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1399_3: Ārammaṇa bhūtesu pana tesu kiñci ārammaṇamattaṃ kiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ kiñci vatthārammaṇapurejātaṃ hotīti sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n0:1399_4: Kabaḷī kāro āhāroti kāmāvacarasattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya uppanno catusamuṭṭhānika rūpāhāroceva bahiddhāhāroca.
anya-e0301n0:1399_6: tāva kalalādikālesu tisamuṭṭhāniko ajjhattāhāroyeva upatthambhanakiccaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0301n0:1399_8: paṭisandhikkhaṇe kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayoti,
anya-e0301n0:1400_0: Yañcassa bhuñjati mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ. Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato tiroti
anya-e0301n0:1401_2: Imassakāyassāti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe ekasamuṭṭhānikassa ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu
anya-e0301n0:1401_3: dvisamuṭṭhāni kassa tatoparaṃ tisamuṭṭhānikassa ojāpharaṇakāle catusamuṭṭhānikassaca kāyassa.
anya-e0301n0:1401_5: Rūpaloke pana vināpi duvidhena ojāhārakiccena appanāpatta kammavisesena siddhassa suciraṃpi addhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1401_6: pharituṃ samatthassa rūpa jīvitindriyassa tathārūpānañca bhavaṅgapariyāpannānaṃ arūpāhārānaṃ vasena anekakappānipi
anya-e0301n0:1401_8: Etenupāyena kammajakāyabahutaresu devesu petanirayesuca suciraṃpi kālaṃ bahiddhāhārena vinā attabhāvassa pavatti vattabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1401_9: Tesu pana ajjhattāhāropi labbhatiyevāti kiñcāpi okkantikkhaṇe vipākakkhandhāpi vatthussa vippayuttapaccayā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1401_10: Te pana cittacetasikādhammā sahajātarūpānanti ettha saṅgayhissantīti katvā okkantikkhaṇevatthuvipākānanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1402_2: Rūpajīvitamiccayanti evaṃ porāṇehi vutto ayaṃ atthipaccayo avigatapaccayocāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1402_7: Kabaḷīkārāhāroca ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni uppādentopi attano ṭhitikkhaṇeeva uppādeti,
anya-e0301n0:1402_9: Yathāca mahābhūtā sahajātarūpāni upatthambhantā attanā saha uppādanapubbakāeva upatthambhanti,
anya-e0301n0:1402_11: So pana vināva sahuppādanakiccena sahajātānipi asahajātānipi upatthambhatīti rūpajīvitaṃpi saha uppādanakiccena vināva saha jātarūpāni anupāleti.
anya-e0301n0:1402_12: Iti ime dvepi dhammā sahajāta lakkhaṇābhāvāeva sahajātapaccaye asaṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n0:1402_13: Idāni sabbepi catuvīsatipaccayā saṅgayhamānā cattāropaccayā hontīti dassetuṃ ārammaṇūpanissaya.La.
anya-e0301n0:1402_16: catuvīsatiyā paccayesu adhipati paccayo tāva duvidho ārammaṇasahajātavasena.
anya-e0301n0:1402_17: Tattha ārammaṇādhipati tīsu kammavajjesu samodhānaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1402_18: Ārammaṇa mattaṃpi hi kammena saha samodhānaṃ nagacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1403_4: Ettha pana mūlaṭīkāyaṃ kammaṃ pana tasmiṃ kate pavattamānānaṃ katūpacita bhāvena kammapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1403_8: Tasmā te paccayākāravisabhāgattā saha ghaṭanaṃ nagacchantīti visajjitanti.
