anya-e0301n0:1403_14: Purejātapaccayo tividho ārammaṇapurejāto vatthupure jāto vatthārammaṇapurejātoti.
anya-e0301n0:1404_0: Vippayuttapaccayo catubbidho sahajāto vatthupurejāto vatthārammaṇapurejāto pacchājātoti.
anya-e0301n0:1404_9: Anantara samanantara āsevana natthi vigata vasena pañcapaccayā upanissayeti.
anya-e0301n0:1404_10: Iti sabbepi catuvīsatipaccayā sabhāgasaṅgahavasena saṃkhippamānā ārammaṇādīsu catūsu paccayesu samodhānaṃ gacchantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1406_0: Tesu catūsu ekekasmiṃpi sabbe catuvīsatipaccayā samodhānaṃ gacchantīti iminā adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “nahi so kocipaccayoti”ādi.
anya-e0301n0:1408_1: Yo cittacetasi kānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvaṃ nagaccheyyāti” vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1409_0: Ettha pana yo sakasakapaccayuppannassa upanissayabhāvaṃ nagacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1409_1: Nahi so koci paccayo atthīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1411_0: “Kammahetukattāca lokappavattiyā phalahetūpacāra vasena sabbepi kammasabhāvaṃ nātivattantīti” vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1413_1: Tadubhayaṃ pana sabbaso sāsanayutti yāpi viruddhamevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1414_2: Yasmā pana paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃnāma nāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññapaṭibaddhaokāse cutiparicchinnassa sakalassa tassa tassa bhavassa sīsabhūtaṃ bījabhūtañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1415_0: Viññāṇañca hi ānanda mātukucchismiṃ na okkamissatha.
anya-e0301n0:1415_3: Viññāṇañca hi ānanda mātukucchismiṃ okkamitvā vokkamissatha.
anya-e0301n0:1415_6: Viññāṇañca hi ānanda daharasseva sato vocchijjissatha kumārassavā kumārikāyavā.
anya-e0301n0:1415_7: Apinukho nāmarūpaṃ vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjissathāti.
anya-e0301n0:1415_9: Tasmā hi ānanda eseva hetu esa nidānaṃ esa samudayo esa paccayo nāmarūpassa.
anya-e0301n0:1416_7: Tasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpuppattiyā ekantena viññāṇapaccayatā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1416_8: Evaṃ uppannañca panetaṃ paṭisandhirūpaṃ puna sayaṃ tasmiṃ bhave yāva cutiyā pavattamānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpasantatīnaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1416_10: Atibalavantaṃpi hi cittaṃ purimuppannāya rūpapaveṇiyā asati rūpaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_12: Tatoyeva hi arūpabhave kāmāvacarādīni rūpajanakacittānipi tattha rūpaṃ najanentīti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_13: Asaññasattepi utu samuṭṭhānarūpasantatiyo pathamuppannāya kammajarūpasantatiyā vijja mānattāeva uppajjantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_14: Vuttañhi vibhaṅgaṭīkāyaṃ arūpaṃ pana rūpassa okāso na hotīti yasmiṃ rūpe sati cittaṃ aññaṃ rūpaṃ uppādeyya.
anya-e0301n0:1416_16: Purimarūpassāpi hi paccayabhāvo atthi puttassa pitisadisatādassanatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_17: Etthaca puttassa pitisadisatādassanatoti etena imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_19: Yassa ānubhāvena tannibbattātiṇarukkhā vaḍḍhantā yathāvā tathāvā avaḍḍhitvāattanā samānabījehieva tiṇarukkhehi sabbaso sadisā kāraṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1416_20: Evamevaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yoni bhāvasaṅkhātaṃ niyāma rūpaṃnāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1416_21: Yassānubhāvena te samāna jātikehieva kulehi visesato mātāpitūhi eva sabbaso sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_1: ayaṃ yoniniyāmonāma kalalakālādīsu puttānaṃ sarīresu mātāpitūhi samudāgataṃ utujarūpasantānaṃeva.
anya-e0301n0:1417_2: Yassa ānubhāvena taṃsantānaṃ samānajātikasattasaṇṭhānasadisaṃ attano ñātikulasadisañca hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_3: Yathāhiitthibhāvādirūpaṃ sattānaṃ itthiliṅgādīni bījarūpañca tiṇarukkhānaṃ taṃtaṃvaṇṇasaṇṭhānā dīni niyāmeti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_4: Evaṃ yonirūpaṃ nānājātivasena sattānaṃ niyāmakaṃ vavatthāpakaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_5: Ettāvatā pavattiyaṃ thapetvā cittajarūpaṃ sabbesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ uppattiyā cittanirapekkhatā
anya-e0301n0:1417_7: Tenevaca tesaṃ cittassa ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesupi cittarahite nirodhasamāpatti kālepi uppatti hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_17: Tathā saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhūtāca paññatti nāmarūpānaṃ vasena tividhā ṭhitā dhammā paṭṭhāne sabbathā catuvīsati paccayānāma hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1417_18: Etthaca tividhā ṭhitānaṃ dhammānaṃ tekālikādibhāve sati catuvīsatipaccayānaṃpi yathāsambhavaṃ tekālikādibhedo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1417_19: Tattha ārammaṇaadhipati upanissayapaccayā tekālikā kālamuttāca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1420_1: Tattha imasmiṃ bhave abhinavānaṃ dhanadhaññabhogānaṃvā vijjāsippasutapari yattīnaṃvā sīlasamādhipaññānaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1420_2: bhavantare bhavasampattibhoga sampatti maggaphalasampattīnaṃvā paṭilābhatthāya pubbayogaṃ karontassa
anya-e0301n0:1420_4: Paṭṭhāne pana anāgataṃ cakkhusampadaṃ patthayamāno sota, ghāna, jivhā,
anya-e0301n0:1420_7: phoṭṭhabbasampadaṃ patthayamāno anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ deti sīlaṃ samādiyatītiādinā bhavantarapariyāpannāeva sampattiyo vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1420_8: Tā pana dānādīnaṃ kammānaṃ anurūpavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1420_10: Anantara samanantara āsevana natthi vigata paccayā atītakālikā.
anya-e0301n0:1420_12: Ajjhattabahiddhāduke ārammaṇā dhipati sahajāta aññamañña nissaya upanissaya purejāta āhāra atthi avigatā ajjhattabahiddhā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1420_14: Ārammaṇa adhipati upanissayā saṅkhatā asaṅkhatāca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1420_17: kadācipi rūpasaṅkhātaṃ saṇṭhānatthaṃ anupagamanato nāmantica pavuccati. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1421_5: Tathā paññāpetabbā atthā paññapīyanti etāyāti paññatti.
anya-e0301n0:1421_6: Byañjanatthajotako paññattisaddoti evaṃ duvidhā paññattīti vuttaṃ tatoavasesā.La.
anya-e0301n0:1421_10: Taṃtaṃbhūtavipariṇāmākāranti pathaviyādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhimattabhāvappakārasaṅkhātaṃ tathā tathā pariṇā mākāraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1421_14: Tathātathā paññattāti ayaṃ pathavīnāma ayaṃ pabbatonāmāti evamādi nayena mahājanena paññattā, kathitā,
anya-e0301n0:1424_1: Sambhārasannivesākāranti kaṭṭhādīnaṃ sambhārānaṃ tathā tathā sannivesākāraṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1424_4: Kaṭṭhādayo eva hi gehākārena saṇṭhitā gehanti rathākārena saṇṭhitā rathoti vuccantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1427_2: Candāvaṭṭanādikanti candasūriyādīnaṃ sineruṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āvaṭṭanādikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1427_12: tadā sakalassa ahassa pubbabhāgattā pubbanhoti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1427_17: Taṃ taṃ bhūtanimittanti pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ uddhumātakādikañca bhūtanimittaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1427_20: Etena parikammanimitta uggahanimitta paṭibhāganimittānaṃ siddhakāraṇaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n0:1428_0: Evamādibhedāti ettha ādisaddena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatā upādāpaññatti upanidhāpaññattiādayo saṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n0:1428_1: Paramatthato avijjamānāpīti etena sammutito laddhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1428_2: Teneva hi tāsaṃ vijjamānabhāvaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā voharantānaṃ musāvādonāma nahotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1428_3: Atthacchāyākārenāti taṃ taṃ bhūtādīnaṃ paramatthānaṃ samūhasaṇṭhānādichāyākārena.
anya-e0301n0:1428_4: Atthacchā yākārenātivā saddābhidheyyasaṅkhātena dabbapaṭibimbākārena saviggahākārenāti attho,
anya-e0301n0:1428_8: Ettha pana evamādipabhedā ālambaṇabhūtā parikappiyamānā sabbā paññatti paññāpīyatīti atthena paññattīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1428_19: Piṭakattayasaṅkhāte hi nāme sati taduggaṇhantānaṃ sabbe tadatthā padepade vākyevākye āgacchanti yevāti.
anya-e0301n0:1429_0: Apica suṇantānaṃ ñāṇaṃ taṃtaṃatthābhimukhaṃ nāmetīti nāmaṃ nāmagahaṇavasena kattabbattā nāmameva kammanti nāmakammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1429_3: Aviditapakkhe ṭhito attho etāya tato nīharitvā vuccati kathīyatīti nirutti.
anya-e0301n0:1429_5: Abhibyattaṃ katvā lapīyati kathīyati attho etenāti abhilāpo.
anya-e0301n0:1429_15: Paramatthato vijjamānesu atthesu pavattā paññatti vijjamānapaññatti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1429_16: Avijja mānesu bhūmipabbatādīsu pavattā paññatti avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1429_17: Etā eva samāsaṭṭhānaṃ patvā dvipadasaṃyogavasena itarā catassopi hontīti dassetuṃ tatthātiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1429_18: Etāya paññāpentīti etena vijjamānaṃ atthaṃ paññapenti etāyāti vijjamānapaññattīti imamatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0301n0:1429_20: Cha abhiññā assāti chaḷabhiññoti katvā visesanabhūtānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ vijjamānattā visesitabbabhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:1429_21: puggalassa avijjamānattā chaḷa bhiññoti vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1429_22: Itthī avijjamānā saddo vijjamānoti itthiyāsaddo itthisaddoti avijjamānena vijjamāna paññatti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1429_23: Cakkhuca cakkhuviññāṇañca ubhayaṃpi vijjāmānanti cakkhusmiṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti vijjamānenavijjamānapaññatti nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1429_24: Rājāca puttoca dvepi avijjamānāevāti rañño putto rājaputtoti avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattināmāti imamatthaṃ dassento ubhinnantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n0:1430_0: Ettha pana vacanato ca vacanatthatoca vinimuttā saddasabhāvā nāmapaññattināma visuṃ natthīti vadanti.
anya-e0301n0:1430_3: Saddo hi nāma akkharapadabyañjanabhāvaṃ upagatoyeva atthajotane samattho hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1430_4: Paramattha saddoca khaṇiko cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhūto tabbhāvaṃ upagato nahotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1430_6: Atthibhāvocassā vacanasaddaṃ sutvā anantare akkhara pada byañjanagocaracittassa tadanantareca tadatthavijānanacittassa
anya-e0301n0:1430_8: Tattha vacīghosā nusārenāti uccāriyamānasaddasaṅkhātassa vacīghosassa ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anusārena
anya-e0301n0:1430_9: uppannāya sotaviññāṇa vīthiyā pavattiyā anantare uppannassa manodvārassa gocara bhūtā sāyaṃ paññattīti
anya-e0301n0:1430_11: Kīdisī pana sāyaṃ paññattīti āha atthāyassā.La.
anya-e0301n0:1430_13: Tattha tatoparanti tato nāmapaññattārammaṇassa manodvārassa uppattito paraṃ atthā viññāyantīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1430_14: Yassā nāmapaññattiyā anusārena paramatthapaññattibhūtā atthā viññāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1430_15: Sā ayaṃ paññatti lokasaṅketanimmitāti viññeyyāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1431_0: Etthaca sotaviññāṇavīthiyāti ettha atītasaddamattā rammaṇā tadanuvattikānāma manoviññāṇavīthipi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1431_3: Tesu ekamekaṃ paccuppannaṃ atītañca gahetvā sota viññāṇavīthiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyāca uppajjitvā niruddhāya
anya-e0301n0:1431_4: avasāne tāni akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā akkharasamūhaṃ gahetvā ekā manoviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0301n0:1431_5: Tadanantaraṃ ayaṃ akkharasamūho etassa nāmanti nāmapaññattigahaṇavasena aparāya manoviññāṇa vīthiyā uppajjitvā
anya-e0301n0:1431_6: niruddhāya tadanantaraṃ uppannāya manoviññāṇa vīthiyā ayametassa atthoti pakatiyā tadatthavijānanaṃ sambhavatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1431_7: Maṇisāramañjūsāyaṃ pana tadanuvattikavīthito paraṃ ekaṃ vinicchayavīthiṃ viññattigahaṇavīthiñca vadati.
anya-e0301n0:1431_8: Tato paraṃ ekakkhare sadde ekatthajotikāya nāmapaññattiyā gahaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1431_9: Yā vadantassa pubbabhāge manasā vavatthāpito paññattisaddonāma vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1431_11: Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu tattha tattha javanavīthivārānaṃ paṭipāṭikathanaṃnāma padhānapākaṭagahaṇavasenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1431_12: Ekaccharakkhaṇe aneka koṭisatasahassāni cittāni uppajjantīti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā –
anya-e0301n0:1434_0: Na ca paramatthasaddasaṅghāṭānaṃ satasahassaṃpi ekakkharaṃnāma bhavituṃ pahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1434_1: Tasmā idha bahuṃ vicāraṇā amhehi nakatāti.
anya-e0301n0:1439_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhahi paricchedehi sapaccayapabhedaṃ nāmarūpa vibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni viditanāmarūpa vibhāgassa
anya-e0301n0:1439_3: Ito paccaya saṅgahato paraṃ samathavipassanānaṃ bhāvanānaṃ duvidhaṃpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yathākkamaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1439_4: Tattha kilese aññepivā vitakkādayo oḷārikadhamme sametīti samatho.
anya-e0301n0:1439_8: Tāya hi yogino khandhesu lokiyamahājanena passitaṃ itthipurisādikaṃ niccasukhādikañca atikkamitvā visesena aniccādikameva passantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1439_16: Ādimajjha pariyosānānañhi samudāyabhūkaṃ ekametaṃ pathavīkasiṇa bhāvanādikaṃ bhāvanākammaṃpi attano avayavabhūtassa
anya-e0301n0:1441_0: Uttaruttara yogakammassa padaṭṭhānatāya kammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiñcātipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1442_4: Tadubhayānipi hi yogānuyogasaṅkhātassa samatha kammassa pavattiṭṭhānattā samathakammaṭṭhānānināma hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1442_6: Dasaanussati yoti buddhaguṇādīni dasaanussatiṭṭhānāni anussaraṇasati yoca.
anya-e0301n0:1444_0: Cariyānaṃ saṃsaggabhedo vutto. So idha nādhippeto.
anya-e0301n0:1445_0: Nahi kammaṭṭhānānaṃnāma saṃsaggacaritassapi ekassa dve tīṇi dātabbāni hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_1: Teneva hi so bhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nagarukatoti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_2: Sabbāpi appanāya pubbabhāgapavattā kāmāvacara bhāvanā parikammabhāvanānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_3: Sā pana appanāya āsanne dūreti duvidhā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_5: sā appanaṃ upecca samīpe ṭhatvā pavattattā upacārabhāvanāti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1445_7: Iti parikammabhāvanāpi samānā pubbāparavisesa pākaṭabhāvatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi nāmehi gahitāti vuttaṃ parikammabhāvanā.La.
anya-e0301n0:1445_8: Tissobhāvanāti tāsaṃ pana viseso parato āgamissati.
anya-e0301n0:1445_10: Tañca tassā ārammaṇa bhāvena ekaṃpi samānaṃ pubbāparavisesapākaṭabhāvatthaṃ parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittanti dvidhā bhinditvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_12: Vidatthicaturaṅgulasaṅkhātena parittapamāṇenavā khala maṇḍalādisaṅkhātena mahantapamāṇenavā kataṃ akataṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1445_17: tattakaṃ cittena asesaṃ pharitvā eva gahetabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_19: tena vuttaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalatalameva asesapharitabbaṭṭhena kasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_23: Phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne cittena saṇṭhānaṃ katvā gahitā vāyuvaṭṭi vāyokasiṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_27: Tittichiddavāta pānachiddādīsu dissamānā ākāsavisiṭṭhā saṇṭhānapaññatti ākāsakasiṇaṃnāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_31: Tadeva pūtibhāvaṃ gatakāle purimavaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā puna nīlabhāvaṃ pattaṃ vinīlakaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_32: Tadeva puna paccitvā tato tato visandamānapubbayuttaṃ vipubbakaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_33: Yuddhabhūmiyādīsu satthena majjhe chinditvā thapitaṃ virūpachinnasarīraṃ vicchinnakaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_34: Soṇa siṅgālādīhi vividhākārena khāyitapadesayuttaṃ sarīraṃ vikkhāyitakaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_35: Soṇasiṅgālādīhi eva khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā apakaḍḍhitvā tato tato khittaaṅgapaccaṅgayuttaṃ sarīraṃ vittakkhikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_36: Aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tato tato khittaaṅgapaccaṅgayuttaṃ sarīraṃ hatavikkhittakaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_39: Sakalo aṭṭhisaṅghāṭovā ekamekaṃvā aṭṭhi aṭṭhikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_48: Attānaṃ devattaṃvā sakkattaṃvā brahmattaṃvā vahituṃ samatthā attano saddhādiguṇā devatāguṇānāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_49: Vatta paṭipattivasenavā dhutaṅgasamādānavasenavā jhānasamāpattivasenavā vipassanāvasenavā attano santāne
anya-e0301n0:1445_50: ciraṃvikālaṃ vikkhambhitānaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ vūpasamo attanāadhigatanibbānañca upasamonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_51: Ekabhavapariyāpannassa attano khandhasantānassa bhedo maraṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_52: Kesakāyādīnaṃ nānākāyānaṃ samūhabhūto ayaṃ kāyo kāyonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_53: Attani nirantaraṃ pavattamānā assāsa passāsā ānāpāṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_56: Tassa hitasukhaṃ avippakiṇṇaṃ katvā saṅgaṇhatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1445_58: Atthato pana parasattānaṃ hitūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto adosoeva.
anya-e0301n0:1445_59: Parasattānaṃ hitūpasaṃhāra hitamodana ahitāpanayanasaṅkhātaṃ byāpārattayaṃ pahāya tesaṃ kammasakatānubrūhanavasena
anya-e0301n0:1445_63: Na hi ettakesu eva sattesu etā pavattetabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1445_64: Na tato aññesūti evaṃ etāsaṃ visayaparicchedonāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_65: Evaṃsantepi ādikammi kena ādito ekasmiṃ puggale attano bhāvanācittaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ laddhavisesañca katvā
anya-e0301n0:1445_66: pacchā dvīsu tīsūtiādinā vaḍḍhitvā sīmasambhedoca odhisopharaṇa anodhisopharaṇa disāpharaṇāniva kattabbānīti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_67: Yaṃ pana vibhaṅge mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatītiādinā paṭisambhidāmaggeca sabbesattā
anya-e0301n0:1445_69: Taṃ mettājhāne vasībhāvappattānaṃ vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_70: Etā pana visesena dosapakkhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhūtā hontīti taṃsamaṅginoca niccaṃ sommahadayabhāvena brahmasadi sattā brahmānonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1445_73: Āhāreti asita pīta khāyita sāyita vasena catuppabhede ajjhohaṭāhāre.
anya-e0301n0:1445_74: Paṭikūlasaññāti āhārahetu anubhavitabbānaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ paccavekkhanavasena sarasapaṭikūlatā paccavekkhanavasena
anya-e0301n0:1445_75: āsayanidhāna pakkāpakkaphalanissandapaccavekkhana vasena ca tattha nikanti pahānasaññā.
anya-e0301n0:1445_76: Catudhātuvavatthānanti sarīragatānaṃ pathaviādīnaṃ catunnaṃ mahādhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇā divasena visuṃ visuṃ paricchinditvā samanupassanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_77: Tañhi catasso dhātuyo vavatthapiyanti vinicchiyanti sallakkhiyanti etenāti catudhātuvavatthānanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_81: So hi kāmaṃ kadāci dosena carati.
anya-e0301n0:1445_85: Tasmā ussannena rāgena so rāgacaritoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_87: Mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāyāti vacanato mettādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ byāpādavihiṃsā
anya-e0301n0:1445_88: aratīnaṃ nissaraṇatāvacanato suparisuddhānañca vaṇṇakasiṇānaṃ dosavatthuttābhāvato catassoappamaññāyo.La.
anya-e0301n0:1445_94: Tassa tadanugatikā upekkhāpi sappāyānāma hotīti katvā catasso appamaññāyoti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_96: Yadidaṃ upekkhā ceto vimuttīti vacanato upekkhā rāgacaritassāti vattabbaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1445_97: Nīlādīnica cattāri kasiṇānīti idañca manāpiyarūpāni nīlādīni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_99: Ānāpāṇasati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāyāti vacanato ānāpāṇaṃvitakkacaritassāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1445_100: Mohacarito pana pakatiyā pamādabahulo hoti vikkhittacittoca.
anya-e0301n0:1445_101: Ānāpāṇañcanāma nirantaraṃ pavattamānaṃ tassa satiṃ uppādentaṃ viya pavattatīti taṃ mohacaritassasappāyanti vuttaṃ siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1447_0: Buddhivisayabhāvena mohapaṭipakkhattāti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati.
anya-e0301n0:1448_0: Evañhi sati so buddhicaritena saha vattabbo siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_2: Te pana visesato saddhaṃ upabrūhayantīti vuttaṃ buddhānussati ādayo.La.
anya-e0301n0:1448_4: Paramatthato sukhumatarāni maraṇādīni vipulabuddhīnaṃ eva visayānāma hontīti vuttaṃ maraṇa. La.
anya-e0301n0:1448_6: Sesānipanasabbānipīti cattāri bhūta kasiṇāni dve ālokākāsakasiṇāni cattāro āruppācāti dasavidhāni kammaṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0301n0:1448_9: Sambādhasmiñhi okāse cittaṃ bhiyyo saṃmohaṃ āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_12: Tatthaca vitakkacaritassevāti ettha evasaddo khuddakantipade yujjati.
anya-e0301n0:1448_16: Rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā saddhādīnañca anupakārikā kusalabhāvanānāma natthītipi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1448_18: Parikammabhāvanā labbhateva parikammena vinā ekassapi kammaṭṭhānassa asampajjanato.
anya-e0301n0:1448_21: Buddha dhamma saṅgha sīla cāga devatā upasama guṇānaṃ tāva gambhīratāya nānāppakāraguṇā nussaraṇādhimuttatāyagāti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1448_22: Tattha gambhīra tāyāti etena ekekassapi guṇapadassa gambhīrattā tabbisayo samādhi mahāsamudde sasako
anya-e0301n0:1448_23: viya tattha appanaṃ patvā niccalabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ nasakkotīti dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_24: Nānāppakāra guṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāyavāti etena tesaṃ guṇānaṃ atappa niyasabhāvattā ettakeeva guṇapade
anya-e0301n0:1448_25: ṭhatvā appanaṃ pāpessāmīti attano cittaṃ sandhāretuṃpi nasakkotīti dassetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_26: Sesesu pana maraṇasaññāvavatthānesu maraṇaṃ tāva sabhāva dhammattā saṃvejanīyadhammattāca itarānica dve
anya-e0301n0:1448_28: Yadievaṃ kasmā lokuttarajjhānāni atigambhīre nibbānasaṅkhāte sabhāvadhamme appanaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_30: lokuttarajjhānāni tāva visuddhito sammasanañāṇatoca paṭṭhāya anukkamena uparuparipavattānaṃ visuddhibhāvanānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1448_31: balena atigambhīrepi nibbānasaṅkhāte sabhāvadhamme appanābhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_32: Āruppajjhānānica appanāpattasseva pañcamajjhānasamādhissa udayamattāni hontīti ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattakaraṇena
anya-e0301n0:1448_37: Paṭikūlārammaṇānināma atianiṭṭhāni lūkhāni cittarabhijanane paridubbalāni hontīti na tāni attani cittaṃ rocetvā thapetuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_38: Tasmā vitakkena vinā cittaṃ tattha ekaggaṃ hutvā na tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n0:1448_41: Yadievaṃ kathaṃ tesu somanassajjhānaṃ hotīti nīvaraṇasantāpaṃ pahānabalenaceva taṃ taṃ ānisaṃsadassana ñāṇabalenaca.
anya-e0301n0:1448_42: Byādhidukkhapīḷitassa rogino vamanavirecanapavattiyaṃ viya bahuṃ dāni vettanaṃ labhissāmīti ānisaṃsadassāvino
anya-e0301n0:1448_44: Mettādayo tayo brahmavihārā domanassasamuṭṭhitānaṃ byāpādavihiṃ sāaratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtā hontīti na
anya-e0301n0:1448_45: te kadāci somanassena vinā appanaṃ pāpuṇantīti vuttaṃ mettādayo tayo catukkajjhānikāti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_46: Upekkhā pana sattesu sabbaso udāsinapakkhe ṭhatvā bhāvitabbattā kadācipi upekkhāvedanāya vinā appanaṃ napāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ upekkhāpañcamajjhānikāti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_51: Ārammaṇassa suṭṭhu daḷhavibhūtagahaṇasaṅkhātena uggahena vinā ārammaṇasampatti nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1448_52: Asatica ārammaṇasampattiyā upacārajjhānaṃpi tāva na sampajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1448_57: Pariyāyenāti idaṃ pana kassaci ārammaṇassa cakkhunā passantasseva avibhūtatarattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1448_58: Yattha pana pathamaṃ sabhāvadhammaṃ gaṇhitvā pacchā tādise tadākāre taṃsaṇṭhāne paññattārammaṇe upacārovā appanāvā pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1448_59: Tattheva paṭibhāganimittaṃnāma labbhatīti vuttaṃ paṭibhāga nimittaṃpanātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1448_61: Evaṃ samathakamme pathamaṃ uggahakosallaṃ dassetvā idāni ādito paṭṭhāya bhāvanāvidhānaṃ dassento kathantiādi māha.
anya-e0301n0:1448_62: Nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāti ārammaṇassa yathā saṇṭhitaṃ ākāraṃ citte uparupari vibhūtaṃ katvā gaṇhantassa samanupassantassa.
anya-e0301n0:1448_63: Sācabhāvanāti uggahaṇākārena pavatta javanavīthiparaṃparasaṅkhātā sā cittabhāvanā parikammabhāvanā nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1448_65: Samuggahitaṃ hotīti vatvā yathā suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ samuggahitaṃnāma hoti taṃ dassetuṃ cakkhunāpassantassevamanodvārassa āpātamāgatanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1448_66: Tattha manodvārassaāpātamāgatanti cakkhūni nimmilitvāvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvāvā āvajjantassa cakkhunā diṭṭhasadisaṃ manodvāre paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_71: Tathā samāhitassāti tena matthakapattena parikammasamādhinā samāhitassa etassa yogino.
anya-e0301n0:1448_75: Tappaṭibhāganti sabhāva dhammabhūtena tena uggahanimittena sadisaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1448_76: Vatthudhammavimuccitanti meghavalāhakantaratovā rāhumukhatovā nikkhantacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya sabhāvadhammabhūtā
anya-e0301n0:1448_80: Ālambaṇanti tadeva samuggahitaṃ nimittālambaṇaṃ cittesannisannaṃsamappitaṃhotīti manodvārikacittasantāne
anya-e0301n0:1448_81: sannisinnaṃ niccalabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ hutvā suṭṭhu appitaṃ pavesitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_83: Yasmā candamaṇḍalādikassa viya tassa nimittālambaṇassa parisuddhapariyodātabhāvena upaṭṭhitatānāma kilesamalavikkhambhanena
anya-e0301n0:1448_84: parisuddhapariyodātabhāvaṃ patvā obhāsajātassa cittassa vaseneva hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_86: Nahi paññatti dhamme tādiso guṇonāma upalabbhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1448_87: Tasmā paṭibhāga nimitte samuppanne nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ paṭibandhakadhammānaṃ vikkhambhitatā siddhā hotīti vuttaṃ tatopaṭṭhāyātiādi.
anya-e0301n0:1448_88: Paṭibandhanti nīvārenti nissaraṇapakkhikaṃ cittaṃ pātentīti paṭibandhā.
anya-e0301n0:1448_92: Sattavidhaṃ nimitta rakkhaṇavidhānaṃ sampādetvā cakkavattigabbhaṃ viya suṭṭhu rakkhitvā punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena sevantassāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1449_0: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
anya-e0301n0:1452_0: Nacireneva kālena, hoti kassaci appanāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1453_0: Rūpāvacarapathamajjhānaṃappetīti kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sātisayaṃ saṇhasukhumabhāvappattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1453_1: upacārajjhānato sataguṇenavā sahassaguṇenavā thiratarajjhānaṅgayuttaṃ rūpāvacara saṅkhātaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1453_2: tasmiṃ nimitte anupavisitvā viya vattatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1453_4: Pañcasu vasītāsu pana pathamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pathamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1453_10: Tato vicāranti evaṃ punappunaṃ jhānaṅgāni āvajjantassa yadā taṃtaṃjhānaṅgālambaṇā cittavārā antarantarā
anya-e0301n0:1453_11: katipayabhavaṅgehi antaritā hutvā nirantarabhūtā viya pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1453_12: Tadā āvajjana paccavekkhana vasitāyo vasībhūtānāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:1453_14: Tesañhi yamakapāṭi hāriyādikālesu lahukapavattiṃ icchantānaṃ taṃtaṃjhānaṅgā rammaṇācittavārāpi catupañcajavanikāeva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1453_15: Antarabhavaṅgānipi pacchimavārassa upacāra bhūtāni bhavaṅga calana saṅkhātāni dveeva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1453_17: Nahi ārammaṇe āpātaṃ anāgate bhavaṅgaṃ calati.
anya-e0301n0:1453_19: Thapetvā sabbaññubuddhe aññesaṃ vasibhāvapattānaṃpi antarantarā bhavaṅgacāre gaṇanānāma natthīti paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1453_20: Visuddhimagge pana ayaṃ pana matthakappattāvasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakāle labbhati.
anya-e0301n0:1453_23: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ samāpajjane dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1453_25: Tathā samāpajjitaṃ jhānaṃ accharāmattādivasena atiparittakaṃpi khaṇaṃ thapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasīnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1453_27: Paccavekkhanavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā siddhāya siddhāeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1455_1: Tattakaṃ cirataraṃ jhānaṃ thapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitānāmātipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1455_2: Tathā paricchinna kālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathāparicchinnakālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitānāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_0: Pāḷiyañhi pathamajjhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_3: Yattakaṃ kālaṃ jhānaṃ thapetuṃvā yattake kāle tato uṭṭhātuṃvā icchati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_4: Tattakaṃ kālaṃ anūnaṃvā anadhikaṃvā katvā adhiṭṭhātuṃvā vuṭṭhātuṃvā samatthatāpi dassitāyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_5: Evañcasati vuṭṭhānavasitāpi adhiṭṭhānavasitāya siddhāya siddhāevāti tāsaṃ dvinnaṃ visesakappanāpi nippayojanā hotīti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_12: Vitakkādikaṃ oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāyāti ettha pathamajjhānaṃ tāva vasībhūtaṃ katvā ṭhitassa vitakko oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_13: Tadā ahovatame avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ assāti evamassa ajjhāsayo saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_14: Tadā avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjissāmīti puna tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte parikammaṃ karontassa sā bhāvanā vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_15: Sāpi yāva vitakke nikanti na pariyādiyati,
anya-e0301n0:1456_17: Pariyādinnāya pana vitakkanikantiyā upacāra bhāvanānāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_19: Evaṃ taṃtaṃjhānaṅgavirāgabhāvanābalena vitakkādikassa oḷārikassa tassa tassa jhānaṅgassa pajahanatthāya.
anya-e0301n0:1456_20: Vicārādisukhumaṅguppattiyāti vicārādīnaṃ sukhumānaṃ catunnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvinnaṃ puna dvinnaṃvā jhānaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1456_21: tena tena vitakkādinā oḷārikena aṅgena vinā puna uppattiyā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_25: Yathārahanti idaṃ dvāvīsakammaṭṭhānesu dutīyajjhānādīnaṃ anurūpāni kasiṇaānāpāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_26: Avasesesu pana aṭṭhārasakammaṭṭhānesu yasmā arūpajjhānāni nāma ārammaṇātikkamanavaseneva pavattanti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_30: Ākāsakasiṇañhi ugghāṭīyamānaṃpi ākāsa meva hotīti natthi tattha tadatikkamanasambhavoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_31: Ugghāṭetvāti yathādiṭṭhe kasiṇanimitte kasiṇanimittasaññaṃ akatvā tattha ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsaṃ anantanti
anya-e0301n0:1456_34: Evaṃ kasiṇasaññāvidhamanena ākāsasaññāpavattanenaca yaṃkiñci kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā viyojetvāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1456_38: Santametaṃ paṇītametanti parikammaṃ karontassāti ettha tathā sambhāvetvā parikammaṃ karontassapi ārammaṇassa
anya-e0301n0:1456_39: samatikkantattā upari jhānaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ catutthāruppamappetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_40: Parikammaṃkatvāti so bhagavā itipi arahantiādinā samanussaraṇaparikammaṃ katvā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_45: Sādhukamuggahiteti ārammaṇassa vibhūtatara vasenavā cittassa tasmiṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāravasenavā suṭṭhu uggahite.
anya-e0301n0:1456_54: Tassa aṭṭhavidhesu navavidhesuvā samathajjhānesusijjha mānesu abhiññāpi sijjhatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1456_56: Teneva hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ visuddhimaggeca āruppajjhānānaṃpaccayabhāvaṃanupagatassapiākāsakasiṇajjhānassa abhiññāpādakatāsambhavo vuttoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_57: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nahi aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cuddasahākārehi ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā upari abhiññādhigamo hotīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_58: Taṃ pana thapetvā purisa visese avasesānaṃ bahūnaṃ ādikammikakulaputtānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vuttanti yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_59: Teneva hi visuddhimagge imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko
anya-e0301n0:1456_60: yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_61: Tasmā tādisānaṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvānaṃ abhiññākamme ādikammikakulaputtānaṃ kasiṇā nulomato
anya-e0301n0:1456_62: kasiṇapaṭilomatotiādinā nayena vuttehi cuddasahi ākārehi attano rūpapañcamajjhānacittaṃ paridametvā tikkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1456_63: sūraṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā idāni iddhivikubbanaṃ karissā mīti ārabhantānaṃ abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1456_64: pana rūpāvacarapañca majjhānaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathārahaṃ appetīti yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_65: Abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti abhiññāya pādakatthāya yaṃabhiññājātikaṃ rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ samāpajjiyati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_69: Taṃ adhiṭṭheyyaṃ ādi yassa avatthukassa āvibhāvatirobhāvādikassa kammassāti adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_70: Āvajjitvā parikammaṃkarontassāti ettha iddhividhe tāva yaṃyaṃsatādikaṃ nimmitarūpaṃvā āvibhāvādikaṃ nimmitakammaṃvā nipphādetuṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_71: Taṃ taṃ avajjitvā sallakkhetvā sataṃ homi sahassaṃ homītivā sataṃ hotu sahassaṃ hotūtivā idañcidañca hotu evañcevañca hotūtivā parikammaṃ karontassa.
anya-e0301n0:1456_72: Dibbasotādīsu pana yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sotuṃvā passituṃvā jānituṃvā anussarituṃvā icchati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_73: Taṃ taṃ sallakkhetvā asukassa asukānaṃvā saddaṃ suṇomītiādinā parikammaṃ karontassa.
anya-e0301n0:1456_74: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana parikammaṃ katvā puna pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ āgatameva.
anya-e0301n0:1456_75: Yathāha abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_76: Sataṃ homīti parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_78: Tatthaca ādito pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikamma cittassa samādānatthāya hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_80: Tathā hi pādakajjhānabalena suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ parikammacittaṃnāma attano visaye abhiññācittagatikaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_81: Pubbenivāsānussaraṇakāle teneva cittena tasmiṃ bhave atītaṃ dhammajātaṃ yāva paṭisandhiyā jānāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_82: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ parikammasamādhiñāṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_84: Sesābhiññāsupi tassa ñāṇassa visayaviseso yathārahaṃ vattabboti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_85: Therena pana pacchimaṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃnāma na sabbesaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_86: Na hi abhiññāsu vasībhāvapattānaṃ puna pādakajjhānena kiccaṃ atthīti katvā taṃ idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_87: Rūpādīsuālambaṇesuyathārahamappetīti ettha iddhividhañāṇaṃ tāva tekālikabhūtesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_88: Tañhi rūpādīsu chasu ārammaṇadhammesu yaṃ yaṃ nipphādeti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_90: Pādakajjhānacittaṃ pana kāyagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā dissamānenakāyena ākāsegamanakāle atītaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_91: Kāyaṃ cittagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle paccuppannaṃ rūpakāyaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_92: Tathāpavattamānassa pana tassa ñāṇassa kiñcirūpaṃ ārammaṇa mattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_95: Anāgate idaṃnāma hotūti adhiṭṭhāna kāle anāgataṃ taṃtaṃrūpadhammaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_97: Atīte sattadivasāni anāgate sattadivasānīti etthantare kāle atītā nāgatapaccuppannabhūtaṃ parassacittaṃ cattārovā khandhā cetopariya ñāṇassa.
anya-e0301n0:1456_98: Cittañhi jānanto taṃ sampayuttadhammaṃpi icchanto jānissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1456_99: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne kusalā khandhā ceto pariyañāṇassa yathākammupagañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti ñāṇadvayaṃ ekato katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_100: Etthaca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva paracittassa paccuppannālambaṇatānāma santativasenavā addhā vasenavā yojitā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_102: Āvajjane paccuppannaṃ yaṃkiñci ekaṃ cittaṃ āvajjetvā niruddhe javanānipi tadeva āvajjanena saddhiṃ niruddhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1456_103: atītaṃ gaṇhantīti tāni kālato āvajjanena saha bhinnālambaṇāni nāma honti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_104: Naca aniṭṭhe maggaphalavīthito aññasmiṃ ṭhāne kālamattenāpi tesaṃ tena saha bhinnālambaṇatā aṭṭhakathācariyehi anu matāti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_105: Tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu paccuppannaṃnāma santativasena addhāvasenaca gahetuṃ yuttanti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_107: Nahi abhidhamme atītārammaṇattikaṃ santati addhānavaseneva vuttanti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_108: Itarathā paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena paccayoti vattabbo siyā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_110: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena paccayoticceva pana vutto,
anya-e0301n0:1456_111: tasmā āvajjanādīni sabbāni cittāni paccekaṃ attanā khaṇavasena sahuppannāni parassa cittānigaṇhantīti yuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1456_112: naca tāni dhammato bhinnā lambaṇānināma honti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_117: Atītānantara cutito pana paṭṭhāya atītā khandhā khandhupani bandhā nāma gottakasiṇa nimittādikā paññattiyo
anya-e0301n0:1456_119: Paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ dibbacakkhussāti evaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathāraha mappetīti.
anya-e0301n0:1456_120: Idāni abhiññāvasena pavakkhassa tassa pañcamajjhānassa kiccabhedena pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ iddhividhantiādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n0:1456_123: Tassa tassa tathā tathāvā ijjhana saṅkhāto vidho koṭṭhāso pakārovā etassāti iddhividhaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_124: Taṃ pana tividhaṃ adhiṭṭhā niddhi vikubbaniddhi manomayiddhi vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1456_125: Tattha attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā tasseva sata sahassādi bahubhāva karaṇa vasenavā ākāsagamanādivasena
anya-e0301n0:1456_126: vā bahiddhā nānāvaṇṇa pāṭihāriya dassana vasenavā pavattitā iddhi adhiṭṭhāniddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1456_127: Pakativaṇṇaṃ pana vijahitvā attānameva kumāravaṇṇanāgavaṇṇādikaṃ katvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi vikubbaniddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1456_128: Attano sarīrabbhantare aññaṃ sabbaso attanā sadisaṃ sarīraṃ nimminitvā nīharitvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi manomayiddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1456_132: Devānaṃ uḷārakammanibbattā dūrepi paṭicchannepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ pasādasotaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_133: Dibbasotasadisattā pana idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbasotanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_134: Kasiṇajjhāna saṅkhātenavā dibbavihārena paṭiladdhattā sayañca tasmiṃ dibbavihāre pariyāpannattā dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1456_136: Tadeva cetopariyāyanti paricchijja jānanti etenāti katvā cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_137: Pubbe nivāso vuccati atītabhavesu attano chasu dvāresu āpātaṃ āgatā suṭṭhu viditā dhammā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_138: Pubbe atītajātīsu gocara nivāsavasena nivasiṃsu attano chadvārikāni cittāni etthāti katvā.
anya-e0301n0:1456_139: Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ pana paresaṃ chadvāragahitāpi dhammā pubbe nivāso hotiyeva,
anya-e0301n0:1456_142: Pubbe vuttanayena dibbañca taṃ cakkhucāti dibbacakkhu.
anya-e0301n0:1456_143: Taṃ sadisattā idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbacakkhūti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_144: Dibbavihāra vasena paṭiladdhattā sayañca dibbavihārasannissitattā dibbañca taṃ cakkhucāti dibbacakkhu.
anya-e0301n0:1456_145: Yathākammupagañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni imasseva paribhaṇḍañāṇānināma.
anya-e0301n0:1456_146: Nahi tesaṃ paṭilābhatthāya visuṃ cittaparidamanaparikammaṃnāma atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1456_148: Tattha dibbacakkhunā nirayesu dukkhaṃ devesuvā sukhaṃ anubhavante satte disvā tesaṃ atītaṃ kammaṃ jānissāmīti
anya-e0301n0:1456_149: parikammaṃ karontassa taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ yathākammupagañāṇaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_150: Tato cavitvā kattha bhavissantīti tesaṃ anāgate pavattiṃ passissāmīti parikammaṃ karontassa tesaṃ anāgatakhandhārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1456_151: Pubbe nivāsānussati ñāṇaṃ viyaca sabbaṃpi anāgatadhammajātaṃ etassa ārammaṇaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1456_152: Etañhi attano visaye sabbaññutañāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1458_0: Anāgate sattadivasato paṭṭhāya cittacetasikadhammā dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ etassa visayoti adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1459_0: Nahi bhavantarepi anāvatadhamme jānituṃ samatthaṃ etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgatadhamme najānātīti sakkā bhavituṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1459_2: tathā pubbenivāsañāṇaṃpi imasmiṃ bhave parasantānagate atītadhammeti.
anya-e0301n0:1459_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsuca bhavantaragatadhammehi eva ñāṇadvayaṃ yojitaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1459_4: Taṃ pana asādhāraṇakālavasena ānubhāvavisesapākaṭatthaṃ yojitanti yuttaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_1: Sabbalokiyamahājanehi yathādiṭṭhaṃ puggalasattaitthi purisādikaṃ nicca dhuva sukha atta nimittañca atikkamitvā visesena passanti etāyāti vipassanā.
anya-e0301n0:1461_5: Vipassanā eva vā kammanti vipassanā kammaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_8: Vipassanā kammameva vā uttaruttarassa bhāvanā visesassa ānisaṃsavisesassavā ṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_9: Tasmiṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne sattavidhena visuddhi saṅgaho tīṇi lakkhaṇānītiādinā sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1461_10: Niccasīlameva sayañca dussilyamalato visuddhattā kāyaṃ vācañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti sīlavisuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_11: Subhāvita cittasantānameva sayañca nīvaraṇamalato visuddhattā taṃsamaṅgipuggalañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti cittavisuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_13: Dhammavavatthānañāṇasaṅkhātā diṭṭhieva taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhimalato visodhanato visuddhīti diṭṭhivisuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_14: Soḷasavidhaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaranti atikkamanti etāyāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇā.
anya-e0301n0:1461_16: Sā eva taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ ahetu diṭṭhi visamahetudiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ yathāvuttāhi duvidhāhi kaṅkhāhi visodhanato visuddhīti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_18: Tattha ñāṇadassanavisuddhādhigamanassa upāyabhūto manasikāravidhivā ariyamaggovā maggonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_20: Maggassa maggato amaggassaca amaggato jānanaṃ dassanañca maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_21: Tameva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato visuddhīti maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_26: ariyamaggañāṇasaṅkhāta ñāṇadassanameva sammohamalato visuddhattā visuddhīti ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_27: Etthaca sutamayādivasena siddhaṃ anumāna ñāṇaṃpi ñāṇamevāti taṃ paṭikkhipitvā atthapaccakkhañāṇameva
anya-e0301n0:1461_29: Lakkhīyanti sallakkhīyanti ime aniccāevāti ekantena vinicchīyanti dhammā etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_38: Tathā aniccatāyogena sabbo saṅkhatadhammo aniccoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_46: Taṃ pana ākāraṃ disvā tadākāravante dhamme ñāṇaṃ pavattati ayaṃ dhammo aniccoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_47: Tasmā sā aniccatāyeva idha lakkhaṇantipi vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_51: Yathāvuttāya pana aniccatāya saha aniccassa dhammassa aniccena vā dhammena saha aniccatāya anuanupassanā aniccānupassanā.
anya-e0301n0:1461_53: Yāva sarīre dhammānaṃ tividhalakkhaṇayuttatā attano ñāṇena paññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_54: Tāva tesu tividhalakkhaṇavibhāvanavasena punappunaṃ masanaṃ āmasanaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_56: Udayo vuccati taṃtaṃ khaṇānurūpaṃ taṃtaṃ paccayānurūpañca navanavānaṃ dhammānaṃ pātu bhāvo ceva uparupari vaḍḍhanañca.
anya-e0301n0:1461_57: Vayo vuccati yattha yattha laddhapaccayā navanavā dhammā pātubhavanti ceva vaḍḍhantica.
anya-e0301n0:1461_59: Samūha santativasena pana udayapakkhassavā vayapakkhassavā samanupassanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_60: Tesu pana dvīsu pakkhesu udayakoṭṭhāsonāma uparupari pākaṭo hutvā āgacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_62: So eva ca aniccatāya paramā koṭīti tasseva suṭṭhutaraṃ samanupassanañāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_63: Bhaṅge diṭṭhe evaṃ bhijjanasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ anekasahassasoka dukkhavatthubhāvena tathā tathā bhāyitabbapakārasamanupassanañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_64: Loke pana kiñci bhayavatthuṃ passantāpi āsanne aññasmiṃ paṭisaraṇe sati na bhāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_66: Evaṃ bhāyitabbānaṃ tesaṃ sabbaso aññapaṭisaraṇābhāvadassanaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_67: Kutoci paṭisaraṇābhāvena tehi ukkaṇṭhatākāra sahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_68: Nibbindīyamānehi tehi attānaṃ vimuccituṃ ajjhāsayasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_69: Suṭṭhu muccituṃ icchantassa sīghaṃ muccanatthaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ cattālīsāya ākārehi anekādīnavarāsi bhāva
anya-e0301n0:1461_70: paṭisaṅkhānavasena suṭṭhuvipphārataraṃ pavattamānaṃ vipassanā ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_71: Tesaṃ pana anekādīnavarāsibhāve suṭṭhu diṭṭhe saṅkhāresu nikantiyā pariyādinnāya idāni muccanupāyo laddhoti
anya-e0301n0:1461_72: adhimattabyāpāraṃ akatvā samena vāyāmena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa saṅkhārapariggahe majjhattākārasahitaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1461_73: saṅkhāresuvā bhayañca nandiñca pahāya udāsinabhāvasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_74: Upari maggappavattiṃ vahituṃ samatthabhāvena magguppattiyā anulomehi thāmabalehi sampannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_75: Heṭṭhimānaṃvā ñāṇānaṃtaṃ anulomaṃ hoti lakkhaṇattayassa suṭṭhutaraṃ vibhāvanato.
anya-e0301n0:1461_78: Atta jīvasuññatādassana balena khandhesu kilesabandhanato vimuccamāno maggo suññatāvimokkho nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_79: Saṅkhārānaṃ yāni nimittāni kilesānaṃ avassayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_80: Tāni vidhamitvā sabbaso dhammānaṃ anātha bhāva dassana balena vimuccamāno maggo animittovimokkho nāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_81: Saṅkhāresu sabbaso assāsābhāva dassanabalena vimuccamāno maggo appaṇihitovimokkhonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_83: Sā hi dhammānaṃ samūhaghana santatighana kiccaghana ārammaṇaghanesu taṃtaṃghana vinibbhujjana vasena
anya-e0301n0:1461_84: pavattattā attā iti gahetabbassa kassaci sārassa abhāvānupassanato suññatānupassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_86: Sāpi hi santati vicchedana vasena pavattattā ahanti gahitassa nimittassa vidhamanato animittānupassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_88: Sāpi hi mahāādīnavarāsi bhāva vibhāvanavasena pavattattā idaṃ mama etaṃ mamāti gahetabbassa kassaci paṇihita
anya-e0301n0:1461_91: Tañhi sabbalo kiyasīlānaṃ jeṭṭhakattā patica hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_94: Tamevaca dussilyamaggassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaroti vuccatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_95: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiyā cakkhādīni indriyāni viphanditāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_98: Tesaṃ uppatti maggassa saṃvaraṇavasena pavattamānā sati indriya saṃvaronāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_102: Soyeva buddhapaṭikuṭṭhehi pupphadānādīhi micchāpayogehi tividhakuhanavatthuhica parisuddhattā ājīvapārisuddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_104: Tathārūpena parisuddhena bhikkhācārādinā payogena paṭiladdhānaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭiggahaṇa paribhuñjanakālesu
anya-e0301n0:1461_105: sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassaca pahānatthaṃ taṃtaṃpayojanamariyādaṃvā paṭikūlalakkhaṇaṃvā dhātumattalakkhaṇaṃvā
anya-e0301n0:1461_106: pariggahaṇa paccavekkhanavasena pavattaṃ paccayasevane paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ paccaya sannissitasīlaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_111: Cittavisuddhīti ettha cittasaddena samādhi niddiṭṭhoti vuttaṃ duvidhopisamādhi cittavisuddhināmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_112: Lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhāna vasenāti ettha dhammānaṃ paccattasabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_114: Tena sabhāvena sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃvā sādhanapaccayā paṭiladdhaguṇasaṅkhātā sampattivā rasonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_116: Sā eva sampattivā kāriyasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃvā paccupaṭṭhānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_119: Tesaṃ vasena nāmassaca rūpassaca pariggaho ñāṇena paricchinditvā gahaṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_120: Etthaca pariggaho duvidho saṅkhepa pariggaho vitthārapariggahoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_121: Tattha ajjhattadhamme dvidhā katvā idaṃ nāmameva, na rūpaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_124: Tadubhayatoca añño attāvā jīvovā sattovā puggalovā manussovā devovā brahmāvā natthīti evaṃ paccakkhato
anya-e0301n0:1461_126: Ñāṇuttarikohi puggalo ettakamattenapi sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti saddhiṃ saññā cittavipallāsehīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_129: Tattha satthusāsanadhamme suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitena saddhāmattenapi diṭṭhi vipallāso vikkhambhito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_130: Itare pana nāmarūpapariggahe kateyeva vikkhambhitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_133: Taṃmūlikāca kilesadhammā avikkhambhitā eva hontīti apica.
anya-e0301n0:1461_136: channaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena chadhātiādinā nayena nāmarūpaṃ pariggahe tabbameva.
anya-e0301n0:1461_137: Tattha cha dhātuyonāma pathavidhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātuyo.
anya-e0301n0:1461_138: Pakkusāti kulaputto hi imā cha dhātuyo pariggaṇhitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā capitvā suddhāvāsesu nibbattoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_139: Yattake vā pana dhamme pariggaṇhanto attā meti pavattamāne saññācittadiṭṭhi vipallāse vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_141: Imasmiṃ pana saṅgahapakaraṇe yo yo cittacetasika vibhāgo rūpavibhāgoca heṭṭhā vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1461_142: Tassa sabbassa vasena nāmarūpassa pariggaṇhanaṃ vitthārapariggahonāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_144: Paṭividdhacatusaccānaṃ pana ābhidhammikattherānaṃ eva visayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1461_145: Nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhantassa pana nāmarūpa mattato uddhaṃ aññassa kassaci abhāvadassanatoca sarīrabbhantare jīvasaññito attā atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_150: Suddhe nāme evavārūpe evavā puggalasattakriyasaññitānaṃ īhābyāpārānaṃ sabbaso abhāvadassanato tadubhayasaṃyogeeva
anya-e0301n0:1461_151: tesaṃ labbhamānatā dassanatoca tadubhayaṃvā ekamekaṃvā uddissa attāti pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_152: Attā jīvo satto puggalo manusso devo brahmāti evamādīsu vohāresuca vohāra matte aṭṭhatvā attānāma ekantato
anya-e0301n0:1461_153: atthi jīvonāma ekantato atthītiādinā tadatthābhinivesavasena atidhāvanañca pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_154: Tadatthābhinivesotica attānāma atthi jīvonāma atthītiādinā daḷhataraṃ abhiniveso.
anya-e0301n0:1461_156: Paccayapariggahoti etthapi duvidho paccayapariggaho saṅkhepato vitthārato cāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_157: Tattha vatthārammaṇavasena nāmassa cittotukāhāravasena rūpassa avijjātaṇhupādānakammavasena tadubhayassaca
anya-e0301n0:1461_159: Heṭṭhā paccayasaṅgahe vibhattehi paṭiccasamuppādanaya paṭṭhānanayehi pariggaṇhanto vitthārato pariggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_161: Paccayaṃ pariggaṇhantassapana yathāvavatthitassa sabbassa nāmarūpassa sabbaso paccayāyattavuttikatādassanato ahetukadiṭṭhi pahīyati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_162: Attano anurūpapaccayasāmaggiyā vinā aññathā pavattiyā adassanato issaranimmāna kālanimmānādikā visamahetudiṭṭhica pahīyati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_163: Hetusambhārapaccayehi kammappavattiyā vipākappavattiyāca aññassa kammakārakassavā vipāka vedakassavā
anya-e0301n0:1461_164: kattuno abhāvadassanato kāraka vedaka diṭṭhi pahīyati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_165: Anamataggeca saṃsāre tīsu addhāsu hetuphala paraṃparāvasena kevalassa nāmarūpamattasseva pavattidassanato
anya-e0301n0:1461_166: ahosiṃ nukho ahamatītamaddhānanti evamādikāya puggalasatta visayāya soḷasavidhāya kaṅkhāyaca atikkamo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_167: Sabhāvadhammapavattiyāca suṭṭhu diṭṭhāya desanādhammassa sudhammatā dassanato buddhasubuddhatañca disvā
anya-e0301n0:1461_168: satthari kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatītiādinayapavattā aṭṭhavidhāpi kaṅkhā pahīyatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_169: Lokuttaradhammānaṃ saṅkhatānaṃpi sataṃ asammasanupagattā tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_170: Anusayasamūhanatthañca sammasananti katvā yattha kāmarāgādayo anusayā anusenti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_171: Teyeva dhammā sammasanārahā hontīti vuttaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_172: Imassa ca padassa lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassāti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1461_174: Khandhādinayaṃārabbhāti paṭisambhidāmagge vibhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ dvārachakkaṃ ārammaṇachakkaṃ viññāṇachakkaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1461_175: phassachakkaṃ vedanāchakkaṃ saññāchakkanti evamādikaṃ sammasanabhūmivibhāganayaṃ ārabbha anugantvā taṃnayānusārenāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1461_176: Tattha pana tevīsatiyā dhammakoṭṭhāsesu yassa yo koṭṭhāso pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_179: Kalāpavasenasaṃkhipitvāti khandhapañcakena ye rūpaṃ tāva atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnaṃpi samānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1461_180: sabbaṃ ekarūpapiṇḍabhāvena saṃkhipitvā esa nayo vedanā dīsupīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_182: Yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃvā bahiddhāvā oḷāritaṃvā sukhumaṃvā hīnaṃvā paṇītaṃvā yaṃ dūre santikevā.
anya-e0301n0:1461_183: Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhena.
anya-e0301n0:1461_191: Sabbaṃ viññāṇanti gahaṇameva kalāpavasena saṅkhipananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_196: Viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā nayena sammasitabbadhammapariggahena saheva sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_198: Tadatthassa pana pākaṭattā idha aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanapadameva therena gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_199: Tattha rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti taṃtaṃrūpaṃ ñāṇena daḷhaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ pathavidhātu aniccā khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0301n0:1461_200: Ayaṃ āpodhātu aniccā khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_201: Tattha imasmiṃ kāye sabbaṃ thaddhakriyāmattaṃ pathavīnāma.
anya-e0301n0:1461_203: Nānāhāraparivattiyā vā nānācittaparivattiyāvā nāniriyāpathaparivattiyāvā nānā kāyikakriyā parivattiyāvā parivattati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_205: Tattha navanavāsu kriyāsantatīsu pātubhontīsu pubbapubbakriyāsantatiyo nassanti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_206: Yasmāca santati nāma dhammato visuṃ natthi,
anya-e0301n0:1461_209: Evaṃ attano kāye nānāthaddhakriyānaṃ parivattiṃ passanto pathavidhātuyā khayavayaṃ passati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_210: Tañca passanto taṃsahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ khayavayaṃ passatiyeva.
anya-e0301n0:1461_214: Imāca kriyā khaṇe khaṇe parivattantiyeva. Imāsañca,
anya-e0301n0:1461_215: visuṃ visuṃ santatiparivattiṃ passanto āpādīnaṃ taṃsahajātarūpānañca khayavayaṃ passati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_216: Santatiparivattiṃ pana bahiddhā cakkhunā disvā jānāti,
anya-e0301n0:1461_218: Santatisarīrabhūtānaṃ pana dhātūnaṃ khayavayaṃ ñāṇenaeva passati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_219: Tasmā attano sarīrabbhantare taṃtaṃsantati parivattiṃ ñatvāvā tathā tathā kappetvā vā rūpadhātūnaṃ aniccattaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1461_221: Sesakhandhesupi taṃtaṃsantatinānāttaṃ ñatvā vedanādīnaṃ khayavayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ kātabbanti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_227: Etaṃ meti attano aṅgaṃ katvā pariharati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_228: Taṃ apariyantehi anekasahassehi abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhehivā vipariṇāmadukkhehivā abhiṇhaṃ pīḷeti. Bādhati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_229: Iti nānādukkhadhammehi abhiṇhaṃ sampaṭipīḷanasabhāvattā ekantena bhāyitabbaṭṭhena dukkhaṃnāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_231: Yo hi ito uddhaṃ mayhaṃ abbhantarimataronāma natthīti evaṃ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahito hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_235: Yathā vuttehi abhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi vinā kevalaṃ attano chandenavā vasenavā ajjhāsayenavā āṇāvidhānenavā niccaṃ avirajjhamāno pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_237: Tathārūpo eva hi dhammo niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ attakiccaṃ karoti nāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_238: Yo pana niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ tesaṃ yathāpavattaṃ sukhaṃ viddhaṃseti vikireti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_239: Dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ tesaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇādi mūlakaṃ nānādukkhaṃ janeti vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_242: Iti attakiccassa akaraṇato attapaṭipakkhakiccassa karaṇatoca rūpaṃ anattānāmāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_243: Kasmā panetaṃ attano vase navattati attakiccaṃ na karoti attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karotīti āha asārakaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_244: Tattha sāronāma paccayasāmaggiyā vinā kevalaṃ ajjhāsayamattena uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāca paccayupatthambhena
anya-e0301n0:1461_245: vinā yadicchakaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ vā samatthabhāvasaṅkhāto thāmabalaviseso vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_246: Rūpaṃ pana sayaṃpi evarūpo sāronāma na hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_248: Nahi tassa paccayasāmaggiyā vinā uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāpi paccayupatthambhena vinā khaṇamattaṃpi patiṭṭhātuṃvā thāmovā balaṃvā atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1461_249: Yañca attano thāmena balena vinā kevalaṃ paccayasāmaggi baleneva uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_251: Taṃ aneka sahassāni paccayābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhāni janetvā ekantena niccaṃ attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karoti, pīḷeti,
anya-e0301n0:1461_256: Nahi bhavantare uppannaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ aññaṃ bhavantaraṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n0:1461_257: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhaveeva asesaṃ nirujjhatīti. Apica,
anya-e0301n0:1461_258: ekasmiṃ bhavepi tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ mandādīnaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ saṃvaccharautu māsa pakkhatithi ahoratti
anya-e0301n0:1461_260: Santativasenāti sabhāgekasantānavasena pavattamānāya rūpasantatiyāvā arūpa santatiyāvā vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1461_261: Khaṇavasenāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ āyu parimāṇasaṅkhātassa khaṇassa vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1461_262: Etthaca khaṇavasena sammasanaṃnāma sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva visayo siyā,
anya-e0301n0:1461_264: Nahi te evaṃ parittake khaṇe uppādaṃvā nirodhaṃvā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_265: Tasmā addhāsantativasena sammasanameva idhā dhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_266: Lakkhaṇattayaṃsammasantassāti tesu tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu dhammesu tilakkhaṇāni āropetvā te dhamme punappunaṃ āmasantassa parimajjantassa.
anya-e0301n0:1461_267: Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anicca jātikataṃvā dukkhajātikataṃvā anattajātikataṃvā ñāṇe suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ karontassāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1461_268: Visesato pana imasmiṃ ñāṇe aniccalakkhaṇadassanameva padhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_269: Tasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva itarāni kamena diṭṭhāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_271: Tasmā ādito aniccalakkhaṇasseva suṭṭhu pākaṭabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_273: Paccayavasenāti rūpakkhandhe tāva avijjātaṇhupādānakammāhārasaṅkhātānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1461_277: Atītānantarabhave avijjātaṇhupādāna kammesu appahīnavasena samuditesu imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n0:1461_279: Yāva maraṇakālā khaṇe khaṇe nānākalāpavasena udenti pasavanti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_280: Tesu pana tasmiṃ bhave eva pahīnavasena niruddhesu tā rūpārūpasantatiyo nirujjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_282: Ettha pana yathā udake sati macchānāma honti,
anya-e0301n0:1461_284: Evaṃ kammajesu nāmarūpesu sati itarāni nāmarūpāni honti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_285: Asati na hontīti itarāni sabbāni kammajesu saṅgahetvā kammavasena udayabbayavidhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1461_286: Evaṃ avijjātaṇhupādānakammapaccayānaṃ vasena pañcakkhandhassa udayabbayapavatti hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_287: Kammavasena pana imasmiṃ bhave samudentānipi paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe kabaḷīkārāhārūpatthambhanaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1461_288: laddhā eva yathā pavattarūpasantatiyo anubandha mānā navanavā rūpasantatiyo samudenti.
anya-e0301n0:1461_290: Taṃ santatiyaṃ puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ ekabhavanirodhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0301n0:1461_291: yathā pavattasantatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjanti antaradhāyantīti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_0: Vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā pana bahiddhā ārammaṇesu āpātāgatesu ārammaṇasamphassaṃ laddhāeva chadvārikā kusalākusalavipāka kriyabhūtā samudenti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_4: Viññāṇaṃca sahajāta nāmeca vatthurūpeca pavattamāneeva pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1462_6: Khaṇavasenāti vuttappakāre paccaye anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ pavattikkhaṇavasena.
anya-e0301n0:1462_7: Khaṇasaddena cettha sammasanañāṇe vuttarūpasantati nāmasantatiyopi gahetabbā.
anya-e0301n0:1462_8: Nahi sāvakānaṃ ñāṇaṃ khaṇavasena nāmarūpānaṃ udayaṃvā vayaṃ vā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_9: Yathā pana rattandhakāre anto leṇe mahanto tamokhandho jāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1462_10: Dīpaṃ jālentassa pana dīpobhāso ekakkhaṇe eva sakalaṃ antoleṇaṃ pharamāno udeti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_14: Puna dīpe nibbāpīyamāne tamokhandhassa udayo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_16: Eva mevaṃ sarīre nānāutuvasenavā nānāhāravasenavā nānācitta vasenavā nāniriyāpathavasenavā nānāpayogavasenavā
anya-e0301n0:1462_17: udayapakkhānaṃ vayapakkhānañca nānāsantatīnaṃ udayañca udayato vayañca vayato sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā samanupassantassāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1462_18: Evaṃ samanupassantassa pana āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ pattassa udayabbaya ñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahante dasavidhā
anya-e0301n0:1462_30: Nikantīti obhāsādīhi saha vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā taṇhā.
anya-e0301n0:1462_32: Obhāsādayo pana tassā vatthubhūtattā upakkilesāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1462_33: Tesu hi uppajjamānesu na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo.
anya-e0301n0:1462_36: Phalaṃ pattosmīti evaṃ assādasahitā amagge maggasaññā aphale phalasaññā uppajjati.
anya-e0301n0:1462_37: Tadā koci abyatto yogāvacaro kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā adhimānavasena vikkhipanto vicaratīti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_38: Byatto pana tāvadeva sabhiṃ paṭilabhitvā idāni mama etesu obhāsādīsu etaṃ mama eso ha masmi eso me attāti cittassa nikāmanākāro paññāyati.
anya-e0301n0:1462_41: So vaḍḍhamāno maṃ niyyānamukhato pātetvā vaṭṭamukhe yojessati.
anya-e0301n0:1462_42: Handa tesveva lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā nikantiṃ sodhetvā yathāpavattaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipādessāmīti te obhāsādayo eva tāva pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1462_43: Ayaṃ me obhāso anicco khayaṭṭhena dukkho bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasatīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1462_44: Evaṃ te obhāsādike vipassanāya upakkilesabhūte paripantha dhamme pariggaṇhitvā tappariggahavasena tesu
anya-e0301n0:1462_45: nikantiṃ pariyādi yitvā ṭhitassa uppannaṃ maggāmaggalakkhaṇavavatthānañāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇa dassanavisuddhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1462_46: Amaggesu obhāsādīsu maggasaññāmalato yathā vuttanikantimalatoca visuddhattā.
anya-e0301n0:1462_47: Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tesu nikantiyāpi vikkhambhitāya eva obhāsādipaṭibandhato suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1464_0: Aniccādivasena obhāsādi paṭibandhapariggahaṃ visuṃ avatvā maggāmaggajānanamatteneva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhināma vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1465_0: Tathā paripanthavimuttassāti tathā pariggahetvā tato vipassanupakkilesaparipanthato vimuttassa yāvānulomāti yāvaanulomañāṇā.
anya-e0301n0:1465_2: Vipassanāparipākaṃāgammāti saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā tividha vimokkhamukhabhāvappattiyāceva sattaariyapuggalavibhāgassa
anya-e0301n0:1465_3: paccaya bhāvappattiyāca vipassanāñāṇassa paripākaṃ āgamma paṭicca.
anya-e0301n0:1465_9: Yāsikhāpattāsānulomāsaṅkhārupekkhāti matthakapattā anulomañāṇasahitā yā saṅkhārupekkhā atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1465_11: Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanānāmāti vuccantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_14: So hi vipassanāñāṇassa ārammaṇabhūta saṅkhāranimittatovā sayaṃ saṃyojanavatthubhāvatovā vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_15: Taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā puthujjanabhāvato samudayapahānavasena vaṭṭa pavattatoca vuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_17: Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vuṭṭhānagāminīti evaṃ dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vuṭṭhāna gāminibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1465_18: Tatoparanti dvinnaṃvā tiṇṇaṃvā vipassanā cittānaṃ pavattiyā paraṃ nibbānaṃ ālambitvāti maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_19: hutvā tassa purecarabhāvena nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
anya-e0301n0:1465_21: Puthujjana gottamabhibhavantanti etena gottaṃ bhavati abhibhavatīti gotrabhu.
anya-e0301n0:1465_22: Gottanti cettha paripuṇṇakilesa samāyogena anariyabhāvasaṅkhātā puthujjanajāti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_23: Ariyagottamabhisambhontañcāti etena gottaṃ bhavati pāpuṇātīti gotrabhu.
anya-e0301n0:1465_24: Gottantica taṃtaṃ kilesa visuddhabhāva saṅkhātā ariyajāti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_26: Dukkhasaccaṃparijānantoti tebhūmaka dhammānaṃ ekantadukkhabhāvaṃ paricchijja jānanto.
anya-e0301n0:1465_27: Parijānanañcettha tesaṃ dukkhabhāva paṭicchādakassa sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_28: Samudaya saccaṃpajahantoti attano cittasantāne anusayabhāvena pavattamānaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ samudayasaccaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_30: Nirodhasaccaṃsacchikarontoti cakkhumā viya nabhamajjhe virocamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ attano santāne ekadesassavā
anya-e0301n0:1465_31: sakalassavā kilesa vaṭṭassavā āyatiṃ bhāvino vipākavaṭṭassaṃvā attano santāne puna anuppādadhammabhāpattivasena
anya-e0301n0:1465_33: Maggasaccaṃbhāvanāvasenāti ito pubbe anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannapubbassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggasaccassa uppādanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya vasena.
anya-e0301n0:1465_34: Maggacetanāya pana ānantarikaphalattā taṅkhaṇe apanītaggike padese puna udakaṃ āsiñcitvā nibbāpento viya
anya-e0301n0:1465_35: maggānukūlapavattivasena dukkhaparijānanādīni cattāri kiccāni anukubbantāni tatoparaṃ dvevā tīṇivā phalacittāni
anya-e0301n0:1465_38: Yathā pana pasādacakkhunāvā dibbacakkhunāvā kiñcirūpaṃ passantassa tāni cakkhūni taṃ rūpaṃ paccakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_39: katvā pacchā tassa puggalassapi paccakkhato pātubhūtaṃ katvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_40: Na tāva tesaṃ uppattikkhaṇe taṃ rūpaṃ tassa ahaṃ idaṃnāma passāmīti pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_41: Pacchā pana paccavekkhana vāresu pavattamānesueva taṃrūpaṃ tadanubandhāca nānākārā tassa pātubhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_42: Evamevaṃ idhapi paccavekkhanavāresu pavattamānesueva nibbānañca tadanubandhāni maggaphalādīnica pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ punabhavaṅgaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n0:1465_44: Idāni paccavekkhanañāṇassa bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ maggaṃphalañcanibbānantiādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n0:1465_45: Tattha paṇḍitoti ariyāya paññāya samannāgato phalaṭṭho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_48: Imāni pana dve pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhanāni kesañci jīvitasamasīsipuggalānaṃ kilesa vibhāgesu
anya-e0301n0:1465_50: Etthaca visuddhimagge tāva sabbapathamaṃ maggapaccavekkhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_56: Vuttañhi tattha paccavekkhanesu pathamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_58: Taṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ paccavekkhana ñāṇassa niddesato pubbe pathamaṃ chinnamanupassane paññāvimutti ñāṇanti evaṃ visuṃ vimuttiñāṇassa āgatattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_59: Tattha chinnanti tena tena maggena samucchinnaṃ kilesajātanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_60: Pāḷi anu sārena vuccamāne pana pathamaṃ pahīnaṃ kilesānaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_64: Tato tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhananti vattabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_65: Pāḷiyañhi paccavekkhanañāṇaniddese nibbānaṃ maggavārepi phalavārepi dvikkhattuṃ āgatanti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_66: Iti nibbānapaccavekkhanaṃ nāma itaresaṃ paccavekkhanānaṃ ādimhivā majjhe antarantarāvā avasānevā yatthakatthaci pavattatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_68: Evañhi sati maggaṃ phalañca nibbānanti ayaṃ gāthāpi aviruddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_69: Evañca katvā adhimānaniddesaṭṭhakathāsu so hi maggaphalanibbāna pahīna kilesā vasiṭṭhakilesa paccavekkhanena
anya-e0301n0:1465_74: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesonāma natthīti cattārīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhanāni hontīti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_75: Idañca paripuṇṇa vasena labbhamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_77: Tathā hi cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_83: Imāsu pana pañcasupaccavekkhanāsu ekaṃvādvevā no laddhuṃ navaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_84: Evaṃ chabbisuddhikamena bhāvetabbo catubbidho maggo ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_85: Maggasaddena cettha catubbidhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ tadanukūlapavattivasena phalañāṇañca gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_89: Heṭṭhā silāpathaviyaṃ nikhātasinerupādassa viya ajjhattakhandhesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā pavattīti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_92: Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitāya khaṇabhaṅgassaca adiṭṭhattā so abhiniveso pavattati.
anya-e0301n0:1465_93: Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃ anattā vedanā anattātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃ abhinivesaṃ vimocayamānāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_96: vipallāsa nimittanti viparītavasena āsanaṃ upagamanaṃ pavattanaṃvā vipallāso.
anya-e0301n0:1465_98: So eva kile suppattiyā āsannakāraṇattā nimittanti vipallāsanimittaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_99: Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgassa adiṭṭhattā taṃnimittaṃ hotīti tesaṃ khaṇabhaṅgaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_100: katvā rūpaṃ aniccaṃ vedanā aniccātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃnimittaṃ vimocayamānāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_101: Taṇhāpaṇidhinti taṇhāeva abhisaṅgavasena ārammaṇe cittassa paṇidahanato daḷhaṃ thapanato paṇidhīti taṇhāpaṇidhi.
anya-e0301n0:1465_103: Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvassa adiṭṭhattā sopaṇidhi hotīti tesaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_104: sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃdukkhaṃ vedanādukkhātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃpaṇidhiṃ vimocayamānāti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1465_105: Tasmāti yasmā etā vimokkhamukhabhūtā tisso anupassanā evaṃ visesa nāmikā honti. Tasmā.
anya-e0301n0:1465_106: Yasmā saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasena atthasiddhināma kevalaṃ attākinivesabhūtassa diṭṭhigāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtassa ñāṇasseva ānubhāvo hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1465_107: tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuñcantassa vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātañāṇa kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadivuṭṭhāna.La.
anya-e0301n0:1465_109: Aniccadassanavasena atthasiddhināma nimittāti nivesabhūtassa mānagāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya saddhāyapi ānubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1465_110: Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātasaddhā kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadianiccato.La.
anya-e0301n0:1465_112: Dukkhadassanavasena atthasiddhināma paṇidhisaṅkhāta taṇhāgāhapaṭipakkhabhūtassa samādhissapi ānubhāvo.
anya-e0301n0:1465_113: Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātasamādhikiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_116: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_119: Magge pana tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccavisesonāma vipassanāgamanavaseneva siddhoti vuttaṃ maggo. La.
anya-e0301n0:1465_121: Tattha suññatavimokkhena vimutto ariyasāvako sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārīnāma hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_126: Apaṇihitavimokkhena vimutto pana aṭṭhasupi ṭhānesu kāyasakkhināma.
anya-e0301n0:1465_127: Soyeva arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vimutto arahattaphale ṭhito ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti ettāvatā yaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1465_128: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ vipassanāparipākamāgammāti saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvappattiyāceva
anya-e0301n0:1465_129: sattaariyapuggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvappattiyāca vipassanāñāṇassa paripākaṃ āgamma paṭiccāti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_131: Maggavīthiyaṃ phalañca maggāgamana vasena tathā tīṇi nāmāni labhatīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1465_132: Yathāvuttanayena vipassantānanti yadi anattato vipassatītiādinā vuttappakāranayena vipassantānaṃ catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_134: Sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmiphalantiādinā nayena attano attano santakabhūtaṃ yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ vipassanāgamana vaseneva suññatādivimokkhotica vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1465_136: Etthaca vipassanāgamana vasena maggassa animitta nāmalābhonāma suttantikapariyāyena vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1465_140: Teneva hissa dukkhapaṭipadā dandhā bhiññādivasenavā pāramidhammānaṃ parittamahantādivasenavā hīna paṇīta paṇītatara paṇītatama vibhāgo sandissatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_141: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aniccānupassanā saṅkhāresu niccanimittaṃ vidhamanavasena pavattattā animittānupassanānāma
anya-e0301n0:1465_142: samānāpi sayaṃ saṅkhāranimitte pariyāpannattā ekantena attanonāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_143: Tasmā maggo abhidhamma pariyāyena animittanāmaṃ nalabhatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_144: Suttantikapariyāyena pana yathā pathavikasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ pathavikasiṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1465_145: Evaṃ suññatādināmaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāni maggaphalānipi ārammaṇavasenapi suññatādināmaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_146: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pana sampayogavasenavā palibodhakarāca nimittakarāca paṇidhikarāca rāgādayo kilesadhammā tesu natthi.
anya-e0301n0:1465_147: Tasmā tāni aññaṃ āgamanaṃvā ārammaṇaṃvā anapekkhitvā attano sabhāvenapi suññatādināmaṃ labhantīti dassetuṃ ārammaṇavasenātiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1465_155: Yasmā sabbādiṭṭhiyoca soḷasavidhā vicikicchāca attadiṭṭhimūlikā eva honti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_156: Attadiṭṭhiyā niruddhāya nirujjhanti sabbānica apāyagāmi kammānināma attadiṭṭhiyā satiyāeva vipaccanti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_158: Diṭṭhasaccānañca sā diṭṭhi sabbaso pahīnā hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_164: Paṭividdhacatusaccānaṃ pahīnaattadiṭṭhīnaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā ekantena uparūpari vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1465_166: Tasmā te anukkamena parihāyitvā gacchantā uparima koṭiyā sattahi bhavehi sabbaso parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0301n0:1465_174: ubhayattha sattakkhattu paramoti tividho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n0:1466_0: Katamoca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti,
anya-e0301n0:1466_3: so sattakkhattuṃ deveca manusseca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_3: Yoca deveca manusseca missakabhava vasena sattakkhattuṃ saṃsarati.
anya-e0301n0:1467_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana missakabhava vasenassa attho vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1467_6: Etthaca yasmā mahaggatajjhānassaca uparimagga vipassanā yaca ānubhāvaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ imassa maggassa
anya-e0301n0:1467_8: Soca pāḷiyaṃ katamesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā.
anya-e0301n0:1467_9: Sattakkhattuparamassa kolaṃ kolassa ekabījissa sakadāgāmissa yoca diṭṭhevadhamme arahāti vuttattā kāmabhaveeva
anya-e0301n0:1467_11: Tenevaca paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭha kathāyaṃ tayopi ime sotāpannā kāmabhavavasena vuttā.
anya-e0301n0:1467_12: Rūpārūpabhave pana bahukāpi paṭisandhiyo gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1467_13: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhamaṃ bhavanti kāmabhave aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhinti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1467_14: Tasmā ye kāmabhaveyeva sattavārato oraṃvā diṭṭhadhamme yevavā uparimaggaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_15: Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavattiviseso upari maggavipassanābalena siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n0:1467_16: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1467_17: Ye pana diṭṭhadhammevā sakkaanāthapiṇḍikavisākhādayo viya sattasu bhavesu yatthakatthaci bhavevā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_18: Yeca brahmalokeyeva sotāpattimaggaṃ labhitvā tattheva parinibbāyanti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_19: Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavatti viseso mahaggatajjhānabalena siddhoti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_20: Yasmāca pāḷiyaṃ sattakkhattuṃ devecāti etena kāmabhave satta opapātika paṭisandhiyo dasseti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_21: Sattakkhattuṃ manussecāti etena satta gabbhaseyyakapaṭisandhiyo dassetīti ubhayena cuddasa paṭisandhiyo dassitā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1467_22: Tasmā tena pariyāyena labbhamāne cuddasabhave sandhāya sakkapañhasutte –
anya-e0301n0:1468_2: Tathā aṅguttareca tikanipāte sace udāyi ānando avitarāgo kālaṃ kareyya,
anya-e0301n0:1468_3: tena cittapasādena sattakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ kareyya.
anya-e0301n0:1468_5: Apica udāyi ānando diṭṭhevadhamme parinibbā yissatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1468_6: Keci pana imehi suttapadehi sattakkhattu paramassa sotāpannassa kāmabhave cuddasa paṭisandhiyo icchanti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_7: Mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṭīkāyañca keci pana kāmabhave sattakkhattuṃeva uppajjati,
anya-e0301n0:1468_10: Vibhaṅge pana tattha tattha aṭṭhānasuttesuca aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyya,
anya-e0301n0:1468_12: aṅguttare chakkanipāte abhabbo diṭṭhasampanno puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetunti ca,
anya-e0301n0:1468_14: nirodhena sattabhave thapetvā anama taggesaṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
anya-e0301n0:1468_19: evaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā yathāvuttanayeneva tesaṃ suttapadānaṃ attho veditabboti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_21: Tanukarattāti yathā sotāpannasantāne uppajjantā dhammikesu kāmavatthūsu balavantā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_23: tathā uppajjituṃ asamatthe katvā saṃlikhanavasena tanukaraṇato.
anya-e0301n0:1468_27: Mahāsivattherena pana tesaṃpi methunavatthu samāyogo icchito.
anya-e0301n0:1468_29: Yañca chakkanipāte migāsālavatthumhi abrahmacārinopi isidattassa brāhmaṇassa sakadāgāmittaṃ bhagavatā byākataṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1468_30: taṃpi tassa āsannamaraṇakāle adhigamavasena byākatanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1468_31: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā āgamanato sakadāgāmīnāma hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1468_34: Arahattaṃbhāvetvāti arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvākhīṇā cattāro āsavā yassāti khīṇāsavo.
anya-e0301n0:1468_35: Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṃ phalapaṭilābhatthāya dinnadānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1468_37: Tāya pana dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato sampattikarānañca sīlakkhandhādiguṇānaṃ
anya-e0301n0:1468_38: sabbaso paripuṇṇattā dakkhiṇeyyesu aggo jeṭṭhako hutvā taṃdakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggahituṃ arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0301n0:1468_45: Tattha saddhādhimutto paññādhimuttoti dve sotāpannā honti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_46: Te ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamocāti tīhi guṇitā cha.
anya-e0301n0:1468_47: Puna catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā catuvīsati honti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_48: Tividha vimokkhacatupaṭipadānaṃ pana bhedena dvādasa sakadāgāmino dvādasa arahantoca honti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_49: Anāgāmino pana avihesu tāva tayo antarāparinibbāyino,
anya-e0301n0:1468_52: Teyeva sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīcāti dvīhi guṇitā dasa.
anya-e0301n0:1468_54: Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīnāma natthīti cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti aṭṭhāti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_61: Teyeva saddhādhura paññādhura vasena dvīhi guṇitā aṭṭhasataṃ puggalā hontīti āgato.
anya-e0301n0:1468_64: Na nirodhasamāpatti viya ekaccānaṃeva sādhāraṇāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:1468_65: Ativiya mamāyitassa abhinindi tassa ajjhositassa attano cittasantānassa apavattikaraṇaṃ nāma bahalarāgavimuttānaṃeva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n0:1468_67: Tesaṃpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ kāmarūpabhavagatānaññeva idha gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā,
anya-e0301n0:1468_71: pathamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
anya-e0301n0:1468_72: Tato dutīyajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati.
anya-e0301n0:1468_77: Tato viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati.
anya-e0301n0:1468_78: Tato ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ saṅghapatimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ addhāna
anya-e0301n0:1468_81: Ekaṃvā dvevā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti nirodhaṃ phusatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_82: Tatthatatthevāti tato tato jhānato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vuṭṭhitakāleeva.
anya-e0301n0:1468_83: Vipassantoti nirodhassa samatha vipassanā yuganandhabaleneva pattabbattā vipassanābalenapi cittasantānassa
anya-e0301n0:1468_84: saṇhasukhumabhāvā pādanatthaṃ idaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanto.
anya-e0301n0:1468_88: Teneva hi paṭisambhidāmagge pañcavidhā vasiyo nirodhaparikammesu vuttāti.
anya-e0301n0:1468_91: Attano sarīrābandhe parikkhāre thapetvā nānābandhāni civarādīni parikkhārāni aggiādinā parissayena māvinassantūtivā,
anya-e0301n0:1468_92: ekasīmāyaṃ saṅghakamme karīyamāne saṅgho maṃ pabhimānessati,
anya-e0301n0:1468_96: Ādisaddena nirodhabbhantareeva maraṇaṃ nukho me bhavissatīti evaṃ pavatto addhāna paricchedo gahito.
anya-e0301n0:1468_98: Vocchijjaticittasantati tadatthāya ādito paṭṭhāya tathārūpassa payogavisesassa suṭṭhu katattā.
anya-e0301n0:1468_100: Anāgāmino anāgāmi phalacittaṃ nirāvajjanaṃpi nipparikammaṃpīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0301n0:1468_101: Tathāhi ādito paṭṭhāya punappunaṃ pavattitaṃ vipassanāparikammameva tassa parikammaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0301n0:1468_104: Evaṃ duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānanayaṃ niddisitvā idāni yadatthaṃ so niddisīyati,
anya-e0301n0:1468_105: tadatthe sotujane niyojento bhāve tabbanti gāthamāha.
anya-e0301n0:1468_114: Soeva assāditabbaṭṭhena assādo cāti paṭipatti rasassādo.
anya-e0301n0:1468_115: Sāsane paṭipattirasassādaṃ patthayantena bhikkhunā iccevaṃ mayā niddiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhāvanādvayaṃ bhāvetabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1473_1: Cārittena kulācārena sobhite ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā visāle kule udayo vaḍḍhi yassa soti cārittasobhitavisālakulodayo. Tena.
anya-e0301n0:1473_2: Saddhāya abhivuḍḍhānaṃ parisuddhānañca attano sīlasutacāgādiguṇānaṃ udayo vaḍḍhi etasminti saddhātivuḍḍhaparisuddhaguṇodayo. Tena.
anya-e0301n0:1473_4: Paṇidhāyāti bhusaṃ nidhāya hadaye thapetvā upādāya paṭicca.
anya-e0301n0:1473_5: Parānukampanti paresaṃ attano mandabuddhīnaṃ pacchimajanānaṃ anukampaṃ anudayaṃ kāruññaṃ paṇidhāyāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1473_7: Puññena tena vipulenāti tena vipulena abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇassa karaṇapuññena.
anya-e0301n0:1473_9: Vuttañhi khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṃsīhaḷadīpe tumūlasomavihāre saṅghassa pākavattaṃpi tāla paṇṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā karīyati.
anya-e0301n0:1473_10: Na hi tattha paṇṇena attho atthi.
anya-e0301n0:1473_12: Eso kira vihāro ādito abhayagirirañño aggamahesibhūtāya somadeviyā kārāpitattā yāvajjatanāpi somavihārotveva paññāyittha.
anya-e0301n0:1474_0: Athettha vattati saddo, tumūlo bheravo mahā;
anya-e0301n0:1477_1: Soca vihāro saṭṭhimattehi mahāpariveṇehi saṇṭhito hotīti ativiya vipulo mahanto vitthiṇṇo hoti.
anya-e0301n0:1477_2: Tasmā so vipulattā mahantattā vitthiṇṇattā tumūla somoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n0:1477_5: Etena thero attano ācariyavaṃsassa vasana vihāraṃ kitteti.
anya-e0301n0:1477_7: Dhaññādhivāsanti tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūta mahindattherādīnaṃ puññavantattherānaṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1477_8: Dīpapasādaka mahāmahindattherassa hi vaṃse jātattā tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūto mahātheropi mahindattheronāmāti dhātuvaṃse vutto.
anya-e0301n0:1477_10: Nabhamajjhe puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya sakalasīhaḷadīpe ativiya uggatanti attho.
anya-e0301n0:1477_11: Ariyamaggapaññāvasena pariyattivesārajjādi paññāvasenavā avadātehi pariyodātehi guṇehi sotitāti paññāvadātaguṇasotitā.
anya-e0301n0:1477_14: Puññavibhāvodaya maṅgalāyāti vipulānaṃ puññānaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhāta maṅgalatthāya.
anya-e0301n0:1477_16: puññena tena vipulena dhaññādhivāsaṃ uditoditaṃ tumūlasoma vihārañca tattha nipāsino mahindattherādike
anya-e0301n0:1477_17: paññāvadāta guṇasobhite lajjibhūte bhikkhūca puññavibhavodayamaṅgalāya āyukantaṃ maññantu pacchimā janāti.  Athavā,
anya-e0301n0:1477_18: taṃvihāraṃ aññe paññāvadāta guṇasobhita lajjī bhikkhū maññantūti yojanā.
anya-e0301n0:1477_19: Etena thero pacchimajanānaṃ chasu anuttariyadhammesu anussatānuttariyasaṅkhātaṃ puññavisesañca mayaṃpi
anya-e0301n0:1493_0: Ubho lokamhi jotantu, saddhammo yāva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0301n0:1494_0: Tattha nagare dīparaṅgamhīti dīpavāsimahājanaṃ rañjetīti dīparaṅganti laddhanāme nagare.
anya-e0301n0:1494_1: Gāme nāmaketi rohitamigānaṃ nivāsabhūmitale patiṭṭhitattā evaṃnāmake mahāgāme.
anya-e0301n0:1494_3: Yā mayāti paramatthadīpanīnāma yāṭīkā mayā saṅkhatāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n0:1494_6: Sārāsāravivekinanti ayaṃ sāro ayaṃ asāroti evaṃ sārañca asārañcavive cetvā jānituṃ samatthānaṃ.
anya-e0301n0:1494_8: Komudasāra deti kumudapupphayutte saradautu pariyāpannepacchi makattikamāse.
